src_original: bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre yogasthāne pañcamaṃ prabhāvapaṭalam // 5 //  (Dutt 55)  Paripākapaṭalam (Chapter 1.6)  tatra paripākaḥ katamaḥ /
tgt_original: 6 成熟品菩薩地持方便處成熟品第六云何成熟？

src_original: sā daśavidhā draṣṭavyā /
tgt_original: 略說十種：

src_original: yā punarapratisaṃhāryā pravāsanā sā pareṣāmeva hitasukhāya /
tgt_original: 若驅出者，還聽懺悔，既安樂彼兼利餘人。

src_original: bahiḥśuddhimupādāya pañcavidhā /  antaḥśuddhimupādāya pañcavidhā /  bahiḥśuddhimupādāya bodhisattvānāṃ pañcavidhā sattveṣvarthacaryā katamā /
tgt_original: 五種外清淨、五種內清淨。 五種外清淨者，一者無罪；

src_original: aparipakvānāñca sattvānāṃ paripācanā /
tgt_original: 一者一切眾生未熟者方便令熟；

src_original: paripakvānāñca sattvānāṃ vimocanā /
tgt_original: 二者已熟者令至解脫。

src_original: sā punastribhirmukhaiḥ veditavyā /
tgt_original: 復有三種：

src_original: dṛṣṭadhārmike 'rthe samādāpanā /
tgt_original: 一者與現世利；

src_original: sāṃparāyike 'rthe samādāpanā /  dṛṣṭadharma-sāṃparāyike 'rthe samādāpanā /
tgt_original: 二者與後世利； 三者與現世後世利。

src_original: tatra dhārmikaiḥ karmaguṇaiḥ bhogānāmarjana-rakṣaṇa-vardhana-samyak-samādāpanatayā dṛṣṭadhārmike 'rthe samādāpanā veditavyā /  yenāyaṃ parataśca praśaṃsāṃ labhate dṛṣṭe ca dharmai sukham /  upakaraṇasukhenānugṛhīto viharati /  tatra bhogān utsṛjya bhikṣākavṛtta-jīvikā-pratibaddhamavrajyā-samādāpanā /  sāṃparāyike 'rthe samādāpanā veditavyā /
tgt_original: 勸教眾生如法德業獲大財寶，守護增長與現世利，於此現世得大名稱及眾具樂，攝受安立勸捨大財，在家出家乞求活命。

src_original: yenāyaṃ niyataṃ saṃparāyasukhito bhavati na tvavaśyaṃ dṛṣṭe dharme /
tgt_original: 與後世利樂，已必定得故，現則不定。

src_original: tatra yā gṛhiṇo vā pravrajitasya vānupūrveṇa vairāgya-gamana-samādāpanā /  iyaṃ dṛṣṭadharma-sāṃparāyike 'rthe samādāpanā veditavyā /  yenāyaṃ dṛṣṭe ca dharme prasrabdha-kāya prasrabdha-cittaḥ sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharati /  saṃparāye ca viśuddhideveṣūpadyate /  nirūpadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāti /
tgt_original: 勸在家出家次第離欲，於此現世身心息止安隱樂住，後世則生淨妙天上，及無餘涅槃界而般涅槃，是名現世後世利。

src_original: tatra katamā bodhisattvānāṃ duṣkarā arthacaryā /  sā trividhā draṣṭavyā /
tgt_original: 難利益者，略說三種：

src_original: pūrvakuśalamūlahetvacariteṣu sattveṣvarthacaryā bodhisattvānāṃ duṣkarā /  tathā hi te duḥkhasamādāpyā bhavanti kuśale /
tgt_original: 一切眾生本不修善因而能利益，以苦勸化故。

src_original: mahatyāṃ bhogasaṃpadi vartamāneṣu sattveṣu tadadhyavasānagateṣvarthacaryā bodhisattvānāṃ duṣkarā /  tathāhi te mahati pramādapade pramādasthāne vartante /
tgt_original: 二者本修善根得大財寶深起貪著，而能利益彼大放逸故。

src_original: ito bāhyakeṣu tīrthikeṣu pūrvaṃ [ca] tīrthika dṛṣṭicariteṣu sattveṣvarthaṃcaryā bodhisattvānāṃ duṣkarā /  tathā hi te svayaṃ saṃmūḍhāścābhiniviṣṭāścāsmin dharmavinaye /
tgt_original: 三者外道異學著本邪見而能利益彼，極愚癡違正法故。

src_original: tathāhi pareṣāṃ pravāsanāṃ vyatikramanidānam /  pareṣūpalabhyāvyatikramāya cetayate /  kathaṃ svayaṃ paripācayati /
tgt_original: 若不還悔，安樂餘人，餘人見彼犯罪驅出因是自護。

src_original: tatra katamā bodhisattvānāṃ sarvatomukhī arthacaryā /  sā caturvidhā draṣṭavyā /
tgt_original: 一切門利益者，略說四種：

src_original: iha bodhisattvaḥ aśrāddhaṃ śraddhāsaṃpadi samādāpayati yāvatpratiṣṭhāpayati /
tgt_original: 一者不信者勸令生信乃至建立；

src_original: duḥśīlaṃ śīlasaṃpadi duṣprajñaṃ prajñāsaṃpadi matsariṇaṃ tyāgasaṃpadi samādāpayati yāvatpratiṣṭhāpayati /
tgt_original: 二者惡戒者勸修淨戒；

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: teṣāmevaṃ bhavati /  nūnametadasmākaṃ hitametatsukhaṃ yatrāyaṃ bodhisattvo 'smān samādāpitavān /
tgt_original: 彼作是念： 「是菩薩與我同利，必能令我安隱快樂。

src_original: yasmādayaṃ bodhisattvo yatraivāsmān sanniyojayati tadevātmanā samudācarati /
tgt_original: 以是菩薩所授我者自修行故，非不樂因而自修行。

src_original: ānulomikañca dharmaṃ deśayati akuśalāt sthānādyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya /  yathāvādī ca bhavati tathākārī /
tgt_original: 自作者，自如法住隨順說法，令他眾生出不善處安立善處。

src_original: tatrāyaṃ jānannahitamasukhaṃ nātmanā samudācarediti na cāsya samānārthasya bodhisattvasyaivaṃ bhavanti pare vaktāraḥ /
tgt_original: 」若以同利教授眾生，彼終不言：

src_original: tvaṃ tāvat svayaṃ na kuśalaṃ samādāya vartase /  kasmāttvaṃ paraṃ kuśale 'tyartha samādāpayitavyaṃ vaktavyamavavaditavyaṃ manyase /
tgt_original: 「汝自不行，云何勸授教誡他人？

src_original: tvameva tāvadanyairvaktavyo 'vavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavya iti /
tgt_original: 汝應從他諮受教誡。

src_original: asti bodhisattvaḥ paraiḥ samānārtha eva saṃstāṃ samānārthatāṃ pareṣāṃ nopadarśayati /  asti samānārthaḥ sasānārthatāmupadarśayati /  asti naiva samānārtho nāpi samānārthatāmupadarśayati /
tgt_original: 」有菩薩他同利，如是同利不示他。 有菩薩不同利，如是示同利。 有菩薩亦不同利亦不同利示他。

src_original: tatra prathamā koṭi tulyaguṇaprabhāvānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ bodhisattvamārge ācāryatvamabhyupagatānāṃ  tulyaguṇaprabhāvo bodhisattvaḥ praticchannakalyāṇatayā guṇān prabhāvañca nopadarśayati /
tgt_original: 初句者，諸菩薩等功德、住菩薩道等功德，菩薩隱覆真實功德不為顯示。

src_original: dharmānudharmapratipannastatsvabhāvānuvartī /  yenainaṃ pare naivamāha /
tgt_original: 若不如法住，眾人當言：

src_original: dvitīyā koṭī hīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ gaṃbhīreṣu sthāneṣūttrastānāṃ pratisaṃkhyāya bodhisattvaḥ teṣāmeva sattvānāṃ tenopāyena vinayanārthaṃ sahadhārmikamātmānamupadarśayati /  saṃcintya ā-caṇḍālānām ā-śunāmarthaṃ kartukāma upadravaṃ saṃśamitukāmo vinayitukāma ā-caṇḍālānām āśunāṃ (Dutt 156)
tgt_original: 第二句者，下劣眾生怖畏深法，菩薩思惟方便調伏，現同彼法如栴陀羅，疾得利益息惱調伏，故現與彼同。

src_original: sabhāgatāyāmupapadyate /  tṛtīyā koṭī calakuśalamūlasamādānānāṃ vineyānāṃ sthirīkaraṇārthaṃ bodhisattvaḥ samānārthaḥ adhikārtho vā samānārthatāmupadarśayati /
tgt_original: 第三句者，為調伏彼受動搖善根眾生故，菩薩以住善根若上善根顯示同利。

src_original: caturthī koṭī svayaṃ pramattaḥ parārthamapyabhyupekṣate /  tatra yacca dānamanekavidhaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ yacca śīlaṃ vistareṇa yāvadyā ca samānārthatā tatra pāramitābhiradhyātmaṃ buddhadharmaparipākaḥ /  saṃgrahavastubhiḥ [sarva]sattvaparipākaḥ /
tgt_original: 第四句者，心自放逸棄捨他利，從種種施如前說如戒廣說，乃至同利彼諸波羅蜜，自成熟佛法成熟攝事。

src_original: evameva kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmāsevanānvayād asau samyak prayoganiṣṭhā anantaraṃ viśuddhye saṃvartate /  sa paripākasvabhāvaḥ /
tgt_original: 如是菩薩修習善法真正方便具足究竟，次第堪任離障清淨，是名自性成熟。

src_original: tvameva tāvat svayaṃ nākuśalātsthānādyutthitaḥ kuśale ca sthāne pratiṣṭhitaḥ kasmāttvaṃ tatra paraṃ samādāpayitavyaṃ codayitavyaṃ smārayitavyaṃ manyase /
tgt_original: 「汝今云何教授他人發舉與念？

src_original: samāsato bodhisattvasyaitatkuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ karma veditavyam /
tgt_original: 是名略說菩薩善法業。

src_original: tatra yacca dānamanekavidhaṃ pūrvavadyāvat samānārthatā ityeṣāmanekavidhānāmaprameyāṇāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bodhipākṣikānāṃ tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ samudācāro veditavyaḥ /  dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ śreṣṭhatā veditavyā /
tgt_original: 從種種施乃至同利，是種種無量善法菩提分，當知三種行、二種勝。

src_original: tribhiḥ kāraṇairviśuddhirveditavyā /  kāyena vācā manasā samudācāro veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 三種淨身口意行，當知是行上妙。

src_original: udāratvādasaṃkliṣṭatvācca śreṣṭhatā niruttaratā asādhāraṇatā ca veditavyā /
tgt_original: 無染，當知是勝無上。

src_original: tatra sattvābhedato vastvabhedataḥ kālābhedattaścodāratā veditavyā /
tgt_original: 不共彼眾生等、事等、時等，是名上妙。

src_original: tvameva tāvat paraiścodayitavyaḥ smārayitavyaḥ samādāpayitavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 他應教汝發舉與念。

src_original: tatra sattvābhedo yadbodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvānadhiṣṭhāya sarvasattvānārabhya tāni dānādīni kuśalamūlāni samudācarati na kevalasyātmana evārthe  tatra vastvabhedo yadbodhisattvaḥ sarvāṇi sarvākārāṇi tāni kuśalamūlāni dānādikāni samādāya vartate /
tgt_original: 眾生等者，是菩薩為一切眾生行施等善根、不自為己。 事等者、是菩薩行施等一切種善根。

src_original: tatra kālābhedo yadbodhisattvaḥ satatasamitamanirākṛtaprayogo 'nikṣiptadhuro rātrau  ca divā vā dṛṣṭe vā dharme tenaiva ca hetunā 'bhisaṃparāye 'pi tāni dānādīni kuśalamūlāni samudācarati /
tgt_original: 時等者、是菩薩不離方便時節日夜、今世後世常修施等善根心不休息。

src_original: tatra caturbhirākārairasaṃkliṣṭatā veditavyā /
tgt_original: 無染者、有四種。

src_original: iha bodhisattvo muditacittaḥ tān kuśalān dharmānniṣevate na duḥkhī na durmanā avipratisārī bhavati tato nidānam /  punarbodhisattvaḥ paramanapahatya dṛṣṭigatānyanabhiniviśya duścaritenāvyāmiśrāṇi tāni kuśalamūlāni dānādikāni samudācarati /
tgt_original: 是菩薩歡喜心修習善法、不因是故生憂苦悔恨。 是菩薩不惱他人、不著諸見、不雜惡行，行施等善根。

src_original: punarbodhisattvaḥ satkṛtya sarvātmanā teṣveva guṇadarśī sāradarśī śāntadarśī suniścito 'parapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ tān kuśalān dharmān dānādīn samādāya vartate /
tgt_original: 是菩薩一切自己功德專至顯現，堅固顯現寂滅決定，不由於他行施戒等諸善法。

src_original: punarbodhisattvo na terṣā dānādīnāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṃṇāṃ vipākaṃ pratikāṃkṣate cakravartitvaṃ vā śakratvaṃ vā māratvaṃ vā brahmatvaṃ vā nāpi parataḥ pratikāraṃ pratyāśaṃsate /
tgt_original: 是菩薩不於施等善法而求果報，若轉輪聖王帝釋魔梵，不求他報、不依此等求名利身命。

src_original: kathaṃ paramadhyeṣate /  yasyāntike sattvānāmadhimātraśca premagauravaṃ niviṣṭaṃ bhavati /  yaścopāyajño bhavati dharmadeśanāyāṃ suśikṣitaḥ /
tgt_original: 」請他者，彼善方便巧說法者，眾所知識增上愛敬，勸請說法成熟眾生。

src_original: na tatra niśrito bhavati /  na sarvalābhasatkāraślokeṣu nāpyantataḥ kāyajīvite 'pi niśrito bhavati /  iti ya ebhirākāraiḥ prasādaprāmodyasahagataścāviṣamaśca satkṛtya cāniśritaśca dānādīnāṃ samānārthatāparyavasānānāṃ (Dutt 157)
tgt_original: 於此等行淨歡喜俱，不惱亂他、專至無依，從施等乃至同利諸善法行，是名無染。

src_original: tatreyamuttaptatā yadāśayaśuddhasya bodhisattvasya sarve te kuśalā dharmā apratisaṃkhyānakaraṇīyā bhavanti /  tatreyamacalanatā yadāśayaśuddho bodhisattvo yathā pratilabdhebhyo yathopacitebhyaśca ebhyaḥ kuśalebhyo dharmebhyo na parihīyate /
tgt_original: 菩薩入淨心地，一切善根熾然不動，是熾然淨心地。 菩薩一切善法不思惟起，是不動淨心地。

src_original: na bhavyo bhavatyāyatyāṃ parihāṇāya /  nānyatra teṣāṃ teṣāṃ rātridivānāmatyayātteṣāṃ teṣāmātmabhāvānāṃ samatikramāccandro  vā śuklapakṣe pratyupasthite vardhata eva ebhiḥ kuśalairdharmairna [pari]hīyate bodhisattvaḥ
tgt_original: 菩薩隨所得所修善法則不退轉，於未來世必定不退日夜增長，如明分月日夜增長，善法不退亦復如是。

src_original: ubhābhyāmābhyāṃ samastābhyāṃ svaparādhyeṣaṇākṛtaḥ paripāko veditavyaḥ /  ityanena saptaviṃśatividhena paripākopāyena sā ṣaḍvidhā paripākaprabheda saṃpadveditavyā /  indriyaparipākasya kuśalamūlaparipākasya jñānaparipākasya mṛdumadhyādhimātrasya ca paripākasya /
tgt_original: 此二十七種方便成熟，彼六種成熟分別具足，所謂諸根成熟、善根成熟、智慧成熟、下中上成熟。

src_original: niṣṭhāgamanabhūmibyavasthitasya punarbodhisattvasyaikajātipratibaddhasya caramabhavikasya  vā ete kuśalā dharmāḥ suviśuddhā veditavyā yeṣāmuttari bodhisattvabhūmau pariśuddhataratā nāsti /
tgt_original: 菩薩住究竟菩薩地一生相續，若最後有所得善根名為快淨，於上更無菩薩淨地故。

src_original: evaṃ tribhiḥ kāraṇaireṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samudācāraḥ /  dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ śreṣṭhatā /
tgt_original: 是名三種善行二種勝、三種淨。

src_original: tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ suviśuddhatā veditavyā dānādīnāṃ samānarthatāvasānānām /  tatra sarvadānasya sarvaśīlasya vistareṇa yāvatsarvasamānarthatāyā āsevitāyāḥ suviśodhitāyāḥ  sakalasaṃpūrṇāyā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirvajrasāraśarīratā saddharmacirasthitikatā  ca phalamabhinirvartate /
tgt_original: 當知從檀波羅蜜乃至同利，一切施等乃至一切同利，修習清淨如來具足充滿無上菩提金剛堅固身正法久住果報生。

src_original: tatra duṣkaradānena duṣkaraśīlena yāvadduṣkarasamānārthatayā āsevitayā suviśodhitayā tathāgatasyāpratisamāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgatatvaṃ phalamabhinirvartate /
tgt_original: 難施乃至難同利，修習清淨如來平等奇特未曾有法，成就果報生。

src_original: tatra sarvatomukhena dānena sarvatomukhena śīlena vistareṇa yāvatsarvatomukhayā samānārthatayā tathāgatasya sarvataḥ pradhānasattvairdevamanuṣyaiḥ pūjyatvaṃ phalamabhinivartate /  tatra satpuruṣadānasya satpuruṣaśīlasya yāvatsatpuruṣasamānārthatāyāḥ tathāgatasya
tgt_original: 一切門施乃至一切門同利，修習清淨如來為一切最勝眾生天人供養果報生。

src_original: ye kecitsattvā apadā vā [dvipadā vā] catuṣpadā vā bahupadā vā rūpiṇo vā 'rūpiṇo vā  saṃjñino vāsaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagā vā [teṣāṃ] sarveṣāṃ sattvānāmagryatvaṃ  phalamabhinirvartate /
tgt_original: 善人施等乃至善人同利，修習清淨如來於彼無足二足四足多足、色無色想無想非想非非想一切眾生最上果報生。

src_original: tatra sarvākārasya dānasya [sarvākārasya] śīlasya vistareṇa yāvatsarvākārāyāḥ samānārthatāyāstathāgatasyāprameyavicitrapuṇyaparigṛhītaṃ  dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanakāyatā phalamabhinirvartate /
tgt_original: 一切行施乃至一切行同利，修習清淨如來種種無量功德攝受，三十二大人相、八十隨形好身果報生。

src_original: (Dutt 158) tatra vighātārthikadānasya vighātārthikaśīlasya vistareṇa yāvadvighātārthikasamānārthatāyāḥ  tathāgatasya bodhimaṇḍa niṣaṇṇasya sarvamārapratyarthikavidhātāviheṭhāvikampanāpratibalanatā
tgt_original: 除惱施乃至除惱同利，修習清淨如來於菩提樹下一切魔怨不能傾動果報生。

src_original: tatra paripācakāḥ pudgalāḥ katame /  samāsataḥ ṣaṭ bodhisattvāḥ ṣaṭasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu vyavasthitāḥ sattvān paripācayanti /
tgt_original: 人成熟者，略說六種。 菩薩住於六地成熟眾生，謂住解行地菩薩行解行住；

src_original: tatrehāmutrasukhasya dānasya ihāmutrasukhasya śīlasya vistareṇa yāvadihāmutrasukhāyāḥ samānārthatāyāstathāgatasya paramadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattisukhaṃ phalamabhinirvartate /
tgt_original: 此世他世樂施乃至此世他世樂同利，修習清淨如來最勝禪解脫三昧正受安樂果報生。

src_original: tatra viśuddhasya dānasya viśuddhasya śīlasya vistareṇa yāvadviśuddhāyāḥ samānārthaṃtāyā  āsevitāyāḥ suviśodhitāyāḥ sakalasaṃpūrṇayāstathāgatasya sarvākārāścatasraḥ pariśuddhayaḥ
tgt_original: 清淨施乃至清淨同利，修習清淨如來一切種清淨，所謂四種淨：

src_original: āśrayapariśuddhirālambanapariśuddhiścittapariśuddhirjñānapariśuddhiḥ phalamabhinirvartate /  tathā trīṇyārakṣyāṇi daśabalavaiśāradyasmṛtyupasthāna-sarvāveṇikabuddhadharmaviśuddhiśca phalamabhinirvartate /
tgt_original: 身淨、緣淨、心淨、智淨果報生，三不護、十力、四無畏、三念處、一切不共佛法清淨果報生。

src_original: idamasya bodhisattvasya dānādīnāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ paryantagataṃ phalaṃ niruttaram /  anyaccāsyāpramāṇamiṣṭamanavadyaṃ bodhisattvacaryāsu saṃsarato veditavyam /
tgt_original: 是名菩薩施等諸善法果報無上，無量菩薩無罪行之所出生。

src_original: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre yogasthāne pañcadaśamaṃ saṃgrahavastupaṭalam /  (Dutt 159)  Pūjāsevā 'pramāṇapaṭalam (Chapter 1.16)
tgt_original: 16 供養習近無量品菩薩地持方便處供養習近無量品第十六云何菩薩供養如來？

src_original: uddānam /
tgt_original: 略說十種：

src_original: ratna-pūjā mitra-sevā apramāṇaiśca paścimam /
tgt_original: 一者身供養； 二者支提供養；

src_original: śarīra-pūjā caitya-pūjā sammukha-pūjā vimukha-pūjā svayaṃkṛta-pūjā para-kārita-pūjā lābha-satkāra-pūjā udāra-pūjā asaṃkliṣṭapūjā pratipatti-pūjā ca /
tgt_original: 六者他作供養； 七者財物供養； 八者勝供養； 九者不染污供養； 十者至處道供養。

src_original: tatra yadbodhisattvaḥ sākṣāt tathāgata-rūpa-kayameva pūjayati /  iyamasyocyate śarīra pūjā /
tgt_original: 若菩薩於佛色身而設供養，是名身供養。

src_original: tatra yadbodhisattvastathāgatamuddisya stūpaṃ vā gahaṃ vā kūṭaṃ vā purāṇacaitya vā abhinava-caityaṃ vā pūjayati /  iyamasyocyate caitya-pūjā /
tgt_original: 若菩薩為如來故，若供養偷婆、若窟、若舍，若故若新，是名支提供養。

src_original: yad bodhisattvastathāgata-kāya vā tathāgata-caityaṃ vā sammukhībhūtamadhyakṣa pūjayati /  iyamasya sammukha-pūjetyucyate /
tgt_original: 若菩薩面見佛身及支提而設供養，是名現前供養。

src_original: tatra yad bodhisattvastathāgate vā tathāgate-caitye vā sammukha-pūjāṃ kurvannevamadhyāśaya-sahagataṃ prasāda-sahagataṃ cittamabhisaṃskaroti
tgt_original: 若菩薩於如來及支提，悕望心俱、歡喜心俱，現前供養；

src_original: yā ekasya tathāgatasya dharmatā sā sarveṣāṃ tathāgatānāmatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ dharmatā /
tgt_original: 如一如來法，如是過去未來現在一切如來法；

src_original: yā ekasya tathāgata-caityasya dharmatā sā sarveṣāṃ tathāgata-caityānāṃ dharmatā /
tgt_original: 如一如來支提法，如是一切如來支提法。

src_original: tatra paripācyāḥ pudgalāḥ samāsataścatvāraḥ /
tgt_original: 人成熟者，略說四種。

src_original: adhimukticaryābhūmisthito (Dutt 60)  bodhisattvo 'dhimukticārī /  śuddhādhyāśayabhūmisthito bodhisattvaḥ śuddhādhyāśayaḥ /
tgt_original: 淨心地菩薩行淨心；

src_original: ityato 'hametañca sammukhībhūtaṃ tathāgataṃ pūjayāmi sarvāṃśca tān atītānāgatapratyutpannāṃśca tathāgatān pūjayāmi /  etacca sammukhībhūta tathāgata-caityaṃ pūjayāmi /  tadanyāni ca daśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvāṇi stūpāni gahāni kūṭāgārāṇi purāṇa-caityāni abhinava-caityāni pūjayāmi /
tgt_original: 作是念： 「我今現前供養如來及供養過去未來現在如來，我今現前供養如來支提及供養一切十方無量世界一切支提，若偷婆、若窟、若舍，若新若故。

src_original: itīyaṃ tāvad bodhisattvasya sādhāraṇā sammukhā /
tgt_original: 」是名菩薩共現前不現前供養。

src_original: vimukhā ca tathāgata-pūjā tathāgata-caitya-pūjā ca veditavyā /  yatpunarbodhisattvaḥ asammukhībhūte tathāgate tathāgata-caitye vā tathāgatacittamabhisaṃskṛtya (Dutt 160)  pūjāṃ prayojayati sarvabuddhānuddiśya sarvatathāgatacaityāni coddiśya /  sāsya kevalā vimukhaiva pūjā veditavyā /
tgt_original: 若菩薩於不現前如來及支提心念供養，為一切佛故、為一切如來支提故，是名不現前供養。

src_original: yadapi bodhisattvaḥ parinirvṛte tathāgate tathāgatamuddiśya tathāgatasya śarīraṃ  stūpaṃ vā kārayati gahaṃ vā kūṭaṃ vā ekaṃ vā dvau vā sambahulāni vā yāvat koṭi-śatasahasrāṇi  yathāśakti-yathābalam /
tgt_original: 若菩薩於如來般涅槃後，以佛舍利起偷婆、若窟若舍，若一若二若多乃至億百千萬，隨力所能，是名菩薩廣不現前供養。

src_original: iyamapi bodhisattvasya tathāgateṣu vimukhā vipulā pūjā apramāṇa-puṇya-phalā 'nekabrāhmapuṇyaparigṛhītā /  yathā bodhisattvaḥ anekaireva kalpai[rmahākalpai]ravinipātagāmī bhavati /  na cānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ sambhāraṃ na paripūrayati tannidānam /
tgt_original: 以是因緣，得無量大果，常攝梵福，是菩薩常於無量大劫不墮惡趣，無上菩提眾具滿足。

src_original: tatra yeyaṃ bodhisattvasya kevalaiva tathāgate tathāgatacaitye vā pūjā iyameva tāvadvipulapuṇyaphalā draṣṭavyā tato vipulatarapuṇyaphalā kevalaiva vimukhā draṣṭavyā /  tato vipulatamapuṇyaphalā sādhāraṇasamsukhavimukhā pūjā draṣṭavyā /  tatra yad bodhisattvastathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā pūjāṃ kartukāmaḥ svayameva  svahastaṃ karoti na dāsīdāsakarmaṃkara-[pauruṣeya-]mitrāmātyajñātisālohitaiḥ kārayatyālasyakausīdyaṃ
tgt_original: 若菩薩於如來及支提，現前供養得大功德，不現前供養得大大功德，共現前不現前供養得最大大功德。

src_original: pramādasthānaṃ vā niśritya /  iyaṃ bodhisattvasya svayaṃkṛtā pūjā veditavyā /  tatra yadbodhisattvastathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā pūjāṃ kartukāmo na kevalaṃ svayeva
tgt_original: 若菩薩於如來及支提手自供養，不依懈墮令他施作，是名菩薩自作供養。

src_original: karotyapi tu mātāpitṛbhyāṃ kārayati putradāreṇa dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyairmitrāmātyajñātisālohitaiḥ  paraiśca rājabhiḥ rājamahāmātrairbrāhmaṇaigṛhapatibhirnaigamairjānapadairdhanibhiḥ  śreṣṭhabhiḥ sārthavāhairantataḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikābhiḥ kṛpaṇaiduḥkhitaira ā-caṇḍālairapi kārayati /  tathā 'cāryopādhyāyaiḥ sārdhavihāryantevāsibhiḥ sabrahmacāribhiśca pravrajitairapyanyatīrthyaistathāgate [vā tathāgata-]caitye vā pūjāṃ kārayati  iyaṃ bodhisattvasya sādhāraṇā pūjā svaparakṛtā veditavyā /
tgt_original: 若菩薩於如來及支提不獨供養，普令父母師友親屬國王大臣長者居士在家出家悉共供養，是名自他共供養。

src_original: yatpunarbodhisattvaḥ parītte pūjākaraṇīye deyavastuni saṃvidyamāne karuṇāsahagatena  cetasā saṃcintya pareṣāmeva tadvastvanuprayacchatyete duḥkhitāḥ sattvā alpapuṇyāścāśaktāśca  tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā kārāṃ kṛtvā sukhitā bhavantviti /  pare ca tena vastunā tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā pūjāṃ kurvanti na bodhisattvaḥ iyaṃ bodhisattvasya kevalā parakāritā pūjā veditavyā /
tgt_original: 若菩薩有少許物，以慈悲心施彼貧苦薄福眾生，令得供養如來及支提，令得安樂而不自為，是名菩薩他作供養。

src_original: (Dutt 161)  tatra yā kevalā svayaṃkṛtā sā mahāpuṇyaphalā /  yā kevalā parakāritā sā mahattarapuṇyaphalā /  yā punaḥ sādhāraṇā yā mahattamapuṇyaphalā niruttarā veditavyā /
tgt_original: 自作供養者得大果報，他作供養者得大大果報，自作他作供養者得最大大果。

src_original: tatra yadbodhisattvaḥ tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārairabhivādanavandanapratyutthānāñjalikarmabhiśca  dhūpagandhaiścūrṇagandhairanulepanagandhairvicitraiśca mālyairvicitrairvādyai rvicitraiśchatradhvajapatākāpradīpadānairvicitraiḥ  stotrābhivyāhāraiḥ pañcamaṇḍalapraṇāmaiḥ pradakṣiṇāvartaiḥ pūjāṃ karoti /  tathā 'kṣayaṇikāpradānaiḥ maṇimuktāvaidūryaśaṃkhaśilāpravāḍāśmagarbhamusāragalvajātarūparajatalohitikā-dakṣiṇāvartaprabhṛtibhiḥ
tgt_original: 若菩薩於如來及支提，以衣食床臥湯藥眾具、問訊禮拜奉迎合掌、熏香末香塗香種種花鬘伎樂幢幡繒蓋燈明、種種讚歎五輪作禮敬遶右旋以為供養，無盡勝財摩尼真珠珂珼玉石、珊瑚琥珀車𤦲馬瑙、金銀赤寶左旋勝寶摩尼寶環，懸以寶鈴散以金錢金縷圍遶。

src_original: ratnapradānairmaṇikuṇḍalakeyūrādyalaṅkārapradānairantataśca ghaṇṭāpradānakārṣāpaṇa-kṣepasūtrapariveṣṭanaiḥ pūjayati /  iyaṃ bodhisattvasya tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā lābhasatkārapūjā veditavyā /  tatra yadbodhisattvo dīrghakālikīñca tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā etāmeva lābhasatkārapūjāṃ  karoti prabhūtavastukāñca praṇītavastukāñca sammukhavimukhāñca svayaṃkṛtaparakṛtāñca  ghanarasena ca prasādena sammukhībhūtena tīvrayā cādhimuktyā pūjāṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 施如是等寶，是名財物供養。

src_original: tacca kuśalamūlamanuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati /  iyaṃ bodhisattvasya saptākārā udārapūjetyucyate /  tatra yadbodhisattvaḥ svahastaṃ tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā kārāṃ karoti na parairavajñayā kārayati pramādakausīdyādvā /  satkṛtya karoti /  nāpaviddhamavikṣiptacittaḥ karotyasaṃkliṣṭacittaḥ /
tgt_original: 若菩薩久遠於如來及支提以財物供養，若多若勝、若現前不現前、若自作他作，淳淨信心現在前，專精解心而作供養，以是善根迴向無上菩提，如是七種名菩薩勝供養。 若菩薩自手供養如來及支提，不輕他人、不放逸、不懈怠，至心恭敬不輕未、不亂心、不染污心，不於信心國王諸勝人所現諂曲威儀求財供養，不以雌黃塗佛形像，亦不以汁而洗浴之，亦不燒求求羅香而以供養，阿迦花等諸不淨物悉不用之，是名菩薩六種無染污供養。

src_original: na buddhābhiprasannānāṃ rājādīnāmudārasattvānāṃ lābhasatkārahetoḥ kuhanārthaṃ pratirūpeṇa ca vastunā pūjayati /  na haritāla-lepana-dhṛtasnāna-gugguludhūpārkapuṣpādibhiranyaiścākalpikairupakaraṇaiḥ /  iyaṃ bodhisattvasya ṣaḍākārā 'saṃkliṣṭā pūjā veditavyā /  tāṃ punaretāmudārāmasaṃkliṣṭāṃ lābhasatkārapūjāṃ bodhisattvastathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā svabāhubalopārjitairbhogaiḥ karoti parato vā paryeṣitaiḥ  ṣariṣkāravaśitā-pratilabdhairvā /
tgt_original: 若菩薩殊勝不染財物供養如來及支提，若自力得、若從他求、若如意得，彼眾具自在如意得財。

src_original: tatra pariṣkāravaśitāprāpto bodhisattvaḥ dvau vā (Dutt 162)  trīnvā saṃbahulān vā samucchrayān yāvat samucchryakoṭīniyutaśatasahastrāṇyanekānyabhinirmāya sarvaistaiḥ samucchrayaistathāgateṣu praṇāmaṃ karoti  teṣāñca samucchrayāṇāmekaikasya hastaśataṃ hastasahasraṃ vā tato vā pareṇa nirmāya
tgt_original: 菩薩若化作身，若二若三乃至百千萬億身，彼一一身悉禮如來；

src_original: caryāpratipattibhūmisthito bodhisattvaścaryāpratipannaḥ /
tgt_original: 住行道跡地菩薩行道跡；

src_original: sarvaistairdivyasamatikrāntaiḥ kusumaiḥ paramasugandhibhiḥ paramamanoramaiḥ tāṃstathāgatānabhyavakirati /
tgt_original: 彼一一身化作百千手，彼一一手以種種華香供養如來及支提。

src_original: sarve ca te samucchrayā atyudārāṇi tathāgatabhūtaguṇopasaṃhitāni stotrāṇi bhāṣante /  sarvaireva ca taiḥ samucchrayairvicitrāṇyamātrāṇi [agrāṇi] praṇītāni keyūramaṇikuṇḍalāni chatradhvajapatākāśca tathāgateṣūtsṛjayattyāropayati  iyamevaṃbhāgīyā pariṣkāravaśitā-prāptasya bodhisattvasya svacittapratibaddhā pūjā /
tgt_original: 彼一切身悉讚歎如來真實功德饒益眾生，彼一切身皆以上妙衣服眾寶瓔珞幢幡花蓋供養如來，如是等名為如意自在力得。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: tathāhi tasyāvaivartikabhūmipraviṣṭatvāt sarvabuddhakṣetreṣvavyāhatā gatirbha vati /
tgt_original: 住不退轉地菩薩於一切佛剎未曾障礙故。

src_original: niyata bhūmisthito bodhisattvo niyata-patitaḥ /  niyatacaryā-pratipattibhūmisthito bodhisattvo niyatacaryāpratipannaḥ /
tgt_original: 住決定地菩薩住決定； 住決定行地菩薩行決定行；

src_original: no cāpi bodhisattvasya svabāhubalopārjitā bhogā bhavantināpi ca parataḥ paryeṣitalabdhā vā /  nāpi ca bodhisattvaḥ pariṣkāravaśitāprāpto bhavati /
tgt_original: 若菩薩不自力得財、不從他求亦不自在力得而為供養；

src_original: api tu yā kācit tathāgatapūjā jambūdvīpe [vā] cāturdvīpe vā sāhasre [vā dvisāhasre  vā trisāhasra-]mahāsāhasre vā yāvaddaśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu mṛdumadhyādhimātrā pravartate /  tāṃ sarvāṃ śrāddho bodhisattvaḥ prasādasahagatenodārādhimuktisahagatena cetasā spharitvābhyanumodate /
tgt_original: 然於他眾生，若閻浮提、若四天下、若千世界、若二千世界、若三千大千世界，乃至十方無量世界，上中下心所作供養，菩薩於彼一切供養，以淨信心、勝妙解心周遍隨喜。

src_original: iyamapi bodhisattvasyālpakṛcchreṇa mahatī apramāṇā tathāgatapūjā bodhāya mahāsaṃbhāraparigṛhītā yasyāṃ bodhisattvena satata-samitaṃ kalyāṇacittena hṛṣṭacittena yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
tgt_original: 是菩薩以少方便興大供養，攝大菩提具。 是菩薩常等真實心、可喜樂心應當修學。

src_original: tatra yadbodhisattvaḥ stokastokaṃ muhūrtamuhūrtamantato godohamātramapi sarvasattva prāṇibhūteṣu maitracittaṃ bhāvayati /  karuṇāsahagataṃ muditāsahagatamupekṣāsahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati /  tathā sarvasaṃskāreṣvanityasaṃjñāmanitye duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ duḥkhe 'nātmasaṃjñāṃ nirvāṇe cānuśaṃsasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati /  tathā tathāgatānusmṛtiṃ dharmasaṃghapāramitānusmṛtiṃ bhāvayati /  tathā stokastokaṃ muhūrtamuhūrtaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ prādeśikena mṛdukṣāntikenāpi jñānena nirabhilāpyadharmasvabhāvatathatādhimukto nirvikalpena nirnimittena cetasā viharati /
tgt_original: 彼菩薩少時乃至一𤛗牛頃，於一切眾生修習慈心悲心喜心捨心，於一切有為行起無常想、無常苦想、苦無我想、涅槃安樂想，念佛念法念僧、念波羅蜜，乃至少時於一切法起少忍知，離言說法自性如解脫，離諸妄想無相心住，況復過上。

src_original: tathā bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvaraparipālanā /  śamathavipaśyanāyāṃ bodhipākṣikeṣu ca dharmeṣu yogakriyā /  tathā pāramitāsu saṃgrahavastuṣu ca samyagyogakriyā /  itīyaṃ bodhisattvasya pratipattisahagatā tathāgata pūjā 'gryāvarā (Dutt 163)  praṇītā niruttarā /
tgt_original: 彼菩薩護持禁戒、止觀、菩提分方便、諸波羅蜜、諸善攝事方便，是名菩薩至處道供養如來，第一最上最妙最勝無上。

src_original: yasyāḥ pūjāyāḥ pūrvikā lābhasatkārapūjā sarvākārāpi śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti vistareṇa yāvadupaniṣadamapi nopaiti
tgt_original: 如此供養，比前財物供養，百倍千倍乃至極算數譬喻不得為比。

src_original: itīyaṃ daśabhirākāraiḥ sarvākārā tathāgatapūjā veditavyā /
tgt_original: 如是十事，名菩薩一切種供養如來。

src_original: yathā tathāgatapūjā evaṃ dharmapūjā saṃghapūjā yathāyogaṃ veditavyā /
tgt_original: 如供養佛，如是法、如是僧，隨所應當知於此三寶作十種供養。

src_original: tatra triṣu ratneṣvetāṃ daśākārāṃ pūjāṃ kurvanbodhisattvastathāgatālambanaiḥ ṣaḍmiradhyāśayaiḥ karoti /  guṇakṣetraniruttarādhyāśayatayā upakāriniruttarādhyāśayatayā 'padadvipadādisarvasattvāgryādhyāśayatayā  udumbarapuṣpavat sudurlaṃbhā 'dhyāśayatayā ekākinastrisāhasrama sāhasre loka utpādātkevalādhyāśayatayā  laukikalokottarasampatsarvārthaṃpratisaraṇādhyāśayatayā /
tgt_original: 菩薩於如來所起六種淨心，謂福田無上心、恩德無上心、於一切眾生無上心、如優曇鉢花難遇心、於三千大千世界獨一心、於世間出世間法一切具足依義心。

src_original: tasyaibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiradhyāśayaiḥ tathāgate tasya vā dharme tasya vā saṃghe pūjā prakalpitā parīttāpyaprameyaphalā bhavanti prāgeva prabhūtā /
tgt_original: 以此六心少想供養如來法僧獲無量功德，何況多。

src_original: tatra katibhirākāraiḥ samanvāgataṃ bodhisattvasya kalyāṇamitraṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 菩薩成就幾行為善知識？

src_original: katibhiścākāraiḥ kalyāṇamitratā 'bandhyā bhavati /  katibhikārāraiḥ samanvāgataṃ kalyāṇamitraṃ prasādapadasthānagataṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 有幾行善知識開導無礙？ 復有幾行得善知識淨信住處？

src_original: kati kalyāṇamitrabhūtasya [bodhisattvasya] vineyeṣu kalyāṇamitra-karaṇīyāni bhavanti /  katividhā ca kalyāṇamitrasaṃsevā bodhisattvasya /
tgt_original: 復有幾行善知識調伏眾生、為善知識事？ 菩薩有幾行習近善知識？

src_original: katyākārayā ca saṃjñayā kalyāṇamitrasyāntikādbodhisattvena dharmaḥ śrotavyaḥ /  katiṣu ca sthāneṣu kalyāṇamitrasyāntikād bodhisattvena dharmaṃ śruṇvatā tasmindharmabhāṇake pudgale 'manasikāraḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
tgt_original: 復有幾行想於善知識聽受正法？ 菩薩於善知識聽受正法復有幾處？

src_original: tatrāṣṭābhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgataṃ bodhisattvasya kalyāṇamitraṃ sarvākāraparipūrṇaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 無有想念菩薩成就八事，滿足一切善知識行。

src_original: niṣṭhāgamanabhūmisthito bodhisattvo niṣṭhāgataḥ /
tgt_original: 住究竟地菩薩到究竟。

src_original: vṛttastho bhavati bodhisattvasaṃvaraśīleṣu vyavasthito 'khaṇḍacchidrakārī /
tgt_original: 一者善住律儀戒而不毀犯；

src_original: adhigamayuktaśca bhavati lābhī bhāvanāmayasyānyatamānyatamasya kuśalasya lāmī śamathavipaśyanāyāḥ /
tgt_original: 三者得禪定修慧及餘止觀善根；

src_original: anukampakaśca bhavati kāruṇikaḥ so 'dhyupekṣya svaṃ dṛṣṭadharmaṃsukhavihāraṃ pareṣāmarthāya parayujyate /
tgt_original: 四者悲心哀愍捨現法樂廣化眾生；

src_original: viśārado bhavati na pareṣāmasya dharmaṃ deśayataḥ smṛtiḥ pratibhānaṃ - va śāradyabhayāt pramuṣyate /
tgt_original: 五者成就無畏為眾說法，正念不失樂說無畏；

src_original: kṣamaśca bhavati parato 'vamānanāvahasanāvaspandana durukta-durāga-tādīnāmaniṣṭānāṃ vacanspathānāṃ vividhānañca sattvavipratipattīnām /
tgt_original: 六者堪忍輕欺罵辱諸不愛言，及諸惡行皆悉能忍；

src_original: aparikhinnamānasaśca (Dutt 164)  bhavati balavān pratisaṃkhyānabahulaḥ akilāsī catasṛṇāṃ pariṣadāṃ dharmadeśanāyai /
tgt_original: 七者無惓，多思惟力，為四眾說法而不疲懈；

src_original: śrāvakagotraḥ śrāvakayāne /  pratyekabuddhagotraḥ pratyekabuddhayāne /
tgt_original: 有聲聞種性，以聲聞乘而成熟之； 有緣覺種性，以緣覺乘而成熟之；

src_original: tatrāgotrasthānāṃ pudgalānāṃ sugatigamanāya paripākaḥ punaḥ punaḥ pratyāvartyo bhavati punaḥ punaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /  gotrasthānāṃ punaḥ paripāko na pratyāvartyo bhavati na punaḥ punaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
tgt_original: 無種性處人，善趣成熟，數退數進。 有種性處人，令得成熟，無有退失，數數增進。

src_original: kalyāṇavākyaśca bhavati vākkaraṇenopeto dharmatāpraṇaṣṭaspaṣṭavāk /
tgt_original: 八者辯才巧便，凡所說法言辭通利。

src_original: tatra pañcabhirākāraireva sarvākāraguṇayuktasya bodhisattvasya kalyāṇamitrasyābandhyaṃ kalyāṇamitrakaraṇīyaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 菩薩有五事，如是一切種功德具足善知識，善知識所作開導無礙。

src_original: sa hi pareṣāmādita eva hitasukhaiṣī bhavati /
tgt_original: 一者先欲安樂眾生；

src_original: tacca hitasukhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /  na tatra viparyastabuddhirbhavati /
tgt_original: 二者於彼安樂如實知之不顛倒覺；

src_original: yena copāyena yadrupayā dharmadeśanayā yaḥ sattvaḥ śakyarūpo bhavati vinetuṃ tatra śakto bhavati pratibalaḥ /
tgt_original: 三者若作方便隨順說法，善能隨順調伏眾生有堪能力；

src_original: aparikhinnamānasaśca bhavati /
tgt_original: 四者心不疲厭；

src_original: samakāraṇyaśca bhavati /  sarvasattveṣu hīnamadhyaviśiṣṭeṣu na pakṣapatitaḥ /
tgt_original: 五者平等悲念一切眾生，於上中下心無偏黨。

src_original: tatra paripakvapudgalalakṣaṇaṃ katamat /  śrāvakaḥ pūrvakuśalābhyāsād yadāmṛdupākavyavasthito bhavati sa mṛducchando bhavati  mṛduprayogaścāpāyānapi gacchati na ca dṛṣṭe dharme śrāmaṇyaphalamadhigacchati na  ca dṛṣṭe dharme parinirvāti /
tgt_original: 人相成熟者，本習聲聞住下成熟者，下欲下方便，未離惡趣，於現法中不得沙門果，於現法中不得涅槃。

src_original: tatra pañcabhirākāraistatkalyāṇamitraṃ prasādapadasthitaṃ bhavati yenainaṃ pare 'tyarthamabhiprasīdantyanuśraveṇāpi śrutvā prāgeva sammukhaṃ nirīkṣya /
tgt_original: 菩薩有五事，得善知識淨信住處，他聞歡喜，況復現見。

src_original: īryāpathasaṃpanno bhavati praśānteryāpathaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgainirvikāraḥ /
tgt_original: 一者威儀成就，寂靜威儀、具足威儀，舉身齊整。

src_original: sthito bhavatyanuddhataacapalakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmāntapracāraḥ /
tgt_original: 二者心常安住，身口意業不悼不躁。

src_original: niṣkuhakaśca bhavati na pareṣāṃ kuhanārthamīryāpathaṃ sthairyaṃ vā pratisaṃkhyāya kalpayati /
tgt_original: 三者不誑，謂不誑他故攝持威儀。

src_original: anīrṣukaśca bhavati na pareṣāṃ dharmyaṃ kathāṃ lābhasatkāraṃ vā ārabhyāmarṣamutpādayati /  api tu svayamadhyeṣyamāṇo 'pi dharmakathane paraiḥ labhamāno 'pi vipulaṃ lābhasatkāraṃ paramapadiśati aśaṭhena cetasā prasannena /  pareṣāṃ tacca dhārmakathikatvaṃ tañca lābhasatkāramārabhyānujanāti /  yathā svena lābhasatkāreṇa tuṣṭo bhavati tathā bhṛśataraṃ paralābhena parasatkāreṇa tuṣṭo bhavati /
tgt_original: 四者不嫉，謂於他說法及得財利不生嫉心，常自勸請令他說法，若財向己勸與他人，無諂偽心心常歡喜。 見他說法及得利樂，起隨喜心如己所得。

src_original: [sumanāḥ] saṃlikhitaśca bhavatyalpabhāṇḍo 'lpapariṣkāraḥ utpannotpannaparityaktasarvopakaraṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 五者以知足心少積眾具，所得能捨。

src_original: tatra pañcabhirākārairayaṃ kalyāṇamitrabhūto bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ vineyānāṃ kalyāṇamitrakāryaṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 菩薩有五事，真善知識調伏眾生，為善知識事。

src_original: codako bhavati /  smārako bhavati /  avavādako bhavati /  anuśāsako bhavati /
tgt_original: 一者語言； 二者與念； 三者教授； 四者教誡；

src_original: dharmadeśako bhavati /
tgt_original: 五者說法。

src_original: eṣāñca padānāṃ vistareṇa vibhāgo veditavyaḥ /  tadyathā śrāvakabhūmāvavavādānuśāsanañca bhūyastata uttari veditavyaṃ tadyathā balagotrapaṭale /
tgt_original: 以是五事廣化眾生，如聲聞地教授教誡，廣說如力性品。

src_original: tatra caturbhirākārairbodhisattvasya kalyāṇamitrasevā paripūrṇā veditavyā /
tgt_original: 菩薩有四事，親近善知識滿足。

src_original: kālena kālaṃ glānopasthānasvasthopasthāna kriyayā premagauravaprasādopasaṃhṛtayā /
tgt_original: 一者若病不病隨時供養，愛念恭敬淨信饒益。

src_original: (Dutt 165) kālena kālamabhivādanavandanapratyutthānāñjalisāmicīkarmapūjākriyayā dharmacīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāradānapūjayā ca /  niśritasya ca dhārmikeṣvarthasaṃyoga-viyogeṣu vaśavartanatayā avikampanatayā yathābhūtatvāviṣkaraṇatayā /
tgt_original: 二者隨時敬禮，問訊奉迎合掌供養。 三者如法衣食湯藥眾具而作供養。

src_original: kālena ca cājñāmiprāyasyopasaṃkramaṇaparyupāsanaparipṛcchanaśravaṇatayā /
tgt_original: 四者若依止者，如法隨作而不傾動，如實而說隨時往詣，請所應作。

src_original: tatra kalyāṇamitrasyāntikāddharmaṃ śrotukāmena bodhisattvena pañcākārayā saṃjñayā dharmaḥ śrotavyaḥ /  ratnasaṃjñayā durlabhārthena /
tgt_original: 菩薩於善知識所，成就五想而聽法，當作寶想，以難得故。

src_original: cakṣuḥsaṃjñayodārasahajaprajñāpratilābhāya hetubhāvārthena /  ālokasaṃjñayā pratilabdhasahajajñānacakṣuṣā sarvākāra-yathābhūta-jñeyasaṃprakāśanārthena /
tgt_original: 作眼想，得勝俱生智慧因故。 作明想，得俱生智慧眼，顯示一切種如實境界故。

src_original: mahāphalānuśaṃsasaṃjñayā nirvāṇasaṃbodhiniruttarapadaprāptihetubhāvārthena /  anavadyaratisaṃjñayā dṛṣṭe dharme 'prāpta nirvāṇasaṃbodhidharmayathābhūtapravicayaśamathavipaśyanā 'navadyamahāratihetubhāvārthe /
tgt_original: 作大果福利想，得涅槃道無上因故。 作樂無罪想，現法不得涅槃道，如實觀察止觀大樂，無罪因故。

src_original: yadā tu madhyapākavyavasthito bhavati sa madhyacchandaśca bhavati madhyaprayogo na cāpāyān gacchati /  dṛṣṭe ca dharme śrāmaṇyaphalaṃ prāpnoti /  no tu dṛṣṭe dharme parinirvāti /
tgt_original: 住中成熟者，中欲中方便，不墮惡趣，於現法中得沙門果，不得涅槃。

src_original: tatra bodhisattvena kalyāṇamitrasyāntikāddharmaṃ śruṇvatā tasmindharmabhāṇake pudgale pañcasthāneṣvamanasikāraṃ kṛtvā 'vahitaśrotreṇa prasannamānasena dharmaḥ śrotavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩於善知識聽受經法，於說法人有五處不憶念淨心專聽。

src_original: naivaṃ cittamabhisaṃskartavyaṃ duḥśīlo 'yamasaṃvarasthaḥ nāhamataḥ śroṣyāmi /  kulabhraṃśe 'pyamanasikāraḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
tgt_original: 一者不念破戒，謂不念言此犯律儀，不應從彼聽受經法。

src_original: naivaṃ cittamabhisaṃskartabyaṃ nīlakulo 'yaṃ nāhamataḥ śroṣyāmi /  rūpabhraṃśe 'pyamanasikāraḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
tgt_original: 二者不念下姓，謂不念言，我不從彼下姓之人聽受經法。

src_original: naivaṃ cittamabhisaṃskartavyaṃ virupo 'yaṃ nāhamataḥ śroṣyāmi /  vyañjanabhraṃśe 'pyamanasikāraḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
tgt_original: 三者不念醜陋，謂不念言，我不從彼醜陋之人聽受經法。

src_original: adhimātre paripāke sthitaḥ adhimātracchando bhavati adhimātraprayogaśca na cāpāyān gacchati /  dṛṣṭe ca dharme śrāmaṇyaphalaṃ prāpnoti /  dṛṣṭa eva ca dharme parinirvāti /
tgt_original: 住上成熟者，上欲上方便，不墮惡趣，於現法中得沙門果及般涅槃。

src_original: naivaṃ cittamabhisaṃskartavyam anabhisaṃskṛtavākyo 'yaṃ nāhamataḥ śroṣyāmi /  nānyatrārthapratisaraṇena bhavitavyaṃ na vyañjanapratisaraṇena /
tgt_original: 四者不念壞味，謂不念言，我不從彼不正語人聽受經法，但依於義不依於味。

src_original: naivaṃ cittamabhisaṃskartavyaṃ paruṣavākyoyaṃ krodhano na ca madhuraṃ dharmaṃ bhāṣate nāhamataḥ śroṣyāmīti /
tgt_original: 五者不念壞美語，謂不念言，我不從彼麁言說人聽受經法。

src_original: ityevaṃ pañcasu sthāneṣvamanasikāraṃ kṛtvā bodhisattvena sādareṇa saddharmaparigrahaḥ kāryo na jātu dharmaḥ pudgaladoṣeṇa duṣṭo bhavati /
tgt_original: 如是五處不憶念已，是菩薩勤攝正法，於說法人不起嫌想。

src_original: tatra yo 'sau mandaprajño bodhisattvaḥ pudgaladoṣeṣūpahatacitto dharmaṃ necchati śrotuṃ sa ātmana evāhitāya prajñāparihāṇāya pratipanno veditavyaḥ
tgt_original: 若下根菩薩起人過心退不樂聽法，當知是菩薩不能自度，智慧退減。

src_original: kathañca bodhisattvaścatvāryapramāṇāni bhāvayati /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩修四無量？

src_original: iha bodhisattvaḥ samāsatastrividhāni catvāryapramāṇāni bhāvayati /
tgt_original: 略說菩薩四無量有三種修：

src_original: sattvālambanāni dharmālambanānyanālambanāni ca /
tgt_original: 一者眾生緣； 二者法緣； 三者無緣。

src_original: yadbodhisattvastriṣu rāśiṣu sarvasattvānavasthāpya sukhitān duḥkhitān aduḥkhitāsukhitān  sattvān sukhakāmānadhikṛtya sukhopasaṃhārādhyāśayagatena maitreṇa cetasā daśadiśaḥ  spharitvā sattvādhimokṣeṇa viharati /  iyamasya sattvālambanā maitrī veditavyā /
tgt_original: 菩薩安處一切三聚眾生已，若苦若樂不苦不樂眾生，欲安樂故，作樂饒益想而修慈心，周滿十方一切眾生意解想住，是名菩薩眾生緣慈。

src_original: yatpunaḥ dharmamātrasaṃjñī dharmamātre sattvopacāramāśayataḥ saṃpaśyaṃstāmeva maitrīṃ bhāvayati /  iyamasya dharmālambanā maitrī veditavyā /
tgt_original: 若菩薩起法數想，法數眾生行觀而修慈心，是名法緣慈。

src_original: yatpunardharmānapyavikalpayaṃstāmeva maitrīṃ bhāvayati /  iyamasyānālambanā maitrī veditavyā /
tgt_original: 若復於法離諸妄想而修慈心，是名無緣慈。

src_original: yathā sattvālambanā dharmālambanā 'nālambanā maitrī evaṃ karuṇā muditopekṣā api veditavyā /
tgt_original: 如眾生緣、法緣、無緣慈，悲喜捨亦如是。

src_original: tatra bodhisattvo duḥkhitān sattvānārabhya duḥkhāpanayanādhyāśayo daśasu dikṣu karuṇāsahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati /  sāsya karuṇā /
tgt_original: 若菩薩於苦眾生作除苦想，周滿十方而修悲心，是名為悲。

src_original: sukhitānvā punaḥ sattvānārabhya sukhānumodanādhyāśayo dasaśu dikṣu muditāsahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati /  sāsya muditā /
tgt_original: 於樂眾生起樂隨喜想，周滿十方而修喜心，是名為喜。

src_original: sa teṣāmeva trividhānāṃ sattvānāmaduḥkhāsukhitānā duḥkhitānāṃ sukhitānāñca yathākramaṃ mohadveṣarāgakleśavivekādhyāśayo daśasu dikṣūpekṣāsahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati /  iyamasyopekṣā /
tgt_original: 如是三種眾生不苦不樂，隨其次第起離癡恚貪想，周滿十方而修捨心，是名為捨。

src_original: tatra yāni bodhisattvasya maitryādīnyapramāṇāni sattvālambanāni tānyanyatīrthya sādhāraṇāni veditavyāni /
tgt_original: 若菩薩慈等無量，眾生緣與外道共。

src_original: yāni punardharmālambanāni tāni śrāvakapratyekabuddhasādhāraṇāni na tvanyatīrthyasādhāraṇāni veditavyāni /
tgt_original: 若法緣者，與聲聞緣覺共，非外道共。

src_original: yāni tu bodhisattvasyānālambanānyapramāṇāni tāni sarvatīrthya-śrāvakapratyekabuddhāsādhāraṇāni veditavyāni /
tgt_original: 若菩薩無緣無量，不共一切聲聞緣覺及諸外道。

src_original: tatra bodhisattvasya trīṇyapramāṇāni sukhādhyāśayasaṃgṛhītāni veditavyāni /  maitrī karuṇā muditā ca /
tgt_original: 若菩薩三無量，當知樂想攝，所謂慈悲喜。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: ekama pramāṇaṃ hitādhyāśayasaṃgṛhītaṃ veditavyaṃ yaduta upekṣā /
tgt_original: 一無量安想攝，所謂捨。

src_original: sarvāṇi caitānyapramāṇāni bodhisattvasyānukampetyucyate /  tasmāttaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā anukampakā ityucyante /
tgt_original: 一切無量，名為哀愍。 成就此者，名哀愍菩薩。

src_original: buddhagotro mahāyāne paripācayitavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 有佛種性，以無上大乘而成熟之；

src_original: tatra daśottaraśatākāraṃ duḥkhaṃ sattvadhātau saṃpaśyanto bodhisattvāḥ sattveṣu karuṇāṃ bhāvayanti /
tgt_original: 菩薩觀察眾生界，有百一十苦而修悲心。

src_original: daśottaraśatākāraṃ duḥkhaṃ katamat /
tgt_original: 云何百一十苦？

src_original: tulyajātīyo 'sya mārgaḥ śrāvakaiḥ /
tgt_original: 道同聲聞故。

src_original: ekavidhaṃ duḥkham /  aviśeṣeṇa pravṛttiduḥkhamārabhya sarvasattvāḥ pravṛttipatitā duḥkhitāḥ /
tgt_original: 有一種苦，謂一切眾生皆墮集苦，以集苦無差別故。

src_original: dvividhaṃ duḥkham /  chandamūlakaṃ yeṣāṃ [priyāṇāṃ] vastūnāṃ pariṇāmādanyathībhāvād duḥkhamutpadyate /
tgt_original: 又二種苦，謂欲根本所愛念事變易生苦、愚癡報苦，極苦觸身而作是言： 「我苦我苦。 」愚癡愁憂亦名二箭，身受心受。

src_original: trividhaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatayā saṃskāraduḥkhatayā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā ca /
tgt_original: 又三種苦，謂苦苦、行苦、變易苦。

src_original: caturvidhaṃ duḥkham /  virahaduḥkhaṃ priyāṇāṃ visaṃyogādyadutpadyate /
tgt_original: 又四種苦，一者合會別離苦，從愛別離生；

src_original: samucchedaduḥkhaṃ nikāyasabhāganikṣepānmaraṇādyadutpadyate /  santatiduḥkhaṃ muttaratramṛtasya janmapāraṃparyeṇa yadutpadyate /  atyantaduḥkhamaparinirvāṇadharmakāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ ye pañcopādānaskandhāḥ /
tgt_original: 二者斷苦，從種類沒死生； 三者相續苦，從無量生死展轉相續生； 四者終竟苦，從不得涅槃者五盛陰生。

src_original: pañcavidhaṃ duḥkham /
tgt_original: 又五種苦：

src_original: kāmacchandaparyavasthāna pratyayaṃ vyāpādastyāna-middhauddhatya-kaukṛtya-vicikitsā-paryavasthānapratyayañca yaddūḥkham /
tgt_original: 欲纏緣苦，恚、癡、睡眠、悔、悼纏緣苦。

src_original: ṣaḍvidhaṃ duḥkham /  hetuduḥkhamāpayaheturniṣevaṇāt phaladuḥkhamapāyopapattitaḥ /
tgt_original: 又六種苦，謂因苦，依惡道因故； 果苦，生惡道故；

src_original: bhogān punarārabhya paryeṣṭiduḥkhamārakṣāduḥkhamatṛptiduḥkhaṃ vipraṇāśaduḥkhañca /
tgt_original: 求財苦、守護苦、不足苦、壞敗苦。

src_original: tadetadabhisamasya ṣaḍvidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavati /  saptavidhaṃ duḥkham /  jātirduḥkhaṃ jarāvyādhirmaraṇamapriyasaṃyogaḥ priyavinābhāvaḥ yadapīcchanparyeṣamāṇo na labhate tadapi duḥkham /
tgt_original: 又七種苦，謂生苦、老苦、病苦、死苦、怨憎會苦、愛別離苦、求不得苦。

src_original: aṣṭavidhaṃ duḥkham /  śītaduḥkhabhuṣṇaduḥkhaṃ jighatsāduḥkhaṃ pipasāduḥkhamasvātantryaduḥkham /
tgt_original: 又八種苦，謂寒苦； 熱苦； 飢苦； 渴苦； 不自在苦；

src_original: ātmopakramaduḥkhaṃ tadyathā nigranthaprabhṛtīnām /
tgt_original: 自作苦，謂尼乾等；

src_original: paropakramaduḥkhaṃ tadyathā paṇiloṣṭasaṃsparśādibhiḥ parato daṃśamaśakādisaṃsparśaiśca /
tgt_original: 他作苦，謂彼手石刀杖蚊虫等；

src_original: īryāṃpathaikajātīyavihāraduḥkhañca /
tgt_original: 久住威儀苦。

src_original: ayantu śrāvakebhyaḥ pratyekabuddhasya viśeṣaḥ /  paścime bhave paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe 'nācāyakaṃ pūrvābhyāsavaśāt saptatriṃśadvodhipakṣyān dharmān bhāvayitvā sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkaroti /  tasmātpratyekabuddha ityucyate /
tgt_original: 勝聲聞者，謂最後身無師自悟，本習力故，修三十七品斷一切結，得阿羅漢證，故名緣覺。

src_original: navavidhaṃ duḥkham /  ātmavipattiduḥkhaṃ paravipattiduḥkhaṃ [jñātivipattiduḥkhaṃ bhogavipattiduḥkham] ārogyavipattiduḥkhaṃ
tgt_original: 又九種苦，謂自不具足苦； 他不具足苦； 親屬不具足苦； 財物不具足苦；

src_original: śīlavipattiduḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭi-[vipattiduḥkhaṃ] dṛṣṭadhārmikaduḥkhaṃ sāmparāyikañca duḥkham /
tgt_original: 無病不具足苦； 戒不具足苦； 見不具足苦； 現在苦； 他世苦。

src_original: bodhisattvaḥ punaradhimukticaryābhūmisthito muduparipāko veditavyaḥ /  adhyāśayaśuddho caryāpratipattibhūmau ca madhyaparipākaḥ /  niyāto niṣṭhitaścādhimātraparipākaḥ /
tgt_original: 又菩薩住解行地者當知下成熟，淨心地者中成熟，決定究竟者上成熟。

src_original: daśavidhaṃ duḥkham /  bhojanakāyapariṣkāravaikalyaduḥkhaṃ pānayānavastrālaṅkārabhāṇḍopaṣkarapariṣkāravaikalyaduḥkhaṃ
tgt_original: 又十種苦，謂食具不足苦； 車乘不足苦； 衣服不足苦； 瓔珞不足苦； 器物眾具不足苦；

src_original: gandhamālyavilepanapariṣkāravaikalyaduḥkhaṃ nṛtyagītavāditrapariṣkāravaikalyaduḥkham
tgt_original: 華鬚塗香眾具不足苦； 伎樂眾具不足苦；

src_original: ālokapariṣkāravaikalyaduḥkhaṃ strīpuruṣaparicaryākāyapariṣkāravaikalyaduḥkhañca daśamam
tgt_original: 燈明眾具不足苦； 男女給使不足苦； 初始苦。

src_original: punaranyaṃ navavidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ veditavyam /  sarvaduḥkhaṃ mahāduḥkhaṃ sarvatomukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipratipattiduḥkhaṃ pravṛttiduḥkhamakāmakāraduḥkhaṃ vighātaduḥkhamānuṣaṅgikaṃ duḥkhaṃ sarvākārañca (Dutt 168) duḥkham /
tgt_original: 復有餘九種苦，謂一切苦、大苦、一切門苦、惡行苦、轉生苦、不隨欲苦、違害苦、相續苦、一切種苦。

src_original: tatra sarvaduḥkhaṃ yat pūrvahetusamutpannaṃ vartamānapratyayasamutpannañca /
tgt_original: 一切苦者，若前因所起及轉時緣苦。

src_original: tatra mahāduḥkhaṃ yaddīrghaṃkālikaṃ pragāḍhaṃ citraṃ nirantarañca /
tgt_original: 大苦者，長夜種種無間大苦。

src_original: tatra sarvatomukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ yannārakaṃ tairyagyonikaṃ pretalaukikaṃ sugatiparyāpannañca /
tgt_original: 一切門苦者，若地獄畜生餓鬼、善趣輪轉。

src_original: tatra mṛdupākavyavasthito bodhisattvo mṛducchando bhavati mṛduprayogaḥ apāyāṃśca gacchati /  prathamakalpāsaṃkhyeyaparyantataśca sa veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 住下成熟菩薩，下欲下方便，未離惡趣，當知是第一阿僧祇滿，熾然不動，快淨、道品悉不成就。

src_original: tatra vipratipattiduḥkhaṃ yad dṛṣṭe vā dharme paravyatikramāt parāpakārakaraṇāllabhate samutthāpayati /  viṣamabhojanaparibhogāddhātuvaiṣamyajaṃ duḥkhaṃ samutthāpayati /  anayena vātmadṛṣṭadharmaduḥkhopakramāt svayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ samutthāpayati /
tgt_original: 惡行苦者，若現世犯他他還報己，若食惡食令身不安，如是種種自身現作還受其苦。

src_original: ayoniśomanaskāra-tadbahulavihāritayā vā kleśopakleśaparyavasthānaduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavati /
tgt_original: 若住眾多不正思惟，則生一切諸煩惱苦。

src_original: kāyavāṅmanoduścaritabāhalyādbā āyatyāmāpāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavati /
tgt_original: 身口及心多造惡行，於未來世生惡行苦。

src_original: tatra pravṛttiduḥkhaṃ yat ṣaḍākārādaniyamādutpadyate saṃsāre saṃsarataḥ /
tgt_original: 轉生苦者，有六事不決定起輪轉生死。

src_original: uttaptairacalaiḥ suviśuddhaiśca bodhipakṣyaiḥ kuśalaidharmaiḥ sarvaireva visaṃyukto bhavati /  madhyapāko bodhisattvo madhyacchando bhavati madhyaprayogaḥ /  na cāpāyān gacchati dvitīyakalpāsaṃkhyeyaparyantataśca bhavati /
tgt_original: 住中成熟菩薩，中欲中方便，不墮惡趣，第二阿僧祇滿，熾然不動，道品成就、快淨不成就。 住上成熟菩薩，上欲上方便，不墮惡趣，第三阿僧祇滿，熾然不動，快淨、道品一切成熟，其性淳厚具足熾然，增上妙果增上福利，故名熾然。

src_original: ātmabhāvāniyamādrājā bhūtvā āḍhyaḥ kṛpaṇo bhavati /
tgt_original: 自身不定，謂先為王後反貧乞。

src_original: mātāpitraniyamāt putradārāniyamāddāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyāniyamāt  mitrāmātyajñātisālohitāniyamāt mātāpitarau bhūtvā yāvadvistareṇa mitrāmātyajñātisālohito bhūtvā 'pareṇa samayena saṃsarato vadhako bhavati pratyarthikaḥ pratyamitraḥ /
tgt_original: 妻子不定、奴婢給使不定、朋友大臣親屬不定，謂今為妻子乃至大臣親屬已，彼於後時在生死中反為怨害及惡知識。

src_original: bhogāniyamācca saṃsāre saṃsaran mahābhogo bhūtvā punarapareṇa samayena paramadaridro bhavati /
tgt_original: 財物不決定者，謂於生死中資財無量，後極貧苦。

src_original: tatrākāmakāraduḥkha yaddīrghāyuṣkāmasya akāmamalpāyuṣkatayotpadyate /
tgt_original: 不隨欲苦者，欲得長壽不樂短命，惱苦生；

src_original: ābhirupyakāmasya cākāmaṃ vairupyataḥ /  uccakulopapattikāmasya cākāmaṃ nīcakulopapattitaḥ /
tgt_original: 欲得端正不樂醜陋，惱苦生； 欲為上族不樂卑賤，惱苦生；

src_original: aiśvaryakāmasyākāmaṃ dāridryopanipātataḥ [mahā-]balakāmasya cākāmaṃ daurvalyopanipātata utpadyate /
tgt_original: 欲得自在不樂貧窮，惱苦生； 欲得大力不樂少力，惱苦生；

src_original: jñeyaṃ jñātukāmasya cākāmaṃ sammohājñānasamudācāra utpadyate /
tgt_original: 欲多智慧不樂愚癡，惱苦生；

src_original: paraparājayakāmasya cākāmaṃ parāparājayādātmaparajayādyaddaḥkhamutpadyate /
tgt_original: 欲降伏彼不樂不如，惱苦生。

src_original: uttaptairacalaiḥ suviśuddhairbodhipakṣyaiḥ kuśalairdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati /  tatra prakṛtyā ghanatvādujjvalatvādadhimātramahāphalatvānmahānuśaṃsatvāccottaptā ityucyante /  apratyāvartyatvādaparihāṇīyatvādviśeṣagāmitvādacalā ityucyante /  bodhisattvabhūmau niruttaratvātsuviśuddhā ityucyante /
tgt_original: 於菩薩地清淨無上，故名快淨。

src_original: tatra vighātaduḥkhaṃ yadgṛhiṇāñca putradārādyapacayād yadutpadyate /  pravrajitānāñca rāgādikleśopacayād yad duḥkhamutpadyate /  yacca dukhaṃ durbhikṣopaghātādvā paracakropadhātādvā 'ṭavīdurgapraveśasambādha saṃkaṭopaghātādvā utpadyate /  yacca duḥkhaṃ parāyattavṛttatayā utpadyate /  yacca duḥkhaṃmaṅgapratyaṅgavaikalyopaghātād votpadyate /  yacca duḥkhaṃ vadhabandhanacchedanatāḍanapravāsanādyupadyātādutpadyate /
tgt_original: 違害苦者，謂在家妻子減苦、出家煩惱增苦、飢儉苦、刀兵恐畏苦、曠野嶮處恐怖苦、支節不具苦、殺縛斷截捶打苦、驅擯出外苦。

src_original: tatrānuṣaṅgikaṃ duḥkhaṃ yadaṣṭāsu lokadharmeṣu duḥkhaṃ naśana dharmake naṣṭe kṣayadharmake  kṣīṇe jarādharmake jīrṇe vyādhidharmake vyādhite maraṇadharmake mṛte 'lābhato vā  punarayaśasto vā nindāto vā yaddaḥkham /  ityetadaṣṭavidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāryanāduḥkhañca /  idamucyate ānuṣaṅgikaṃ duḥkham /
tgt_original: 相續苦有九種，此中不說。

src_original: tatra sarvākāraṃ duḥkhaṃ (Dutt 169)  yatpañcākāraṃ yathoddiṣṭasukhavipakṣeṇa duḥkhaṃ hetuduḥkhaṃ vedayitaduḥkhaṃ sukhābhāvamātraduḥkhaṃ  veditayānupacchedaduḥkhaṃ naiṣkramyapravivekopaśamasaṃbodhisukhavipakṣeṇa vāgārikakāmadhātusaṃyogaja-vitarka-pṛthagjanaduḥkhaṃ
tgt_original: 一切種苦者有五種，如前說。 五種樂相違苦，謂因苦、受苦、樂對治苦、不斷受苦、出家遠離寂滅菩提樂對治非家欲界和合覺想凡夫苦，是名五苦。

src_original: ityetacca paścavidhaṃ duḥkham /  aupakramikamupakaraṇavaikalyajaṃ dhātuvaiṣamyajaṃ priyavipariṇāmajaṃ traidhātukāvacarakleśapakṣyadoṣṭhulyaduḥkhañca pañcamam /
tgt_original: 又有五苦，謂逼迫苦、眾具不足苦、四大增損苦、失所欲苦、三界煩惱穢污苦，是名五苦。

src_original: ityetat pañcavidhaṃ pūrvakaṃ caikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya daśavidhaṃ dukhaṃ sarvākāramityucyate /
tgt_original: 此五種及前五種，略說十種一切種苦。

src_original: iti pūrvakañca [pañcapañcāśadākāramidañca] pañcapañcāśadākāramaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya  daśottaraśatākāraṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavati bodhisattvaḥ karuṇāyā ālambanaṃ yenālambanena  bodhisattvānāṃ karuṇotpadyate vivardhate bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati /
tgt_original: 前五十五種、此五十五種，略說百一十種苦，是菩薩悲境界，緣彼故悲心生，修習增長成就滿足。

src_original: ataśca mahato duḥkhaskandhādekānnaviṃśatiprakāraduḥkhālambanā mahākaruṇā pravartate /
tgt_original: 於彼大苦聚，緣十八種苦，生大悲心。

src_original: ekānnaviṃśatiprakāraṃ duḥkhaṃ katamat /
tgt_original: 云何十八苦？

src_original: sammohavipākaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃskāraduḥkhatāsaṃgṛhītaṃ duḥkhamātyantikaṃ duḥkhaṃ hetuduḥkhaṃ  jātiduḥkhaṃ svayaṃkṛtaupakramikaṃ duḥkhaṃ śīlavipattiduḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭivipattiduḥkhaṃ  pūrvahetukaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahadduḥkhaṃ nārakaṃ duḥkhaṃ sugatisaṃgṛhītaṃ duḥkhaṃ sarvavipratipattijaṃ  duḥkhaṃ sarvapravṛttiduḥkhamajñānaduḥkhamaupacayikaṃ duḥkhamānuṣaṅgikaṃ duḥkhaṃ vedayitaduḥkhaṃ
tgt_original: 謂愚癡報苦、行苦、所攝究竟苦、因苦、生苦、自作苦、他逼迫苦、他作苦、惡戒苦、惡見苦、本因苦、大苦、地獄苦、善趣攝苦、一切性苦、無智苦、增長苦、受苦、鄙穢苦。

src_original: dauṣṭhulyaduḥkhañceti /  tatra caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ karuṇā mahākaruṇetyucyate gambhīraṃ sūkṣmaṃ durvijñeyaṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhamālamvyotpannā bhavati /
tgt_original: 復次有四行悲，名為大悲： 一者緣彼眾生甚深微細難知之苦而起悲心；

src_original: dīrghakālaparicitā ca bhavatyaneka kalpaśatasahasrābhyastā /
tgt_original: 二者久遠長養於百千劫修習慇懃發悟緣生；

src_original: tīvreṇa cābhogenālambane pravṛttā bhavati yadrūpeṇābhogenāyaṃ karuṇāviṣṭo bodhisattvaḥ  sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpanayanahetoḥ svajīvitaśatānyapi parityajet prāgevaikaṃ jīvitaṃ prāgeva ca kāyapariṣkāram /

tgt_original: 是菩薩不於施等善法而求果報，若轉輪聖王帝釋魔梵，不求他報，不依此等求名利身命，於此等行淨歡喜俱，不惱亂他，專至無依。

src_original: na sarvalābhasatkāraślokeṣu nāpyantataḥ kāyajīvite 'pi niśrito bhavati /  iti ya ebhirākāraiḥ prasādaprāmodyasahagataścāviṣamaśca satkṛtya cāniśritaśca dānādīnāṃ samānārthatāparyavasānānāṃ (Dutt 157)  kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samudācāraḥ /  sā eṣāmasaṃkliṣṭatetyucyate /  viśuddhiruttaptatā acalatā suviśuddhatā ca veditavyā /  tatrāśaya śuddhibhūmipraviṣṭasya bodhisattvasya uttaptānyacalāni caitāni kuśalamūlāni bhavanti /
tgt_original: 從施等乃至同事諸善法行，是名無染熾然不動快淨，是名清淨菩薩入淨心地。

src_original: tatreyamuttaptatā yadāśayaśuddhasya bodhisattvasya sarve te kuśalā dharmā apratisaṃkhyānakaraṇīyā bhavanti /  tatreyamacalanatā yadāśayaśuddho bodhisattvo yathā pratilabdhebhyo yathopacitebhyaśca ebhyaḥ kuśalebhyo dharmebhyo na parihīyate /
tgt_original: 一切善根熾然不動，是名熾然淨心地。 菩薩一切善法不思惟起，是名不動淨心地。

src_original: na bhavyo bhavatyāyatyāṃ parihāṇāya /  nānyatra teṣāṃ teṣāṃ rātridivānāmatyayātteṣāṃ teṣāmātmabhāvānāṃ samatikramāccandro  vā śuklapakṣe pratyupasthite vardhata eva ebhiḥ kuśalairdharmairna [pari]hīyate bodhisattvaḥ
tgt_original: 菩薩隨所得所修善法則不退轉，於未來世必定不退，如明分月日夜增長，善法不退亦復如是。

src_original: niṣṭhāgamanabhūmibyavasthitasya punarbodhisattvasyaikajātipratibaddhasya caramabhavikasya  vā ete kuśalā dharmāḥ suviśuddhā veditavyā yeṣāmuttari bodhisattvabhūmau pariśuddhataratā nāsti /
tgt_original: 代究竟地菩薩一生相續，若最後身所得善根，是名快淨，於上更無菩薩淨地故。

src_original: evaṃ tribhiḥ kāraṇaireṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samudācāraḥ /  dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ śreṣṭhatā /
tgt_original: 是名三種行、二種勝。

src_original: tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ suviśuddhatā veditavyā dānādīnāṃ samānarthatāvasānānām /  tatra sarvadānasya sarvaśīlasya vistareṇa yāvatsarvasamānarthatāyā āsevitāyāḥ suviśodhitāyāḥ  sakalasaṃpūrṇāyā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirvajrasāraśarīratā saddharmacirasthitikatā  ca phalamabhinirvartate /
tgt_original: 三種淨當知，從檀波羅蜜乃至同事，一切施乃至一切同事，修習清淨如來具足充滿無上菩提金剛法身正法久住果報生。

src_original: tatra duṣkaradānena duṣkaraśīlena yāvadduṣkarasamānārthatayā āsevitayā suviśodhitayā tathāgatasyāpratisamāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgatatvaṃ phalamabhinirvartate /
tgt_original: 難施乃至難同事，修習清淨如來平等奇特未曾有法成就果報生。

src_original: yattathāgato niruttarābhirapratisamābhiścatasṛbhiḥ saṃpattibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ śīlasaṃpattyā dṛṣṭisaṃpattyā ācārasaṃpattyā ājīvasaṃpattyā [pratipannaḥ]  iayamasya sampattiparamatetyucyate /  yattathāgato niruttarābhirapratisamābhiścatasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ samanvāgataḥ dharmapratisaṃvidā 'rthapratisaṃvidā niruktipratisaṃvidapratibhānapratisaṃvidā ca /  iyamasya jñānaparamatetyucyate /  yattathāgato niruttarābhirapratisamābhiḥ ṣaḍbhirabhijñābhiḥ samanvāgataḥ yathā pūrvanirdiṣṭābhiḥ /

src_original: tatra sarvatomukhena dānena sarvatomukhena śīlena vistareṇa yāvatsarvatomukhayā samānārthatayā tathāgatasya sarvataḥ pradhānasattvairdevamanuṣyaiḥ pūjyatvaṃ phalamabhinivartate /  tatra satpuruṣadānasya satpuruṣaśīlasya yāvatsatpuruṣasamānārthatāyāḥ tathāgatasya
tgt_original: 一切門施乃至一切門同事，修習清淨如來一切取勝天人供養果報生。

src_original: ye kecitsattvā apadā vā [dvipadā vā] catuṣpadā vā bahupadā vā rūpiṇo vā 'rūpiṇo vā  saṃjñino vāsaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagā vā [teṣāṃ] sarveṣāṃ sattvānāmagryatvaṃ  phalamabhinirvartate /
tgt_original: 善人施乃至善人同事，修習清淨如來於無足二足四足多足、色無色想無想非想非非想一切眾生最上果報生。

src_original: tatra sarvākārasya dānasya [sarvākārasya] śīlasya vistareṇa yāvatsarvākārāyāḥ samānārthatāyāstathāgatasyāprameyavicitrapuṇyaparigṛhītaṃ  dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanakāyatā phalamabhinirvartate /
tgt_original: 一切行施乃至一切行同事，修習清淨如來種種無量功德攝受，三十二大人相八十隨形好果報生。

src_original: (Dutt 158) tatra vighātārthikadānasya vighātārthikaśīlasya vistareṇa yāvadvighātārthikasamānārthatāyāḥ  tathāgatasya bodhimaṇḍa niṣaṇṇasya sarvamārapratyarthikavidhātāviheṭhāvikampanāpratibalanatā
tgt_original: 除惱施乃至除惱同事，修習清淨如來於菩提樹下一切魔怨不能傾動果報生。

src_original: tatrehāmutrasukhasya dānasya ihāmutrasukhasya śīlasya vistareṇa yāvadihāmutrasukhāyāḥ samānārthatāyāstathāgatasya paramadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattisukhaṃ phalamabhinirvartate /
tgt_original: 此世他世樂施乃至此世他世樂同事，修習清淨如來最勝禪解脫三昧正受安樂果報生。

src_original: tatra katamadbodhisattvānāmupāyakauśalyam /

src_original: bodhisattvānāṃ buddhānāñca bhagavatām ityete catvāraḥ pudgalāḥ eṣu caturṣu vastuṣu paripācayitavyāḥ /  evaṃ paripācyapudgalataḥ paripāko veditavyaḥ /  tatra paripākaprabhedaḥ katamaḥ /
tgt_original: 如是四種人，諸佛菩薩以此四事而成熟之。

src_original: tatsamāsato dvādaśākāram /  adhyātma-buddhadharmasamudāgamamārabhya [ṣaḍvidham /  ] bahirdhā-sattvaparipākamārabhya ṣaḍvidhameva /
tgt_original: 略說十二種，為起內佛法有六種、為外成熟眾生有六種。

src_original: adhyātma-buddhadharmasamudāgamamārabhya ṣaḍvidhamupāyakauśalyaṃ katamat /
tgt_original: 云何為起內佛法六種巧方便？

src_original: yā bodhisattvasya sarvasattveṣu karuṇāsahagatā apekṣā yacca sarvasaṃskāreṣu yathābhūtasarvaparijñānaṃ yā cānuttarasamyaksaṃbodhijñāne spṛhā
tgt_original: 一者菩薩悲心顧念一切眾生； 二者一切諸行如實了知； 三者求無上菩提智；

src_original: yacca sattvāpekṣāṃ niśritya saṃsārāparityāgaḥ yā ca saṃskāreṣu yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ niśrityāsaṃkliṣṭacittasya saṃsārasaṃsṛtī /
tgt_original: 四者依顧念眾生捨離生死； 五者依諸行如實知，以無染心輪轉生死；

src_original: yā ca buddhajñāne spṛhā niśrityottaptavīryatā /
tgt_original: 六者依求佛智慧熾然精進。

src_original: idamadhyātmabuddhadharmaṃsamudāgamamārabhya ṣaḍivadhamupāyakauśalyaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 是名為起內佛法六種巧方便。

src_original: tatra katamadbahirdhā-sattvaparipākamārabhya ṣaḍvidhamupāyakauśalyam /

src_original: yenopāyakauśalyena bodhisattvaḥ parāttāni kuśalamūlāni apramāṇaphalatāyāmupanayati /
tgt_original: 一者菩薩巧方便以少善根起無量果；

src_original: tathālpakṛcchreṇa vipulānyapramāṇāni kuśalamūlāni samāvartayatyupasaṃharati /
tgt_original: 二者以少方便起無量善根；

src_original: tathā buddhaśāsanapratihatānāṃ sattvānāṃ pratighātamapanayati /
tgt_original: 三者毀壞佛法眾生除其暴害；

src_original: avatīrṇān paripācayati /  paripakvān vimocayati /
tgt_original: 六者已成熟者令得解脫。

src_original: kathañca bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ parīttāni kuśalamūlāni apramāṇaphalatāyāmupanayati /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩能以少善根得無量果？

src_original: iha bodhisattvo yat kiṃcit sattvaṃ pratyavaramapi vastvantataḥ saktuprasṛtaṃ pratyavara  eva kṣetre pradāpayati antatastiryagyonigate 'pi parīttaṃ tacca prāṇibhūte dāpayitvā  cānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃmbodhau pariṇāmayati /  evaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ vastuto 'pi kṣetrato 'pi parīttaṃ tacca pariṇāmanā-vaśenāpramāṇaphalatayāmupanītaṃ bhavati
tgt_original: 是菩薩教下劣眾生，以少財物施下福田，乃至揣󰉓施於畜生，施已迴向無上菩提，以迴向力故得無量果。

src_original: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāmalpakṛcchreṇa vipulānyapramāṇāni kuśalamūlāni saṃjanayati /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩以少方便起無量善根？

src_original: iha bodhisattvo mithyā-māsopavāsānaśanādyadhimuktānāṃ sattvānāmāryāṣṭāṅgamupavāsaṃ vyapadiśati /  tasmādvicchandayati kṛcchrādaniṣṭaphalādupavāsāt /  tasminnakṛcchrasamādāne mahāphale copavāse samādāpayati /
tgt_original: 是菩薩見有眾生，修邪法齋而求解脫，則為彼說賢聖八齋斷苦方便不究竟法，授少方便得大果齋。

src_original: tathā ātmaklamathayogamanuyuktānāṃ mokṣakāmānāṃ mithyāprayuktānāṃ [sattvānāṃ] (Dutt 179)  madhyamāṃ pratipadamantadvayavigatāṃ vyapadiśati tasyāṃ cāvatārayati /  tathā svargakāmānāṃ [sattvānāṃ] mithyāprayuktānāmagnipraveśātaṭaprapātā 'naśanasthānādibhiḥ  samyagdhyānaṃ dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya cāyatyāṃ akṛchreṇa sahaiva sukhena saha saumanasyena
tgt_original: 復次邪見眾生苦身求度，為說中道，令離二邊究竟解脫。 復次或有眾生求生天者，邪見方便投巖赴火不食等苦，則為演說正法禪定，現法樂住，後生天上如法受樂。

src_original: tatra śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavihārā nirodhasamāpattivihāraścāryo vihāra ityucyate /  catvāri dhyānānyārūpyasamāpattayaśca divyo vihāra ityucyate /  catvāryapramāṇāni brāhmo vihāra ityucyate /  tasmātpunastrividhādvihārāścatvāraḥ paramavihārā yaistathāgatāstadvahulavihāriṇo bhavanti /  āryādvihārācchūnyatā vihāro nirodhasamāpattivihāraśca /
tgt_original: 於彼三住中，四無上住如來多住聖住中，住空三昧及滅盡定；

src_original: punarvaidikamantroddeśasvādhyāyaśuddhiniṣṭhāgamanādhimuktān buddhavacanoddeśasvādhyāyakriyāyāmarthacintāyāñca samādāpayati /  punargambhīrāṃstathāgatabhāṣitān śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktāndharmān tathā tathā uttānīkaroti saṃprakāśayati yathā pare śrutvā tīvrañca saṃvegamutpādayanti tīvraṃ ca prasādam /
tgt_original: 復次或有眾生誦習外典求清淨者，以佛正法令其誦習思惟其義，又說如來甚深經典，具足顯示空相應法。

src_original: tadekakṣaṇikamapi saṃvegaprasādasahagataṃ cittaṃ vipula[kuśamūla]saṃgrahe saṃkhyāṃ gacchati prāgeva prābandhikam /
tgt_original: 彼聞法已，生厭離心專精淨信，於一念頃能攝廣大無量善根，況復次第續念不捨。

src_original: punarbodhisattvo yāni kānicinmālyāni gandhajātāni ca loke vividhāni pravarāṇi praṇītāni  taiḥ prasādasahagatenādhyāśayena buddhadharmasaṃgha[tri]ratnapūjāmadhimucyate parāṃścādhimocayati daśasu dikṣu /

src_original: punaḥ sarvā diśastenaiva prasādasahagatenādhyāśayena spharitvā sarvāṃ triratnapūjāmabhyanumodate parāṃścābhyanumodayati /

src_original: divyādvihārādāniṃjyacaturthadhyānavihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 天住中住第四禪；

src_original: punarbuddhānusmṛtiṃ satatasamitaṃ bhāvayati pareṣāñca samādāpayati dharmānusmṛtiṃ saṃghānusmṛtiṃ yāvaddevatānusmṛtim /

src_original: punarmanojalpaistriratna-namaskriyayā abandhyaṃ kālaṃ karoti kārayati ca /

src_original: punaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvapuṇyamanumodate anumodayati ca /

src_original: punaratītapratyutpannāni sarva-skhalitāni sarvavyatikramāṃśca kalyāṇena śikṣākāmānugatena cetasā sarvadikṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike pratideśayati
tgt_original: 復次於過去現在一切所犯，以真實隨順求淨戒心向十方佛至誠懺悔，亦教他人如是悔過。

src_original: uddānaṃ pūrvadveditavyaṃ tadyathā śīlapaṭale /
tgt_original: 八者此世他世樂忍； 九者清淨忍。

src_original: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya svabhāvakṣāntiḥ /

src_original: yā pratisaṃkhyānabalasanniśrayeṇa vā prakṛtyā vā parāpakārasya marṣaṇā sarveṣāñca marṣaṇā sarvasya ca marṣaṇā nirāmiṣeṇa ca cittena kevalayā karuṇayā [marṣaṇā] /  ayaṃ samāsato bodhisattvasya kṣāntisvabhāvo veditavyaḥ /

src_original: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya sarvā kṣāntiḥ /

src_original: yā dvividhā draṣṭavyā /

src_original: gṛhipakṣāśritā pravrajitapakṣāśritā ca /

src_original: sā punarubhayapakṣāśritāpi trividhā veditavyā /

src_original: parāpakāramarpaṇā-kṣāntiḥ /

src_original: tatrāśrayaparamatayā tathāgatā mahāpuruṣā ityucyante /

src_original: duḥkhādhivāsanā-kṣāntiḥ /

src_original: dharmanidhyānādhimokṣa kṣāntiñca /

src_original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvaḥ parāpakāraṃ marṣayati kṣamate /  iha bodhisattvastīvre nirantare citre dīrghakālikea 'pi parāpakāraje duḥkhe sammukhībhūte idaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate /

src_original: svakarmāparādha eṣa me /  yenāhaṃ svayaṃkṛtasyāśubhasya karmaṇo duḥkhamīdṛśaṃ phalaṃ pratyanubhavāmi /

src_original: pratipattiparamatayā mahākāruṇikā ityucyante /  saṃpattiparamatayā mahāśīlamahādharmāṇa ityucyante /  jñānaparamatayā mahāprajñā ityucyante /  prabhāvaparamatayā mahābhijñā ityucyante /
tgt_original: 道無上者，名為大悲。 正無上者，名大戒大法。 智無上者，名為大惠。 力無上者，名大神通。

src_original: iyañcākṣāntirāyatyāṃ puranapi me duḥkhahetusthānīyā /  so 'hametadduḥkhahetubhūtaṃ dharmaṃ samādāya varteyam /  yaddhā yanmamaivāniṣṭaṃ tenāhamātmanaivātmānaṃ sayojayeyam /  ata ātmana eva me 'pakṛtaṃ syāt /  na tathā pareṣām /

tgt_original: 」如是思惟已修習五種想，於怨親中人下中勝品若苦若樂、有德無德，如是眾生一切能忍。

src_original: kathañca bodhisattvaḥ apakāriṣu sattveṣu dharmamātrānusāriṇīṃ saṃjñāṃ bhāvayati /  iha bodhisattva idaṃ pratiṣaṃśikṣate /

src_original: tasyaivaṃ yoniśo manasikurvataḥ sattvasaṃjñā cāntardhīyate /  dharmamātrasaṃjñā ca saṃtiṣṭhate /

tgt_original: 依法數想已，他不饒益者悉能堪忍。

src_original: kathañca bodhisattvo 'pakāriṣu sattveṣu anityasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati /  iha bodhisattva idaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate /
tgt_original: 無常想者，菩薩作如是學：

src_original: ye kecit sattvā jātā bhūtāḥ sarve te anityā maraṇadharmāṇaḥ /  eṣa ca paramaḥ pratyatakāro yaduta jīvitādvayaparopaṇam /

src_original: evañca prakṛttyā maraṇadharmakeṣvanityeṣu sattveṣu na pratirūpaṃ syādvijñapuruṣasya  kaluṣamapi tāvaccittamutpādayituṃ prāgeva pāṇinā vā prahartuṃ loṣṭena vā daṇḍena  vā prāgeva sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayitum /

tgt_original: 苦想者，是菩薩觀大力具足者尚不離三相，所謂行苦、變易苦、苦苦，況復不具足者。

src_original: sa evaṃ paśyannidaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate /  evaṃ sadā duḥkhānugatānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpakarṣaṇāyāsmābhirvyāyacchitavyaṃ na duḥkhopasaṃhārāya /

src_original: katamairdaśabhiḥ /

tgt_original: 「我於一切眾生發菩提心，於一切眾生作親屬想，我應攝取普令安樂，不應於親屬眾生應利益處而復重加不饒益事。

src_original: tasyaiva yāniśo manasi kurvataḥ apakāriṣu sattveṣu parasaṃjñā prahīyate /  parigrahasaṃjñā ca saṃtiṣṭhate /

src_original: sa tāṃ parigrahasajñāṃ niśritya pareṣāṃ sarvāpakārān marṣayati kṣamate /

src_original: kṣāntiḥ katamā /

tgt_original: 一者依處； 二者世法處； 三者威儀處； 四者攝法處；

src_original: catvāraḥ sanniśrayāḥ /

src_original: tadyathā cīvaraṃ piṇḍapātaḥ śayanāsanaṃ glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāśca /  tairbodhisattvo lūhaiḥ stokairasatkṛtya dhandhañca labdhairnotkaṇṭhyate na paritrasyati nāpi tato nidānaṃ vīryaṃ sraṃsayati /  evaṃ sanniśrityādhiṣṭhānaṃ duḥkhamadhivāsayati /

src_original: nava lokadharmāḥ /
tgt_original: 世法者有九種：

tgt_original: 一者不利； 二者不稱； 三者毀； 四者苦； 五者壞法壞；

src_original: catvāra īryāpathāḥ /  caṃkramaḥ sthānaṃ niṣadyā śayyā ca /

src_original: tatra bodhisattvaḥ caṃkramaniṣadyābhyāṃ divārātrau vā āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhayaṃstana nidānaṃ pariśramajaṃ duḥkhamadhivāsayati  na tvakāle pārśvamanuprayacchati mañce vā pīṭhe vā tṛṇasaṃstare vā parṇasaṃstare vā /
tgt_original: 是菩薩若行若坐，晝夜二時除去陰障心得清淨，不非時臥。 臥床坐床草敷葉敷，因此疲極而生眾苦，悉能堪忍。 菩薩於彼眾苦不捨精進，如是名為安忍威儀苦。

src_original: saptavidho dharmaparigrahaḥ /  ratnatrayapūjopasthānaṃ gurupūjopasthānaṃ dharmāṇāmudgrahaṇamudgṛhītānāṃ pareṣāṃ
tgt_original: 攝法者有七種寶供養、德供養：

src_original: vistareṇa deśanā vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyakriyā ekākino rahogatasya samyak cintanā  tulanā upaparīkṣaṇā yogamanasikārasaṃgṛhītā śamathavipaśyanā bhāvanā ca /

src_original: asmin saptākāre dharmaparigrahe bodhisattvasya vyāyacchamānasya yad duḥkhamutpadyate tadapyasāvadhivāsayati /  na ca tannidānaṃ vīryaṃ straṃsayati /

src_original: mānuṣyakebhyaḥ kāmebhya āvaraṇakriyā abrahmacaryamaithunadharmaprativivaraṇatayā /

src_original: yāvajjīvaṃ mānuṣyakebhyo ratikrīḍābhya āvaraṇakiyā naṭanartanakahāsakalāsakādisaṃdarśanaprativiramaṇatayā /  mitrasuhṛdvayasyaiśca saha hasitakrīḍitaramitaparicārita-prativiramaṇatayā /

src_original: ityevaṃ rūpaṃ kṛcchrasaṃbādhaṃ bhikṣākavṛttamāgamya yadduḥkhamutpadyate tadapi bodhisattvo 'dhivāsayati /

tgt_original: 精勤者，菩薩精勤供養三寶，受持讀誦菩薩經藏、書寫解說、思惟其義，勤加精進修集聖道，由是生苦，菩薩安忍，不因是故捨於眾生。

src_original: sattvārthakarma tvekādaśaprakāraṃ pūrvavadveditavyamu /

src_original: itikaraṇīyaṃ pravrajitasya cīvarapātrakarmādi /  gṛhiṇaḥ punaḥ samyakkṛṣivaṇijyā-rājapauruṣyādi /  tannidānamapi bodhisattvo duḥkhamadhivāsayati /  no tu tannidānaṃ vīryaṃ sraṃsayati /

src_original: yatpunarbodhisattvaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ sannanyatamena duḥkhena prayujyata evānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye /

src_original: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya duṣkarakṣāntiḥ /
tgt_original: 云何難忍？

src_original: sā trividhā draṣṭavyā /

src_original: iha bodhisattvo durbalānāṃ sattvānāmantikādapakāraṃ kṣamate /  iyaṃ prathamā duṣkarakṣāntiḥ /

tgt_original: 七者不退弱； 八者不壞； 九者平等； 十者迴向大菩提。 是菩薩為斷除煩惱，隨其所應修習對治。

src_original: kāmarāgasya pratipakṣeṇāśubhāṃ bhāvayati /  vyāpādapratipakṣeṇa maitrīm /  mohapratipakṣeṇedaṃpratyayatā-pratītyasamutpādaṃ bhāvayati /  vitarkapratipakṣeṇānāpānasmṛtim /  mānapratipakṣeṇa dhātuprabhedaṃ bhāvayati /
tgt_original: 如愛所縛修不淨觀、瞋修慈心、癡觀緣起、覺觀所亂修安般念、慢修分別界方便觀，如是等名隨順精進。

src_original: idamevaṃbhāgīyaṃ bodhisattvasya anurūpaṃ [vīrya]mityucyate /  iha bodhisattvo na ādikarmika-tatprathamakarmikavīryeṇa samanvāgato bhavati /  yaduta cittasthitaye ' 'vavādānuśāsanyām /  nānyatrābhyastaprayogo bhavati paricitaprayogaḥ /
tgt_original: 是菩薩非成就初業精進，謂心已住教授教誡，修習方便調伏方便，是名菩薩修習精進。

src_original: itīdaṃ bodhisattvasyābhyastaṃ vīryamityucyate /  na cāpi bodhisattvaḥ abhyastaprayogo bhavati avavādānuśāsanyāṃ cittasthitimārabhya /
tgt_original: 是菩薩非修習精進、教授教誡、方便心住，然是初業。

src_original: api tvādikarmika eva sa bodhisattvastasmin prayoge 'ślathaprayogo bhavati sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogitayā /  itīdaṃ bodhisattvasyāślathaṃ vīryamityucyate /
tgt_original: 是菩薩於是方便，專精進方便、常方便、頓方便，是名專著精進。

src_original: punarbodhisattvo guruṇāmantikāta svayameva vā bāhuśrutyabalādhānatayā 'viparītagrāhitayā cittasthitaye vīryamārabhate /  itīdaṃ bodhisattvasya sugṛhītaṃ vīryamityucyate /
tgt_original: 是菩薩因諸所尊，若多聞力不顛倒受，其心安住精進方便，是名善攝精進。

src_original: punarbodhisattvaḥ evamaviparītagrāhī śamathakāle śamathaṃ bhāvayati /  pragrahakāle cittaṃ pratigṛhaṇāti /  upekṣākāle upekṣāṃ bhāvayati /  idamasya kālaprayuktaṃ vīryamityucyate /  (Dutt 142)
tgt_original: 是菩薩如是不顛倒受，止時修止、舉時修舉、捨時修捨，是名時具足精進。

src_original: punarbodhisattvaḥ śamathapragrahopekṣānimittānāṃ samādhisthitivyutthānanimittānāṃ copalakṣaṇāsaṃpramoṣa-prativedhāya sātatyakārī bhavati satkṛtyakārī  itīdaṃ bodhisattvasya nimittaprativedhaṃ vīryamityucyate /
tgt_original: 菩薩於止舉捨相、三昧住起相，常善觀察不妄分別，是名菩薩分別相精進。

src_original: punarbodhisattvaḥ paramodārān paramagambhīrānacintyāprameyān bodhisattvānāṃ vīryārambhanirdeśān śrutvā nātmānaṃ paribhavati na salīnacitto bhavati  nāpi cālpamātrakeṇāvaramātrakeṇa viśeṣādhigamena santuṣṭo bhavati /  nottari na vyāyacchate /  itīdaṃ bodhisattvasyālīnaṃ vīryamityucyate /
tgt_original: 是菩薩聞說第一妙勝、第一甚深不可思議無量菩薩精進方便，心不自輕亦不怯弱，不少勝進生知足想而不上求，是名菩薩不退弱精進。

src_original: punarbodhisattvaḥ kālena kālamindriyairguptadvāratāṃ bhojane mātrajñatāṃ pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ  jāgarikānuyuktatāṃ saprajānan vihāritāmityevaṃbhāgīyān samādhisaṃbhārān samādāya vartate /  teṣu codyukto bhavati /  aviparītañcārthopasaṃhitaṃ sarvatra yatnamārabhate /
tgt_original: 是菩薩常守根門、飲食知量、初夜後夜未曾睡眠，精進方便正智心住，如是等三摩跋提具精勤成就正義饒益，是名菩薩不壞精進。

src_original: itīdaṃ bodhisattvasyāvidhuraṃ vīryamityucyate /  punarbodhisattvo nātilīnaṃ nātyārabdhaṃ vīryamārabhate /  sama yogavāhi sarveṣu cārambhakaraṇīyeṣu samaṃ satkṛtyakārī bhavati /  iyaṃ bodhisattvasya samaṃ vīryamityucyate /  punarbodhisattvaḥ sarvavīryārambhānabhisaṃskṛtānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇamayatīdaṃ bodhisattvasya samyak pariṇamitaṃ vīryamityucyate
tgt_original: 是菩薩精進方便，不緩不急平等修習，一切方便平等頓修，是名菩薩平等精進。 是菩薩一切精進方便所作，迴向無上菩提，是名菩薩正迴向精進。

src_original: ityetatsvabhāvavīryādikaṃ viśuddhavīryāvasānañca bodhisattvānāṃ vīrya mahābodhiphalaṃ
tgt_original: 如是從自性精進乃至清淨精進，當得大菩提果。

src_original: yadāśritya bodhisattvā vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrya anuttarāṃ samyak saṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā
tgt_original: 菩薩依是精進滿足毘梨耶波羅蜜，得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: tatra yadbodhisattvānāṃ dhyānaṃ vicitrācintyāpramāṇadaśabalagotra-saṃgṛhītasamādhinirhārāya saṃvartate /  yeṣāṃ samādhīnāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā api nāmāpi na prajānanti kutaḥ punaḥ samāpatsyante /  yacca bodhisattvavimokṣābhibhvāyatanakṛtsnāyatanānāṃ pratisaṃvid-araṇā-praṇidhijñānādīnāṃ [guṇānāṃ] śrāvakasādhāraṇānāmabhinirhārāya saṃvartate  idaṃ bodhisattvasya dhyānaṃ samādhiguṇābhinirhārāya veditavyam /

src_original: tatra ye mṛduke paripāke vyavasthitāḥ sattvāste bodhisattvasya dīrghakālikamupādānamityucyante cireṇa kālena viśuiddhibhavyatayā /

src_original: (Dutt 251)  ye punarmadhye paripāke vyavasthitāste 'dīrghakālikamupādānamityucyante na cireṇa viśuddhibhavyatayā /  ye punaḥ sattvā adhimātre paripāke vyavasthitāste bodhisattvasya caramamupādānamityucyante tasminneva janmani viśuddhibhavyatayā /
tgt_original: 上成熟眾生於此生堪能清淨，是名後攝。

src_original: ityayaṃ ṣaḍvidhaḥ samyaksattvaparigraho bodhisattvānām /
tgt_original: 是名六種等攝眾生。

src_original: yena parigraheṇātītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvāḥ sattvān parigṛhītavantaḥ parigrahīṣyanti parigṛhṇanti vā /  punaḥ nāstyata uttari nāsto bhūyaḥ /
tgt_original: 過去未來現在菩薩，已攝當攝今攝，皆此六種，無餘無上。

src_original: evañca samyaksattvaparigrahavṛttānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dvādaśasambādhasaṃkaṭaprāptayo veditavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩如是等攝眾生，有十二難：

src_original: kvacittīvraṃ pratisaṃkhyānamupasthāpyākhinnena kṣamena bhavitavyam /  kvacid (Dutt 252) upekṣakeṇa bhavitavyam /  kvacidārabdhavīryeṇa ātaptakāriṇā bhavitavyam /  kvacidupāyakuśalena bhavitavyam /  evaṃ samyak pratipakṣakuśalo bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptisammukhībhāve 'pi na viṣīdati samyakcātmānaṃ pariharati /  iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne parigrahapaṭalaṃ dvitīyam /  (Dutt 253)  Bhūmipaṭalam (Chapter 3.3)
tgt_original: 菩薩於諸眾生不觀輕重而為方便，或察於人而行於悲、或勇猛方便為造因緣、或修正願或淨信心、或專心思惟觀察不惓、或時柔軟、或時行捨、或時精進、或時巧方便，菩薩如是正對治巧方便，於十二難能自開解心不退沒。

src_original: eṣu yathāvarṇiteṣu trayodaśasu vihāreṣvanugatāḥ sapta bhūmayo veditavyāḥ /  ṣaṭ bodhisattvabhūmayaḥ /  ekā vyāmiśrā bodhisattva-tāthāgatī-bhūmiḥ /  gotrabhūmiḥ /
tgt_original: 3 地品菩薩地持畢竟方便處地品第三如上所說十三住，次第為七地，六是菩薩地、一是菩薩如來共地。

src_original: vipratyanīkavirodhaḥ /  tadyathā ahinakulayormārjāramūṣikayoranyonyapratyarthikayośca pratyamitrayoḥ /
tgt_original: 五者怨相違，謂毒蛇鼠狼猫鼠，是等蟲獸各各怨害；

src_original: abhimukticaryābhūmiḥ śuddhādhyāśayabhūmiḥ /
tgt_original: 一者種性地； 二者解行地； 三者淨心地；

src_original: caryāpratipattibhūmiḥ /
tgt_original: 四者行迹地；

src_original: niyatā bhūmiḥ /  niyatacaryābhūmiḥ /
tgt_original: 五者決定地； 六者決定行地；

src_original: niṣṭhāgamanabhūmiśca itīmāḥ sapta bodhisattvabhūmayaḥ /  āsāṃ paścimā vyāmiśrā /
tgt_original: 七者畢竟地。

src_original: tatra gotravihāro 'dhimukticaryāvihāraśca dve bhūmī /  pramudito vihāraḥ śuddhādhyāśayā bhūmiḥ /  adhiśīlādhicittavihārau trayaścādhiprajñavihārāḥ sābhogaśca nirnimitto vihāraścaryāpratipattibhūmiḥ /  anābhogo nirnimitto vihāro niyatā bhūmiḥ /  tasyāṃ bhūmau bodhisattvastṛtīyaniyatipātapatito bhavati /
tgt_original: 種性住名種性地，解行住名解行地，淨心住名淨心地，增上戒住、增上意住、三種增上慧住、有開發無相住名行迹地，無開發無相住名決定地，於三決定是初決定；

src_original: pratisaṃvidvihāro niyatacaryābhūmiḥ /  paramo vihārastāthāgataśca niṣṭhāgamanabhūmiḥ /
tgt_original: 無礙智住名決定行地，最上菩薩住、如來住名畢竟地。

src_original: tāthāgatasya punarvihārasya bhūmeśca paścānnirdeśo bhaviṣyati buddhadharmapratiṣṭhā paṭale /
tgt_original: 如來住地，後建立品廣說。

src_original: tatra bodhisattvaḥ adhimukticaryābhūmeḥ śuddhādhyāśayabhūmimanupraviśan katham apāyānsamatikrāmati /
tgt_original: 菩薩於解行地入歡喜地，云何離惡趣報？

src_original: iha bodhisattvo laukikaṃ pariśuddhaṃ dhyānaṃ niśrityādhimukticaryābhūmau susambhṛtabodhi  sambhāro daśottareṇa pūrvanirdiṣṭenākāraśatena sattveṣvanukampāṃ bhāvayapyananyamanasikāraḥ /  sa bhāvanānvayāt tadrūpaṃ sattveṣvanukampāśayaṃ karuṇāśayaṃ pratilabhate /  yenāpāyān sattvānāmarthe 'gārāvasāyogenādhitiṣṭhati /  yadi me eṣveva sannivasato 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ samudāgacchati tathāpyahamutsahāmīti sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpanayanahetoḥ /  sarvāñca sattvānāmāpāyikaṃ karma tena śuddhenāśayenātmavaipākyamicchati /  atyantañca sarvākuśalakarmāsamudācārāya mānaṃ saṃpraṇidhatte /
tgt_original: 是菩薩於解行地，依世俗淨禪集菩提具，於百一十苦眾生修悲愍心，為惡趣眾生久處惡道如己舍宅，於此學無上菩提故堪忍，能為一切眾生作除苦因，一切眾生三惡道業，以清淨心願悉代受，畢竟修行一切善業修習正願。

src_original: tasya tathā paribhāvitaṃ tallaukikaṃ pariśuddhaṃ dhyānam /  āpāyikakleśapakṣyaṃ dauṣṭhalyaṃ āśrayādapakarṣati /
tgt_original: 以世俗淨禪正願力故，惡道煩惱染污受身不久得斷。

src_original: acireṇa tasya prahāṇādāśrayo 'sya bodhisattvasya parivartate pāpakasyāpāyikasya karmaṇo 'tyantamakaraṇatāyai apāyāgamanatāyai (Dutt 254) ca  iyatā bodhisattvaḥ samatikrānto 'pāyagatīḥ sarvā bhavati /
tgt_original: 菩薩轉惡道身，諸惡道業一切不行，是名菩薩離諸惡趣。

src_original: samatikrāntaścādhimukticaryābhūmim /  praviṣṭaśca śuddhādhyāśayabhūmim /  ye ca te daśadharmā vihārapaṭale nirdiṣṭā /  śraddhādayo vihārapariśodhanāḥ ta ihāpi bhūmiviśodhanā veditavyāḥ /  teṣāṃ vipakṣapratipakṣato vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam /  samāsārtho 'nukramaśca veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 過解行地入淨心地，前住品說。

src_original: tatra daśeme /  eṣāṃ daśānāṃ bhūmiviśodhanānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vipakṣabhūtā dharmāḥ /  yeṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇaiṣāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati /  katame daśa /
tgt_original: 淨歡喜住信等十法，於此地淨對治所治及次第建立。 云何對治？

src_original: sarveṇa sarvamanārambhacittotpādanā bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāsamādānam ayaṃ śraddhāvipakṣo dharmaḥ /  yasya pratipakṣeṇa śraddhā /
tgt_original: 一者放逸不受菩薩戒，違信菩提，是故以信對治。

src_original: vipakṣaprātipakṣikaśca virodhaḥ /  tadyathā 'śubhabhāvanā-kāmarāgayoḥ maitrībhāvanā-vyāpādayoḥ karuṇābhāvanāvihiṃsayoḥ  bodhyaṅgāryāṣṭāṅgamārgabhāvanāyāḥ sarvakleśānāñca traidhātukāvacarāṇām asmiṃstvarthe  utpattivirodha evābhipretaḥ /
tgt_original: 六者對治相違，謂修不淨對治貪欲、慈息瞋恚、悲止害覺、無漏道品永斷煩惱，此中以生相違故。

src_original: sattveṣu vihiṃsācittaṃ karuṇāvipakṣaḥ /  yasya pratipakṣeṇa karuṇā /  sattveṣu vyāpādo maitrīvipakṣaḥ /  yasya pratipakṣeṇa maitrī /
tgt_original: 二者於諸眾生有殺害心，違於大悲，是故悲心對治。 三者於諸眾生有瞋恚心，違於大慈，是故慈心對治。

src_original: bhogajīvikāpekṣā dānavipakṣaḥ /  yasya pratipakṣeṇa tyāgaḥ /
tgt_original: 四者顧念命財，違於惠施，是故惠施對治。

src_original: sattvebhyo 'pakāra-vipratipattilābho bahukartavyatā cākhedavipakṣaḥ /  yasya pratipakṣeṇākhedatā /
tgt_original: 五者於諸眾生多求眾具，違於不惓，是故不惓對治。

src_original: anupāyaprayogaḥ śāstrajñatā-vipakṣaḥ /  yasya pratipakṣeṇa śāstrajñatā /
tgt_original: 六者無方便智，違於知論，是故知論對治。

src_original: asauratyāparacittānuvartanatā lokajñatā-vipakṣaḥ /  yasya pratipakṣeṇa lokajñatā /
tgt_original: 七者不善隨順，違隨順他，是故知世間對治。

src_original: kuśaladharmabhāvanāyāṃ pramādakausīdyaṃ hrīvyapatrāpya-vipakṣaḥ /  yasya pratipakṣeṇa hrīvyapatrāpyatā /
tgt_original: 八者於修善法放逸懈怠，違於慚愧，是故慚愧對治。

src_original: dīrghakālikaiścitraistīvrairnirantaraiḥ saṃsāraduḥkhairvyavadīraṇatā dhṛtibalādhānatā-vipakṣaḥ /  tasya pratipakṣeṇa dhṛtibalādhānatā /
tgt_original: 九者長夜生死受無間苦其心怯劣，違於勇猛，是故勇猛對治。

src_original: śāstari kāṃkṣā vimatirvicikitsā tathāgatapūjopa sthānatāyāḥ vipakṣaḥ /  yasya pratipakṣeṇa tathāgatapūjopasthānatā /
tgt_original: 十者於佛疑惑，違於供養，是故供養對治。

src_original: evaṃ tāvadeṣāṃ vipakṣapratipakṣato vyavasthānaṃ bhavati /  kaḥ punareṣāṃ samāsārthaḥ /  samāsena daśabhirebhirdharmairāśayaśuddhiḥ prayogaśuddhiśca paridīpitā /
tgt_original: 如是十種對治所治，略說有二種：

src_original: tatra tribhiḥ pūrvakairāśayaśuddhiḥ /
tgt_original: 一者心淨；

src_original: punaḥ sarveṣāmeṣāṃ hetūnāṃ dvābhyāṃ hetubhyāṃ saṃgrahaḥ /
tgt_original: 說此諸因二因所攝：

src_original: avaśiṣṭaiḥ prayogaśuddhirveditavyā /  bodhimabhiśraddhadbodhisattvaḥ sattvān duḥkhitān karuṇāyate /  karuṇāyamāno mayaite paritrātavyā iti maitrāyate /
tgt_original: 二者方便淨。 前三種心淨，餘者方便淨。

src_original: svayañca kleśasamudācāreṇa jehrīyate vyapatrapate /  hrīmānapatrāpī ca kleśāvaśago dhṛtibaladhānaprāpto bhavati /  dhṛtibalādhānaprāptaśca samyak prayogādaparihīyamānaḥ kuśalaiśca dharmairvivardhamānaḥ pratipattipūjayā lābhasatkārapūjayā ca tathāgatapūjopasthānaṃ karoti /  ityayameṣāṃ daśānāṃ dharmāṇāmanukramasamudāgamo veditavyaḥ /  ebhirdaśabhirdharmaiḥ sarvabhūmiviśodhanā bhavati /
tgt_original: 菩薩信於菩提，於苦眾生而起悲心，起悲心故欲度眾生而起慈心，起慈心故而為惠施，為惠施故修習正義無有厭惓，無有厭惓故知諸經論，知經論故善知世間隨順世間，隨順世間故若煩惱起而生慚愧，以慚愧故不隨煩惱得勇猛力，得勇猛力故修正方便善法增長，多得勝利供養如來，如是十法淨一切地。

src_original: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne tṛtīyaṃ bhūmipaṭalam /  (Dutt 256)  adhimukticaryābhūmimupādāya sarvāsu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu bodhisattvānāṃ samāsataścatasraścaryā veditavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 4 行品菩薩地持畢竟方便處行品第四菩薩從解行住乃至最上菩薩住，略說有四行：

src_original: [katamāścatasraḥ /  ] pāramitācaryā bodhipakṣyācaryā [abhijñācaryā] sattvaparipākacaryā ca /
tgt_original: 一者波羅蜜； 二者菩提分法； 三者神力； 四者成熟眾生。

src_original: tatra ṣaṭ ca pūrvanirdiṣṭāḥ pāramitāḥ /  upāyakauśalyapāramitā ca praṇidhānapāramitā ca balapāramitā ca jñānapāramitā ca /  itīmā daśapāramitā abhisamasya pāramitācaryetyu cyate /
tgt_original: 如前說六波羅蜜，巧方便波羅蜜、願波羅蜜、力波羅蜜、智波羅蜜，是名波羅蜜行。

src_original: janakena ca hetunā (Dutt 70)  upāyahetunā ca /
tgt_original: 一者生因； 二者方便因。

src_original: tatra dvādaśākāraṃ pūrvanirdiṣṭamupāyakauśalya[mupāyakauśalya-]pāramitā /
tgt_original: 如前說十二巧方便，是名巧方便波羅蜜。

src_original: pañca pūrvanirdiṣṭāni praṇidhānāni praṇidhānapāramitā /
tgt_original: 如前說五種願，是名願波羅蜜。

src_original: daśabalaprayogaviśuddhirbalapāramitā /
tgt_original: 十力方便清淨，是名力波羅蜜。

src_original: sarvadharmeṣu yathāvad vyavasthānajñānaṃ jñānapāramitā /
tgt_original: 一切法部分知，是名智波羅蜜。

src_original: tatra paramārthagrahaṇapravṛttā prajñā prajñāpāramitā /
tgt_original: 知第一義諦故，名般若波羅蜜。

src_original: saṃvṛtigrahaṇapravṛttā punarjñānapāramitā /  ityayamanayorviśeṣaḥ /
tgt_original: 知世諦故，名智波羅蜜。

src_original: yadākṣepakaṃ nirvartakañca bījaṃ tajjanako hetuḥ /
tgt_original: 若種諸種子生，是名生因；

src_original: aparaḥ paryāyaḥ /  apramāṇajñānatā upāyakauśalyapāramitā /  uttarottarajñānavaiśeṣikatā-prārthanā praṇidhānapāramitā /  sarvamārairmārgānācchedyatā balāpāramitā /  yathāvaj jñaiyāvabodhatā jñānapāramitā /
tgt_original: 又無量智名巧方便波羅蜜，求增進智故名願波羅蜜，一切魔道不能壞故名力波羅蜜，智開覺故名智波羅蜜。

src_original: smṛtyupasthānānyupādāya sarve saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāścatasraśca paryeṣaṇāścatvāri  ca yathābhūtaparijñānāni yathāpūrvanirdiṣṭānyabhisamasya bodhisattvānāṃ bodhipakṣyacaryetyucyate /
tgt_original: 如前說念處等三十七菩提分法，四種求四種如實知，是名菩提分法。

src_original: yathā saṃvarṇitāśca ṣaḍbhijñāḥ prabhāvapaṭale bodhisattvānāmabhijñācaryetyucyate /  dvau ca pūrvanirdiṣṭāvaprameyau vineyāprameyaśca vinayopāyāprameyaśca [sarvasattvaparipāko  yathānirdiṣṭaḥ] sattvaparipākapaṭale bodhisattvasyābhisamasya sattvaparipākacaryetyucyate /
tgt_original: 如前說六神通是名神力。 如前說二無量，調伏界無量、調伏方便無量，是名成熟眾生。

src_original: ābhiścatasṛbhirbodhisattvacaryābhiḥ sarvabodhisattvacaryāṃsaṃgraho veditavyaḥ /  tatrāsaṃkhyeyatraya-dīrghakālasamudāgamātsvabhāvaviśuddhiviśeṣāttadanyebhyaḥ sarvalaukikaśrāvakapratyekabuddhakuśalamūlebhyaḥ paramabodhiphalaparigrahāccaite daśa (Dutt 257)
tgt_original: 如是四行攝一切菩薩行，三阿僧祇劫長夜修行，自性清淨勝餘世間聲聞緣覺，攝大菩提果。

src_original: dānādayo dharmāḥ parameṇa kālena samudāgatāḥ paramayā svabhāvaviśuddhyā viśuddhāḥ paramañca phalamanuprayacchanti /  iti tasmātpāramitā ityucyante /
tgt_original: 施等十法，時度、自性清淨度、果度，是故名波羅蜜。

src_original: tribhiśca kāraṇaiḥ pāramitānāmanukramavyavasthānaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 諸波羅蜜次第建立有三種：

src_original: katamaistribhiḥ /  pratipakṣataḥ upapattito vipākaphalataśca /
tgt_original: 一者對治； 二者因起； 三者報果。

src_original: avaśiṣṭā hetava upāyaheturveditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 諸餘因是名方便因。

src_original: tatra mātsaryaṃ duścaritaṃ sattveṣu vairotpīḍanatā kausīdyaṃ vikṣepo mandamomuhatā ca /  amī ṣaḍdharmā bodherāvaraṇasthānīyāḥ /  eṣāṃ [ṣaṇṇāṃ] dharmāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa ṣaṭ pāramitā yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ /  tadanyāśca pāramitā ābhireva saṃgṛhītāḥ /  evaṃ pratipakṣato vyavasthānaṃ bhavati /  kathamupapattitaḥ /
tgt_original: 慳貪、惡業、瞋恚、懈怠、亂意、愚癡，如是六法障礙菩提，六度對治隨其所應，餘波羅蜜六波羅蜜所攝，是名對治建立。

src_original: ihādita eva bhoganirapekṣo bodhisattvaḥ tyaktvā āgārikān kāmān śīlasamādānaṃ karoti /  śīlagauravācca paraviheṭhaṃ kṣamate /  no tu paraṃ viheṭhayati /  samādānataśca kṣāntitaśca viśuddhiśīlo niścalena nirantareṇa kuśalapakṣaprayogeṇa prayujyate /  sa tathā vīryeṇāpramattaḥ spṛśati kuśalāñcittasyaikāgratām /
tgt_original: 是菩薩始不顧財捨離出家，既出家已受菩薩戒，以護戒故修習忍辱，不怖眾生忍力清淨，不怖眾生故修習無間善法方便以修精進，無放逸故善一其心，心已善一得如實智，是名因起建立。

src_original: pañcākārā ātmabhāvasampatkatamā /  sugatiparyāpanno divyamānuṣyakastadanyasattvāyurādiviśeṣavān /  iyaṃ prathamā sampat /
tgt_original: 戒等波羅蜜五種具足者生善趣中，於諸眾生壽等奇特，是名初具足。
