src_original: sattveṣu hitacittatayā samadarśanāt samadantatā abhinīlanetratā gopakṣmamā ca nirvartate /
tgt_original: 安眾生心如視一子，得齒齊密、紺眼、𥇒如牛王三相。

src_original: evamanayā caturākārayā sukṛtakarmāntatayā bodhisattvānāmeṣāṃ dvātriṃśatāṃ-mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇānāṃ pratilambho viśuddhiśca bhavati /
tgt_original: 是名四種善修業得三十二大人相。

src_original: tatra gotrabhūmau bodhisattvānāmetallakṣaṇabījamātre 'vasthānaṃ veditavyam /  adhimukticaryābhūmau prāptyupāye vṛttireṣāṃ veditavyā /  adhyāśayaśuddhi bhūmau prāptireṣāṃ veditavyā /  tadanyāsu taduttarottarāsu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu viśuddhireṣāṃ (Dutt 264)  veditavyā tāthāgatyāṃ niṣṭhāgamanabhūmau suviśuddhataiṣāṃ niruttaratā ca veditavyā /
tgt_original: 種性地菩薩相好種子處，解行地菩薩修集方便，淨心地菩薩得，餘地菩薩漸勝清淨，如來畢竟地快淨無上。

src_original: tatra rūpitvādeṣāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ hīnamadhyottamaiśca sattvaiḥ sūpalakṣyatvāt satsu sarveṣveva buddhadharmeṣu mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇeṣvetānyeva mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni vyavasthāpitāni /
tgt_original: 此略說諸相，為軟中上眾生，餘一切佛法皆是大人相。

src_original: etānyeva ca dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānyāśrayabhāvena dhārayantyānurūpyācca śobhayante tasmādanuvyañjanānītyucyante /  tatra samāsataḥ sarvasattveṣu puṇyasadṛśena puṇyaskandhena tathāgatasyaikaiko romakūpo nirvartate /  yāvatsarvaromakūpapraviṣṭaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ /  iyatā puṇyaskandhenaikaikamanuvyañjanagati nirvartate /  yāvatsarvānuvyañjanapraviṣṭaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ /  tataḥ śataguṇena puṇyaskandhena tathāgatasyaikaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nirvartate /  yāvatsarvalakṣaṇapraviṣṭaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ sthāpayitvā ūrṇāmuṣṇīṣañca /
tgt_original: 此及餘百四十相，於身妙好故說隨形好。

src_original: tataḥ sahasraguṇena puṇyaskandhenorṇā nirvartate /  yāvānūrṇā-praviṣṭaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ tataḥ śatasahasraguṇena puṇyaskandhena uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā anavalokitamūrdhatā ca nirvartate /  yāvānuṣṇīṣapraviṣṭaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ /  tataḥ koṭīśatasahasraguṇena puṇyaskandhena tathāgatasya lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāsaṃgṛhīto 'nyo dharmaśaṃkhyo nāma nirvartate /  yena tathāgata ākāṃkṣamāṇaḥ anantāparyantān lokadhātūn svareṇa vijñāpayati /
tgt_original: 略說一切眾生福德積聚等一毛相，一切毛相福德積聚等一隨形好，一切隨形好福德積聚增至百倍乃得一相，除白毫、肉髻； 餘一切相功德增至千倍乃得白毫相，白毫相功德增至百千倍乃得肉髻無見頂相，白毫相功德增至億百千倍乃得如來法䗍音相。

src_original: evamaprameyaḥ puṇyasambhāra-samudāgatastathāgataḥ /  tathāgatānāmacintyo niruttaraḥ sarvākārasampattiparigṛhīta ātmabhāvo nirvartate /
tgt_original: 如來隨意發聲清淨梵音乃至十方無量世界，如是如來無量功德積聚不可思議。

src_original: teṣāṃ punarlakṣaṇānuvyañjananirvartakānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmaṇāṃ samāsatastribhiḥ kāraṇeprameyatā veditavyā /
tgt_original: 復次相好善業三種無量：

src_original: kalpāsaṃkhyeyatayā 'bhyāsasamudāgamāt kālāprameyatayāaprameyasattvahitasukhāśayādhipateyatvādāśayā 'prameyatayā aprameyakuśalakarmavaicitryākārāprameyatayā ca /
tgt_original: 三阿僧祇劫修習，名劫無量； 安樂一切眾生，名心無量；

src_original: tasmādaprameyapuṇyasambhārasamudāgatastathāgatānāṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanādaya ityucyate /  iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne pañcamaṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanapaṭalam /  (Dutt 265)  Pratiṣṭhāpaṭalam (Chapter 3.6)
tgt_original: 種種善業，名行無量。 是無量福德眾具修習，出如來相好。

src_original: catasraḥ sarvākārāḥ pariśuddhayaḥ katamāḥ /
tgt_original: 四一切種清淨者，一者身淨；

src_original: ālambanaśuddhiḥ /
tgt_original: 二者境界淨；

src_original: cittaśuddhiḥ jñānaśuddhiśca /
tgt_original: 三者心淨； 四者智淨。

src_original: tatrāśrayaviśuddhiḥ katamā /  savāsanānāṃ sarvakleśapakṣyāṇāṃ dauṣṭhulyānāmāśrayān niravaśeṣato 'tyantaparamaḥ sve cātmabhāve yathākāmādānasthānacyutivaśavartitā sarvākārā āśrayaśuddhistyucyate /
tgt_original: 煩惱習身捨離無餘，得最上身生滅自在，是名身淨。

src_original: tatrālambanaviśuddhiḥ katamā /  nirvāṇe pariṇāme saṃprakhyāne ca sarvālambaneṣu yā vaśavartitā /  iyamucyate sarvākārā ālambanaviśuddhiḥ /
tgt_original: 種種現化及所言說，一切境界自在無礙，是名境界淨。

src_original: tatra cittaviśuddhiḥ katamā /  pūrvavatsarvacittadauṣṭhulyāpagamāccitte ca sarvākāra-kuśalamūlopacayātsarvākārā cittaviśuddhirityucyate /  tatra katamā jñānaviśuddhiḥ /
tgt_original: 煩惱悉離善根成熟，是名心淨。

src_original: pūrvavatsarvāvidyāpakṣyadauṣṭhulyāpagamātsarvatra ca jñeye jñānasyānāvaraṇāt jñānavaśavartitā sarvākārā jñānaviśuddhirityucyate /
tgt_original: 捨離一切無明穢污，一切所知無礙自在，是名智淨。

src_original: tatra daśa tathāgatabalāni katamāni /  sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ karmasvakajñānabalaṃ dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalam
tgt_original: 如來十力者，一者處非處智力； 二者自業智力； 三者禪解脫三昧正受智力； 四者諸根利鈍智力；

src_original: indriyaparāparajñānabalaṃ nānā dhātujñānabalaṃ nānādhimuktijñānabalaṃ sarvatragāminīpratipajjñānabalaṃ
tgt_original: 五者種種解智力； 六者種種界智力； 七者至處道智力；

src_original: pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānabalaṃ cyutyupapattijñānabalam āsravakṣayajñānabalañca /
tgt_original: 八者宿命智力； 九者生死智力； 十者漏盡智力。

src_original: ityetāni daśa tathāgatabalāni yuthā daśabalasūtre nirdeśato vistareṇa veditavyāni /
tgt_original: 此十力，如十力修多羅廣說。

src_original: [tatra] yatkiñcidanena bhāṣitaṃ lapitamudāhṛtaṃ sarvaṃ tattathā avitatheti tasmāttathāgata ityucyate /
tgt_original: 言語所說不乖於如，是故名多陀阿伽馱。

src_original: tatra phalasya śubhāśabhasya yo bhūtapravṛttaḥ aviṣamo hetuḥ tadasya sthānaṃ pratiṣṭhā niśrayo 'bhinirvartakaṃ ityucyate /  śubhāśubhasyaiva phalasya viṣamaheturetadviparyayeṇāsthānamityucyate /
tgt_original: 淨不淨果依差別因，是名是處。 淨不淨果差別因相違，是名非處。

src_original: nirabhimānaṃ jñānaṃ yathābhūtamityucyate /
tgt_original: 離增上慢智，是名如實智。

src_original: (Dutt 266) sarvajñānamasaktajñānaṃ śuddhañca tannirabhimānaṃ [jñānaṃ] veditavyam /  eṣāñca sarvajñānādīnāṃ padānāṃ pūrvavadvyākaraṇaṃ veditavyaṃ tadyathā paramabodhipaṭale /  anupūrvaṃ gaṇanayā prathamam /
tgt_original: 如前無上菩提品說。 一切智無礙智清淨智，是名離增上慢智。

src_original: niruttaratvātsarvākāra-sarvasattvārthakriyāśaktiyuktatvāt sarvamārabalātyantābhibhavācca balamityucyate /

src_original: yathāvaddhetusamudāgamaparigrahādyathākāmasamudācāravaśavartitā samanvāgata ityucyate /

src_original: niruttaratvānnirvāṇamudāramityucyate /
tgt_original: 無上涅槃，是名勝妙。

src_original: āryāṣṭāṅgeṇa mārgeṇa labhyatvātsarvopadravabhayāpagatatvāccārṣabhamityucyate /

src_original: ātmanastadadhigamena pratijñānātpratijānātītyucyate /
tgt_original: 自知所得，名為自知。

src_original: svayamadhigamya pareṣāmapyanukampayā vistareṇa prakāśanād brāhmacakraṃ pravartayatītyucyate /

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

tgt_original: 如來於此種種惱亂清淨寂滅清涼真實，初轉令一切眾生皆得清淨，是名梵輪。

src_original: agraprajñaptipatitasya niruttaraśāstṛsaṃpatparigṛhītasya cātmano vikhyāpanāt tanmārgadeśanayā  ca sarvatadanyapāṣaṇḍapratikṣepaṇāt tanmārgavipratyanīkavādiṣu ca pratyupasthiteṣu  asaṃkocātsarvaparavādābhibhavāya codāraniruttaravāgabhyudoraṇātpariṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ nadatītyucyate /

src_original: samāsatastvātmahita-pratipattisampat-parahita-[pratipatti-]sva parahitapratipattisampadaścāsādhāraṇam /  teṣām uttānā vivṛtā prajñaptā prakāśitā bhavati /

src_original: aparaḥ samāsārthaparyāyaḥ /  prāptavyantaprāptyabhyupāyaḥ /

tgt_original: 若天若人諸有所求悉於我得，是名得方便。

src_original: tatra vyādhipraśamanavadudāramārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ draṣṭavyam /  vyādhipraśamanopāyavad brāhmacakrapravartanā draṣṭavyā /
tgt_original: 如病得差除惱安隱，復為人治，是名轉法輪。

src_original: sarva[ku]vaidyapratijñā pratikṣepaṇavat svayaṃ ca niyataṃ vyādhipraśamanapratijñānavatpariṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ naditaṃ draṣṭavyam /
tgt_original: 能令一切虛妄邪師得諸對治諸病得差，是名師子吼。

src_original: yāni karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni niruddhāni tānyatītānītyucyante /
tgt_original: 若所作業成就已滅，是名過去。

src_original: yāni naiva kṛtāni na niruddhāni nāpi karoti api tu kariṣyatyāyatyāṃ /
tgt_original: 若未作未滅而是當作，是名未來。

src_original: tāni punaḥprakārabhedena trīṇi kāyakarma vākkarma manaskarma /
tgt_original: 以行分別，復有三種，謂身、口、意業。

src_original: dharmasamādānāni catvāri yathāpūrvameva nirdiṣṭāni /  asti dharmasamādānaṃ pratyutpannasukhamāyatyāṃ duḥkhavipākamiti vistareṇa /

src_original: tāni punaretāni dṛṣṭadharmasamparāyahitāhitaprayogato yathāyogaṃ veditavyāni /  yasmin deśe kriyante tatteṣāṃ sthānamityucyate /
tgt_original: 現法後世若安不安，隨其所應說法利益，是名處方便。

src_original: yacca sattvasaṃkhyātamasattvasaṃkhyātaṃ vā vastvādhiṣṭhāya kriyante tatteṣāṃ vastu ityucyate /
tgt_original: 若眾生數以非眾生數為境界而有所作，是名眾生。

src_original: yenākuśalamūlena [kuśalamūlena] vā nidānena kriyante /  tatteṣāṃ heturityucyate /
tgt_original: 善根所作，是名為因。

src_original: yadiṣṭāniṣṭamādīnavānuśaṃsaṃyuktaṃ phalamabhinivartayanti tatteṣāṃ vipāka ityucyate /
tgt_original: 愛與不愛禍福果成，是名為報。

src_original: tadetadabhisamasya sarvakālaṃ sarvaprakāraṃ sarvāvasthāprayogaṃ sarvadeśaṃ sarvādhiṣṭhānaṃ sarvanidānaṃ sarvādīnavānuśaṃsañca sarvākāraṃ tathāgatānāṃ karmajñānaṃ bhavati /  nāsti vāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
tgt_original: 略說一切時、一切行、一切處方便、一切眾生、一切境界、一切因、一切禍一切福，如是一切如來悉知無餘無上。

src_original: catvāri dhyānāni /  aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ /  dhyānavimokṣaiḥ karmaṇyacetasaścetovaśiprāptasya yathepsitasyārthasya samṛddhaye yā tasya tadanurūpasya samādheḥ samāpadyanatā tā samādhisamāpattirityucyate  [yathocyate ca /
tgt_original: 四禪八解脫，於禪解脫心得自在，彼彼色像隨意悉成，是名禪解脫三昧正受。

src_original: ] bhagavāṃstadrūpaṃ samādhi samāpannaṃ /  yathā samāhite citte sarvo brahmalokaudāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭo babhūva /  bhāṣitasya cāsya śabdaḥ śrūyate /  na cainaṃ kaścitpaścatīti vistaraḥ /  evaṃ hi tathāgato yaṃ yamevārthaṃ prasādhayitukāmo lokasādhāraṇaṃ [asādhāraṇaṃ vā] sa tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadya laghuladhveva prasādhayati
tgt_original: 如說世尊三昧正受，如其正受光照梵天，妙音說法但聞其聲不見其形，以是義故如來入共世間、不共世間像類三昧能速成辦，於禪解脫心得自在隨意悉成，是故說禪解脫三昧正受。

src_original: aprāpteṣu caiṣu prāptaye bibandhasaṃkleśaḥ /

src_original: tadyathā 'nupāyaprayogo nivaraṇānyatamasamudācāraśca /  prāpteṣu caiṣu tadbhūmikaṃ kleśaparyavasthānamanuśayo vā /

src_original: vyavadānaṃ punarvividhamevaitadviparyayeṇa (Dutt 268)  veditavyam /  teṣāmeva ca dhyānādīnāṃ vicitrāṇāmabhinirhṛtānāṃ nāmasaṃketena anurūpeṇa yathāyogaṃ vyavasthitirvyavasthānāmityucyate /  eṣāmeva ca dhyānādīnāṃ pratilabdhānāmuttari yā bhāvanā-paripūrirnikāmalābhitā 'kṛcchreṇānavarakalābhitā saiṣāṃ viśuddhirityucyate /  tatra yathā caiṣāmaprāptiryathā ca prāptiḥ teṣu ca yā ca hīnatā yā ca praṇītatā yaccaiṣāṃ nāma yā cotkarṣaparyantatā tat sarvaṃ prajānāti /  tasmādevaṃ niruttaraṃ tathāgatānāṃ dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalamityucyante /
tgt_original: 如來以種種世俗言教，隨其色像隨其所應，令得禪等修慧滿足離惱清淨，若得未得、若劣若勝悉如實知，是故名諸禪解脫三昧正受如實知。

src_original: yathā paripākasamudāgamataḥ śraddhādīnāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātratā indriya-parāparatetyucyate /  paraśraddhāpūrvā dharmavicāraṇā-pūrvā ca mṛdumadhyādhimātrā ruciḥ pratyavagamaḥ nānādhimuktikatetyucyate /
tgt_original: 向成熟信等五根有軟中上，是名諸根利鈍。 從他生信及自思惟為方便，起軟中上欲，是名種種解。

src_original: nānāgotravyavasthānam /  śrāvakapratyekabuddha-tathāgatagotrāṇāṃ rāgādicaritaprabhedanayena ca yāvadaśīti sattvacaritasahasrāṇi nānādhātukatetyucyate /

src_original: sa tvaṃ sacedaśubhāṃ manasikaroṣi enaṃ manasikāraṃ mā riñciṣyasi /  sa cenmaitrī midaṃpratyayatā pratītyasamutpādaṃ dhātuprabhedamānāpānasmṛtiṃ prathamaṃ  dhyānaṃ vistareṇa yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyanamapramāṇa-bodhisattva dhyānābhijñā-samādhisamāpattīrmanasikaroṣi /  etameva manasikāraṃ mā riñciṣyasi /
tgt_original: 彼諸菩薩得不淨觀，行於慈心觀察緣起，分別諸界、入出息念，逮得初禪乃至非想非非想處。

src_original: evaṃ te 'yaṃ bodhisattva manaskāro 'nupūrveṇa yāvadanuttarāyai samyaksambodhaye niryāsyatīti /  iyaṃ sarvatragāminī bodhisattvānāṃ pratipadveditavyā /

src_original: atīte 'pyadhvani tathāgatā (Dutt 274)  bodhisattvamādikarmakamevamevāvavaditavantaḥ /  anāgate 'pyadhvanyevamevavadiṣyanti /  pratyutpanne 'pyadhvanyevamevavadanti /
tgt_original: 過去如來為初業菩薩如是教授，未來諸佛當如是教，現在諸佛亦如是教。

src_original: śrāvako 'pi cānena manaskāreṇa prayujyamānaḥ kṣiprābhijñataraḥ syād dharmābhisamayāya yadi śaknuyādetaṃ manasikāraṃ yathāvatprativeddhum /
tgt_original: 聲聞乘如是思惟，疾得神通無礙智。

src_original: sarvatrāgaminī pratipat jñānabalena tathāgataḥ sarvaduḥkha-nairyāṇikīmanairyāṇikīṃ ca pratipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /  anairyāṇikīṃ ca pratipadaṃ varjayitvā nairyāṇikīmupasaṃharati /
tgt_original: 一切至處道智力，出一切苦道如實知，離不出道出道饒益。

src_original: pūrve nivāsānusmṛtijñānabalena tathāgataḥ pūrvānte itivṛttakāṃśca jātakāṃśca smṛtvā cittasaṃvegāya cittaprasādāya vineyānāṃ deśayati /  śāśvatavādinaśca śramaṇabrāhmaṇān nigṛhṇāti /
tgt_original: 宿命智力觀察宿命，於善於惡若厭心若淨心，調伏說法，伏常論沙門婆羅門。

src_original: cyutyupapādajñānabalena tathāgataḥ śrāvakaṃ cābhyatītakālagatamupapattau vyākaroti /  ucchedavādinaśca śramaṇabrāhmaṇān nigṛhṇāti /
tgt_original: 生死智力，說眾生生死所往生處，伏斷滅論沙門婆羅門。

src_original: āsravakṣayajñānabalena tathāgataḥ sve ca vimokṣe niṣkāṃkṣo bhavati nirvicikitsaḥ /  arhattvābhimāninaśca śramaṇabrāhmaṇān nigṛhṇāti /
tgt_original: 漏盡智力，伏疑惑解脫沙門婆羅門。

src_original: tatra yo janako hetuḥ saḥ hetupratyayaḥ /
tgt_original: 生因者，是因緣。

src_original: idaṃ tāvattathāgatasya daśānāṃ [balānāṃ] karma veditavyam /  tatra ka eṣāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāmanukramaḥ /  sahābhisaṃbodhādanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhestathāgataḥ sarvāṇyeva daśa balāni sakṛtpratilabhate /  sakṛtpratilabdhānāṃ punareṣāṃ krameṇa sammukhībhāvo bhavati /
tgt_original: 次第者，如來得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提頓得，十力後次第現在前。

src_original: abhisaṃbuddhamātra eva tathāgato dharmāṇāṃ samyageva hetuphalavyavasthānaṃ sthānāsthānajñāgabalena vyavalokayati /
tgt_original: 阿惟三佛法部分因果故，以處非處智力，觀察因果部分。

src_original: vyavalokya kāmadhātāveva sabhāge dhātāviṣṭaphala-viśeṣārthikānāṃ karmasvakatā-jñānabalenākuśalakarmaparivarjanāṃ kuśalakarmasamudācāratāñca vyapadiśati /
tgt_original: 欲界差別故，以自業智力，觀察自業而為說法，令離惡業修行善業。

src_original: laukika-vairāgyakāmānāṃ punaḥ sattvānāṃ dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalena laukikavairāgyagamanāya yathāvanmārgapratilābhāyāvavādamanuprayacchati  lokottaravairāgyakāmānāṃ punastadanyaiḥ saptabhisthāgatabalairlokottaravairāgyopagamāya mārgaṃ vyapadiśati /
tgt_original: 為世俗道離欲故，以禪解脫三昧正受智力，教諸眾生。 復為出世離欲故，以禪解脫三昧正受智力，先教眾生以世俗道離欲，後得出世間道離欲。

src_original: tatra pūrvaṃ tāvallottaravairāgyakāmānāmindriyaṃ vyavalokayatīndriyaparāparajñānabalena /
tgt_original: 欲令眾生得出世間離欲故，以諸根利鈍智力，觀察諸根。

src_original: tata indriyapūrvamāśayaṃ vyavalokayati nānādhimuktijñānabalena /  tataścāśayapūrvamanuśayaṃ vyavalokayati nānādhātujñānabalena /
tgt_original: 知諸根已，欲知悕望故，以種種解智力觀其悕望。

src_original: sa evamindriyāśayānuśayajñaḥ yathāyogamālambanāvatāramukheṣvavatārayati sarvatragāminī pratipaj-jñānabalena /  tataścānurūpeṇālambanāvatāramukhaprayogena cittasthitiñca grāhayitvā (Dutt 275)
tgt_original: 觀悕望已，以種種界智力，觀察根使，隨其方便境界度門而度脫之。

src_original: caritāni ca viśodhayitvā satkāyadṛṣṭimūla-śvāśatocchedāntagrāhavivarjitāṃ madhyamāṃ
tgt_original: 以一切至處道智力，於境界度門方便心住攝受心住，行清淨已離身見斷常等見，為說中道。

src_original: pratipadaṃ vyapadiśati sarvakleśaprahāṇāya pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānabalena cyutyupapattijñānabalena ca /
tgt_original: 離一切煩惱故，入宿命智力及生死智力。

src_original: tata evaṃ samyak prayuktaḥ śamathopastabdho aprahīṇakleśasamudācārayogākṛte kṛtābhimānināmabhimānaṃ tyājayati āsravakṣayajñānabalena /  ayaṃ tāvadeko balānāmanukramaparyāyaḥ /
tgt_original: 為止所縛不斷煩惱，起增上慢教令離故，入漏盡智力。

src_original: aparaḥ paryāyaḥ /  iha tathāgato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksambodhibhisaṃbudhya tatprathamataḥ sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ sammukhīkṛtya pratītyasamutpanneṣu dharmeṣu paramaṃ dharmasthitijñānaṃ vyavacārayati /
tgt_original: 又次第者，阿惟三佛法得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，先以處非處智力，觀察緣起第一義法住。

src_original: tacca dharmasthitijñānaṃ niḥśritya karmasvakatājñānabalena gṛhipakṣaṃ vyavalokayati yena yena karmaṇā vicitreṇa teṣāṃ gṛhipakṣāśritānāṃ samudāgamo 'bhūdbhaviṣyati vidyate [ca] /
tgt_original: 依第一義法住智已，以自業智力，觀在家分種種業。

src_original: gṛhipakṣaṃ vyavalokya dhyānavimokṣa-samādhisamāpattijñānabalena pravrajitapakṣaṃ vyavalokayati /  kimastyasmin kaścid pravrajitapakṣe duḥkhānniḥsṛto duḥkhān niḥsaraṇāya ca mārgasya deśayitā /
tgt_original: 觀在家分種種業已，以禪解脫三昧正受智力，觀出家分。

src_original: āhośvit nāstīti /  sa nāstīti avagamya nisrāṇamaśaraṇaṃ sarvaṃ lokamavekṣya mahākaruṇāmupādāya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayati /
tgt_original: 云何令此出家分於苦解脫，當為說道起大悲心佛眼觀察。

src_original: sa vyavalokayannindriyaparāparajñānaṃ sammukhīkṛtya prajānāti /  santi sattvā loke jātā [loke] vṛddhā mṛdvindriyā api madhyendriyā api tīkṣṇendriyā apīti /  [iti] viditvāsya dharmadeśanāyāṃ cittaṃ krāmati /
tgt_original: 以諸根利鈍智力，觀察軟中上根而為說法。

src_original: tataḥ pūrvavatsarvānukramo nānādhimuktyādikānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ balānāṃ veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 餘種種解智力等，次第如前說。

src_original: ayaṃ dvitīyo balānāmanukramaparyāyaḥ /  aparaḥ paryāyaḥ /  pūrvaṃ tāvattathāgato 'bhisaṃbudhyamātra eva sthānāsthānajñānabalena pratītyasamutpannaṃ dharmadhātuṃ vicārayati /  tataḥ karmasvakajñānabalena yeṣu pratītatyasamutpanneṣu dharmeṣu sattvasaṃjñātaṃ sattvadhātuṃ vicārayati /  amī sattvā evaṃ rūpasya svayaṃkṛtasya karmaṇa evaṃ rūpaṃ phalaṃ pratyanubhavantīti /
tgt_original: 又次第者，阿惟三佛法以處非處智力觀察緣起法界，以自業智力觀眾生界，如此眾生作如是業、受如是果。

src_original: dharmadhātuṃ [sattvadhātuṃ] ca yathāvadvyavacārayitvā dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalena tāneva sattvān duḥkhavimokṣāya samyak tribhiḥ prātihāryairavavadati /
tgt_original: 觀法界、眾生界已，以禪解脫三昧正受智力為苦眾生三種示現而教授之。

src_original: avavadan pūrvaṃvadananukrameṇāvaśiṣṭairvalairindriyādīni jñātvā mārge cāvatārayitvā tān sattvān duḥkhādvimocayati /
tgt_original: 餘根利鈍智力等，以道度脫一切眾生，令脫眾苦。

src_original: ayaṃ tṛtīyo balānāma nukramaparyāyaḥ /  (Dutt 276)  tatra sthānāsthānajñānavalasya karmasvakajñānabalasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ /
tgt_original: 差別者，知善不善業、得愛不愛果，是名處非處智力。

src_original: yatkuśalākuśalasya karmaṇa iṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ nirvartate idaṃ sthānāsthānajñānabalāt /  yatpunarya eva kuśalākuśalaṃ karma karoti sa eva tadiṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ pratyanubhavati /  idaṃ karmasvakajñānabalāt /  yattāvadya eva dhyānavimokṣādīnāṃ samāpattyā tasyaiva te bhavanti /  nānyasya /  idaṃ karmasvakajñānabalāt /
tgt_original: 知善不善業、得愛不愛果，不作不受乃至禪解脫等，此業非彼業，是名自業智力。

src_original: yatpunastāneva dhyānādīnāśritya vineyāṃsribhiḥ prātihāryairavavadati /  idaṃ dhyānavimokṣa[samādhi]samāpattijñānabalāt /  yat tāvacchraddhā-disahajena saṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti /  idaṃ dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalāt /
tgt_original: 知禪解脫等三種示現教授，乃至知淨等俱生相應心，是名禪解脫三昧正受智力。

src_original: yatpunastānyevendriyāṇi mṛdumadhyādhimātrādiprabhedena vibhajati /
tgt_original: 知軟中上根，是名諸根利鈍智力。

src_original: idamindriyaparāparajñānabalāt /  yattāvadindriyapūrva teṣu teṣu dharmeṣvāśayaṃ gṛhṇāti /
tgt_original: 乃至知諸根方便生彼悕望，亦名諸根利鈍智力。

src_original: idamindriyaparāparajñānabalāt /  yatpunastamevāśayaṃ nānā vibhajati idaṃ nānādhimuktijñānabalāt /
tgt_original: 知種種悕望，是名種種解智力。

src_original: tasya punarāśayasya samāsataḥ ṣaḍbhirākārairvibhāgo veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 解有六種：

src_original: anairyāṇika āśayaḥ /  tadyathā pṛthaṅ maheśvara-nārāyaṇa-brahmalokādyadhimuktānām /
tgt_original: 一者不出解，謂悕望摩醯首羅、那羅延、梵世等解。

src_original: nairyāṇika āśayaḥ tadyathā triṣu yāneṣvadhimuktānām /
tgt_original: 二者出解，謂悕望三乘解。

src_original: yaḥ punarupāyahetuḥ so 'dhipatipratyayo veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 方便因者，是增上緣。

src_original: tadyathā mṛdumadhyaparipākavyavasthitānām /
tgt_original: 三者遠淨解，謂悕望軟、中成熟解。 四者近淨解，謂悕望上成熟解。

src_original: yatpunaḥ pravibhajya vyavahārapadānugataṃ pūrvavat ṣaḍvidhaṃ caritaṃ prajānāti /  idaṃ pūrve nivāsānusmṛtijñānabalāt /
tgt_original: 知過去六種言說，是名宿命智力。

src_original: yattāvatpūrvāntamārabhya sattvānāṃ cyutyupapādaṃ prajānāti /  idaṃ pūrve nivāsānusmṛtijñānabalāt /
tgt_original: 乃至知過去眾生生死，亦名宿命智力。

src_original: yatpunaparāntikaṃ sattvānāṃ cyutyupapādaṃ paśyati /  idaṃ cyutyupapattijñānabalāt /
tgt_original: 知未來生死，是名生死智力。

src_original: yattāvadapariniṣṭhita-svakārthānāṃ sattvānāmaparānte upapattiṃ pratisandhiṃ prajānāti /  idaṃ cyutyupapattijñānabalāt /
tgt_original: 乃至知未究竟自義眾生未來生死，亦名生死智力。

src_original: yatpunaḥ pariniṣṭhitasvakārthānāṃ suvimuktacittānāṃ dṛṣṭadharmanirvāṇaprāptiṃ prajānāti /  idamāsravakṣayajñānabalāt /
tgt_original: 知究竟自義現法得涅槃，是名漏盡智力。

src_original: ayameṣāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāmanyonyaṃ viśeṣaścāviśeṣaśca veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 如是十種智力各各差別。

src_original: tatra dhātupuṣṭiḥ katamā /  yā prakṛtyā kuśaladharmabījasaṃpadaṃ niśritya pūrvakuśaladharmābhyāsāduttarottarāṇāṃ kuśaladharmabījānāṃ paripuṣṭatarā paripuṣṭatamā utpattiḥ sthitiḥ /  iyamucyate dhātupuṣṭiḥ /
tgt_original: 界充滿者，善法種子生長具足，依先修習善法種子展轉相因增長充滿，是名界充滿。

src_original: catvāri vaiśāradyāni granthato yathāsūtrameva veditavyāni /
tgt_original: 四無畏，如修多羅說。

src_original: tatra catvāryetāni sthānāni tathāgataiḥ pariṣadi pratijñātavyāni bhavanti /
tgt_original: 如來以此四事，於大眾中自證而無所畏。

src_original: śrāvakāsādhāraṇo jñeyāvaraṇavimokṣātsarvākārasarvadharmābhisaṃbodhaḥ /  idaṃ prathamaṃ sthānam /
tgt_original: 智障解脫，一切法平等覺不共聲聞，是第一無畏。

src_original: śrāvakasādhāraṇaśca kleśāvaraṇavimokṣaḥ /  idaṃ dvitīyaṃ sthānam /
tgt_original: 煩惱障解脫共聲聞，是第二無畏。

src_original: vimokṣakāmānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ duḥkhasamatikramāya nairyāṇiko mārgaḥ /
tgt_original: 說出苦道，是第三無畏。

src_original: samanantarapratyayaścālambanapratyayaśca cittacaitasikānāmeva dharmāṇām /  tathā hi cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ prāgutpannāvakāśadānaparigṛhītā ālambanaparigṛhītāśca prādurbhavanti pravartante ca /  tasmātsamanantarapratyaya ālambanapratyayaśca parigrahahetunā saṃgṛhītau veditavyau /
tgt_original: 次第緣、緣緣者，是心心數法，謂前生心心數法，開導攝受緣攝受生，是故二緣攝因所攝。

src_original: tasyaiva ca mārgasya prāptivibandhabhūtā ye āntarāyikā dharmāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ /  idaṃ caturthaṃ sthānam /
tgt_original: 障道法是第四無畏。

src_original: yathārthapratijñaśca tathāgataḥ eṣu caturṣu sthāneṣu /
tgt_original: 如來於是四義自如實知，若有誹謗言不知者無有是處。

src_original: tatra pūrvakābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ sthānābhyāṃ paripūrṇā svahitapratipattiḥ pratijñātā bhavati /  paścimakābhyāṃ [sthānābhyāṃ] paripūrṇā parihitapratipattiḥ pratijñātā bhavati /  tatrātmanaḥ sarvadharmābhisaṃbodhātsamyaksaṃbuddhatvaṃ tathāgato mahāyānasaṃprasthitān bodhisattvānadhikṛtya pratijānīte /
tgt_original: 前二處滿，是自安道； 後二處滿，是安彼道。 一切法平等覺，為向大乘諸菩薩故；

src_original: sarvāstravakṣayaṃ punaḥ (Dutt 278)  śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānasaṃprasthitān sattvānadhikṛtya pratijānīte /
tgt_original: 煩惱障解脫，為向聲聞緣覺乘故；

src_original: mārgaṃ nairyāṇikaṃ dharmānāntarāyikāṃstadubhayānadhikṛtya pratijānīte /
tgt_original: 出苦道及障道法，二俱為故。

src_original: evametatsūtrapadaṃ tathāgatena deśitam /  yo vā me bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakāṇāñca nairyāṇiko mārgo deśita iti vistaraḥ /  sa ca bodhisattvāpadeśaḥ saṃgītikāraiḥ śrāvakapiṭakādhikārādapanītaḥ /  bodhisattvapiṭake punarbodhisattvopadeśa eva kevalaḥ paṭhyate /
tgt_original: 如來為諸菩薩聲聞緣覺，行出苦道說修多羅。 結集經藏者，以說菩薩行立菩薩藏，說聲聞緣覺行立聲聞藏。

src_original: trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni granthato yathāsūtrameva veditavyāni /
tgt_original: 三念處，如修多羅說。

src_original: dīrgharātraṃ tathāgata evaṃ kāmaḥ kaccinmayā sudeśite dharme vineyāḥ pratipattau yathāvadavatiṣṭeranniti /  tasya ca dīrgharātraṃ tatkāmasya dharmasvāmino gaṇaparikarṣakasya tasyāḥ prārthitāyāḥ sampattibhyāmasaṃkleśasribhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ samāsataḥ prabhāvyate /
tgt_original: 如來長夜作如是念： 「我善法律為大法主，於受不受不起惱心。

src_original: tāni punaretāni pariṣattrayaprabhedāt trīṇi vyavasthāpyante /  tisraḥ pariṣadā katamāḥ /
tgt_original: 」略說三種眾：

src_original: tatra kathamebhirdaśabhirhetubhiḥ sarvalaukikā bhāvāḥpravartante /
tgt_original: 云何此十因，生一切世間事？

src_original: ekāntena samyak pratipadyante sarva eva /
tgt_original: 一者正趣；

src_original: ekāntena mithyā pratipadyante sarva eva /
tgt_original: 二者邪趣；

src_original: tṛtīyā punaḥ pariṣadyāsyāṃ tadekatyāḥ samyak pratipadyante tadekatyā mithyā pratipadyante /
tgt_original: 三者非正非邪。 於此三眾，以正念心而無增減。

src_original: trīṇyarakṣyāṇi yathāsūtrameva granthato veditavyāni /
tgt_original: 三不護，如修多羅說。

src_original: samāsataḥ sarvākārakukṛtapraticchādanatā-prahāṇam /  etattathāgatasya tribhirarakṣyaiḥ paridīpitam yadapi tadarthato 'pi kiñcidavyākṛtaṃ kukṛtamātrakaṃ bhavati kadācitkarhicitsmṛtipramoṣāt /  tadapi tathāgatasya sarveṇa sarva nāsti /
tgt_original: 略說一切所作覆藏悉斷，是故如來顯示三不護。 阿羅漢猶有無記突吉羅，或時忘誤；

src_original: kathañca saṃkleśo bhavati /
tgt_original: 云何生一切煩惱？

src_original: tadanyākārānapi trīnsamādhīnyathābhūta-vyavasthāna-nayapraveśena bhāvanā-nayapraveśena ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yeṣu śrāvakāḥ śikṣante samudāgacchati ca /
tgt_original: 若有餘行，悉入三三昧門，所謂聲聞所學所行。

src_original: catvārīmāni dharmoddānāni yāni buddhāśca bodhisattvāśca sattvānāṃ viśuddhaye deśayanti /

src_original: katamāni catvāri /

src_original: anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārā iti dharmoddānam /
tgt_original: 一切行無常是憂檀那法；

src_original: duḥkhāḥ sarvasaṃskārā iti dharmoddānam /  anātmānaḥ sarvadharmā iti dharmoddānam /
tgt_original: 一切行苦是憂檀那法； 一切法無我是憂檀那法；

src_original: etat pratisaṃyuktārtha yadbhūyasā dharmamudīrayanti buddhabodhisattvāḥ sattvānām /  tasmādetāni dharmoddānānītyucyante /
tgt_original: 諸佛菩薩具足此法，復以此法傳授眾生，是名憂檀那。

src_original: śāntaṃ nirvāṇamiti dharmoddānam /
tgt_original: 涅槃寂滅是憂檀那法。

src_original: paurāṇeśca śāntamānasairmunibhiruditoditatvānnityakālamuddānānītyucyante /  mahodayagāminī bhavāgrordhvaṃgāminī caiṣā pratipat tasmāduddānānītyucyante /
tgt_original: 過去寂默諸牟尼尊展轉相傳，是名憂檀那。 增上勇出乃至具足出第一有，是名憂檀那。

src_original: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārānanityataḥ samanupaśyati /  iha bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārāṇāmabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ nityakālameva nāstītyupalabhyānityataḥ sarvasaṃskārān paśyati /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩觀一切行無常？ 菩薩觀一切行，言說自性常不可得。

src_original: punaravijñātasya bhūtatastasyaiva nirabhilāpyasya vastunaḥ aparijñānahetukamudayavyayamupalabhyatān nirabhilāpyasvabhāvān sarvasaṃskārānanityataḥ samanupaśyati /  so 'tītān saṃskārānutpannaniruddhānsamanupaśyati /  teṣāṃ naiva hetumupalabhate nāpi svabhāvam /  tasmātteṣāṃ naiva hetuto naiva svabhāvato vidyamānatāṃ samanupaśyati /
tgt_original: 若復不知真實無言說事故有生有滅，若彼觀無言說自性一切行無常，觀過去行無生無滅，彼亦無因亦無自性可得，是故亦無因亦無自性。

src_original: pratyutpannāniruddhānsamanupaśyati /  teṣāṃ hetuṃ nopalabhate dattaphalatvāt /  svabhāvaṃ punarupalabhate aniruddhatvāt /  tasmātteṣāṃ svabhāvato vidyamānatāṃ samanupaśyati no tu hetutaḥ /
tgt_original: 觀現在行無生無滅，彼因不得而與果，故自性可得，是故觀彼自性而無因。

src_original: sa eva triṣvadhvasvavyavacchinnāṃ saṃskāra-santatiṃ pravartamānāṃ dṛṣṭvā ekaikasmin saṃskārakṣaṇe trīṇi saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni paśyati  kṣaṇādurkṣvaṃ caturthaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaṃ samanupaśyati /
tgt_original: 如是見三世分段諸行相續轉時，一一行剎那有三有為有為相，於剎那後有四有為相。

src_original: anāgatān saṃskārānanutpannāniruddhān paśyati /  teṣāṃ hetumupalabhate adattaphalatvāt /  no tu svabhāvamanutpannatvāt /  tasmātteṣāṃ bodhisattvo hetuto vidyamānatāṃ (Dutt 189)  paśyati no tu svabhāvataḥ /
tgt_original: 觀未來行無生無滅，彼因可得而不與果，故無自性，是故觀因而無自性。

src_original: tatra pūrvasaṃskārakṣaṇe svabhāvavināśānantara yo 'pūrvasaṃskārakṣaṇasvabhāvaprādurbhāvaḥ sā jātiriti paśyati /
tgt_original: 彼前諸行相自性壞，次未曾行相自性起名為生；

src_original: utpannasya yastatkālāvipraṇāśaḥ sā sthitiriti paśyati /
tgt_original: 起已未壞名為住；

src_original: sa yatsvabhāvameva tamutpannaṃ saṃskārakṣaṇaṃ samanupaśyati /  tatsvabhāvāneva tasya jātiṃ sthitiṃ jarāṃ ca /  [na] paśyati tadanyasvabhāvān /  tasmācca kṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ ca eva tasya saṃskārakṣaṇa[svabhāva]syāpagamaḥ sa eva teṣāṃ
tgt_original: 若觀起自性行相，即彼自性生住老相，無餘自性，是故剎那後如是行相自性滅。

src_original: taṃ pūrvaniruddhaṃ saṃskārajñaṇasvabhāvamapekṣya tasyotpannasya yadanyatvamanyathātvaṃ vā sā jareti paśyati /  tasmājjātikṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ tasyaivotpannasya saṃskārakṣaṇasya yaḥ svabhāvavināśaḥ sa vyaya iti paśyati /
tgt_original: 顧念前滅行相自性彼起異，異名為老，是故生剎那後； 即彼起行相自性壞名為滅。

src_original: jātyādīnāmiti yathābhūtaṃ paśyati tānyetāni catvāryaṣi saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānyabhisamasya  saṃskārāṇāṃ samāsato dvayāvasthā-prabhāvitāni /
tgt_original: 如是諸生等行相如實觀。 此四有為相，略說二種：

src_original: bhāvaprabhāvitānyabhāvaprabhāvitāni ca /
tgt_original: 有性及無性。

src_original: tatra bhagavatā yo bhāvastadekaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpitam /  yastvabhāvastat dvitīyaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpitam /  sa ca bhāvasteṣāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ sthityanyathātvaprabhāvita iti kṛtvā tṛtīyaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
tgt_original: 如來以起故立一有為相，以自性故立第二有為相，諸行住老故立第三有為相。

src_original: tatra bodhisattvaḥ saṃskāramātraṃ sthāpayitvā na tasya jātiṃ na sthitiṃ na jarāṃ nānityatāṃ sarvakālaṃ dravyasvabhāvapariniṣpattitaḥ paśyati
tgt_original: 彼菩薩觀有為行分齊，非生非住非老非壞，一切時別有事起。

src_original: tadvaikalyaṃ nānantarāyaḥ avirodhahetuḥ /
tgt_original: 彼不具不障，是名不相違因。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: saṃskāramātraṃ sa utpadyamānamupalabhate /  nāsyānyāṃ jātiṃ na sthitiṃ na jarāṃ nānityatām /
tgt_original: 諸行分齊起時，更無別生別住別老別壞。

src_original: yuktyāpi bodhisattvo vimṛśannetān jātyādīn dravyato nopalabhate /

src_original: saṃskāramātrameva ca jāyamānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ jīryamāṇaṃ vinaśyamānamupalabhate /  na tasyānyāṃ jātiṃ sthitiṃ jarāmanityatāñca /
tgt_original: 諸行分齊住老壞時，亦無別生別住別老別壞一念頃名為一剎那。

src_original: tathaiva so 'pyutpadyeta /  evaṃ sati dve janmanī syātām yacca saṃskāra-janma yacca jāti-janma tatra tatsaṃskārajanma tasmājjātijanmanaḥ ananyadeva vā syāt /

src_original: evañca punarvimṛśannopalabhate /  sa cedrūpādisaṃskāravinirmuktaḥ anyo jātidharmaḥ syāt sa yathaiva rūpādikaḥ saṃskāraḥ svātmanotpadyate /

src_original: ] yadi tāvadananyadevaṃ satyapārthikā jātidravyakalpanā /

src_original: anyā jātirdravyato 'stītiṃ na yujyate /  (Dutt 190) atha ca punaranyadevaṃ sati saṃskāra-janma jātirna bhavati /  saṃskāra-janma jātiriti na yujyate /

src_original: vartamānapratyayopasaṃhārato vartamāna evaṃ heturvartamānaḥ paripāko veditavyaḥ /

src_original: evamete daśa hetavastadanyeṣvapi laukikeṣu bhāveṣu yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ /  tadyathā dhānyaparigrahe /  (Dutt 71)
tgt_original: 諸餘一切世間事，皆十因所生，隨所宜應當知。

src_original: yathā jātirevaṃ sthitirjarā vināśaśca vistareṇa veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 如生，住老亦如是。

src_original: sa cedvināśo nāma svabhāvato dharmaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ syāt so 'pyutpadyeta nirudhyeta vā /

src_original: yadā ca vināśa utpannaḥ syāttadā sarvasaṃskārairniruddhairbhavitavyaṃ syāt /

src_original: tasya ca punarvināśasya nirodhāt niruddhairapi taiḥ saṃskāraiḥ punareva bhavitavyaṃ syāt vināśa eṣāṃ nāstīti kṛtvā /  ato vināśa utpadyate nirudhyate ceti na yujyate /

src_original: na ca punaḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā sarvakālāstitāñca dravyasatāṃ svabhāvapariniṣpatiñca prajñapti satāṃ paśyato nirvidvirāgo vimuktiśca yujyate /

src_original: ato viparyayeṇa tu yujyate /

src_original: ityebhirākārairbodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārā anityā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
tgt_original: 以此事故，菩薩於一切諸行無常如實知。

tgt_original: 復次菩薩於一切諸行無常相續轉時，觀三苦相：

src_original: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārā duḥkhā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /

src_original: punaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dvividhaṃ nairātmyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
tgt_original: 復次菩薩於一切法有為無為、無我我所，如實知眾生無我及法無我。

src_original: tatra sarvasya pratītyasamutpādasya yadidaṃ nāmasaṃjñā-vāgvyāhāraḥ tadyathā avidyā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃvistareṇa yāvajjarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ  ityayantāvat saṃkleśasyānuvyavahārahetuḥ /
tgt_original: 彼一切緣起名想言說，所謂無明、行、識、名色、六入、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老病死憂悲苦惱，是名煩惱隨說因。

src_original: pudgalanairātmyaṃ dharmanairātmyaṃ ca /  tatredaṃ pudgalanairātmyam /  yannaivate vidyamānā dharmāḥ pudgalāḥ /  nāpi vidyamānadharmavinirmukto 'nyaḥ pudgalo vidyate /  tatredaṃ dharmanairātmyam /
tgt_original: 彼眾生無我者，有法非眾生，離有法亦非眾生。

src_original: yatsarveṣvabhilāpyeṣu vastuṣu sarvābhilāpasvabhāvo dharmo na saṃvidyate /

src_original: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvadharmā anātmāna iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
tgt_original: 如是菩薩於一切法無我如實知。

src_original: yaḥ punareṣāmeva saṃskārāṇāṃ pūrvaṃ hetusamucchinnānāṃ paścādaśeṣoparamastadanyeṣāñcātyantamanabhinirvṛttiraprādurbhāvaḥ /  idamucyate nirvāṇam /  tacca śāntaṃ kleśopaśamāt duḥkhopaśamācca veditavyam /
tgt_original: 復次一切行起因斷，無餘諸餘畢竟滅名般涅槃，煩惱寂滅眾苦永息。

src_original: evaṃ ca tāvadanadhyāśayaśuddho bodhisattvaḥ adṛṣṭasatyo vā śrāvakāyānīyo nirvāṇamadhimukto bhavati /  evañcābhivadati-śāntaṃ nirvāṇamiti /
tgt_original: 未入淨心地菩薩、未見諦聲聞，於涅槃作意解想，說言寂滅涅槃。

src_original: na cāsya tasminnirvāṇe yathābhūtāvagamo yathāvajjñānadarśanaṃ (Dutt 191)  pravartate /  asti tveṣa yoniśo manaskāraḥ /
tgt_original: 當知是等不得真實涅槃知見，唯有正思惟。

src_original: tadyathā rājaputro vā gṛhapatiputro vā rājñā gṛhapatinā vā 'ntargṛhe saṃvardhitaḥ  syāt tasya ca daharasyaiva kumārabhūtasya tena rājñā gṛhapatinā vā kṛtrimakā mṛgarathakā
tgt_original: 譬如國王長者巨富無量，為諸子故造作戲具，鹿車、牛車、馬車、象車。

src_original: avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvajjātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamityevamādikasya anuvyavahārasya viṣayāsvādāpekṣā caiṣu bhavāṅgeṣu pravṛtiḥ /  ayamasya saṃkleśasyāpekṣāhetuḥ /
tgt_original: 無明緣行乃至生緣老死等，言說境界顧念味著。 諸有支生，是名煩惱以有因。

src_original: sa ca rājaputro vā gṛhapatiputro vā taiḥ krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ paricārayaṃsteṣveva kṛtrimeṣu mṛgeṣu mṛgasaṃjñī syāt kṛtrimeṣu go 'śveṣu hastiṣu hastisaṃjñī syāt /
tgt_original: 彼諸子等歡喜愛樂，作真鹿馬象車等想。

src_original: athaikadā sa rājā vā gṛhapatirvā svasya putrasya vṛddheranvayādindriyāṇāṃ paripākādbhūtānāṃ mṛgāṇāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣeta /  tasya punā rājaputrasya [vā] gṛhapatiputrasya vā ta varṇavādaṃ śrutvā evaṃ syāt /  eṣāmayaṃ rājā gṛhapatirvā asmākaṃ mṛgarathakānāṃ yāvaddhastirathakānāṃ vā varṇaṃ bhāṣata iti /
tgt_original: 其父知子漸已長大，為說真實牛鹿象馬，諸子謂父歎己象馬。

src_original: athāpareṇa samayena sa rājā gahapatirvā svaṃ putraṃ bahirāgārānnivīṣya bhūtāneva mṛgāṃstasmai upadarśayedbhūtāneva yāvaddhastina upadarśayet
tgt_original: 父於後時知子轉大，將出宅外示真象馬。

src_original: tasya tān dṛṣṭvā tasminsamaye pratyātmaṃ pratyavagamo yathābhūta utpadyeta /  ime te bhūtārthikā mṛgarathakā vistareṇa yāvaddhastirathakā yeṣāmasmākaṃ pitā dīrgharātraṃ  varṇaṃ bhāṣitavānasmākameva tvayathābhūte arthe tat pratirūpamātrake tatpratibimbapratibhāsamātrake  tena pūrvakeṇādhimokṣeṇāritīyeran /
tgt_original: 彼見實已乃知其真，定知其父常所歎說非是我等先所翫好，先所翫好非真象馬。

src_original: evameva saṃsārāntargṛhasaṃvṛddhānāmaśuddhāśayānāṃ bodhisattvānāmadṛṣṭasatyānāñca  śrāvakāṇāṃ putrasthānīyānāṃ pitṛkalpairbuddhairbodhisattvaiśca mahābhūmipraviṣṭairnirvāṇapratyakṣadarśibhisteṣāṃ  bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakāṇāñca purastānnirvāṇasya yathādṛṣṭasya varṇo bhāṣitaḥ /
tgt_original: 如是諸行以為屋宅，未住淨心地菩薩、未見諦聲聞如彼童子，諸佛如來及入大地菩薩明見涅槃，為彼菩薩及諸聲聞歎說涅槃，彼既聞已隨說意解。

src_original: avidyādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭe dharme yāni bījāni jātasya bhūtasyeha tānyanyajānmikasya jātijarāmaraṇasyākṣepahetuḥ /
tgt_original: 無明等法現法種子，生餘生生老病死，是名種殖因。

src_original: taiśca tannirvāṇaṃ guṇato ghoṣamātrānusariṇyā buddhyā dīrgharātramadhimuktam /  yadā punasteṣāṃ saṃbhāraparipākavṛddheranvayāt śraddhāśayānāñca bodhisattvānāṃ dṛṣṭasatyānāñca śrāvakāṇāṃ nirvāṇe pratyakṣaṃ jñānadarśanamutpadyate  tadā teṣāmapi yathābhūtaḥ pratyavagama utpadyate /
tgt_original: 若彼漸學道品具足，入淨心地及見諦聲聞，彼於涅槃生現知見：

src_original: idaṃ tannirvāṇaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ yasya buddhabodhisattvairvarṇā bhāṣitaḥ /  asmābhistu pūrvabālaprajñatayā na yathābhūtamadhimuktam /  asti tu tadasya pratirūpakam /  asti pratibhāsamātrakam /
tgt_original: 如是諸佛菩薩所歎說者，非如我等愚癡智慧意想所解，我等所想相似非實。

src_original: asatpuruṣasaṃsevā 'saddharmaśravaṇamayoniśomanaskāraḥ pūrvābhyāsāvedhaścāvidyādīnāmutpattaye parigrahahetuḥ /
tgt_original: 不近善友聽受正法、習不正思惟，無明等生，是名攝因。

src_original: te tena pūrvakeṇādhimokṣeṇa (Dutt 192)  ritīyante paścimakaṃ yathābhūtādhimokṣaṃ niśritya /
tgt_original: 於彼所解生慚愧心，依後知見。

src_original: tadyathā kiñcidvyādhitaṃ puruṣaṃ kaścinmahāvaidyastasya prapyupasthitasya vyādheḥ praśamāyānulomikairbhaiṣajyairūpatiṣṭhet /
tgt_original: 譬如病人遇得良醫，為治病故說隨病藥。

src_original: sa ca vyādhitapuruṣo dīrghakālapratiniṣevaṇātteṣāṃ bhaiṣajyānāṃ tadadhimukta eva bhavet tadārāmaḥ /  teṣveva sāradarśī bhavet /
tgt_original: 彼諸病者常習此藥，便作信解樂著此藥，緣是病差。

src_original: atha tasyaiva vyādhitapuruṣasya sa ca pūrvako vyādhistayā bhaiṣajyāsevayā vyupaśāmyedanyaścāpūrvo vyādhiranyabhaiṣajyasādhyaḥ prādurbhavet /  atha sa mahāvaidyaḥ pūrvakasya ca vyādheḥ praśamaṃ paścimakasya cotpādamanyabhaiṣajyasādhyaṃ  viditvā tañca pūrvakaṃ bhaiṣajyaprayogaṃ pratikṣipedanyaṃ cānulomikaṃ vyapadiśed bhaiṣajyam /
tgt_original: 更起餘病應服餘藥，良醫教彼棄捨前藥，更服餘藥。 彼諸病者信前藥故，不肯棄捨，良醫方便令服後藥。

src_original: sa bālo vyādhita puruṣaḥ pūrvabhaiṣajyādhimuktasteṣveva pathyasaṃjñī yenaiva mahāvaidyena tāni pūrvapaścimāni bhaiṣajyāni vyapadiṣṭāni /  evamapyucyamānastena saṃmukhamapathyānyetāni pūrvakāṇi bhaiṣajyāni paścime vyādhāviti  saṃpratyayena na gacchannāṣya vacanamabhiśraddhavyādevameva tadupamāste bālā bodhisattvāḥ  śrāvakāśca veditavyāḥ /  ye vyādhitapuruṣā eva kleśagrastā mahāvaidyasya tathāgatasyottarāduttaratarāmuttamatamāmuttānāduttānatarāṃ  samyagvyapadeśamavavādānuśāsanīṃ nāvataranti nādhimucyante na pratipadyante dharmasyānudharmam /
tgt_original: 如是菩薩住淨心地、見諦聲聞，諸煩惱病，諸佛如來、住大地菩薩為彼說法上法上上法、深法上深法上上深法、勝法上勝法上上勝法，教授教誡。

src_original: tatra śrāddho bodhisattvaḥ śrāvako vā na kasmiṃścittathāgatabhāṣite vimatisandehamutpādayati /  sa punaḥ sarvāṅgapariṣkārasusamāyuktamivājanyarathaṃ taṃ tathāgatabhāṣitaṃ dharmarathamabhirūhya  kuśala iva sārathiryāvatī tena bhūmirgantavyā bhavatyanuprāptavyā tāṃ laghuladhveva  gantā bhavatyadhandhāyamānaḥ /
tgt_original: 入淨心地菩薩、見諦聲聞，聞佛所說信受不疑，乘如來所說具足法乘，善能調御遊平等道，疾疾正向無餘涅槃。

src_original: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre yogasthāne saptadaśamaṃ bodhipakṣyapaṭalam /  (Dutt 193)  Bodhisattvaguṇapaṭalam (Chapter 1.18)  uddānam /  āścaryaṃ cāpyanāścaryaṃ samacittopakāritā /  pratikārastathā śāsti syādabandhyaprayogatā //  pañceme bodhisattvāsyāścaryādbhūtā dharmā anuttare samyaksaṃbodhiyāne śikṣamāṇasya veditavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 18 菩薩功德品菩薩地持方便處菩薩功德品第十八菩薩學阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，有五奇特未曾有法。

src_original: katame pañca /
tgt_original: 云何為五？

src_original: niṣkāraṇavatsalatā sarvasattveṣu /
tgt_original: 一者於諸眾生無有因緣而起愛念；

src_original: sattvānāmevārthāya saṃsāre 'prameyaduḥkhasahiṣṇutā /
tgt_original: 二者為諸眾生受無量苦；

src_original: tatrāvatāraḥ katamaḥ /  śraddhāpratilambhamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā āgārikasya duścaritavivekaśikṣāpadasamādānam /  ratigrāhaḥ katamaḥ /
tgt_original: 度者，親近善友信心得生，信增上已，離家惡行受持禁戒，非家出家受離欲戒。

src_original: bahukleśānāṃ durvineyānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ vinayopāyajñatā /
tgt_original: 三者煩惱熾盛難化眾生方便調伏；

src_original: paramadurvijñānatattvārthānupraveśaḥ /
tgt_original: 四者入第一難解真實之義；

src_original: acintyaprabhāvatā ca /
tgt_original: 五者入不可思議神通之力。

src_original: ime pañca bodhisattvānāmāścaryādbhutā dharmā asādhāraṇastadanyaiḥ sarvasattvaiḥ /
tgt_original: 如是奇特未曾有法，不與一切諸眾生共。

src_original: pañcemāni bodhisattvasyānāścaryāṇi yaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ anāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ityucyate /  katamāni pañca /
tgt_original: 菩薩有五事非奇特，能成奇特未曾有法。

src_original: yad bodhisattvaḥ parahitahetukena duḥkhena sukhātmaka eva san kṛtsnaṃ parahitahetukaṃ duḥkhamabhyupagacchati /  idaṃ bodhisattvasya prathamamanāścaryaṃ yena samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ anāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ityucyate /
tgt_original: 一者為安眾生故受於苦因，受苦因故得受安樂。

src_original: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvaḥ saṃsāradoṣajño nirvāṇaguṇajña eva ca san sattvapariśuddhipriyastenaiva ca sukhātmakaḥ sattvapariśuddhimevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā saṃsāramabhyupagacchati /
tgt_original: 二者知生死過惡涅槃功德，有淨眾生念不自受樂、為淨眾生故受諸生死。

src_original: svakasvakaṃ bījamavidyādīnāṃ nirvṛṃttihetuḥ /
tgt_original: 各各種子無明等生，是名生因。

src_original: idaṃ bodhisattvasya dvitīyamanāścaryaṃ pūrvavat /  punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvastūṣṇīṃbhāva-sukharasajña eva san sattvapariśuddhipriyastenaiva ca sukhātmakaṃ sattvapariśuddhimevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā sattvānāṃ dharmedeśanāyai prayujyate /  idaṃ bodhisattvasya tṛtīyamanāścaryaṃ pūrvavat /
tgt_original: 三者修靜默樂、有淨眾生念不自受樂、為淨眾生故演說正法。

src_original: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvaḥ [ṣaṭ] pāramitopacitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sattvapariśuddhipriyastenaiva ca sukhātmakaḥ sattvapariśuddhimevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā sarvasattvānāmāśayataḥ samutsṛjati /  na ca punastasya samutsargasya vipākenārthī bhavati /
tgt_original: 四者修六波羅蜜善根、有淨眾生念不自受樂、為淨眾生故不捨一切眾生、亦不捨果報。

src_original: pañcabhirākārairbodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu samacitto veditavyaḥ /  katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩有五事，於一切眾生其心平等。

src_original: tathā hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthe samaṃ taccittamutpādayati /
tgt_original: 一者初發心願，為一切眾生其心平等。

src_original: anukampāsahagatena cittena samacitto bhavati /
tgt_original: 二者修習大悲心，與哀愍俱其心平等。

src_original: bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu ekaputraka iva premasahagatena cittena samacitto bhavati /  bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu ekaputraka eva premasahagatena cittena samacitto bhavati /  viditvā bodhisattvo yā ekasya sattvasya dharmatā sā sarveṣāmiti dharmasamatānugatena
tgt_original: 三者於一切眾生作一子想，與愛念俱其心平等。

src_original: cetasā sarvasattveṣu samacitto viharati /  yathā caikasya sattvasyārthamācarati tathā sarveṣām /  evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvārthakriyāsahagatena cetasā sarvasattveṣu smacitto viharati /  ebhiḥ pañcabhirākārairbodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu samacitto bhavati /
tgt_original: 四者觀一切眾生諸行緣起，一眾生法即是一切諸眾生法，隨順一切眾生其心平等。 五者如為一眾生行，如是一切眾生，利益心俱其心平等。

src_original: pañcabhirākārairbodhisattvānāṃ sattveṣu sarvopakārakriyā veditavyā /  katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩有五事饒益一切眾生：

src_original: samyagājīvavyapadeśopasaṃhāreṇa /
tgt_original: 一者說正命饒益；

src_original: vilomeṣu ca kṛtyeṣvarthopasaṃhiteṣvanulomopadeśopasaṃhāreṇa /
tgt_original: 二者不隨順者說隨順法饒益；

src_original: anāthānāṃ ca duḥkhitānāṃ kṛpaṇānāmapratiśaraṇānāṃ sanāthakriyayā /
tgt_original: 三者孤獨辛苦貧乞無依者為作依怙饒益；

src_original: sugatigamanāya mārgavyapadeśopasaṃhāreṇa yānatrayavyapadeśopasaṃhāreṇa ca /
tgt_original: 四者向善趣者說道饒益； 五者為三乘人說三乘饒益。

src_original: pañcabhirākāraiḥ sattvā upakāriṇo bodhisattvasya pratyupakāreṇa pratyupasthito bhavanti /  katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩有五事報眾生恩：

src_original: ātmānaṃ guṇaiḥ saṃyojayanti paraguṇādhānāya prayuktāro bhavanti /
tgt_original: 一者自成功德； 二者勸他令成；

src_original: te punaravidyādayo bhavaparyavasānā uttarottarāvāhanapāraṃparyeṇa tasyānyajānmikasya jātijarāmaraṇasyāvāhakahetuḥ /
tgt_original: 從無明至後有增進相求，至餘生生老病死，是名長因。

src_original: anātheṣu duḥkhiteṣu kṛpaṇeṣvapratiśaraṇeṣu sattveṣu sānāthyaṃ kurvanti /
tgt_original: 三者孤獨辛苦貧乞無依為作依怙；

src_original: tathāgatān pūjayanti /
tgt_original: 四者供養如來；

src_original: tathāgatābhāṣitañca dharmamukhena vā lekhayitvā vā dhārayanti tañca pūjayanti /
tgt_original: 五者佛所說法，若讀誦若書持若供養。

src_original: pañcemāni sthānāni bodhisattvena nityamevamāśaṃsitavyāni bhavanti /  katamāni pañca /
tgt_original: 菩薩行菩提道常求五事：

src_original: buddhotpādārāgaṇatā /  teṣāmeva ca buddhānāmantikāt ṣaṭe pāramitā-bodhisattvapiṭakaśravaṇam /
tgt_original: 一者常願諸佛出興於世； 二者於諸佛所聽六波羅蜜及菩薩藏；

src_original: sarvākārasattvaparipācanapratiabalatā /
tgt_original: 三者堪能一切種成熟眾生；

src_original: anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhiprāptiḥ /  abhisaṃbodheśca śrāvakasāmagrī /  (Dutt 195)
tgt_original: 四者堪能無上成熟眾生； 五者得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提、阿惟三菩提、聲聞菩提，和合聲聞。

src_original: anye saha svavīryairavidyādayo bhavaparyavasānā narakopapattaye saṃvartante /  anye tiryakpretamanuṣyadevopapattaye /  ityeyaṃ saṃkleśasya pratiniyamahetuḥ /
tgt_original: 種種種子俱從無明乃至後有，生地獄餓鬼畜生及諸人天，是名煩惱自種因。

src_original: pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ bodhisattvasya sattveṣvvabandhyo 'rthakriyā-prayogo bhavati /  katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩有五事利益眾生真實方便。

src_original: iha bodhisattva ādita eva sattveṣu hitasukhaiṣī bhavati /  tacca hitasukhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /  aviparyastabuddhirbhavati /  iti sarvaṃ pūrvavad veditavyaṃ yadyathā pūjāsevā 'pramāṇapaṭale /  uddānam /
tgt_original: 是菩薩先欲安樂眾生，於彼安樂如實知不顛倒覺，如前供養習近無量品說。

src_original: samyak prayogo hāniśca viśeṣagamanaṃ tathā /  pratirūpāśca bhūtāśca guṇā vinayanaṃ tathā //  pañcabhiḥ prayogairbodhisattvasya sarvasamyaksaṃprayoga saṃgraho veditavyaḥ katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩有五種方便攝一切正方便： 一者隨護方便； 二者無罪方便；

src_original: adhyāśayaśuddhiprayogeṇa /
tgt_original: 三者思惟力方便； 四者淨心方便；

src_original: niyatapatitaprayogeṇa ca /
tgt_original: 五者決定方便。

src_original: apekṣāhetumādiṃ kṛtvā sarva ete hetavaḥ pratiniyamahetuparyavasānāḥ sahakāriheturityucyate /
tgt_original: 從以有因乃至自種因，是名共事因。

src_original: tatra bodhisattvo 'nurakṣaṇā prayogeṇa medhāṃ rakṣati yena sahajena jñānena dharmān laghuladhvevodgṛhṇāti /  smṛtiṃ rakṣati yayā smṛtyā udgṛhītān dharmān dhārayati /  jñānamārakṣati yena jñānena dhṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāmarthamupaparīkṣate /  samyak prajñayā pratividhyati medhāsmṛtibuddhihānabhāgīyanidānaparivarjanatayā sthitivṛddhibhāgīyanidānapratiniṣevaṇatayā ca /
tgt_original: 隨護方便有五種： 一者黠護，得俱生智能疾受法。 二者念護，念持於法。 三者智護，得堅固智觀察法義，以黠念智護離於退分修勝進分。

src_original: tatra bodhisattvasyānavadyaprayogo yaḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣvaviparītaścottaptaścāpramāṇaśca satataśca bodhipariṇāmitaśca /
tgt_original: 無罪方便者，於諸善法不顛倒，熾然無量常修迴向菩提。

src_original: pratisaṃkhyānabalaprayogaḥ punarasya sarvasyāmadhimukticaryābhūmau draṣṭavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 思惟力方便者，是解行地。

src_original: [śuddhādhyāśayaprayogaḥ] śuddhādhyāśayabhūmau caryā pratipattibhūmau ca draṣṭavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 淨心方便者，是淨心地具足行地。

src_original: niyatipatitaprayogo niyatāyāṃ bhūmau niṣṭhāgamanabhūmau ca draṣṭavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 決定方便者，是決定地、決定行地、究竟地。

src_original: ivamebhiḥ pañcabhiḥ prayogairbodhisattvasya sarvasamyakprayogasaṃgraho bhavati /
tgt_original: 是名五種方便攝一切正方便。

src_original: pañceme bodhisattvasya hānabhāgīyā dharmā veditavyāḥ /  katame pañca /
tgt_original: 菩薩退分有五事：

src_original: tasya punaḥ saṃkleśasya virodhahetuḥ gotrasaṃpad buddhānāmutpādaḥ saddharmasya deśanā  satpuruṣasaṃsevā saddharmaśravaṇaṃ yoniśo manaskāro dharmānudharmapratipattiḥ sarve  ca bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ /
tgt_original: 若有種性，值佛出世演說善法，近善知識聽受善法，正念思惟，法次法向清淨道品，是名煩惱相違因。

src_original: agauravatā dharme dharmabhāṇake ca /
tgt_original: 一者不恭敬法及說法者；

src_original: pramādakausīdyam /
tgt_original: 二者放逸懈怠；

src_original: kleśa-āsevā 'dhivāsanatā /  duścarita-āsevā 'dhivāsanatā /
tgt_original: 三者習眾煩惱及諸惡行；

src_original: tadanyaiśca bodhisattvaiḥ saha paritulanābhimānatā dharmaviparyāsābhimānatā ca /
tgt_original: 四者稱量同己及餘菩薩起增上慢； 五者於法顛倒起增上慢。

src_original: pañceme bodhisattvasya dharmā viśeṣabhāgīyā veditavyāḥ /  te punareṣāmeva pañcānāṃ kṛṣṇapakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yathākramaṃ viparyayeṇa veditavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩勝分有五事，與上退分五事次第相違者，是名勝分。

src_original: avirodhahetureṣāmeva yathoddiṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vaikalyaṃ virahitatvam /
tgt_original: 如上說不具者，是名不相違因。

src_original: pañceme bodhisattvānāṃ guṇapratirūpakaḥ bodhisattvadoṣā veditavyāḥ /  katame pañca /
tgt_original: 菩薩有五事菩薩似功德過：

src_original: raudraduḥśīleṣu sattveṣu tato nidānamapakārakriyā /
tgt_original: 一者於諸凶惡及犯戒者作非慈饒益；

src_original: kuhakasyeryāpathasampattikralpanā /  lokāyatairmantraistīrthikaśāstrapravisaṃyuttairjñātra pratilambhaḥ paṇḍitasaṃkhyā-gamanatā ca /
tgt_original: 二者現諂曲威儀； 三者說世俗諸外道經論，得生智慧能自思惟；

src_original: saddharmapratirūpakāṇāṃ ca /  rocanā deśanā vyavasthāpanā /

src_original: tebhyaśca sattvebhyo yānsattvān bhavyān śakyarupānatyantaduḥkhavimokṣāya paśyati /  sa caturtho 'prameyaḥ /

src_original: tadekatyāḥ sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayanti /

tgt_original: 五者為眾生說法，聞已受誦，具足修習令法久住。

src_original: itīme pañca deśanāyā vipulāḥ phalānuśaṃsā veditavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 是名五種說法得大果福利。

src_original: saptemāni mahattvāni yairyuktaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yānaṃ mahāyānamityucyate /  katamāni sapta /

src_original: dharmamahattvam /  tadyathā dvādaśāṅgādvacogatād bodhisattvapiṭakavaipulyam /
tgt_original: 一者法大，謂十二部經，菩薩方廣藏最上最大。

src_original: cittotpādamahattvam /  tadyathā ekatyo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayati /
tgt_original: 二者心大，謂發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。

src_original: adhyāśayamahattvam /  tadyathaikatyaḥ adhimukticaryābhūmiṃ (Dutt 202)  samatikramyādhyāśayaśuddhibhūmimanupraviśati /

src_original: sambhāramahattvam /  yasya puṇyasambhārasya jñānasambhārasya samudāgamādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisambudhyate /
tgt_original: 五者眾具大，謂福德眾具、智慧眾具得無上菩提。

src_original: kālamahattvam /  yena kālena yaistribhiṣkalpāsaṃkhyeyairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
tgt_original: 六者時大，謂三阿僧祇劫得無上菩提。

src_original: samudāgamamahattvam /  saivānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /  yasyātmabhāvasamudāgamasyānyaḥ ātmabhāvasamudāgamaḥ samo nāsti /
tgt_original: 七者得大，謂得無上菩提身，無與等者，況復過上。

src_original: kutaḥ punaruttari kuto bhūyaḥ /  tatra yacca dharmamahattvaṃ yacca cittotpādamahattvaṃ yaccādhimuktimahattvaṃ yaccādhyāśayamahattvaṃ  yacca sambhāramahattvaṃ yacca kālamahattvamitīmāni ṣaṭmahattvāni hetubhūmāni samudāgama-mahattvasya /  tatpunarekaṃ samudāgama-mahattvaṃ phalasthānīyameṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ veditavyam /  aṣṭāvime dharmāḥ sarvasya mahāyānasya saṃgrahāya saṃvartante /  bodhisattvapiṭakadeśanā /
tgt_original: 彼法大、心大、解大、淨心大、眾具大、時大，此六大謂因種得大謂果處。

src_original: tasminneva ca bodhisattvapiṭake ya sarvadharmāṇāṃ tattvārthaprakāśanā /  tasminneva bodhisattvapiṭake yā sarvabuddhabodhisattvānāmacintyā paramodārā prabhāvasaṃprakāśanā /  tasya ca yadyoniśaḥ śravaṇam /  yoniśaśca cintāpūrvakamadhyāśayopagamanam /  adhyāśayopagamanapūrvaṃkaśca bhāvanākārapraveśaḥ /  bhāvanākārapraveśapūrvikā ca bhāvanāphalapariniṣpattiḥ /  taśyā eva ca bhāvanāphalapariniṣpatteratyantanairyāṇikatā /
tgt_original: 菩薩有八法，攝一切摩訶衍菩薩藏所說，謂信菩薩藏，顯示一切法真實義、顯示一切諸佛菩薩不可思議第一勝妙神力，得聞慧思慧思惟，依聞慧思慧思惟方便得淨心，得淨心方便入修慧行，入修慧行方便修慧果成，如是修慧果成畢竟出離，菩薩如是學得無上菩提。

src_original: evaṃ hi bodhisattvāḥ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhthante /

src_original: aśuddhāśayaḥ /  śuddhāśayaḥ /

src_original: aparipakvaḥ /
tgt_original: 五者未熟；

src_original: paripakvaḥ /

src_original: yo vyavadānapakṣyo virodhahetuḥ sa saṃkleśaheturdraṣṭavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 淨法相違因，是煩惱因。

src_original: ekajātipratibaddhaḥ /
tgt_original: 八者定； 九者一生；

src_original: caramabhavikaśceti /
tgt_original: 十者最後身。

src_original: tatra gotrastho bodhisattvaḥ śikṣamāṇaścittamutpādayati /  so 'vatīrṇa ityucyate /

src_original: sa eva punaravatīrṇo yāvat śuddhāśayabhūmimapraviṣṭo bhavati tāvadaśuddhāśaya ityucyate /
tgt_original: 已入未入淨心地名為未淨；

src_original: praviṣṭastu śuddhāśayo bhavati /
tgt_original: 入淨心地名為淨。

src_original: evaṃ ebhirdaśabhirhetubhiḥ saṃkleśo daśabhireva vyavadānaṃ bhavatyatīte 'pyadhvanyabhūdanāgate  'pyadhvani bhaviṣyati saṃkleśāya vā vyavadānāya vā na ebhya uttari na ebhyo bhūyānanyo heturvidyate /

src_original: praviṣṭastu paripakvo bhavati /
tgt_original: 入畢竟地名為熟。

src_original: sa punaraparipakvo yāvanniyataniyatācaryābhūmau (Dutt 203)  vā nānupraviṣṭo bhavati tāvadaniyata ityucyate /

src_original: praviṣṭastu niyato bhavati /
tgt_original: 已入定地名為定。

src_original: sa eva punaḥ paripakvau dvividhaḥ /

tgt_original: 一者一生，次第得無上菩提； 二者最後身，即此生得。

src_original: tatrādiprasthānaṃ katamat /  ya eva tatprathamataḥ saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu saṃvegamāgamya nyāyārthapratipādane cānuśaṃsāṃ viditvā 'vatāraḥ /
tgt_original: 初處者，以初厭法修行厭離，知勝妙義度功德利。

src_original: tatra phalaṃ katamat /
tgt_original: 云何為果？

src_original: tatra te gotramupādāya yāvadanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdaśa bodhisattvā nirdiṣṭāḥ /  ye bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣante teṣāṃ nāta uttari śikṣā vidyate /  yatra śikṣeran yathā ca śikṣeran na ca ebhyo yathā nirdiṣṭebhyo bodhisattvebhya uttari bodhisattvo vidyate yo bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣate /
tgt_original: 如是從種性乃至最後身得無上菩提，此十種菩薩所學而學，於上更無所學。 菩薩如所學而學，於上更無菩薩學。

src_original: teṣāṃ punaḥ sarveṣāṃ eva bodhisattvānāmabhedenimānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni gauṇāni nāmāni veditavyāni /  tadyathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dhīmānuttamadyutiḥ jinaputro jinādhāraḥ vijetā jināṅkuraḥ vikrāntaḥ paramāryaḥ sārthavāho mahāyaśaḥ kṛpālurmahāpuṇyaḥ īśvaro dhārmikaśceti /
tgt_original: 菩薩如所學而學，得一切功德名，所謂菩薩摩訶薩、勇猛無上、佛子、佛持、大師、大聖、大商主、大名稱、大功德、大自在。

src_original: teṣāṃ punardaśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣvanantānāṃ bodhisattvānāmaprameyāḥ prayātmagatāḥ saṃjñāprāptayo veditavyāḥ /  tatra ye bodhisattvāḥ sma iti pratijñāyāṃ bodhisattvā vartante na ca bodhisattvaśikṣāsu samyak pratipadyante te bodhisattvapratirūpakā veditavyāḥ  no tu bhūtāḥ /
tgt_original: 如是十方無量世界、無量菩薩、無量因緣，自想施設。 當知若有言我是菩薩，不善學菩薩所學者，當知是名字菩薩非實菩薩。

src_original: bodhisattvāḥ sma iti pratijñāyāṃ vartante samyak [ca ye] bodhisattvaśikṣāṣu śikṣante te bhūtā bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 若言我是菩薩，善學菩薩所學者，當知是實菩薩。

src_original: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre yogasthāne bodhisattvaguṇapaṭalamaṣṭādaśamam /  samāptaṃ cādhārayogasthānam /  uddānam /  svabhāvo 'dhiṣṭhānaṃ [phalānuśaṃsaḥ] anukramaḥ saṃgraheṇa ca /  pañcemāni bhūtasya bodhisattvasya bodhisattvaliṅgāni yaiḥ samanvāgato [bodhisattvo] bodhisattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
tgt_original: 2 次法方便處1 菩薩相品菩薩地持次法方便處菩薩相品第一第二段有四品菩薩成就五種真實相，得入諸菩薩數。 一者哀愍；

src_original: anukampā priyavāditā vairyaṃ muktahastatā gambhīrārthasandhinirmocanatā ca /
tgt_original: 二者愛語； 三者勇猛； 四者惠施； 五者說深法義。

src_original: ime punaḥ pañca dharmāḥ pañca parivartena veditavyāḥ /  svabhāvato 'dhiṣṭhānataḥ phalānusaṃśataḥ anukramataḥ saṃgrahataśca /
tgt_original: 此五相，各五種分別： 一者自性； 二者境界； 三者果報； 四者次第； 五者攝受。

src_original: tatrānukampāyāḥ svabhāvo dvividhaḥ /
tgt_original: 哀愍自性有二種：

src_original: tatrāśayagato hitāśayaḥ sukhāśayaśca bodhisattvasya sattveṣvanukampetyucyate /  pratipattigataśca svabhāvato 'nukampāyāḥ yadāśayo bhavati bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu tadeva yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ kāyena vācā upasaṃharati /
tgt_original: 至心者，安心樂心。 具足者，菩薩至心於諸眾生，隨其所能隨其力身口饒益。

src_original: samāsataḥ pañca phalāni /
tgt_original: 略說五種：

src_original: tatra priyavāditāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ pūrvavadāmodanī saṃmodanī upakarā ca vāgveditavyā /
tgt_original: 愛語自性者，先語安慰，如前攝品說。

src_original: tatra sattvaṃ dhṛtiralīnatvaṃ ca yadbalaṃ bodhisattvasya ayaṃ vairyaṃsvabhāva ityucyate /  tatra yā bodhisattvasyodāradānatā asaṃkliṣṭadānatā vā /  ayaṃ muktahastatāyāḥ svabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 勇猛自性者，於諸眾生志強有力。 惠施自性者，勝妙施、無煩惱施。

src_original: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidastāsāmeva cābhinirhārāya yatsamyak prāyogikaṃ jñānamayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ gambhīrārthasandhinirmocanatāyāḥ svabhāvo veditavyaḥ
tgt_original: 說深法義自性者，四無礙智出生正方便智。

src_original: tatrānukampāyāḥ pañcādhiṣṭhānāni /  katamāni pañca /
tgt_original: 哀愍境界有五種：

src_original: duḥkhitāḥ sattvā duścaritacāriṇaḥ pramattā mithyāpratipannāḥ kleśānuśayitāśca /
tgt_original: 一者受苦眾生； 二者惡行眾生； 三者放逸眾生； 四者邪趣眾生； 五者煩惱所使眾生。

src_original: nārakānsattvānupādāya śeṣāṃ keṣāṃcitsattvānāṃ duḥkhā vedanā prābandhikī santatisamārūḍhā vartate /  (Dutt 208) ime [te] sattvā duḥkhitā ityucyante /
tgt_original: 從地獄乃至一切苦受相續，是名受苦。

src_original: ye punarnāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitāapi tu bahulaṃ kāyaduścaritamadhyācaranti vāgduścaritaṃ manoduścaritamadhyācaranti /
tgt_original: 雖不受苦而多造作身口意惡行，所謂十二惡律儀，是名惡行。

src_original: tatra cābhiratarūpā viharanti /  ime sattvā duścaritacāriṇa ityucyante tadyathā aurabhrika-śaukarika-kaukkuṭikaprabhṛtayaḥ /  ye punarnāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitā na duścaritacāriṇo 'pi tvadhyavasitāḥ kāmānupabhuñjate naṭanartakahāsakalāsakaprekṣaṇaparā viharanti ātmopalāḍanaparāḥ  ime sattvāḥ pramattā ityucyante tadyathā tadekatyāḥ kāmopabhoginaḥ /
tgt_original: 雖不受苦造諸惡行，而樂著五欲歌舞戲笑，是名放逸。

src_original: ye punarnāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitā na duścaritacāriṇo na vāpi pramattāḥ api tu dṛṣṭivipattimāśritya duḥkhavimokṣāya pratipannāḥ /  ime sattvā mithyāpratipannā ityucyante tadyathā kāmānutsṛjya durākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitāḥ /  ye punaḥ sattvā nāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitā vistareṇa yāvan na mithyāpratipannāḥ api tu sakalabandhanāśca
tgt_original: 雖不受苦造諸惡行、樂著五欲，而依邪見求苦解脫，是名邪趣。 捨離五欲於法出家，不受諸苦乃至邪趣，而具煩惱或有不具，謂正方便。

src_original: vikalabandhanāśca kleśaiḥ ime sattvāḥ kleśānuśayitā ityucyante tadyathā ye ca samyak
tgt_original: 真實凡夫及諸學人，是名煩惱所使。

src_original: abhīkṣṇadānatā pramuditadānatā satkṛtyadānatā asaṃkliṣṭadānatā aniśrityadānatā ca /
tgt_original: 一者不分別施； 二者歡喜施；

src_original: eṣāṃ punarvistareṇa vibhāgo veditavyaḥ /  tadyathā dānapaṭale /
tgt_original: 三者頓施； 四者不染污施； 五者無依施，如前施品說。

src_original: ebhiradhiṣṭhānairebhirālambanairbodhisattvānāṃ muktahastatā pravartate /  nāt uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩於此境界，惠施心生無餘無上。

src_original: pañcemāni bodhisattvasya gambhīrārthasandhinirmocanatāyā adhiṣṭhānāni /  katamāni pañca /
tgt_original: 說深法義境界有五種：

src_original: ye te tathāgatabhāṣitāḥ sūtrāntāḥ gambhīrāgambhīrāvabhāṣāḥ śūnyatā-pratisaṃyuktā idaṃpratyayatā /  pratītyasamutpādānulomāḥ /  idaṃ prathamamadhiṣṭhānam /
tgt_original: 一者於如來所說修多羅，甚深空相應緣起隨順。

src_original: vinaye vā punarāpattikauśalyamāpattivyutthāna-kauśalyaṃ ca /  idaṃ dvitīyamadhiṣṭhānam /
tgt_original: 二者於諸戒律，善知犯不犯及與出犯。

src_original: mātṛkāyāṃ vā punaraviparītaṃ dharmalakṣaṇavyavasthānam /  idaṃ tṛtīyamadhiṣṭhānam /
tgt_original: 三者於摩德勒伽藏，不顛倒建立法相。

src_original: ābhiprāyikanigūḍhadharmasaṃjñārthavibhāvanatā /  idaṃ caturthamadhiṣṭhānam /
tgt_original: 四者於深法義以想分別。

src_original: sarvadharmāṇāñca dharmārthanirvacanaprakārabhedaḥ /  idaṃ pañcamamadhiṣṭhānam /
tgt_original: 五者於一切法法義，種種言辭種種分別。

src_original: yenādhiṣṭhānena yenālambanena bodhisattvānāṃ gambhīrārthasandhinirmocanatā pravartate /  nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩於此境界，說深法義心生無餘無上。

src_original: anukampā bodhisattvasya sattveṣvādita eva tāvadvairaprahāṇāya saṃvartate /  tathānukampako bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvārthakriyāsu adinamanāḥ prayujyate /  tasmiṃśca prayoge na parikhidyate /  anukampā tad-bahulavihāritā cāsyānavadyadṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya parānugrahāya ca saṃvartate /
tgt_original: 菩薩哀愍於諸眾生修習慈心，利益親厚方便不厭，多住無罪現法樂攝取眾生。

src_original: ye ca bhagavatā maitryā anuśaṃsā uktānāsya kāye viṣaṃ krāmati na śasramityevamādayaḥ /
tgt_original: 如世尊說，慈心福利，身常不被刀杖等害。

src_original: te 'pyanukampakasya bodhisattvasya sarve veditavyāḥ /  ityayamanukampāyā bodhisattvānāṃ phalānuśaṃso draṣṭavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 此中應廣說，是名哀愍果。

src_original: vipākaphalaṃ niṣyandaphalaṃ visaṃyogaphalaṃ puruṣakāraphalamadhipatiphalañca /
tgt_original: 一者報果； 二者依果； 三者解脫果； 四者士夫果； 五者增上果。

src_original: priyavādī bodhisattvo dṛṣṭe dharme caturvidhaṃ vāgdoṣaṃ vijahāti mṛṣāvādaṃ paiśūnyaṃ ṣāruṣyaṃ sambhinnapralāpañca /
tgt_original: 菩薩愛語，於現法中離口四過： 兩舌、惡口、妄言、綺語。

src_original: sā cāsya bāgātmānugrahāya parānugrahāya ca pravṛttā bhavati /  dṛṣṭa eva ca dharme āyatyāṃ ca priyavādī bodhisattvaḥ ādeyavacano bhavati grāhyavacanaḥ /  ityayaṃ bodhisattvasya priyavāditāyāḥ [phalā]nuśaṃso veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 以此愛語自攝攝他，於未來世成就正語，言輒信用，是名愛語果。

src_original: dhīro bodhisattvo dṛṣṭe [tāvata] dharme sarveṇa sarvamālasyakausīdyāpagato bhavati pramuditacittaśca /  bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ karoti /  kṛtvā ca na (Dutt 210) viṣīdati /  ātmānaṃ ca parañca kṣāntyānugṛhṇāti /  āyatyāṃ ca sarvabodhisattvakṛtyasamārambheṣu prakṛtyā dṛḍhasamāraṃbho bhavati /
tgt_original: 菩薩勇猛，於現法中離諸懈怠心常歡喜，受持菩薩律儀戒不毀不犯，以堪忍心攝受自他，於未來世菩薩所作悉能修學，學已堅固，是名勇猛果。

src_original: nākṛtvā vinivartate /  itīme bodhisattvānāṃ vairyaphalānuśaṃsā veditavyā /  muktahastatāyā gambhīrārthasandhinirmocanatāyāśca phalānuśaṃsā veditavyāḥ /  tadyathā prabhāvapaṭale dānaprabhāve prajñāprabhāve ca /  ayameṣāṃ bodhisattvavijñānāṃ phalānuśaṃsaḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩惠施及說深法義果，如前力品、檀波羅蜜、般若波羅蜜說，是名惠施說深法義果。

src_original: kaścaiṣāmanukramaḥ /  pūrvaṃ tāvadbodhisattvo 'nukampayā sattvānanugṛhṇāti teṣu ca sāpekṣo bhavatyarthakāmaḥ /  tataścākuśalātsthānādvyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya yuktiṃ bhāṣate grāhayati vyapadiśati /
tgt_original: 次第者，菩薩先修哀愍攝取眾生，為令眾生出不善法安立善法，為具足說教授攝受，是故次說愛語。

src_original: evamavatīrṇeṣu ca sattveṣu sattvavipratipattiṣu [ca] kleśaviprakṛtāsvarthavidhāsu vimardasaho bhavati /  pratipattiviprati[patti]sthitānāṃ sattvānāmanutsargatayā /
tgt_original: 眾生造惡種種煩惱堪能不息，是故次說勇猛。

src_original: sa evaṃ dhīraḥ ekatyānsattvānāmiṣasaṃgraheṇa paripācayati ekatyāndharmasaṃgraheṇa tadekatyāṃstadubhābhyāṃ dharmābhiṣasaṃgrahābhyām /  ayameṣāṃ pañcānāṃ bodhisattvaliṅgānāmanukramo veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 或有眾生以財攝受、或有眾生以法攝受、或俱攝受，是故次說惠施、說深法義。

src_original: pañcemāni bodhisattvaliṅgāni ṣaṭpāramitāḥ /  āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ katamayā pāramitayā katamadbodhisattvaliṅgaṃ saṃgṛhītam /
tgt_original: 菩薩有五種相攝六波羅蜜。 此六波羅蜜何相所攝？

src_original: akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmapāyeṣu vipāko vipacyate /  kuśalasāsravāṇāṃ sugatau /  tadvipākaphalam /
tgt_original: 若不善法得惡趣報、有漏善法得善趣報，是名報果。

src_original: anukampā dhyānapāramitayā saṃgṛhītā /  priyāvāditā śīlapāramitayā prajñāpāramitayā ca saṃgṛhītā /  vairyaṃ vīryapāramitayā kṣāntipāramitayā prajñāpāramitayā ca saṃgṛhītam /  muktahastatā dānapāramitāyaiva saṃgṛhītā /  gambhīrārthasandhinirmocanatā dhyānapāramitayā prajñāpāramitayā ca saṃgṛhītā evamimāni [pañca bodhi]sattvaliṅgāni pañcaparivartena veditavyāni
tgt_original: 哀愍相攝禪波羅蜜，愛語相攝尸波羅蜜、般若波羅蜜，勇猛相攝羼提波羅蜜、毘離耶波羅蜜、般若波羅蜜，惠施相攝檀波羅蜜，說深法義相攝禪波羅蜜、般若波羅蜜。

src_original: gṛhipakṣe vā pravrajitapakṣe vā vartamānasya bodhisattvasya samāsataścatvāro dharmā veditavyāḥ /  yeṣu gṛhī pravrajito va bodhisattvaḥ śikṣamāṇaḥ kṣipramevānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
tgt_original: 2 翼品菩薩地持次法方便處翼品第二在家出家菩薩翼有四法，菩薩修學疾得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: katame catvāraḥ /  sukṛtakarmāntatā kauśalyaṃ parānugrahaḥ pariṇāmanā ca /
tgt_original: 一者善修業； 二者巧便； 三者攝取眾生； 四者迴向。

src_original: idamevādiprasthānamityucyate /  anādiprasthānaṃ katamat /  yā avatīrṇasya pudgalasya paripācyamānatāyāṃ vartamānasya bodhisattvebhyo buddhebhyaścānadhyupekṣāmāgamya  vivṛtānāñca sthānānāṃ bhūyo bhūyaḥ uttānakriyāmāgamya uttarottaraparipākagamanatā /
tgt_original: 非初處者，已度成熟，於現在世不離親近諸佛菩薩，增長住處漸漸增進轉勝成熟。

src_original: yatpunarakuśalābhyāsādakuśalārāmatā saṃtiṣṭhate akuśalabahulatā kuśalābhyāsātkuśalārāmatā kuśalabahulatā pūrvakarmasādṛśyena vā paścātphalānuvartanatā tanniṣyandaphalam /
tgt_original: 若習不善法、樂住不善法、增不善法，若習善法、樂住善法、增益善法，先業相似後果生，是名依果。

src_original: āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya kleśanirodho visaṃyogaphalam /
tgt_original: 八聖道滅諸煩惱，名解脫果。

src_original: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya sukṛtakarmāntatā /  yā pāramitāsu niyatakāritā nipuṇakāritā nityakāritā anavadyakāritā ca /
tgt_original: 云何善修業？ 菩薩於六波羅蜜，決定修、專心修、常修、無罪修。

src_original: kathañca bodhisattvo niyatakārī bhavati yaduta dāne /
tgt_original: 云何決定修檀波羅蜜？

src_original: iha bodhisattvaḥ saṃvidyamāne deyadharme yācanake samyak prapyupasthite apakāriṇyupakāriṇi vā guṇavati doṣavati vā 'vaśyaṃ dadāti /
tgt_original: 是菩薩於來求者，饒益不饒益、有德有過，要當施與。

src_original: yaḥ punalaukikena mārgeṇa kleśanirodhaḥ sa nātyantamanuvartate pṛthagjanānām /  tasmāttanna visaṃyogaphalam /
tgt_original: 若復世俗滅諸煩惱，彼不究竟捨離凡夫，非解脫果。

src_original: nāsya dānacittaṃ kaścidvikampayituṃ samartho bhavati manuṣyo vā 'manuṣyo vā śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā kaścidvā punarloke sahadharmeṇa /
tgt_original: 於諸惠施心不傾動，若人非人、沙門婆羅門、世間同法所不能壞。

src_original: iha bodhisattvaḥ saṃvidyamāne deyadharme samyak pratyupasthite yācanake sarvaṃ dadāti /  nāstyasya kiñcidyadaparityājyaṃ bhavati sattvebhyaḥ ādhyātmikamapi vastu prāgeva bāhyam /
tgt_original: 是菩薩於求來者，捨內外物一切施與，無有悋惜。

src_original: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvo nityakārī bhavati yaduta dāne /
tgt_original: 云何常修？

src_original: iha bodhisattvo aparikhidyamāno dānena satatasamitameva sarvakālaṃ yathotpannaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
tgt_original: 是菩薩施無厭惓，一切時平等隨得隨施。

src_original: iha bodhisattvo yattatsaṃkliṣṭaṃ dānaṃ varṇitaṃ dānapaṭale tatsaṃkliṣṭaṃ varjayitvā asaṃkliṣṭaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
tgt_original: 如施品說離煩惱施。

src_original: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sukṛtakārī bhavati yaduta dāne /
tgt_original: 是名菩薩善修檀波羅蜜。

src_original: yathā dāne evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāpāramitāsu (Dutt 212)
tgt_original: 如施，如是戒、忍、精進、禪定、智慧亦如是，隨其所應當知。

src_original: tatsamāsato daśavidhaṃ veditavyam pratihatānāṃ sattvānāṃ pratighātāpanayāyopāyakauśalyam /
tgt_original: 略說有十種。

src_original: madhyasthānāmavatāraṇāya avatīrṇānāṃ paripācanāya paripakvānāṃ vimocanāyopāyakauśalyam /  laukikeṣu sarvaśāstreṣu kauśalyam /  bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādāne skhalitapratyavekṣaṇākauśalyam samyakpraṇidhānakauśalyam /  [śrāvakayānakauśalyaṃ] pratyekabuddhāyānakauśalyam mahāyānakauśaśalyañca /
tgt_original: 壞法眾生為除惱害方便巧便，中住者令入、已入者令熟、已熟者令解脫方便巧便，世論巧便、菩薩戒律若持若毀觀察巧便、正願巧便、聲聞乘巧便、緣覺乘巧便、大乘巧便。

src_original: yadi vā kṛṣyā yadi vā vaṇijyayā yadi vā rājapauruṣṭeṇa lipi-gaṇana-nyasana-saṃkhyā-mudrayā  sasyādikaṃ lābhādikañca phalamabhinirvartayati idamucyate puruṣakāraphalam /
tgt_original: 若於現法，依種種世間工巧處業諸士夫事，所謂田種販賣、宰官理務、書畫算數、卜占印封，各有果生，是名士夫果。

src_original: eṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva kauśalyānāṃ pūrvavadyathāyogaṃ tatra tatrāsyāmeva bodhisattvabhūmau pravibhāgo veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 如是一切巧便，隨所應彼彼菩薩地，分別當知。

src_original: etāni punarbodhisattvasya daśa kauśalyāni pañcakṛtyāni kurvanti /
tgt_original: 此十巧便為五種事：

src_original: pūrvakaiścaturbhiḥ kauśalyairbodhisattvaḥ sattvān svārthe sanniyojayati /
tgt_original: 初四巧便，為利眾生。

src_original: laukikeṣu sarvaśāstreṣu kauśalyena bodhisattvaḥ sarvaparapravādānabhibhavati /
tgt_original: 世論巧便，為伏異論。

src_original: cakṣuvijñānañcukṣurindriyasyādhipatiphalam /  evaṃ yāvanmanovijñānaṃ manaindriyasya /
tgt_original: 眼識是眼根增上果，乃至意識是意根增上果。

src_original: bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādāne skhalitapratyavekṣaṇākauśalyena bodhisattvaḥ āpattiṃ [na] vāpadyate /  āpanno vā yathādharmaṃ pratikaroti /  suviśuddhaṃ śīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ parikarṣati /
tgt_original: 菩薩戒律若持若毀觀察巧便，為不起犯戒，已犯者令如法悔，受持清淨律儀。

src_original: samyak praṇidhānakauśalyena bodhisattvaḥ āyatyāṃ sarvābhipretārthasamṛddhimadhigacchati /
tgt_original: 正願巧便，菩薩於未來世一切所欲悉皆得之。

src_original: tribhinnaṃ kauśalyairbodhisattvo yathā gotrendriyādhimuktānāṃ tadupamaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /  anukūlāṃ yuktiṃ vyapadiśati /
tgt_original: 三乘巧便，菩薩隨種性根解譬喻，隨順說法具足說法。

src_original: evamebhirdaśabhiḥ kauśalyairbodhisattvaḥ pañcakṛtyāni karoti /
tgt_original: 如是十種巧便為五種事。

src_original: tathā prāṇairaviyogo jīvitendriyasya /
tgt_original: 生理不壞是命根增上果。

src_original: yairasya pañcabhiḥ kṛtyaiḥ sarvakṛtyasamāptirbhavati /  dṛṣṭadhārmikasāṃparāyikaṃ cārthamārabhya /
tgt_original: 此五種事，一切所作皆悉具足，現法後世利益方便。

src_original: tatra katamo bodhisattvasya parānugrahaḥ /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩攝取眾生？

src_original: iha bodhisattvaścatvāri saṃgrahavastūni niśritya dānaṃ priyavāditāmarthacaryāṃ samānārthatāñca tadekatyānāṃ sattvānāṃ hitamapyupasaṃharati /
tgt_original: 是菩薩依四攝法： 布施、愛語、利益、同事。

src_original: sukhamapyupasaṃharati /  [hitasukhamapyupasaṃharati /  ] ayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ parānugrahasya samāsanirdeśaḥ /  vistaranirdeśaḥ punaḥ pūrvavadveditavyaḥ tadyathā svaparārthapaṭale /  (Dutt 213)
tgt_original: 或有眾生，以安饒益、以樂饒益、以安樂饒益，廣說如前自他利品。

src_original: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya pariṇāmanā /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩迴向？

src_original: iha bodhisattvo yatkiñcidebhistribhirmukhairupacitopacitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sukṛtakarmāntatayā  kauśalyena parānugraheṇa ca tatsarvamatītānāgatapratyutpannamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
tgt_original: 菩薩三門修習善根，謂善修業巧便；

src_original: iti sarveṣāmindriyasya /  iti sarveṣāmindriyāṇāṃ dvāviṃśatīnāṃ svena svenādhipatyena yatphalaṃ nirvartate tadadhipatiphalaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 一切二十二根，各為增上、各有果生，當知皆是增上果。

src_original: na tasya kuśalamūlasyānyaṃ phalavipākaṃ pratikāṃkṣati nānya[trā]nuttarāmeva samyaksaṃbodhim /
tgt_original: 彼一切過去未來現在淳淨心，迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，不以善根求餘果報。

src_original: ye ca kecidbhagavatā gṛhiṇāṃ vā pravrajitānāṃ vā bodhisattvānāṃ śikṣādharmā vyapadiṣṭāḥ  sarveṣāṃ teṣāmeṣveva caturṣu saṃgraho veditavyaḥ sukṛtakarmāntatāyāṃ kauśalye parānugrahe pariṇāmanāyāṃ ca /
tgt_original: 若世尊說，在家出家菩薩所學法，當知一切皆是善修業巧便，攝取迴向四法所攝。

src_original: tasmādevaṃ sukṛtakarmāntasya bodhisattvasya kuśalasya parānugrahapravṛttasya pariṇāmakasya evaṃ duṣprāpā duradhigamā ca bodhirāsannā samāsannā veditavyā /
tgt_original: 菩薩善修業巧便，攝取集聚迴向，當知近菩提座。

src_original: atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasu ye kecidbodhisattvā gṛhi-pravrajita pakṣeṣu śikṣamāṇā  anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhavanto 'bhisaṃbhotsyante 'bhisaṃbudhyante ca  sarve te ebhireva caturbhirdharmaiḥ /  nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
tgt_original: 過去未來現在，一切菩薩在家出家，學阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，已學當學今學，如是四法無餘無上。

src_original: taccādhipatyaṃ dvāviṃśatīnāmindriyāṇāṃ veditavyam /  tadyathā vastu saṃgrahaṇyām /
tgt_original: 此二十二根增上，如攝事處說。

src_original: evamapi caturṣu dharmeṣu samyakprayukto gṛhī pravrajito vā bodhisattvo bhavati /
tgt_original: 如是四法，在家出家菩薩成就，然彼出家於在家者大有差別。

src_original: yogācārabhūmau  Bodhisattvabhūmiḥ  ādhārayogasthānam (Book 1)
tgt_original: 1 初方便處1 種性品菩薩地持初方便處種性品第一第一段有一十八品

src_original: daśeme dharmāḥ saphalasya bodhisattvamārgasya mahāyānasya saṃgrahāya saṃvartante /
tgt_original: 有十法，具足菩薩道，摩訶衍攝。

src_original: (Dutt 73) evaṃ hi bodhisattvo buddhavacanaṃ samyaghetuphalaparidīpanākāraṃ viditvā sthānāsthānajñānabalagotramāsevanānvayāt krameṇa viśodhayati vivardhayati ca /  na cākṛtamanyakṛtaṃ vā kasyacidvipacyate /  na ca svayaṃ kṛtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ kalpaśatairapi praṇāśo bhavati phaladānaṃ prati /
tgt_original: 如是菩薩知佛顯示正因果已，於處非處智力種性次第修習清淨增長，非不作異作有所成熟，亦無自所作業經劫而失，作者不失、不作不受，佛所顯示。

src_original: katame daśa /
tgt_original: 云何為十？

src_original: ādhāro liṅgaṃ pakṣo 'dhyāśayo vihāra upapattiḥ parigraho bhūmiścaryā pratiṣṭhā ca /
tgt_original: 一者持； 二者相； 三者翼；

src_original: ādhāro liṅga-pakṣādhyāśaya-vihārā upapattiḥ /  parigraho bhūmiścaryā pratiṣṭhā paścimā bhavet //
tgt_original: 五者住； 六者生； 七者攝； 八者地； 九者行；

src_original: tatrādhāraḥ katamaḥ /
tgt_original: 十者安立。 云何名持？

src_original: iha bodhisattvasya svagotraṃ prathamaścittotpādaḥ sarve ca bodhipakṣyā dharmā ādhāra ityucyate /
tgt_original: 菩薩自種性、初發心及一切菩提分法，是名為持。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: iha bodhisattvo gotraṃ niśritya pratiṣṭhāpayitavyo bhavati /  pratibalo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /  tasmāt sabhāgatayā gotramādhāra ityucyate /
tgt_original: 菩薩依種性，必定堪任阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，是故種性名必定持。

src_original: iha bodhisattvaḥ prathamacittotpādaṃ niśritya pratiṣṭhāya dāne 'pi prayujyate śīle kṣāntau vīryeṃ dhyāne prajñāyāmapi prayujyate iti /
tgt_original: 菩薩依初發心，修行檀波羅蜜、尸波羅蜜、羼提波羅蜜、毘梨耶波羅蜜、禪波羅蜜、般若波羅蜜。

src_original: yadvā pāramitāsu puṇyasaṃbhāre jñānasaṃbhāre sarveṣu ca bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu prayujyate /  tasmātprathamacittotpādasya bodhisattvasya caryāprayogasyādhāra ityucyate /
tgt_original: 修此六波羅蜜功德律儀、智慧律儀、菩提分法，是故初發心名為菩薩行方便持。

src_original: iha bodhisattvastameva bodhisattvacaryāprayogaṃ niśritya pratiṣṭhāyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ paripūrayati /  tasmātsa bodhisattvacaryāprayogastasya mahābodhiparipūrerādhāra ityucyate /
tgt_original: 菩薩依行方便，滿足阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，是故行方便名為大菩提持。

src_original: agotrastha pudgalo gotre 'sati cittotpāde 'pi yatnasamāśraye satyabhavyaścānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ paripūraye /
tgt_original: 非種性人，無種性故，雖復發心勤精進，必不究竟阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: tadanena paryāyeṇa veditavyamanutpāditacittasyāpi bodhisattvasya akṛte 'pi bodhisattvacaryāprayoge gotramādhāra iti /
tgt_original: 是故當知，雖不發心、不修行方便，猶得名為種性持。

src_original: sa cet punargotrasthaścittaṃ notpādayati bodhicaryāsu na prayujyate na kṣipraṃ bodhimārāgayati tāsvapi (Dutt 2)  viparyayāt kṣipramārāgayatīti veditavyam /
tgt_original: 若有菩薩種性，而不發心、不修行方便，不能疾成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。 有菩薩種性，發菩提心、勤行精進，則能疾成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: tatpunaretadgotramādhāra ityucyate /  upastambho heturniśraya upaniṣatpūrvaṅgamo nilaya ityapyucyate /
tgt_original: 又種性名為持、名為長養、名為因、名為依、名為梯、名為導、名為覆。

src_original: yathāgotramevaṃ prathamaścittotpādaḥ sarvā ca bodhisattvacaryā /
tgt_original: 如種性發心，行方便亦如是。

src_original: samāsato gotraṃ dvividham /
tgt_original: 略說有二：

src_original: prakṛtisthaṃ samudānītañca /
tgt_original: 一者性種性； 二者習種性。

src_original: evamakṛtānabhyāgamakṛtāvipraṇāśaṃ buddhavacanaṃ paridīpitaṃ bodhisattvo yathābhūtaṃ jñātvā karma-svakatā-jñānabalagotraṃ krameṇa viśodhayati vivardhayati ca /
tgt_original: 如是菩薩如實知已，自業智力種性次第修習清淨增長。

src_original: tatra prakṛtisthaṃ gotraṃ yadbodhisattvānāṃ ṣaḍāyatanaviśeṣaḥ /
tgt_original: 性種性者，是菩薩六入殊勝展轉相續，無始法爾，是名性種性。

src_original: tatra samudānītaṃ gotraṃ yatpūrvakuśalamūlābhyāsātpratilabdham /  tadasminnarthe dvividhamapyabhipretam /
tgt_original: 習種性者，若從先來修善所得，是名習種性。

src_original: tatpunargotraṃ bījamityapyucyate /
tgt_original: 又種性名為種子、名為界、名為性。

src_original: dhātuḥ prakṛtirityapi /  tatpunarasamudāgataphalaṃ sūkṣmaṃ vinā phalena /  samudāgataphalamaudārikaṃ saha phalena /
tgt_original: 又不習者，果細果遠。 習者，果麁果近。

src_original: tena khalu gotreṇa samanvāgatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānatikramya prāgevānyān sattvānniruttaro viśeṣo veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩成就種性者，出過一切聲聞辟支佛上。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: dve ime samāsato viśuddhī /
tgt_original: 有二種淨：

src_original: kleśāvaraṇaviśuddhirjñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhiśca /
tgt_original: 一者煩惱障淨； 二者智障淨。

src_original: tatra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ tadgotraṃ kleśāvaraṇaviśuddhyā viśudhyati na tu jñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhyā /
tgt_original: 二乘種性煩惱障淨，非智障淨；

src_original: bodhisattvagotraṃ punarapi kleśāvaraṇaviśuddhyā api jñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhyā viśudhyati /  tasmātsarvaprativiśiṣṭaṃ niruttaramityucyate /
tgt_original: 菩薩種性具足二淨，是故一切最勝最上。

src_original: api ca caturbhirākārairbodhisattvasya śrāvakapratyekabuddhebhyo viśeṣo veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 復有四事勝於一切聲聞緣覺：

src_original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvaḥ śrutaṃ paryeṣate /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩求聞法？

src_original: katamaiścaturbhiḥ /  indriyakṛtaḥ pratipattikṛtaḥ kauśalyakṛtaḥ phalakṛtaśca /  tatrāyamindriyakṛto viśeṣaḥ /
tgt_original: 一者根勝； 二者道勝； 三者巧便勝； 四者果勝。

src_original: prakṛtyaiva bodhisattvastīkṣṇendriyo bhavati /
tgt_original: 菩薩性自利根，緣覺中根，聲聞軟根，是名根勝。

src_original: tatrāyaṃ pratipattikṛto viśeṣaḥ /  śrāvakapratyekabuddhaścātmahitāya pratipanno bhavati /  bodhisattvaḥ apyātma hitāya api parahitāya bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇām /  tatrāyaṃ kauśalyakṛto viśeṣaḥ /
tgt_original: 聲聞緣覺但為自度，菩薩不爾，自度度彼，是名道勝。

src_original: śrāvakaḥ pratyekabuddhaśca skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpāda-sthānāsthānasatyakauśalyaṃ karoti bodhisattvastatra cānyeṣu ca sarvavidyāsthāneṣu
tgt_original: 聲聞緣覺唯能了知陰界諸入、十二緣起、是處非處及四真諦；

src_original: śrāvakaḥ śrāvakabodhiphalamadhigacchati /  pratyekabuddhaḥ pratyekabodhimadhigacchati /  bodhisattvo 'nuttaraṃ samyaksaṃbodhiphalamadhigacchati /
tgt_original: 聲聞得聲聞菩提，緣覺得緣覺菩提，菩薩得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，是名果勝。

src_original: iha bodhisattvastīvraṃ gauravamupasthāpya subhāṣite sulapite dharma paryeṣate /  evaṃrūpaścāsya samāsena subhāṣitagauravaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 是菩薩住慇懃恭敬，求善說法、善語法，如是比略說善說法住、勤恭敬住。

src_original: ṣaḍimāni bodhisattvasya pāramitānāṃ gotraliṅgāni saṃpadyante /  yairevaṃ pare saṃjānate bodhisattvo 'yamiti /
tgt_original: 有六波羅蜜，是菩薩種性相，令諸眾生知是菩薩。 云何為六？

src_original: tatredaṃ bodhisattvasya dānapāramitāyā gotraliṅgam /  iha bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyaiva dānarucirbhavati /  satsu ca saṃvidyamāneṣu deyadharmeṣu satatasamitaṃ pareṣāṃ saṃvibhāgaśīlo bhavati pramuditacittaśca dadāti na vimanaskaḥ /  viśadañca dānamanuprayacchati /  na hīnam /  adānena ca jihreti /
tgt_original: 檀波羅蜜菩薩種性相者，是菩薩性自樂施，於彼受者以所施物等施不惓，於諸財物若多若少等心惠施歡喜無悔，若無所施心常慚愧；

src_original: pareṣāñca dānasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate /  dāne cainānupacchandayati /  dātārañca dṛṣṭvā āttamanā bhavati sumanaskaḥ /
tgt_original: 常為他人歎施功德勸令行施，見有施者心常隨喜；

src_original: gurubhyo vṛddhatarakebhyo dakṣiṇīyebhyaḥ satkārārhebhya utthāyāsanamanuprayacchati /
tgt_original: 於諸尊重耆宿福田應供養者，捨所坐處恭敬奉施；

src_original: pṛṣṭo 'pṛṣṭo vā teṣu teṣu sattvakṛtyeṣvanapāyamihaloke paraloke nyāyopadeśamanuprayacchati /
tgt_original: 若有人問今世後世如法事者，悉皆為說；

src_original: yadasau bodhisattva ekasubhāṣitaśravaṇahetorapi taptāṃ jvalitāmapyayomayīṃ bhūmiṃ  pareṇa prāmodyenādareṇa praviśedyadyanyathā subhāṣitaśravaṇaṃ na labheta prāgeva  prabhūtasya subhāṣitasyārthe /
tgt_original: 若菩薩為聞一善說法，路由惡道大地熾然，猶尚歡喜從中而過，況為多聞。

src_original: rājacaurāmitrāṇyudakādibhayabhītānāñca sattvānāmabhayamanuprayacchati /
tgt_original: 若有王賊水火惡知識怖，隨力所能施以無畏；

src_original: nikṣiptañcāsya haste paradhanaṃ nābhidruhyati /  ṛṇaṃ gṛhītvā parebhyo na visaṃvādayati nābhidruhyati /  svadāyādaṃ na vañcayate na vipralambhayati /
tgt_original: 受他寄物未曾差違，若負人債終不抵捍； 兄弟分財平等無二。

src_original: maṇimuktāvaidūryaśaṃkhaśilāpravālajātarūparajatāśmagarbhamusāragalvalohitikādakṣiṇāvartaprabhṛtiṣūpakaraṇajāteṣu mūḍhaṃ viparyasyacittaṃ samyaksaṃbodhayati
tgt_original: 於諸珍寶深愛著者，教令離貪；

src_original: kutaḥ punaḥ svayamenaṃ vipralambhayiṣyati /
tgt_original: 尚教他離，況自貪著。

src_original: prakṛtyā codārabhogādhimukto bhavati /  udāreṣvasya sarvabhogaparibhogeṣu cittaṃ krāmati /  udāreṣu ca karmānteṣvadhimukto bhavati na parīttāyadvāreṣu /
tgt_original: 性於好財能捨受用，樂修勝業報利弘多。

src_original: santi cemāni loke vyasanāni /  tadyathā strīvyasanam /  madyavyasanam /  dyūtavyasanam /  naṭa-nartaka-hāsaka-lāsakādisaṃdarśanavyasanamityevaṃrūpebhyovyasanebhyo laghu ladhveva vairāgyaṃ pratilabhate /
tgt_original: 於諸酒色歌舞倡伎種種變現一切戲事，常生慚愧能速遠離。

src_original: yacca bodhisattvasya sve ātmabhāve samucchraye premagauravaṃ prāgevānyeṣu sarvakāyapariṣkāreṣu bhojanapānādiṣu /
tgt_original: 為一聞法，猶尚不惜所愛之身，況餘資生。

src_original: hrīvyapatrāpyaṃ prāviṣkaroti vipule 'pi ca bhogapratilambhe nādhimātralolupo bhavati prāgevālpe /
tgt_original: 得大財寶猶不貪著，何況小利。

src_original: itimānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni bodhisattvasya dānapāramitāyā gotraliṅgāni veditavyāni /
tgt_original: 如是等比，是名檀波羅蜜菩薩種性相。

src_original: tatremāni bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitāyā gotraliṅgāni /  iha bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā mṛdunā kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇā samanvāgato bhavatyakuśalena nātyartharaudreṇa nātyarthasattvopaghātakena /
tgt_original: 尸羅波羅蜜菩薩種性相者，是菩薩身口意業性自柔軟，不增惡行、不樂殺生；

src_original: kṛtvāpi ca pāpakaṃ karma laghu ladhveva vipratisāraṃ pratilabhate /  tañca jehrīyamāṇaḥ samācarati na nandījātaḥ /
tgt_original: 設作惡業心生慚愧。 能疾悔除不令增長；

src_original: pāṇiloṣṭadaṇḍaśastrādibhiśca sattvānāmaviheṭhanajātīyo bhavati /  prakṛtivatsalaśca bhavati sattvapriyaḥ /
tgt_original: 不以刀杖恐怖眾生，體性仁賢常懷慈愛；

src_original: paripākaḥ samāsataḥ ṣaḍbhirākārairveditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 略說有六種： 一者自性成熟；

src_original: kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamīmapi saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapyupaniṣadamapi nopaiti
tgt_original: 一聞說法，愛樂恭敬，比前愛敬百千萬倍，乃至算數譬喻不得為比。

src_original: nāgarikaḥ paracittānuvartī /  smitapūrvaṅgamaśca bhavatyuttānamukhavarṇavigatabhrūkuṭiḥ pūrvābhibhāṣī /
tgt_original: 善隨人心言常含笑，舒顏平視先意問訊。

src_original: upakāriṣu ca sattveṣu kṛtajño bhavati kṛtavedī /  arthikeṣu ca sattveṣu ṛjutāṃ pratipadyate /
tgt_original: 知恩報恩。

src_original: na māyāśāṭhyenaitān vilobhayati /
tgt_original: 所求正直，不偽不曲。

src_original: dharmeṇāsāhasena ca bhogān samudānayati nādharmeṇa /
tgt_original: 受如法財，不為非法。

src_original: prakṛtyaiva ca puṇyakāmo bhavati /  parapuṇya kriyāsvapi vyāpāraṃ gacchati prāgevātmanaḥ /
tgt_original: 性常喜樂修諸福德，見人修福尚以身助，況復自為。

src_original: sa tathā subhāṣite gauravajātaḥ subhāṣitaṃ śṛṇvannakhinnaśca bhavattyatṛptaśca /  śrāddhaśca bhavati prasādabahalaścārdrasantāna ṛjukadṛṣṭiḥ /
tgt_original: 謂聞善說法心無厭足，增益淨信其身柔軟，心直見直深樂功德。

src_original: parabādhayā cāttyartha bādhyate yaduta pareṣāṃ vadhabandhanacchedanatāḍanakutsanatarjanādikayā dṛṣṭvā vā śrutvā vā /
tgt_original: 若有眾生更相殘害打縛割截毀訾訶責，有如是等無量眾苦，若見若聞心常憐愍。

src_original: dharmasamādānagurukaśca bhavati saṃparāyagurukaḥ /  aṇumātre 'pyavadye bhayadarśī prāgeva prabhūte /
tgt_original: 重今世善及後世樂，於輕罪中心常恐怖，況餘重惡而不畏慎。

src_original: parakṛtyeṣu ca parakaraṇīyeṣu sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchati yaduta kṛṣivaṇijyāgorakṣyarājapauruṣyalipigaṇananyasanasaṃkhyāmudrāyāṃ  bhartṛprasādane kulaprasādane rājakulaprasādane mitrāmitraprasādane bhogānāmarjane  rakṣaṇe sannidhau prayoge visarge āvāhavivāhābhakṣaṇasaṃbhakṣaṇeṣvevaṃbhāgīyeṣu sattvakṛtyeṣu  sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchati /
tgt_original: 若見他人農商放牧、書數算計、和合諍訟、求財守護、出息施與、婚姻集會，如是一切如法事中悉與同事。

src_original: na kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādeṣu ca paraviheṭhanakaraṇīyeṣu ye ātmanaḥ pareṣāñcānarthāyāhitāya duḥkhāya saṃvartante /  akṛtyāccaitāṃ nivārayati yaduta daśabhyaḥ pāpakebhyo 'kuśalebhyaḥ /
tgt_original: 鬪亂諍訟互相恐怖，若自若他無義無益，如是一切不與同事，善能遮制十不善道。

src_original: samānakṣāntiśīlatayā apahāya svakāryaṃ parairātmakārye yathākāmaṃ niyojyate /  ārdracittaśca bhavati peśalacitto na ca ciramāghātacittatāṃ pratighacittatāmudvahati nānyatra tatkṣaṇa evāsya taccittaṃ bhadratāyāṃ parivartate
tgt_original: 於諸事業廢我成彼，常懷悲惻不興怒害，設令暫起尋即除滅。

src_original: satyagurukaśca bhavati nābhūtavacanena parān visaṃvādayati /  na ca pareṣāṃ mitrabhedaṃ rocayati na karoti /  (Dutt 5) na cāsambaddhamapārtha nirartha sahasā pralapati /
tgt_original: 恒修實語不誑眾生，不離他親及無義語，言常柔軟無有麁惡。

src_original: saguṇa kāmatayā dharmakāmatayā dharmabhāṇakamupasaṃkrāmati nopārambhābhiprāyeṇa sagauravatayā  na mānastambhena kiṃkuśalagaveṣaṇatayā na ātmodbhāvanārtham ātmānañca parāṃśca kuśalamūle  saṃniyojayiṣyāmīti na lābhasatkārahetoḥ /
tgt_original: 至說法所無留難心，恭敬除慢，但求正法不求名稱，為己及他修諸善根不為利養。

src_original: priyaṃvadaśca bhavatyaparakaṭukaḥ api svakasya dāsādiparijanasya prāgeva pareṣām guṇapriyaśca bhavati pareṣāṃ bhūtasya varṇasyāhartā /
tgt_original: 於己僮僕尚不麁言，況於他人。 於諸功德心常愛樂，見人行者隨喜讚善。

src_original: itīmānyevaṃbhāgīyāni bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitāyā gotraliṅgāni veditavyāni /
tgt_original: 如是等比，是名尸羅波羅蜜菩薩種性相。

src_original: tatremāni bodhisattvasya kṣāntipāramitāyā gotraliṅgāni /  iha bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā pareṣāmantikādapakāraṃ labdhvā nāghātacittatāṃ prāviṣkaroti nāpyapakārāya prapadyate /  saṃjñapyamānaścāśu saṃjñaptiṃ pratigṛhṇāti /  na ca khilaṃ dhārayati na cirakālikaṃ vairāśayaṃ vahati /
tgt_original: 羼提波羅蜜菩薩種性相者，是菩薩性自柔和，若遇他人不饒益事，不起恚害無反報心，若他悔謝即受其懺，不懷結恨無復餘想。

src_original: itīmānyevaṃbhāgīyāni bodhisattvasya kṣāntipāramitāyā gotraliṅgāni veditavyāni /
tgt_original: 如是等比，是名羼提波羅蜜菩薩種性相。

src_original: sa evamupasaṃkramaṇasaṃpannaḥ asaṃkliṣṭaśca dharma śṛṇotyavikṣiptaśca /  kathamasaṃkliṣṭaḥ śṛṇoti /  stambhasaṃkleśavigato 'vamanyanāsaṃkleśavigataḥ laya-saṃkleśavigataśca /
tgt_original: 至說法所，不染心聽法、不亂心聽法、不染污心聽法者，離貢高煩惱，及輕想煩惱、下想煩惱。

src_original: tatremāni bodhisattvasya vīryapāramitāyā gotraliṅgāni /  iha bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā utthānavān bhavati /  kālyotthāyī sāyaṃ nipātī na nidrāsukhaṃ śayanasukhaṃ pārśvasukhamatyarthaṃ svīkaroti /
tgt_original: 毘梨耶波羅蜜菩薩種性相者，是菩薩性自精進，晨起夜寐，不樂習著眠睡偃臥。

src_original: pratyupasthite ca kṛtye abhibhūyākartukāmatāmālasyaṃ pratisaṃkhyāya prayujyate tasya kṛtyasyābhiniṣpattaye /  sarvakṛtyasamārambheṣu ca dṛḍhaniścayo bhavati nākṛtvā nāpariprāpya sarveṇa sarvaṃ vīryasraṃsayati antarā vā viṣādamāpadyate /
tgt_original: 凡所作事精勤不捨，能善思惟要令究竟。 創始造業必定堅固，事若未成終不中廢。

src_original: udāreṣu ca parameṣvartheṣu na cetasā saṃkocamāpadyate /  nāpyātmānaṃ paribhavati /  śakto 'haṃ pratibalameṣāmadhigamāyetyutsāhajātaḥ /
tgt_original: 於第一義心不退沒，不自輕言不能成辦，於所作事堪能勇猛。

src_original: vīraśca bhavati mahāsabhāpraveśe vā paraiḥ sahābhiprayoga pratyabhiyoge vā tadanyatra
tgt_original: 入諸大眾摧伏邪論，善能酬答一切難問。

src_original: vā duṣkarakarmaṇi mahāvyavasāyeṣvapi cārthopasaṃhiteṣu nātyarthaṃ khedamāpadyate prāgeva parītteṣu /
tgt_original: 諸餘苦事悉能堪耐，大方便力終不憂悔，何況小事。

src_original: itīmānyevaṃbhāgīyāni bodhisattvasya vīryapāramitāyā gotraliṅgāni veditavyāni /
tgt_original: 如是等比，是名毘梨耶波羅蜜菩薩種性相。
