src_original: tatremāni bodhisattvasya dhyānapāramitāyā gotraliṅgāni /  iha bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā dharmārthopanidhyāne avikṣepabahulo bhavati /
tgt_original: 禪波羅蜜菩薩種性相者，是菩薩於法於義，性善思量無諸亂想。

src_original: tatra ṣaḍbhirākāraiḥ stambhasaṃkleśavigato bhavati /
tgt_original: 有七行離貢高煩惱：

src_original: araṇyavanaprasthānāni /  ca prāntāni śayanāsanāni manuṣyarahaḥsevitāni vigatapāpakāni pratisaṃlayanasārūpyakāṇi dṛṣṭvā śrutvā sukhaṃ tannaiṣkramyaṃ prāvivekyamiti (Dutt  naiṣkramyaprāvivekye tīvramautsukyamutpādayati /
tgt_original: 若見若聞山巖林藪，離諸憒亂隨順寂默，即生念言： 是處安樂是處遠離。 尋往其所，勤加修學。

src_original: prakṛtyā ca mandakleśo bhavati mandanivaraṇo mandadauṣṭhulyaḥ /  pravivekagatasya cāsya svārthaṃ paritulayataḥ pāpakāḥ asadvitarkā nātyarthaṃ cittaṃ kṣobhayanti na paryādāya tiṣṭhanti /
tgt_original: 是菩薩性薄煩惱陰蓋輕微，至遠離處思量己利，不為惡覺之所惱亂，或時暫起尋即除滅。

src_original: [saḥ] amitrapakṣe 'pi tvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ maitracittatāmupasthāpayati prāgeva mitrodāsīnapakṣe /
tgt_original: 於怨憎所常起慈心，況復餘人。

src_original: vicitraiśca duḥkhairduḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ śrutvā vā dṛṣṭvā vā mahatkāruṇyacittamutpādayati /  duḥkhāpanayāya ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ vyāpāraṃ gacchati /
tgt_original: 若見若聞眾生受苦，即起悲心，隨力方便度令離苦。

src_original: prakṛtyā ca sattveṣu hitakāmo bhavati sukhakāmaḥ /  dhṛtimāṃśca bhavatyāpatsu jñātivyasane vā bhogavyasane vā vadhe vā bandhane vā pravāse vā ityevaṃbhāgīyāsvāpatsu /
tgt_original: 性樂饒益安樂眾生，或有親屬錢財殺縛驅擯，如是等難悉能安忍。

src_original: medhāvī ca dharmāṇāṃ grahaṇadhāraṇohanasamarthaḥ smṛtibalena ca samanvāgato bhavati /  sa cirakṛtacirabhāṣitamapyanusmarttā bhavati pareṣāñcānusmārayitā /
tgt_original: 能速受持諸法深義，念力成就所受專諦，久遠所修悉能憶持，亦令他人憶念不忘。

src_original: itīmānyevaṃbhāgīyāni bodhisattvasya dhyānapāramitāyā gotraliṅgāni veditavyāni /
tgt_original: 如是等比，是名禪波羅蜜菩薩種性相。

src_original: tatremāni bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitāyā gotraliṅgāni /  iha bodhisattvaḥ sarvavidyāsthānajñeyapraveśāya sahajayā prajñayā samanvāgato bhavati /  adhandhaśca bhavatyamandaḥ amomuhajātīyaḥ /
tgt_original: 般若波羅蜜菩薩種性相者，是菩薩於一切明處、一切智處生慧成就，不頑鈍不薄少不愚癡，諸放逸處悉能思量。

src_original: tāsu tāsu ca pramādasthānaviratiṣu pratisaṃkhyānabaliko bhavati /  itīmānyevaṃbhāgīyāni bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitāyā gotraliṅgāni veditavyāni /  tānīmāni bodhisattvasya audārikāṇyānumānikāni gotraliṅgāni veditavyāni /
tgt_original: 是名般若波羅蜜菩薩種性相。

src_original: bhūtārthaniścaye tu buddhā eva bhagavantaḥ pratyakṣadarśinaḥ /
tgt_original: 是菩薩種性麁相我已略說，諸餘實義唯佛世尊能決定知。

src_original: yasmācca tadgotraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ prakṛtyaiva guṇayuktaṃ bhadraṃ kalyāṇaṃ śukladharmasamanvāgataṃ  tasmāttāvad durabhisaṃbhavasya śreṣṭhasyācintyasyācalasyānuttarasya tathāgatasya
tgt_original: 種性菩薩具足如是性功德者，成就真實白淨之法，是故名為難得、名為奇特、名為不可思議、名為不動、名為無上、名為如來住處正因相應。

src_original: padasyāvāptaye hetubhāvena yujyate 'nyathā na yujyate /  tāvacca bodhisattva ebhiḥ śukladharmaiḥ prakṛtyaiva yukto bhavati yāvanna śukladharmavairodhikaiścaturbhirupakleśaiḥ sakalavikalairupakliṣṭo bhavati /
tgt_original: 種性菩薩成就白淨法者，不為四種煩惱之所染污。

src_original: yadā copakliṣṭo bhavati sa tadā eṣu ca śukleṣu dharmeṣu na saṃdṛśyate /  apāyeṣu caikadā upapadyate /
tgt_original: 若染污者，白淨之法不現在前，或生惡道。

src_original: apāyopapattāvapi bodhisattvasya tadanyebhyaḥ apāyopapannebhyaḥ sattvebhyo (Dutt 7)  gotrakṛto mahān viśeṣo veditavyaḥ /  iha bodhisattvo dīrgheṇa kālena kadācit karhicidapāyeṣūpapadyate /  upapannaścāśu parimucyate apāyebhyaḥ /
tgt_original: 種性菩薩久處生死或墮惡道，墮惡道者疾得解脫，雖處惡道不受大苦。

src_original: na ca tathā tīvrāmāpāyikīṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate tadyathā 'nye 'pāyopapannāḥ sattvāḥ /  tayā ca tanvyā duḥkhayā vedanayā spṛṣṭo 'dhimātraṃ saṃvegamutpādayati /  teṣu ca sattveṣu tatropapanneṣu duḥkhiteṣu kāruṇyacittaṃ pratilabhate yaduta tenaiva  gotreṇa ca sattveṣu tatropapanneṣu duḥkhiteṣu kārūṇyacittaṃ pratilabhate yaduta tenaiva
tgt_original: 如餘眾生入地獄者，若苦觸身即能厭離，見他受苦能起悲心。

src_original: ityevaṃbhāgīyaḥ apāyopapattau bodhisattvasya tadanyebhyaḥ apāyopapannebhyaḥ sattvebhyo viśeṣo veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 如是種性為大悲因，是故菩薩雖墮惡道，勝餘一切惡道眾生。

src_original: tatra katame te bodhisattvasya catvāraḥ śukladharmavairodhikā upakleśāḥ /
tgt_original: 云何四種煩惱？

src_original: pūrvaṃ pramattasya kleśābhyāsāttīvrakleśatā āyatakleśatā cāyaṃ prathama upakleśaḥ /
tgt_original: 一者久習放逸煩惱數利；

src_original: mūḍhasyākuśalasya pāpamitrasaṃśrayo 'yaṃ dvitīya upakleśaḥ /
tgt_original: 二者愚癡習惡知識；

src_original: gurubhartṛrājacaurapratyarthikadyabhibhūtasyāsvātantryaṃ cittavibhramaścāyaṃ tṛtīya upakleśaḥ /
tgt_original: 三者尊主王賊怨敵所迫，不得自在，其心迷亂；

src_original: upakaraṇavikalasya jīvikāpekṣā ayaṃ caturtha upakleśaḥ /
tgt_original: 四者眾具不足，常憂身命。

src_original: caturbhiḥ kāraṇairevaṃ gotrasaṃpanno 'pi bodhisattvo na śaknotyanuttara samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
tgt_original: 種性菩薩復有四法，不得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: katamaiścaturbhiḥ /
tgt_original: 云何為四？

src_original: iha bodhisattvaḥ ādita eva kalyāṇamitraṃ na labhate aviparītabodhimārgadaiśikaṃ buddhaṃ vā bodhisattvaṃ vā /  idaṃ prathamaṃ kāraṇam /
tgt_original: 一者本無善友諸佛菩薩善說法者；

src_original: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo labdhvāpi kalyāṇamitraṃ viparītagrāhī viparītaṃ śikṣate bodhisattvaśikṣāsu /  idaṃ dvitīyaṃ kāraṇam /  punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo labdhvāpi kalyāṇamitramaviparītaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaśikṣāsu tasmin prayoga śithilaprayogo bhavati kusīdo nodagrapratatavīryasamanvāgataḥ
tgt_original: 二者雖值善友佛及菩薩善說法者，而謬受學。

src_original: bodhisattvo bodhisattva iti ca saṃkhyāṃ gacchati yaduta saṃketavyavahāranayena /  tasmātsa cittotpādaḥ avatārasaṃgṛhītaḥ /
tgt_original: 三者緣： 四者德： 五者勝。 初發心菩薩名為度大乘菩提諸菩薩數，是故初發心度之所攝。

src_original: utpādya ca bodhisattvastaccittaṃ krameṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimadhigacchati nānutpādya /  tasmādanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ sa cittotpādo mūlam /
tgt_original: 發是心已，漸得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，是故初發心是菩提根木。

src_original: duḥkhiteṣu ca sattveṣu sa kāruṇiko bodhisattvaḥ paritrāṇābhiprāyastaccittamutpādayati /  tasmātsa cittotpādaḥ karuṇāniṣyandaḥ /
tgt_original: 發是心已，見諸眾生受無量苦，而起悲心欲度脫之，是故初發心是大悲所依。

src_original: (Dutt 9) tañca cittotpādaṃ niśritya pratiṣṭhāya bodhisattvo bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu sattvārtha kriyāyāñca bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ prayujyate /  tasmātsa cittotpādo bodhisattvaśikṣāyāḥ sanniśrayaḥ /
tgt_original: 依初發心建立菩薩菩提分法，及眾生所作菩薩所學悉能修習，是故初發心是菩薩學之所依。

src_original: evamasau prathamaścittotpādaḥ saṃgrahato 'pi mūlato 'pi niṣyandato 'pi sanniśrayato 'pi veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 如是初發心名為攝、名為根本、名為依。

src_original: sa ca bodhisattvasya prathamacittotpādaḥ samāsena dvividhaḥ /
tgt_original: 初發心菩薩有二種：

src_original: tatra nairyāṇiko ya utpanno 'tyantamanuvartate na punarvyāvartate /  anairyāṇikaḥ punarya utpanno nātyantamanuvartate punareva vyāvartate /  tasya ca cittotpādasya vyāvṛttirapi dvividhā /
tgt_original: 二者不出。 出者，從初發心乃至究竟終不退轉。 不出者，則有退轉。 退有二種：

src_original: ātyantikī cānātyantikī ca /
tgt_original: 一者究竟退； 二者不究竟退。

src_original: tatrātyantikī yatsakṛdvyāvṛttaṃ cittaṃ na punarutpadyate bodhāya /
tgt_original: 究竟退者，退已終不復起菩薩之願。

src_original: anātyantikī punaḥ yadvyāvṛttaṃ cittaṃ punaḥ punarutpadyate bodhāya /
tgt_original: 不究竟退者，退已還起。

src_original: tasya khalu cittasyotpādaḥ caturbhiḥ pratyayaiścaturbhirhetubhiścaturbhirbalairveditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 初發心菩薩有四種緣、四種因、四種力。

src_original: kālena śṛṇoti satkṛtya śuśrūṣamāṇo nāsūyannanuvidhīyamāno 'nupārambhaprekṣī /
tgt_original: 三者頓聽； 四者敬聽； 五者不戲； 六者隨順； 七者不求過失。

src_original: catvāraḥ pratyayāḥ katame /
tgt_original: 云何四緣？

src_original: iha kulaputro vā kuladruhitā vā tathāgatasya vā bodhisattvasya vā acintyamatyadbhutaṃ prātihāryaṃ prabhāvaṃ paśyati saṃpratyayitasya vā 'ntikācchṛṇoti  tasya dṛṣṭvā vā śrutvā vā evaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 一者善男子善女人，若見若聞諸佛菩薩有不可思議神通變化，彼見聞已即發是念：

src_original: mahānubhāvā bateyaṃ bodhiryasyāṃ sthitasya vā pratipannasya vā 'yamevarūpaḥ prabhā[vaḥ]
tgt_original: 是為大事，不可思議，能為如是諸變化事。

src_original: idamevaṃrūpaṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛśyate ca śrūyate ca sa tadeva prabhāvadarśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ  vādhipatiṃ kṛtvā mahābodhyadhimukto mahābodhau cittamutpādayati /  ayaṃ prathamaḥ pratyayaścittasyotpattaye /
tgt_original: 以此見聞為增上緣故，樂佛大智發菩提心。

src_original: sa na haiva prabhāvaṃ paśyati vā śṛṇoti vā aparitvanuttarāṃ bodhimārabhya saddharmaṃ śṛṇoti bodhisattvapiṭakaṃ deśyamānaṃ śrutvā ca punarabhiprasīdati
tgt_original: 二者雖不見聞如上神變，聞說法者讚歎菩提及菩薩藏，聞則欣慶歡喜信樂。

src_original: abhiprasannaśca saddharmaśravaṇamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā tathāgatajñānādhimuktaḥ tathāgatajñānapratilambhāya cittamutpādayati /  ayaṃ dvitīyaḥ pratyayaścittasyotpattaye /
tgt_original: 以此聞法為增上緣故，樂佛大智發菩提心。

src_original: tatra viśuddhidūratā katamā /  yat kausīdyaṃ vā āgamya pratyayavaidhuryaṃ vā mahatā dīrgheṇa kālena prabhūtairjanmāntarāparivartaiḥ kalpaparivartairvā bhavyo bhavati viśuddhaye
tgt_original: 遠淨者，起懈怠心修行遠緣，流轉生死經歷劫數；

src_original: ebhiḥ ṣaḍbhirākāraiḥ stambhasaṃkleśavigataḥ /  (Dutt 74)
tgt_original: 如是七行，離貢高煩惱。 有四行離輕想煩惱：

src_original: sa na haiva dharma śṛṇotyapi tu bodhisattvaḥ saddharmāntardhānimāmukhāmupagatāṃ paśyati /  dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaivaṃ bhavati aprameyāṇāṃ bata sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpagamāya bodhisattvasaddharmasthitiḥ saṃvartate /
tgt_original: 三者雖不聞法，見法滅相而作是念： 無量眾生當遭大苦，菩薩住世則能除滅。

src_original: yannvahaṃ bodhisattva-saddharmacirasthitaye cittamutpādayeyaṃ yaduta eṣāmeva sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpakarṣaṇāya /
tgt_original: 我今當修菩提之道，護持正法，為諸眾生滅無量苦。

src_original: [sa] saddharmadhāraṇamevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā tathāgatajñānādhimuktastathāgatajñānapratilambhāya cittamutpādayati /  ayaṃ (Dutt 10) tṛtīyaḥ pratyayaścittasyotpattaye /
tgt_original: 以護法為增上緣故，樂佛大智發菩提心。

src_original: sa na haiva saddharmāntardhāniṃ pratyupasthitāṃ paśyati apitvantayuge 'ntakāle pratyavarāntayugikān sattvāśrayān paśyati yaduta daśabhirupakleśairupakliṣṭān
tgt_original: 四者不見法滅，見惡世眾生為十煩惱之所惱亂： 一者愚癡； 二者無慚愧； 三者慳嫉； 四者苦惱；

src_original: tadyathā mohabahulānāhrīkyānapatrāpyabahulānīrṣyāmātsaryabahulān duḥkhabahulān dauṣṭhulyabahulān kleśabahulān duścaritabahulān pramādabahulān kausīdyabahulān āśraddhyabahulāṃśca /
tgt_original: 六者煩惱； 七者惡行； 八者放逸； 九者懈怠； 十者不信。

src_original: dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaivaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 見已作是念：

src_original: mahān batāyaṃ kaṣāyakālaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ /  asminnevamupakliṣṭe kāle na sulabho nihīnaḥ śrāvakapratyekabodhāvapi tāvaccittotpādaḥ prāgevānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
tgt_original: 大濁世起，於此惡世尚不能發二乘之願，況能志求無上菩提？

src_original: yannvahamapi tāvaccittamutpādayeyam apyeva [nāma] mamānuśikṣamāṇā anye 'pyutpādayeyuriti /
tgt_original: 我當發心亦令他發。

src_original: so 'ntakāle cittotpādadurlabhatāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā mahābodhāvadhimukto mahābodhau cittamutpādayati /  ayaṃ caturthaḥ pratyayaścittasyotpattaye /
tgt_original: 以濁世中發心難得為增上緣故，樂佛大智發菩提心。

src_original: catvāro hetavaḥ katame /
tgt_original: 云何四因？

src_original: gotrasaṃpadvodhisattvasya prathamo hetuścittasyotpattaye /
tgt_original: 一者種性具足；

src_original: buddhabodhisattvakalyāṇamitraparigraho dvitīyo hetuścittasyotpattaye /
tgt_original: 二者諸佛菩薩善友所攝；

src_original: dharme gauravamupasthāpya dharmabhāṇake pudgale gauravamupasthāpya dharmamaparibhavan dharmabhāṇakaṃ pudgalamaparibhavan ebhiścaturbhirākārairavamanyanāsaṃkleśavigataḥ śṛṇoti /
tgt_original: 一者恭敬法； 二者恭敬說法人； 三者不輕法； 四者不輕說法人。 如是四行，離輕想煩惱。

src_original: sattveṣu kāruṇyaṃ bodhisattvasya tṛtīyo hetuścittasyotpattaye /
tgt_original: 三者起大悲心；

src_original: saṃsāraduḥkhād duṣkaracaryāduḥkhādapi dīrghakālikādvicitrāttīvrānnirantarādabhīrutā caturtho hetuścittasyotpattaye /
tgt_original: 四者生死苦、難行苦，如是久遠無量諸苦，於此眾苦心不怖畏。

src_original: caturbhirākārairbodhisattvasya mitrasaṃpadveditavyā /
tgt_original: 善友所攝者，有四事：

src_original: iha bodhisattvasya mitramādita evājaḍaṃ bhavatyadhandhajātīyaṃ paṇḍitaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ na ca kudṛṣṭipatitam /  iyaṃ prathamā mitrasaṃpat /
tgt_original: 一者善友不愚不鈍，黠慧不邪。

src_original: na cainaṃ pramāde viniyojayati /  na pramādasthānamasyopasaṃharati /  iyaṃ dvitīyā mitrasaṃpat /
tgt_original: 二者不教人放逸，亦不以放逸之具授與他人。

src_original: na cainaṃ duścirite viniyojayati na duścaritasthānamasyopasaṃharati /  iyaṃ tṛtīyā mitrasaṃpat /
tgt_original: 三者不教人惡行，亦不以惡行之具授與他人。

src_original: na cainamutkṛṣṭatarebhyaḥ śraddhācchandasamādānavīryopāyaguṇebhyo vicchandayitvā nihīnatareṣu śraddhācchandasamādānavīryopāyaguṇeṣu samādāpayati  tadyathā mahāyānādvicchandayitvā śrāvakayāne vā pratyekabuddhayāne vā bhāvanāmayād  vicchandayitvā cintāmaye cintāmayādvicchandayitvā śrutamaye śrutamayādvicchandayitvā  vaiyāvṛttyakarmaṇi śīlamayād vicchandayitvā dānamaye ityevaṃbhāgīyebhya utkṛṣṭatarebhyo  guṇebhyo na vicchandayitvā evaṃbhāgīyeṣu nihīnatareṣu guṇeṣu samādāpayati /
tgt_original: 四者終不斷人上信、上欲、上受、上精進、上方便、上功德令其退下，不以下信、下欲、下受、下精進、下方便、下功德授與他人，所謂斷無上大乘令學二乘，斷修慧與思惠、斷思慧與聞慧、斷聞慧與福業、斷戒與施，如是等斷上功德令其退下，以下功德授令修習。

src_original: iyaṃ caturthī mitrasaṃpat /  caturbhirākārai rbodhisattvaḥ karuṇābahulo bhavati sattveṣu /
tgt_original: 起大悲心者有四事：

src_original: santi te lokadhātavo yeṣu duḥkhaṃ nopalabhyate daśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu /  sa ca bodhisattvaḥ saduḥkhe loka dhātau pratyājāto bhavati yatra duḥkhamupalabhyate nāduḥkhe /  parañcānyatamena duḥkhena spṛṣṭamupadrutamabhibhūtaṃ paśyati /  ātmanā cā 'nyatamena duḥkhena spṛṣṭo bhavatyupadruto 'bhibhūtaḥ /
tgt_original: 或有世界有苦惱處、或有世界無有苦惱，菩薩生於有苦惱處，見他受苦、或自受苦、或見俱受，或見生死長久受無間苦，菩薩依自種性性自仁賢，於四境界起下中上悲。

src_original: punaśca paramātmānaṃ vā tadubhayaṃ vā dīrghakālikena vicitreṇa tīvreṇa nirantareṇa duḥkhena spṛṣṭamupadrutamabhibhūtaṃ paśyati /  iti tasya bodhisattvasya svagotrasanniśrayeṇa prakṛtibhadratayā ebhiścaturbhirālambanairadhiṣṭhānaiḥ karuṇāmṛdumadhyādhimātrā pravarvate anyatrābhyāsataḥ  caturbhiḥ kāraṇairbodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu karuṇāṃ saṃpuraskṛtya saṃsāraduḥkhāddīrghakālikādvicitrāttīvrānnirantarādapi na bibheti nottrasyati prāgeva nihīnāt /
tgt_original: 於無窮生死無間大苦心不怖畏者，有四事：

src_original: prakṛtyā sāttviko bhavati dhṛtimān balavān /  idaṃ prathamaṃ kāraṇam /
tgt_original: 一者性安隱勇猛；

src_original: paṇḍito bhavati samyagupanidhyānaśīlaḥ pratisaṃkhyānabalikaḥ /  idaṃ dvitīyaṃ kāraṇam /
tgt_original: 二者黠慧專修思惟；

src_original: ātmānamaparibhavan śṛṇoti /
tgt_original: 一行離下想煩惱，所謂聽受正法。 不自輕聽法，以此一行離下想煩惱。

src_original: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvadhimātrayā 'dhimuktyā samanvāgato bhavati /  idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇam /
tgt_original: 三者於無上菩提起增上樂；

src_original: sattveṣu cādhimātrayā karuṇayā samanvāgato bhavati idaṃ caturtha kāraṇam /
tgt_original: 四者於諸眾生發增上悲。

src_original: catvāri balāni katamāni /
tgt_original: 云何四力？

src_original: adhyātmabalaṃ parabalaṃ hetubalaṃ prayogabalañca /
tgt_original: 一者自力； 二者他力； 三者因力； 四者方便力。

src_original: tatra svaśaktipatitā yā ruciranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau idamucyate bodhisattvasyādhyātmabalaṃ cittasyotpattaye /
tgt_original: 菩薩自力發菩提心，是名自力。

src_original: paraśaktisamutpāditā tu ruciranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bodhisattvasya parabalam ityucyate cittasyotpattaye /
tgt_original: 因他發心，是名他力。

src_original: pūrvako bodhisattvasya mahāyānapratisaṃyuktakuśaladharmābhyāsa etarhi buddhabodhisattvasandarśana  mātrakeṇa tadvarṇaśravaṇamātrakeṇa vā āśu cittasyottpattaye prāgeva saddharmaśravaṇena  vā prabhāvadarśanena vā hetubalam ityucyate cittasyottpattaye /
tgt_original: 先習大乘相應善根，今少見佛及諸菩薩，或少聞歎說則便發心，是名因力。

src_original: anenaikenākāreṇa layasaṃkleśavigataḥ śṛṇoti /  evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ asaṃkliṣṭo dharma śṛṇoti /
tgt_original: 離如是等過聽受正法，是名菩薩不染心聽法。

src_original: dṛṣṭadhārmiko bodhisattvasya satpuruṣasaṃsevā-saddharmaśravaṇacintādiko dirghakālikaḥ kuśaladharmābhyāsaḥ prayogabalam ityucyate cittasyotpattaye
tgt_original: 於現世中近善知識，聞其說法能修眾善，是名方便力。

src_original: tatra bodhisattvasya samastavyastāṃścaturaḥ pratyayāṃścaturo hetūnāgamya sacedadhyātmabalena hetubalena ca samastābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ balābhyāṃ taccittamutpadyate
tgt_original: 菩薩以四緣、四因、自力、因力發菩提心者，堅固不動決定究竟。

src_original: (Dutt 12) evantad dṛḍhaṃñca sārañca niścalaṃ cotpadyate /  parabalaprayogabalābhyāṃ tu taccittamadṛḍhodayaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 他力方便力而發心者，不堅固動轉不定。

src_original: catvāri bodhisattvasya cittavyāvṛttikāraṇāni /
tgt_original: 菩薩有四事退菩提心。

src_original: katamāni catvāri /
tgt_original: 云何為四？

src_original: na gotrasaṃpanno bhavati /
tgt_original: 一者種性不具足；

src_original: pāpamitraparigṛhīto bhavati /
tgt_original: 二者惡知識所攝；

src_original: sattveṣu mandakaruṇo bhavati /
tgt_original: 三者於諸眾生悲心微薄；

src_original: saṃsāraduḥkhācca dīrghakālikādvicitrāttīvrānnirantarād bhīrurbhavati atyartha bibhetyuttasyati saṃtrāsamāpadyate /  caturṇāṃ cittotpattihetūnāṃ viparyayeṇa catvāryetāni cittavyāvṛttikāraṇāni vistareṇa pūrvavadveditavyāni /
tgt_original: 四者於生死苦生怖畏心。

src_original: dvāvimau dṛḍhaprathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya lokāsādhāraṇāvāścaryādbhūtau dharmau /  katamau dvau /
tgt_original: 初發心堅固有二事，出過世間殊勝奇特未曾有法：

src_original: sarvasattvāṃśca kaḍatrabhāvena parigṛhṇāti /
tgt_original: 一者於諸眾生起親屬想；

src_original: na ca punaḥ kaḍatraparigrahadoṣeṇa lipyate /
tgt_original: 二者無攝親屬之過。

src_original: tatrāyaṃ kaḍatraparigrahadoṣaḥ /  kaḍatrasyānugrahopaghātābhyāṃ kliṣṭānurodhavirodhau /
tgt_original: 攝親屬過者，受親屬故心生愛恚。

src_original: tau ca bodhisattvasya na vidyete /  dvāvimau dṛḍhaprathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya sattveṣu kalyāṇādhyāśayau pravartete /
tgt_original: 初發心堅固有二事，於諸眾生起真淨心：

src_original: hitādhyāśayaśca sukhādhyāśayaśca /
tgt_original: 一者安隱心； 二者快樂心。

src_original: tatra hitādhyāśayo yā akuśalāt sthānād vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanakāmatā
tgt_original: 安隱心者，為諸眾生除不善處安置善處。

src_original: sukhādhyāśayo yā vighātināmanāthānāmapratiśaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ kliṣṭavarjitānugrāhakavastūṣasaṃharaṇakāmatā /
tgt_original: 快樂心者，貧乏眾生無所依怙，能以攝法等心饒益。

src_original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvaḥ avikṣipto dharmaṃ śṛṇoti /
tgt_original: 云何不亂心聽法？

src_original: dvāvimau dṛḍhaprathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya prayogau /
tgt_original: 初發心堅固有二方便：

src_original: adhyāśayaprayogaḥ pratipattiprayogaśca /
tgt_original: 一者淨心方便； 二者道方便。

src_original: tatrādhyāśayaprayogo yā tasyaiva hitasukhādhyāśayasya pratidivasamanubṛṃhaṇā /
tgt_original: 淨心方便者，彼安隱心快樂心日日增長。

src_original: pratipattiprayogaḥ pratidivasamātmanaśca buddhadharmaparipākaprayogaḥ sattvānāñca yathāśakti yathāvalamadhyāśayaprayogameva niśritya hitasukhopasaṃhāraprayogaḥ
tgt_original: 道方便者，自於日夜成熟佛法，隨其力能，依淨心方便安樂饒益一切眾生。

src_original: dve ime dṛḍhaprathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya mahatī kuśaladharmāyadvāre /
tgt_original: 初發心堅固有二門，善法所入：

src_original: svārthaprayogaścānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ samudāgamāya /
tgt_original: 一者自利方便，發菩提心；

src_original: parārthaprayogaśca sarvasattvānāṃ sarvaduḥkhanirmokṣāya /
tgt_original: 二者他利方便，滅除眾苦。

src_original: yathā dve āyadvāre evaṃ dvau mahāntau kuśaladharmasannicayau dvāvaprameyau kuśaladharmaskandhau / peyālam /  dve ime prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya prathamaṃ cittotpādamupādāya (Dutt 13)  bodhāya kuśalaparigrahavaiśeṣye tadanyaṃ kuśalaparigrahamupanidhāya /
tgt_original: 初發心堅固有二事，發心成道所攝善法，出勝一切所攝眾善：

src_original: ājñācitta ekāgracittaḥ avihitaśrotraḥ samāvarjitamānasaḥ sarvacetasā samanvāhṛtya dharmaṃ śṛṇoti /
tgt_original: 一者一心； 二者側聽； 三者定意； 四者一向專樂聽受正法。

src_original: hetuvaiśeṣyaṃ phalavaiśeṣyañca /
tgt_original: 一者因勝； 二者果勝。

src_original: sa khalu bodhisattvasya kuśalaparigraho 'nuttanurāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherhetuḥ sā ca tasya phalam /
tgt_original: 彼菩提因所修善法，是名因勝。

src_original: na tadanyaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhakuśalaparigrahaḥ prāgeva tadanyeṣāṃ sattvānām /  tasmādvodhisattvānāṃ kuśalaparigrahastadanyasmātsarvakuśalaparigrahāddhetubhāvataḥ phalataśca prativiśiṣṭaḥ /
tgt_original: 無上菩提，是名果勝。 勝於一切聲聞緣覺，是故菩薩因果殊勝。

src_original: dvāvimau dṛḍhaprathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya cittotpādānuśaṃsau /
tgt_original: 初發心堅固有二種利益：

src_original: sahacittotpādācca sarvasattvānāṃ dakṣiṇīyabhūto bhavati gurubhūtaḥ puṇyakṣetraṃ pitṛkalpaḥ prajānāmavyābādhyasya ca puṇyasya parigrahaṃ karoti
tgt_original: 一者發是心已，即為一切無量眾生而作淨施尊重福田。

src_original: yena samanvāgato bodhisattvaścakravarti-dviguṇonārakṣeṇārakṣito bhavati /  yasminnārakṣe sadā pratyupasthite na śaknuvanti suptamattapramattasyāpi vyāḍā vā yakṣā vā amanuṣyā vā naivāsikā vā viheṭhāṃ kartum /  parivṛttajanmā punarayaṃ bodhisattvastena puṇyaparigraheṇālpābādho bhavatyarogajātīyaḥ /  na ca dīrgheṇa khareṇa vā ābādhena spṛśyate /
tgt_original: 成就淨福者，二轉輪王福德所護，若臥若覺不為惡獸惡鬼神等之所惱害，在所生處少病無病。

src_original: sattvārtheṣu ca sattvakaraṇīyeṣvasya vyāyacchamānasya kāyena vācā dharmañca deśayataḥ nātyarthaṃ kāyaḥ krāmyati na smṛtiḥ pramuṣyate na cittamupahanyate
tgt_original: 若說法時，身不疲惓心不忘失。

src_original: prakṛtyaiva tāvadgotrastho bodhisattvo mandadauṣṭhulyo bhavati /  utpādita cittastu bhūyasyā mātrayā mandatara dauṣṭhulyo bhavati yaduta kāyadauṣṭhulyena cittadauṣṭhulyena ca /
tgt_original: 性種性菩薩身口意惡性自微薄，既發心已轉復輕微。

src_original: asiddhānyapi ca tadanya hastagatāni sattvānāmītyupadravopasargasaṃśamakāni mantrapadāni vidyāpadāni taddhastagatāni sidhyanti /  kaḥ punarvādaḥ siddhāni /
tgt_original: 若他所用無驗呪術，菩薩用之悉皆神驗。

src_original: adhikena ca kṣāntisauratyena samanvāgato bhavati /  parata-upatāpasahaḥ aparopatāpī ca /
tgt_original: 已能成就隨順上忍，能忍他惱亦不惱他；

src_original: pareṇāpi ca paramupatāpyamānamupalabhyātyartha bādhyate /
tgt_original: 見人相惱，心生憐愍。

src_original: krodherṣyāśāṭhyamrakṣādayaścāsyopakleśāhatavegā mandāyamānāḥ kadācitsamudācarantyāśu ca vigacchanti /
tgt_original: 瞋嫉隱覆、幻偽諂曲諸上煩惱皆悉微薄，設起速滅。

src_original: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ śrutaṃ paryeṣate /
tgt_original: 是名菩薩求聞法。

src_original: yatra ca grāmakṣetre prativasati tasmin bhayabhairavadurbhikṣadoṣā amanuṣyakṛtāścopadravā anutpannāśca notpadyante utpannāśca vyupaśāmyanti
tgt_original: 在所住處無諸恐怖鬪諍飢饉非人所惱。 如是諸難未起不起，設起速滅。

src_original: sa cetpunaḥ sa prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvaḥ ekadā (Dutt 14)  narakeṣvapāyabhūmāvupapadyate sa bhūyasyā mātrayā āśutaraṃ ca mucyate narakebhyaḥ /
tgt_original: 發心菩薩或生惡道速得解脫，受苦微少疾生厭離。

src_original: ityetān yathānirdiṣṭānākārān sthāpayitvā tadanya etadviparyayātsvārtho bodhisattvānāṃ sarva eva parārthasambaddho veditavyaḥ /  tatrāyaṃ bodhisattvasya kevalaḥ parārtho bodhisattvena parijñāya prahātavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 除如是所說，餘純自利相違者，是名自利共他。

src_original: vipanna dṛṣṭerdānam anāgamadṛṣṭeraphaladarśinaḥ bhraṣṭaśīlasya pratipattivirahitasya pareṣāṃ dharmadeśanā /  adhobhūmisamatikrāntasyādhobhūmikaśukladharmopasaṃhāro dhyānavyāvartanakuśalasya ca bodhisattvasya /  tathāhi sa dhyānairvihṛtya dhyānaṃ vyāvarttya praṇidhāya yatra kāmaṃ tatra kāmadhātāvupapadyate /  vaśitāprāptasya ca bodhisattvasya daśasu nikṣu vicitrairnirmāṇaiḥ vicitrāṇāṃ sattvānāmarthakriyā /  ca svakṛtārthasya munestathāgatasya balavaiśāradyādisarvāveṇikabuddhadharmasaṃniśrayeṇāpramāṇeṣu sattveṣvapramāṇārthakriyā /
tgt_original: 純他利者，無因無果邪見布施，犯戒違道為他說法，自度下地而以下地淨法授與他人，菩薩捨禪願生欲界，自在菩薩十方世界種種變現教化眾生，如來畢竟力無所畏不共之法利益一切無量眾生，是名純他利。

src_original: tatra kimarthaṃ bodhisattvaḥ śrutaṃ paryeṣate /
tgt_original: 菩薩何故求聞法？

src_original: so 'pi parārthaḥ kevalo veditavyaḥ /  tatra pūrvako dvividhaḥ parārthaḥ kevalo yathā nirdiṣṭo bodhisattvena parijñāya prahātavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 前所說二種純他利，應知應斷；

src_original: tadanyatra ca kevale parārthe bhūyasyā mātrayā śikṣitavyam /
tgt_original: 餘純他利，應當勤學。

src_original: ityetānākārān sthāpayitvā etadviparyayācca bodhisattvānāṃ sarvaḥ parārthaḥ svārthaḥ sambaddhaḥ /  tatrāpi bodhisattvena śikṣitavyam /
tgt_original: 除如是所說，餘純他利相違者，是名他利共自。

src_original: hitānvayaḥ svaparārtho bodhisattvasya katamaḥ /  samāsataḥ pañcākāro veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 安自他利者，略說五種：

src_original: anavadyalakṣaṇaḥ anugrāhakalakṣaṇaḥ aihikaḥ āmutrikaḥ aupaśamikaśca /
tgt_original: 一者無罪相； 二者攝受相； 三者此世； 四者他世；

src_original: tatra yatkiṃcid bodhisattvaḥ ātmanā vā parīttaṃ prabhūtaṃ vā kuśalaparigrahaṃ kuśalopacayaṃ  karoti paraṃ vā parītte prabhūte vā kuśalaparigrahe kuśalopacaye samādāpayati vinayati (Dutt 17)
tgt_original: 五者寂滅。 菩薩所攝善根，若多若少修習成就，亦以此善成就眾生調伏建立，是名無罪相。

src_original: niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati /  ayamanavadyalakṣaṇo bodhisattvasya hitānvayaḥ svaparārtho veditavyaḥ /  yatkiṃcidvodhisattvaḥ ātmano vā parasya vā kliṣṭa varjitaṃ sukhamupasaṃharati upakaraṇasukhaṃ  vā dhyānasukhaṃ vā ayaṃ bodhisattvasyānugrāhakalakṣaṇo hitānvayaḥ svaparārtho veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 安自他利菩薩，以離染污樂眾具樂，住禪樂饒益自他，是名攝受相。

src_original: asti bodhisattvasya svaparārtha iha-hito nāmutra /  astyamutra neha /  astyamutra caiha ca /  asti naivāmutra neha-hitaḥ /  sa punareṣa caturvidhaḥ svaparārthaḥ caturṣu dharmasamādaneṣvanupūrva yathāyogaṃ dṛṣṭavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 安自他利菩薩，有此世安非他世、有他世非此世、有此世他世、有非此世非他世，此四種受、四種法，次第隨其所應。

src_original: catvāri dharmasamādānāni katamāni /
tgt_original: 云何為四？

src_original: asti dharmasamādānaṃ pratyutpanna-sukhāmāyatyāṃ duḥkhavipākam /  asti pratyutpannaduḥkhamāyatyāṃ sukhavipākam /  asti pratyutpannasukhamāyatyāṃ sukhavipākam /  asti pratyutpannaduḥkhamāyatyāṃ duḥkhavipākam /
tgt_original: 有法現世受樂他世受苦，有法現世受苦他世受樂，有法現世受樂他世受樂，有法現世受苦他世受苦，是名此世他世安自他利。

src_original: vibhaṅgā eṣāṃ yathāsūtrameva veditavyāḥ /  tatra nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃsaṃprāpakaśca nirvāṇapakṣyā laukikalokottarā dharmā ityeṣa  samāsato bodhisattvasya hitānvaya aupaśamikaḥ svaparārthaḥ sarvaprativiśiṣṭo niruttaro veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 涅槃及涅槃道涅槃分、世間法出世間法，是名寂滅安自利他。

src_original: sukhānvayo bodhisattvasya svaparārthaḥ katamaḥ /  samāsataḥ pañcavidhena sukhena saṃgṛhīto veditavyaḥ /  tatredaṃ pañcavidhaṃ sukham /
tgt_original: 樂自他利者，略說五種：

src_original: hetusukhaṃ veditasukhaṃ duḥkhaprātipakṣikaṃ sukhaṃ veditopacchedasukhamavyabādhyañca pañcam sukham /
tgt_original: 一者因樂； 二者受樂； 三者苦對治樂； 四者斷受樂； 五者無罪樂。

src_original: buddhavacanaṃ tāvad bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate /  samyagdharmāpratipatti saṃpādanārthaṃ pareṣāñca vistareṇasaṃprakāśanārtham /
tgt_original: 菩薩求佛所說法，為受正法次法向故、為他廣說故。

src_original: tatra sukhapakṣyadvaya mindriyaṃ viṣayaśca /  taddhetukaśca yaḥ sparśaḥ sukhavedanīyaḥ yacca kiñcidiṣṭaphalaṃ karma dṛṣṭe dharme abhisaṃparāye vā tatsarvamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya hetusukhamityucyate
tgt_original: 因樂有二種： 一者情塵觸因緣故樂受生； 二者今世後世愛果業。 是名因樂。

src_original: nāstyata uttari nāstyato bhūyaḥ /  duḥkhapraśamanāpekṣaḥ ebhireva hetusukhasaṃgṛhītaistribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ saṃbhūtaḥ kāyacittānugrahakaro 'nubhavo veditasukhamityucyate /
tgt_original: 眾苦息已，思惟三種因樂，起身心受，是名受樂。 受樂有二種：

src_original: tatpunaḥ samāsato dvividhaṃ sāsravamanāsravañca /  tatra yadanāsravaṃ tacchaikṣamaśaikṣañca /
tgt_original: 有漏及無漏。 無漏者，學無學；

src_original: sāsravaṃ punaḥ traidhātukaṃ kāmarūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktam /
tgt_original: 有漏者，三界繫。

src_original: hetuvidyāṃ bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate tasyaiva śāstrasya durbhāṣitadurlapitatāyā yathābhūta  parijñānārthaṃ paravādanigrahārthaṃ cāprasannānāmasmiṃcchāsane prasādāya prasannānāñca bhūyobhāvāya /
tgt_original: 菩薩求因論者，欲知彼論過故、欲降伏異論故、未信佛法者令生信故、已生信者令增廣故。

src_original: tatpunaḥ sarva traidhātukaṃ yathāyogaṃ ṣaḍvidhamāyatanabhedena cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajaṃ yāvanmanaḥsaṃsparśajam /  tatpunaḥ ṣaḍvidhaṃ dvividham /  kāyikaṃ caitasikañca /  tatra pañcavijñānakāyasaṃprayuktaṃ kāyikaṃ manovijñānasaṃprayuktaṃ caitasikam /
tgt_original: 欲界、色界、無色界，彼一切三界隨其所應六入分別，眼觸因緣乃至意觸因緣生，五識相應名為身受，意識相應名為心受。

src_original: śītoṣṇakṣutpipāsādikānāmanekavidhānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ bahunānāprakārāṇāmutpannotpannānāṃ (Dutt 18)  śītoṣṇakṣutpipāsādiduḥkhapratikāreṇa praśamāt tasminneva duḥkhopaśamamātrake yā sukhabuddhirutpadyate idamucyate duḥkhaprātipakṣikaṃ sukham
tgt_original: 寒暑飢渴種種苦惱，已起未起對治令息，息已樂知生，是名苦對治樂。

src_original: saṃjñāveditanirodhasamāpattirveditopacchedasukhamityucyate /
tgt_original: 滅受想定，是名斷受樂。

src_original: avyābādhyasukhaṃ punaḥ samāsataścaturākāraṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 無罪樂者，有四種： 一者出家樂；

src_original: etadviparyayeṇa viśuddhyāsannatā veditavyā /
tgt_original: 堪任清淨與此相違，名為近淨。

src_original: naiṣkramyasukhaṃpravivekasukhamupaśamasukhaṃ saṃbodhisukhañca /
tgt_original: 二者遠離樂； 三者寂滅樂； 四者菩提樂。

src_original: samyageva śraddhayā agārādanāgārikāṃ pravrajitasya āgārikavicitravyāsaṅgaduḥkhanirmokṣānnaiṣkramyasukhamityucyate /
tgt_original: 信家非家出家學道，解脫種種在家之難，是名出家樂。

src_original: kāmapāpakākuśaladharmaprahāṇavivekātprathame dhyāne vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ pravivekasukhamityucyate /
tgt_original: 斷欲惡不善法，得初禪離生喜樂，是名遠離樂。

src_original: dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu vitarkavicāropaśamādu paśamasukhamityucyate /
tgt_original: 二禪為首，覺觀止息，是名寂滅樂。

src_original: sarvakleśātyantavisaṃyogājjñeyavastuyathābhūtābhisaṃbodhācca yatsukhamidamucyate saṃbodhisukham /
tgt_original: 一切煩惱究竟滅，於一切法如實覺知樂，是名菩提樂。

src_original: tatra hetusukhaṃ sukhahetutvāt sukhaṃ na svabhāvataḥ /
tgt_original: 因樂者，是樂因非自性。

src_original: veditasukhaṃ na hetubhāvādapi tu svabhāvata eva /
tgt_original: 受樂者，非樂因是自性。

src_original: duḥkha-prātipakṣikaṃ sukhaṃ na ca hetubhāvānnāpi svabhāvataḥ api tu duḥkhopaśama-mātrad duḥkhāpakarṣaṇāt sukham /
tgt_original: 對治樂者，非樂因、非自性，而是息苦除苦。

src_original: veditopacchedasukhaṃ na hetubhāvānna svābhāvyānna duḥkhāpakarṣaṇādapi tu yatkiṃcidveditam /  idamatra duḥkhasyeti kṛtvā pāramārthikasya duḥkhasya tāvatkālikvavihāra-vyupaśamāt sukham /
tgt_original: 斷受樂者，非樂因、非自性、非除苦，而所有受是真實苦，隨住定時是受滅，無罪樂所攝。

src_original: avyābādhya-sukha-saṃgṛhītaṃ paścimaṃ saṃbodhisukhamāyatyāṃ ca tasyaiva pāramārthikasya  duḥkhasyātyanta-vyupaśamād dṛṣṭe ca dharme sarva-kleśa-pakṣyasya dauṣṭhulyagyāśrayagatasyātyantoparamāt sukham /  tadavaśiṣṭamavyābādhya-sukhaṃ tasyaiva paścimasyānukūlatvāt tatpakṣyatvāt tadāvāhakatvāt avyābādhyasukhaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 最後菩提樂，未來現在一切煩惱究竟滅，諸餘無罪樂於彼隨順，是名無罪樂。

src_original: tatra bodhisattvo yadeva hitapakṣyaṃ sukhaṃ tadeva sattvānāmupasaṃharet natu ahitapakṣyam /  ahitapakṣyaṃ punaḥ sukhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā parijñāya tasmāt sattvān vicchandayecchaktitaśca tasyāpakarṣāpahārāya vyāyaccheta /
tgt_original: 是菩薩以安隱樂饒益眾生，非安隱樂如實知之，隨力方便教令除斷。

src_original: duḥkhānugatamapi yaddhitaṃ syāt tadvodhisattvena sahaiva duḥkhena sahaiva daurmanasyenākāmakānāṃ sattvānāmupasaṃhartavyamupāyakauśalya-saṃniśrayeṇa  sukhānugatañcāpi yadahitaṃ syāttadapi sahaiva sukhena saha saumanasyena kāmakānāṃ sattvānāmapahartavyamapakarṣitavya mupāyakauśalya-saṃniśrayeṇa
tgt_original: 若苦而後安者，彼雖憂惱要當饒益，是則菩薩依巧方便。 若樂而後不安者，彼雖憂苦不欲去之，以方便力要為除斷。

src_original: śabdavidyāṃ bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate /  saṃskṛtalapitādhimuktānātmani saṃpratyayotpādanārthaṃ saniruktapadavyañjananirūpaṇatayā ekasya cārthasya nānāprakāraniruttyanuvyavahārānupraveśārtham
tgt_original: 菩薩求聲論者，廣為眾生演說正語令愛樂故、為淨莊嚴辭句味故、於一義中種種言辭莊嚴故。

src_original: tatkasya hetauḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: sukhāyaiva sa (Dutt 19)  āyatyāṃ sattvānāṃ niyato veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 以後必得樂故。

src_original: yo 'sau duḥkhena saha hitopasaṃhāraḥ sukhena ca sahāhitāpakarṣaḥ /  ataeva bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu yo hitakāmaḥ arthataḥ sukhakāmo 'pi sa jñeyaḥ /  yo hitapradaḥ sukhaprado 'pi sa jñeyaḥ /
tgt_original: 是菩薩欲眾生安者欲令得樂，與其安者亦欲與樂。

src_original: tathā hi hitaṃ hetusthānīyaṃ sukhaṃ phalasthānīyam /
tgt_original: 安者謂因處，樂者謂果處。

src_original: tasmātsukhānugata eva sa sattveṣu veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 是故當知，樂眾生者必先安之。

src_original: yaḥ kaściddhitānugataḥ tatra yacceṣṭaphalaṃ karma dṛṣṭe dharme abhisaṃparāye ca hetusukhasaṃgṛhītaṃ  yacca duḥkhaprātipakṣikaṃ yacca vedito pacchedasukhaṃ yaccāvyābādhyasukham etadekāntena
tgt_original: 彼愛果業今世後世因樂所攝，及苦對治樂、斷受樂、無罪樂，決定以此饒益眾生，亦名為攝，亦名無罪受樂及情塵觸因樂。 是染污有罪不安隱者，不以饒益教令除斷。

src_original: nirvimarṣo bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣūpasaṃharet /  etaddhyanugrāhakaṃ cānavadyañca /  vedita sukhamindriyaviṣayasparśasaṃgṛhītañca hetusukhaṃ yatsaṃkleśāya vā kliṣṭaṃ vā sāvadyamahitamapathyaṃ tannopasaṃharet /  yatpunarasaṃkleśāyāsaṃkliṣṭaṃ vā 'navadyaṃ hitaṃ pathyaṃ ca tadvodhisattvaḥ sattveṣūpasaṃhared yathāśakti yathābalam /
tgt_original: 若非染污無罪安隱者，以此饒益一切眾生。

src_original: api cātmanā tathaiva samācarecchikṣeta pratyanubhavedityayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ hitasukhānvayaḥ svaparārtho veditavyaḥ /  nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩亦常隨力自行，是名菩薩安樂自他利因攝。

src_original: tatra katamo bodhisattvasya hetuphalasaṃgṛhītaḥ svaparārthaḥ /  samāsatastrividho hetustrividhameva ca phalaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 果攝自他利者，略說三種因、三種果。

src_original: vipākahetuḥ vipākaphalaṃ puṇyahetuḥ puṇyaphalaṃ jñānahetuḥ jñānaphalam /
tgt_original: 報因報果、福因福果、智因智果。

src_original: vipākaḥ katamaḥ /
tgt_original: 云何為報？

src_original: samāsato 'ṣṭavidho vipākaḥ /
tgt_original: 報有八種： 一者壽具足；

src_original: cikitsāśāstraṃ bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate sattvānāṃ nānāprakāravyādhivyupaśamanārthaṃ mahājanakāyasyānugrahārtham /
tgt_original: 菩薩求醫方論者，為除眾生種種病故、攝受大眾故。

src_original: āyuḥsaṃpat varṇasaṃpat kulasaṃpat aiśvaryasaṃpat ādeyavākyatā maheśākhyatā manuṣyatvaṃ balameva cāṣṭamam /
tgt_original: 二者色具足； 三者種性具足； 四者自在具足； 五者信言具足； 六者大力具足；

src_original: dīrghāyuṣkaṃ cirasthitikatā bodhisattvasyāyuḥsaṃpat /
tgt_original: 七者人具足； 八者力具足。 長壽久往，是名壽具足。

src_original: abhirūpatā darśanīyatā prāsādikatvaṃ varṇasaṃpat /
tgt_original: 顏容端政，是名色具足。

src_original: ucceṣu kuleṣu pratyājātiḥ kulasaṃpat /
tgt_original: 生於上族，是名種性具足。

src_original: mahābhogatā mahāpakṣatā mahāparivāritā ca aiśvaryasaṃpat /
tgt_original: 得大財大眾大眷屬，是名自在具足。

src_original: yatpunaḥ śraddheyo bhavati pratyayitaḥ sattvānāmutpannotpanneṣvadhikaraṇeṣu prāmāṇikatvena ratheyaḥ kāṃsakūṭatūlākūṭādibhinirmāyāśāṭhyena /  nikṣipyasya ca draviṇasyānabhidroho bhavatyavisaṃvādakaḥ /  tannidānañca sattvānāṃ gṛhītavākyo bhavati /  iyamucyate ādeyavacanatā /
tgt_original: 斷事聽訟制作法度，受與寄付悉從取正，凡所出言人所信伏，是名信言具足。

src_original: mahadyaśaḥ khyātiścāsya loke prathitā bhavati yaduta śauryaṃ vā vīrya vā dhairyaṃ  vā vaicakṣaṇyaṃ vā naipuṇyaṃ vā sauśīlyaṃ vā vicitraśilpakarmasthānātirekataratama-kauśalyaṃ vā ārabhya /  (Dutt 20) tannidānañca gururbhavati mahājanakāyasya satkaraṇīyo gurukaraṇīyo mānanīyaḥ pūjanīyaḥ /  iyamucyate maheśākhyatā /
tgt_original: 有大名稱、大方便、大智慧，種種技藝為人所重，大眾恭敬尊重讚歎，是名大力具足。

src_original: puruṣabhāvaḥ puruṣendriyeṇa samanvāgato manuṣyatvam /
tgt_original: 成就丈夫法，是名人具足。

src_original: alpābādhatā arogajātīyatā mahotsāhatā ca prakṛtyā balasaṃpat /
tgt_original: 少病少惱有所堪能，是名力具足。

src_original: laukikāni śilpakarmasthānāni bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate 'lpakṛcchreṇa bhogasaṃharaṇārthaṃ  sattvānāmarthāya sattvānāñca bahumānotpādanārthaṃ śilpajñānasaṃvibhāgena cānugrahasaṃgrahārtham /
tgt_original: 菩薩求世間工業處智者，為少方便獲致大財饒益無量諸眾生故、為教眾生種種事業故。

src_original: vipākahetuḥ katamaḥ ahiṃsā sattveṣvahiṃsāśayaścāyuḥsaṃpado hetuḥ /
tgt_original: 云何報因？ 不害眾生無傷害心，是名壽因。

src_original: ālokaśucivastradānaṃ varṇasaṃpado hetuḥ /
tgt_original: 施燈明淨物，是名色因。

src_original: nihatamānatā sattveṣu kuśalasaṃpado hetuḥ /
tgt_original: 捨離憍慢，是名種性因。

src_original: dānamarthiṣu copakaraṇavikaleṣu caiśvaryasaṃpado hetuḥ /
tgt_original: 眾具惠施，是名自在因。

src_original: satyavacano 'piśunā 'paruṣā 'saṃbhinnapralāpābhyāsaḥ ādeyavacanatāyā hetuḥ /
tgt_original: 離口四過，是名信言因。

src_original: āyatyāmātmani vicitraguṇādhānapraṇidhānavato ratnatrayapūjā gurupūjā maheśākhyatāyā hetuḥ /
tgt_original: 攝諸功德立大誓願，供養三寶及諸尊長，是名大力因。

src_original: manuṣyabhāve cābhiratiḥ strībhāve vidveṣaśca /  tatrādīnavadarśinaḥ /  pareṣāñca manuṣyatvopasaṃhārau dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām /  vicchandanatayā ca strīṇāṃ strībhāvābhiratānāṃ [ca] strībhāvāt /  vinirmokṣaṇatayā ca dharmeṇa puruṣendriyavipralopāyopāttānāmupanītānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ manuṣyatvasya hetuḥ /
tgt_original: 樂丈夫法、厭女人法，說丈夫法饒益他人，教令厭離女人之法，是名人因。

src_original: kāyena sattvānāṃ vaiyāvṛtya kriyā sahāyakriyā utpannotpanneṣu kṛtyeṣu yathāśakti
tgt_original: 眾生所作如法事中，隨其所能悉往營助，是名力因。

src_original: yathābalaṃ dharmeṇāsāhasena bhakta-tarpaṇa-yavāgupānānāṃ ca vṛṣyāṇāmutsāhakarāṇāmannapānānāṃ  sattveṣūpasaṃhāro balasampado hetuḥ /  ityaṣṭavidhasya vipākasyāyamaṣṭavidho heturveditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 如是八種是名報因。

src_original: sa punarayaṃ hetuḥ samāsatastribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ puṣṭo bhavati paripūrṇasya puṣṭasyodārasya vipākasyābhinirvṛttaye /  trīṇi kāraṇāni katamāni /
tgt_original: 略說報因有三種勝，令報增上：

src_original: cittaśuddhiḥ prayoga śuddhiḥ kṣetraśuddhiśca /
tgt_original: 一者心淨； 二者方便淨； 三者福田淨。

src_original: tatra yā ca śuddhāśayatā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau teṣāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ pariṇamanād  yā ca tīvrāśayatā ghanarasenodāreṇa prasādenādhyācaraṇād yā ca sahadhārmikasya darśanenābhipramodanā  yā ca pratidivasaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ tadanudharmameva bahulamanuvitarkaṇānuvicāraṇā /  iyamucyate cittaśuddhiḥ /
tgt_original: 淨心悕望無上菩提，迴向善根漸漸增長，信樂修行勝妙純善，見人行者心生隨喜，日夜念念隨順正法隨覺隨觀，是名心淨。

src_original: tatra yo dīrghakālābhyāso nirantarakāritā [ca] nipuṇakāritā ca pareṣāñcāsamātte tasmin  kuśale samādāpanāya varṇavāditā samātte vā punaḥ saṃharṣaṇāya varṇavāditā teṣāmeva  ca tasmin kuśalamūle sanniveśanā pratiṣṭhāpanā /
tgt_original: 長夜修習精勤無間，復以此法轉授他人，見有授者隨喜讚善，見彼受行隨順訓導，亦以此法而自建立，是名方便淨。

src_original: (Dutt 21) iyamucyate prayogaśuddhiḥ /  tatra samāsataḥ prayogasya samyaksampādanāttasyaiva ca samyakprayogasya phale 'vasthāpanā tkṣetraśuddhirveditavyā /
tgt_original: 略說方便正起方便果，是名福田淨。

src_original: tatra vipākaphalaṃ katamat /
tgt_original: 云何報果？

src_original: āyuḥsaṃpanno bodhisattvo dīrghakālaṃ kuśalapakṣe prayujyate prabhūtañca kuśalamūlopacayaṃ karoti svārtha parārthañcārabhya /  idamāyuḥsaṃpadaḥ phalam /
tgt_original: 菩薩壽具足故，久修善法令諸眾生成就善根，是名壽具足果。

src_original: sarvāṇi ca etāni pañcavidyāsthānāni bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhermahājñānasambhāraparipūṇārtham /  na hi sarvatraivamaśikṣamāṇaḥ krameṇa sarvajñajñānamanāvaraṇaṃ pratilabhate /  yattāvadvodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate yathā ca paryeṣate yadarthañca paryeṣate tannirdiṣṭam /
tgt_original: 如是菩薩求五明處，為無上菩提大智眾具究竟滿故，非不次第學一切法而得一切無障礙智，是名菩薩所求如所求所為求。

src_original: varṇasaṃpanno bodhisattvaḥ priyo bhavati mahājanakāyasya /
tgt_original: 菩薩色具足故，大眾愛樂；

src_original: priyatvāccābhigamanīyo bhavati /  tayā ca manojñarūpatayā sammukhībhāvopagamanāccāsya mahājanakāyo vacanaṃ śrotavyaṃ kartavyaṃ manyate /  idaṃ varṇasaṃpadaḥ phalaṃ bodhisattvasya veditavyam /
tgt_original: 眾愛樂故，悉共宗敬樂聽所說，是名色具足果。

src_original: kulasaṃpanno bodhisattvaḥ sammato bhavati mahājanakāyasya pūjyaśca praśasyaśca /  sammatatvācca pūjyatvātpraśasyatvād yatra yatra vastuni sattvān samādāpayati te tejograstāstatra tatrāśu pratipadyante na vivadante na viceṣṭante 'kriyāyai /  idaṃ kulasaṃpadaḥ phalaṃ bodhisattvasya veditavyam /
tgt_original: 菩薩種性具足故，眾所敬重供養讚歎，言必受行無所違犯，是名種性具足果。

src_original: aiśvaryasaṃpanno bodhisattvo dānena sattvān saṃgṛhṇāti paripācayati /  idamaiśvaryasaṃpado bodhisattvasya phalaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 菩薩自在具足故，布施普攝成就眾生，是名自在具足果。

src_original: ādeyavacano bodhisattvaḥ priyavāditayā arthacaryayā samānārthatayā ca sattvān gṛhṇāti paripācayati /  idamādeyavacanatāyā bodhisattvasya phalaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 菩薩信言具足故，常以愛語利益同事，攝取眾生化令成就，是名信言具足果。

src_original: maheśākhyo bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ vicitraiḥ kṛtyakaraṇīyaiḥ sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchannupakārī bhavati /  yenopakāre ṇāvabaddhacittāḥ sattvā asya gauravāt kṛtajñatayā ca laghuladhvevājñāmanuvartante satkṛtyādareṇa /  idaṃ maheśākhyatāyā bodhisattvasya phalaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 菩薩大力具足故，眾生所作悉能營助，眾生知恩咸來歸仰，凡出言教即皆承用，是名大力具足果。

src_original: manuṣyabhūto bodhisattvaḥ purūṣendriyeṇa samanvāgato bhājanabhūto bhavati sarvaguṇānāṃ sarvavyavasāyānāṃ sarvajñeyapravicayānām /  viśāradaśca bhavatyanāvṛtagatiḥ sarvasattvasarvakālopasaṃkramaṇasaṃbhāṣaṇasaṃvāsasaṃbhogaraho vihārāṇam idaṃ puruṣatva phalaṃ bodhisattvasya veditavyam /
tgt_original: 菩薩人具足故，男相成就，堪為一切功德法器，於一切方便一切知見得無所畏，於一切時自在遊處，一切眾生往來同事，人間曠野隨意無礙，是名人具足果。

src_original: balasaṃpanno bodhisattvaḥ akhinno bhavati kuśaladharmārjanaprayogeṇa sattvānugrahaprayogeṇa ca /  ārabdhavīryaśca bhavati dṛḍhavīryaḥ kṣiprābhijñaśca bhavati /  idaṃ balasaṃpado bodhisattvasya phalaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 菩薩力具足故，精勤方便、堅固方便、速疾方便，修善無厭攝人不惓，是名力具足果。

src_original: itīdaṃ bodhisattvānāmaṣṭavidhasya vipākasyāṣṭavidhaṃ phalaṃ yadbhavati sattvānāṃ (Dutt 22)  copakārāya buddhadharmāṇāścodayāyānukūlamanuguṇam /  asmin khalu bodhisattvo vipākaphale vyavasthitaḥ svayañca śakto bhavati pratibalaḥ sattvānāṃ vicitraprabhūtārthakaraṇe /  te 'pi cāsya vineyā niyojyā bhavanti yathākāmakaraṇīyāya yaduta svārthakriyāmārabhya /
tgt_original: 菩薩以此八種報果饒益眾生，自熟佛法隨順功德，菩薩住是報果，令諸眾生作所應作，眾生隨教各修所願。

src_original: svayañcedayaṃ bodhisattvaḥ pratibalaḥ syādvineyāścāsya na niyojyā bhaveyuḥ /  evamasya na pracurā syānna pradakṣiṇā parārthakriyā yenāyaṃ na śaknuyāt parārthaṃ kartum /
tgt_original: 若菩薩雖自有力而彼不從，不名利他。

src_original: svayañcedayaṃ bodhisattvaḥ aśaktaḥ syādapratibalo vineyāścāsya niyojyāḥ syuḥ svārthakriyāmārabhyaivamapi  bodhisattvasya parārthakriyā na pracurā na pradakṣiṇā syād yenāyaṃ na śaknuyāt parārtha kartum /
tgt_original: 若自無力而受化者順，亦不名利他。

src_original: tasmādubhayasānnidhye ubhayasaṃpadiṃ satyāṃ bodhisattvasya sattvārthakriyā pracurā bhavati pradakṣiṇā yena śaknoti parārthaṃ kartum /
tgt_original: 若自有力、受化者順，是二具足則能兼利。

src_original: tathābhūtaścāsau bodhisattvaḥ ātmanaśca buddhadharmān sattvāṃśca triṣu yāneṣu kṣiprameva paripācayati /  ātmanā cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimadhisaṃbudhyate /
tgt_original: 菩薩具足二法能自行佛法，以三乘法成就眾生，能自究竟無上菩提，眾生熟者令得解脫。

src_original: paripakvāṃśca sattvān vimocayati /  tadanena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvānāṃ yasmādaṣṭavidhaṃ vipākaphalaṃ hitasukhāya sattvānāṃ saṃvartate /  tasmād yaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ bandhyo nirarthaḥ saṃsāraḥ sa teṣāmavandhyaśca mahārthaśca bhavati /
tgt_original: 是故菩薩住八種報果，乃能安樂一切眾生，一切眾生無際生死，從本已來空無義利，悉令不空獲大果實。

src_original: tatra katamat puṇyam /
tgt_original: 云何為福？

src_original: katamajjñānam /
tgt_original: 云何為智？

src_original: puṇyamucyate samāsatastisraḥ pāramitāḥ /  dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā ca /
tgt_original: 檀波羅蜜、尸羅波羅蜜、羼提波羅蜜，是名為福。

src_original: jñānaṃ punarekā pāramitā yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
tgt_original: 般若波羅蜜，是名為智。

src_original: vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā ca puṇyapakṣyā jñānapakṣyā ca veditavyā /
tgt_original: 禪波羅蜜、毘梨耶波羅蜜，各有二分： 一者福分； 二者智分。

src_original: yadvīrya niśritya dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ vā samādatte rakṣati maitryādīni cāpramāṇāni bhāvayati /  idamevaṃbhāgīyaṃ puṇyapakṣyaṃ vīryam /
tgt_original: 依禪故修四無量等，是名福分；

src_original: tatra kiṃ bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ deśayati /
tgt_original: 菩薩為他說者，何所說？

src_original: yatpunarvīryaṃ niśritya śrutacintābhāvanāmayyāṃ prajñāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti skandhakauśalyaṃ  vā karoti dhātukauśalyamāyatanakauśalyaṃ pratītyasamutpādakuśalyaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalyaṃ  duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhataḥ samudayaṃ vā samudayato nirodhaṃ vā nirodhato mārgaṃ vā mārgataḥ pratyavekṣate /  kuśalākuśalāndharmān sāvadyānanavadyān hīnapraṇītān kṛṣṇaśuklasapravibhāgapratītyasamutpannān dharmān yathābhūtaṃ pravicinoti pratyavekṣate
tgt_original: 依禪故修陰界入巧便、處非處巧便，觀苦習滅道善不善法、有罪無罪法、下法上法、垢法淨法及諸緣起，皆能如實分別觀察，是名智分。

src_original: idamucyate jñānapakṣyaṃ vīryam /  yaddhyānaṃ niśrityaṃ dānaṃ vā dadāti śīlaṃ vā samādatte rakṣati maitryādīni cāpramāṇāni bhāvayati /  idamevaṃbhāgīyaṃ puṇyapakṣyaṃ dhyānam /
tgt_original: 依精進故，修行施戒四無量等，是名福分。

src_original: (Dutt 23) yatpunardhyānaṃ niśritya śrutacintābhāvanāyyāṃ prajñāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti skandhakauśalyaṃ vā pūrvavat sarvaṃ vaktavyaṃ tadyathā vīrye  idamucyate jñānapakṣyaṃ dhyānam /
tgt_original: 依精進故，修聞思修惠，陰巧便等如前說，是名智分。

src_original: taccaitat puṇyajñānaṃ samāsataḥ ṣaḍvidhaṃ bhavati /  apramāṇaṃ tvetadekaikaprabhedato veditavyam /
tgt_original: 如是福智略說六種，廣說則無量。

src_original: puṇyajñānahetuḥ katamaḥ /
tgt_original: 云何福因、智因？

src_original: samāsatastrayaḥ puṇyajñānahetavo veditavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 福因、智因略說三種：

src_original: puṇyajñānapratilambhasthānopacayāya yacchandaḥ anukūlo 'vidhuraḥ pratyayaḥ pūrvakaśca puṇyajñānābhyāsaḥ /  tatrāyamavidhuraḥ pratyayaḥ yā viparītasya ca pratyayasyāpratyupasthānamasannihitatā /  aviparītasya ca pratyayasya pratyupasthānaṃ sannihitatā /
tgt_original: 一者得長養福智方便處欲； 二者隨順近緣； 三者本習福智近緣者，不住顛倒緣，住不顛倒緣。

src_original: tatra yā pāpamitramāgamya viparītā puṇyajñānadeśanā viparītena vā manaskāreṇa viparītagrāhitā /
tgt_original: 習近惡知識，倒說福智倒念倒受，是名住顛倒緣。

src_original: idamucyate viparītapratyasānnidhyam /  etadviparyayeṇa śuklapakṣeṇa aviparītapratyayasānnidhyaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 與此相違淨分，名住不顛倒緣。

src_original: ye ca puṇyajñānapratilambhasthityupacayāya prayuktasyāntarāyāḥ /  teṣāñca vivarjanamanutpādaḥ pratyayo 'vidhura ityucyate bodhisattvasya puṇyajñānayoḥ /
tgt_original: 離長養福智方便處欲障不起，是名為近。

src_original: kathañca deśayati /  kimarthañca deśayati /
tgt_original: 云何說？ 何故說？

src_original: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ hetūnāmanyatamavaikalyānnāpi puṇyasya nāpi jñānasya prasūtirveditavyā /
tgt_original: 此三因不具者，福智不生。

src_original: puṇyajñānaphalaṃ katamat /
tgt_original: 云何福果、智果？

src_original: puṇyamāśritya bodhisattvo 'kṣataḥ saṃsāre saṃsarati nātyarthaṃ duḥkhairbādhyamānaḥ /  yathepsitañca sattvārthaṃ sattvānugrahaṃ śaknoti kartum /
tgt_original: 菩薩依福故，為諸眾生於無窮生死備經眾苦，隨其所欲攝取眾生。

src_original: jñānamāśritya bodhisattvaḥ samyak puṇyaparigrahaṃ karoti na mithyā vicitrāprameyakauśalyakriyayā ca yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate
tgt_original: 菩薩依智故，攝受正福種種巧便，為諸眾生乃至無上菩提。

src_original: itīdaṃ samāsena puṇyajñānaphalaṃ yathāyogaṃ caturvidhaṃ veditavyam /  apramāṇantve tatprakāraprabhedataḥ /
tgt_original: 如是略說福智有四種果，廣說則無量。

src_original: tatra yaśca vipāko yaśca vipākaheturyacca vipākaphalaṃ sarvametatpuṇyāśritaṃ puṇyaprabhavam /  puṇyaṃ punarjñānāśritaṃ jñānaprabhavam tasmādubhayametatpradhānamanuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye /
tgt_original: 若報、若報因、若報果，一切依福起，福依智起，此二具足最勝最上，得無上菩提；

src_original: puṇyaṃ pradhānaṃ jñānaṃ punarnirūttaram puṇyajñānaṃ tadanyataravaikalyādayaṃ bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ nādhigacchet /
tgt_original: 若福智不具，終不能得。

src_original: ityayaṃ bodhisattvasya hetuphalasaṃgṛhītaḥ svaparārtho veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 是名菩薩因攝果攝自他利。

src_original: tatra katamo bodhisattvasya dṛṣṭadhārmikaḥ svaparārthaḥ /  katamaḥ sāṃparāyikaḥ /
tgt_original: 云何此世他世自他利？

src_original: yuktena śilpasthānakarmasthānena puruṣakāreṇa yā bhogānāmarjanā /  teṣāmeva copārjitānāṃ bhogānāṃ mātrayopabhogaḥ /  pūrvakasya ceṣṭaphalasya karmaṇo vipakvavipākasya (Dutt 24)  yo dṛṣṭe dharme phalopabhogaḥ /  yacca dṛṣṭadharmanirvāṇaṃ tathāgatabhūtasya ye ca laukikalokottarā dṛṣṭadharmanirvāṇasaṃprāpakāḥ saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ /
tgt_original: 現修福業獲如法財，宿善因緣今受果報，善能轉禪住此世樂，依於此世為利眾生，依於諸禪現法涅槃，如實世間出世間，向現法涅槃有為法，是名此世自利。

src_original: tatra yadeva paryeṣate tadeva deśayati /
tgt_original: 彼如所求法，如是法說。

src_original: yā punardṛṣṭe dharme sahaiva sukhena sahaiva saumanasyena bhogātmabhāvasaṃpado hetvāsevanā /  yā cehāhānabhāgīyā dhyānārūpyasamāpattiḥ /  dṛṣṭadharmasāṃparāyikaḥ svaparārtho veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 他世欲界身財乃至禪無色，生此世憂苦，思惟修習彼因，是名他世自他利。 此世喜樂，思惟修身財因，乃至此世退分禪無色正受，是名此世他世自他利。

src_original: ātyantikaḥ svaparārthaḥ katamaḥ /  katamaścānātyantikaḥ /
tgt_original: 云何畢竟不畢竟自他利？

src_original: kāmadhātau bhogātmabhāvasaṃpattiḥ sahetuphalā laukikī ca pṛthagjanānāṃ śuddhiḥ sahetuphalā anātyantikaḥ svaparārthaḥ /
tgt_original: 欲界身財有因有果，凡夫世俗淨有因有果，是名不畢竟自他利。

src_original: sarvātyantakleśaprahāṇamāryāṣṭāṅgaśca mārgaḥ tadāśrayeṇa ca ye laukikāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ pratilabdhāḥ /
tgt_original: 一切煩惱畢竟滅，八正道及依此生世俗善法，是名畢竟自他利。

src_original: tatra tribhiḥ kāraṇairātyantikatā anātyantikatā ca veditavyā /
tgt_original: 畢竟不畢竟有三種：

src_original: svabhāvataḥ parihāṇitaḥ phalopabhoga parikṣayataśca /
tgt_original: 一者自性； 二者退； 三者受用果盡。

src_original: tatra svabhāvato nirvāṇamātyantikam /  saṃskṛtaṃ sarvamevānātyantikam /
tgt_original: 自性者，涅槃畢竟，一切有為法不畢竟。

src_original: āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ aparihāṇīyatvādaphalopa bhogāparikṣayādātyantikaḥ /
tgt_original: 八正道不退，受用果不盡畢竟。

src_original: tadanye kuśalasāstravā dharmāḥ parihāṇitaḥ phalopabhogaparikṣayataścānātyantikāḥ /
tgt_original: 餘善有漏法退，受用果盡不畢竟。

src_original: ityayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ daśavidhaḥ svaparārthaḥ samāsavistarataḥ yatra bodhisattvairyathāśakti yathābalaṃ śikṣitavyam nāta ūttari nāto bhūyaḥ
tgt_original: 是名十種自他利，如是略說廣說。

src_original: atīte 'pyadhvanyanāgate 'pi ye svaparārthe śikṣitavantaḥ śikṣiṣyante sarve te 'sminneva daśavidhe svaparārthe /  nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /  bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre yogasthāne svaparārthapaṭalaṃ tṛtīyaṃ samāptam /  (Dutt 25)  Tattvārtha-paṭalam (Chapter 1.4)  tattvārthaḥ katamaḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩應當隨力修學，過去已學、未來當學，一切十種自他利，是名畢竟不畢竟自他利。

src_original: samāsato dvividhaḥ /
tgt_original: 略說二種：

src_original: yathāvadbhāvikatāñca dharmāṇāmārabhya yā dharmāṇāṃ bhūtatā yāvadbhāvikatāñcārabhya yā dharmāṇāṃ sarvatā /
tgt_original: 一者實法性；

src_original: iti bhūtatā sarvatā ca dharmāṇāṃ samastastattvārtho veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 二者一切事法性。

src_original: sa punareva tattvārthaḥ prakārabhedataścaturvidhaḥ /
tgt_original: 此二法性以種分別，復有四種：

src_original: lokaprasiddho yuktiprasiddhaḥ kleśāvaraṇaviśuddhijñānagocaro jñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhijñānagocaraśca /
tgt_original: 一者世間所知； 二者學所知； 三者煩惱障淨智所行處法； 四者智障淨智所行處法。

src_original: tatra laukikānāṃ sarveṣāṃ yasmin vastuni saṃketasaṃvṛtisaṃstavanāgamapraviṣṭayā buddhyā darśanatulyatā bhavati tadyathā pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivyaiveyaṃ nāgniriti /  yathā pṛthivyāmevamagnāvapsu vāyau rūpeṣu śabdeṣu gandheṣu raseṣu spraṣṭavyeṣu bhojane  āloke strīpuruṣaparicaryāyāṃ kṣetrāpaṇagṛhavastuni sukhaduḥkhe duḥkhamidaṃ na sukhaṃ
tgt_original: 云何世間所知真實義耶？ 世間眾事，隨順俗數知見悉同，謂地即是地，非水非餘水火風。

src_original: sukhamidaṃ na duḥkhamiti /  samāsata idamidaṃ nedam /  evamidaṃ nānyatheti niścitādhimuktigocaro yadvastu sarveṣāmeva laukikānāṃ paraṃparāgatayā saṃjñayā svavikalpa-prasidvaṃ na cintayitvā tulayitvopaparīkṣyodgṛhītam  idamucyate lokaprasiddhatattvam /
tgt_original: 色聲香味觸乃至苦樂，略說此物即此物、非彼物，如是一切決定意解所行處事，世間本來自憶想知不從修習，是名世間所知真實義也。

src_original: yuktiprasiddhatattvaṃ katamat /
tgt_original: 云何學所知真實義耶？

src_original: satāṃ yuktārthapaṇḍitānāṃ vicakṣaṇānāṃ tārkikāṇāṃ mīmāṃsakānāṃ tarkaparyāpannāyāṃ  pramāṇaṃ niśritya suvidita-suviniścitajñānagocara-jñeyaṃ vastūpapattisādhanayuktyā  prasādhitaṃ vyavasthāpitam /  idamucyate yuktiprasiddhaṃ tattvam /
tgt_original: 如世智人，依現智比智及從師聞思量修學，彼決定智所行處事結集建立，是名學所知真實義也。

src_original: kleśāvaraṇaviśuddhijñānagocarastattvaṃ katamat /
tgt_original: 云何煩惱障淨智所行處法真實義耶？

src_original: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāmanāsraveṇānāsravāvāhakena cānāsravapṛṣṭalabdhena ca laukikena jñānena yo gocaraviṣayaḥ /  idamucyate kleśāvaraṇaviśudvijñānagocarastattvam /  tenālambanena kleśāvaraṇāj (Dutt 26)  jñānaṃ viśudhyati /  anāvaraṇatve cāyatyāṃ santiṣṭhate /  tasmātkleśāvaraṇaviśuddhijñānagocarastattvamityucyate /
tgt_original: 一切聲聞緣覺無漏智、若無漏方便、若隨生世智修行境界，於彼智緣中煩惱障淨，未來世障畢竟不起，是名煩惱障淨智所行處法真實義也。

src_original: tatpunastatvaṃ katamat /  catvāryāryaisatyāni duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgaśca /  ityetāni catvāryāryasatyāni pravicinvato 'bhisamāgacchato 'bhisamāgateṣu ca tajjñānamutpadyate /  sa punaḥ satyābhisamayaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ skandhamātramupalabhamānānāṃ skandhebhyaścānyamarthāntaramātmānamanupalabhamānānāṃ  pratītyasamutpannasaṃskārodayavyayapratisaṃyuktayā prajñayā skandhavinirmuktapudgalābhāvadarśanābhyāsādutpadyate /
tgt_original: 所謂四聖諦苦集滅道，觀此四諦入無間等惠及無間等所起智慧，聲聞緣覺見陰離陰我不可得，諸行緣起生滅和合，陰與離陰無我人性修習知見。

src_original: jñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhijñānagocarastattvaṃ katamat /
tgt_original: 云何智障淨智所行處法真實義耶？

src_original: jñeye jñānasya pratighāta āvaraṇamityucyate /  tena jñeyāvaraṇena vimuktasya jñānasya yo gocaraviṣayastajjñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhijñānagocarastattvaṃ veditavyam /  tatpunaḥ katamat /
tgt_original: 智所知礙是名為障，彼智障解脫智修行境界，是名智障淨智所行處法真實義也。

src_original: yadarthañca paryeṣate tadarthameva pareṣāṃ deśayati /
tgt_original: 如所求義，如是義說。

src_original: bodhisattvānāṃ buddhānāñca bhagavatāṃ dharmanairātmyapraveśāya praviṣṭena suviśuddhena  ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ nirabhilāpyasvabhāvatāmārabhya prajñaptivāda svabhāvanirvikalpajñeyasamena  jñānena yo gocaraviṣayaḥ sāsau paramā tathatā niruttarā jñeyaparyantagatā yasyāḥ  sarva samyagdharmapravicayā nivartante nābhivartante /
tgt_original: 所謂諸佛菩薩入無我法，入已清淨，於一切法離言說自性、假名自性，離諸妄想平等大智修行境界，第一如實無上無邊，一切法擇永滅不起。

src_original: tatpunastattvalakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthānataḥ advayaprabhāvitaṃ veditavyam /  dvayamucyate bhāvaścābhāvaśca /  tatra bhāvo yaḥ prajñaptivādasvabhāvo vyavasthāpitaḥ /
tgt_original: 又真實相建立二種： 一者有性；

src_original: ] ayaṃ lokaḥ paro lokaḥ /  ubhau sūryācandramasau /  yadapi dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātaṃ prāptaṃ paryeṣitaṃ manasā 'nuvitarkitamanuvicāritamiti vā /  antato yāvannirvāṇamiti vā /  ityevaṃbhāgīyaḥ prajñaptivādanirūḍhaḥ svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ lokasya bhāva ityucyate /
tgt_original: 久遠已來世間計著一切憶想虛妄根本，所謂是色，是受想行識，眼耳鼻舌身意、地水火風、色聲香味觸法乃至涅槃，如是世間假名有自性法，是名為有。

src_original: tatrābhāvo yā asyaiva rūpamiti prajñaptivādasya yāvadantato nirvāṇamiti prajñaptivādasya  nirvastukatā nirnimittatā prajñaptivādāśrayasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ nāstikatā asaṃvidyamānatā  yāmāśritya prajñaptivādaḥ pravartate /  ayamucyate 'bhāvaḥ /
tgt_original: 無性者，色假名乃至涅槃假名，無事無依假名，所依一切悉無，是名為無。

src_original: yatpunaḥ pūrvakeṇa ca bhāvenānena cābhāvena ubhābhyāṃ bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ vinirmuktaṃ dharmalakṣaṇasaṃgṛhītaṃ vastu /
tgt_original: 如上所說有無是二，俱離法相。

src_original: tadadvayaṃm yadadvayam tanmadhyamā-pratipadantadvayavarjitam /  niruttaretyucyate /
tgt_original: 所攝二法無有二，無二者是名中道，離於二邊是名無上。

src_original: tasmiṃśca tattve buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ suviśuddhaṃ jñānaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 如是真實，是佛世尊淨智境界，是諸菩薩所應修學。

src_original: dvābhyāṃ punarākārābhyāṃ deśayati /
tgt_original: 以二因緣故說：

src_original: bodhisattvānāṃ punaḥ śikṣāmārgaprabhāvitaṃ tatra jñānaṃ veditavyam /  sā ca prajñā mahānupāyo bodhisattvasyānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ prāptaye /
tgt_original: 若修學者，名為大智方便菩薩，當得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: taktasya heto /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: tathā hi bodhisattvastena śūnyatādhimokṣeṇa tāsu tāsu jātiṣu prayujyamānaḥ sattveṣu buddhadharmaparipākāya saṃsāre saṃsaran tañca saṃsāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ parijānāti /  na ca punastasmātsaṃsārādanityādibhirākārairmānasamudvejayati / sa
tgt_original: 菩薩與空解脫相應，在於生死如實知生死，不於生死無常等行而生厭離，能成就佛法利益眾生。

src_original: cetsaṃsāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ na parijānīyānnaśaknuyādrāgadveṣamohādikāt sarvasaṃkleśāccittamadhyupekṣitum /
tgt_original: 若不如實知生死者，不能捨離貪恚癡等一切煩惱。

src_original: anadhyupekṣamāṇaścasaṃkliṣṭacittaḥ saṃsāre saṃsaret saṃkliṣṭacittaḥ saṃsarannaiva buddhadharmān paripācayennāpi sattvān /
tgt_original: 若不捨離則以染污受諸生死，以染污心受生死者不能成就佛法利益眾生。

src_original: anulomāṃ ca kathāṃ kathayati pariśuddhāṃ ca /
tgt_original: 一者隨順說； 二者清淨說。

src_original: sa cet punaranityādibhirākāraiḥ saṃsārānmānasamudvejayedevaṃ sati bodhisattvo laghu ladhveva parinirvāyāt /
tgt_original: 若於生死無常等行生厭離者，是菩薩疾得涅槃。

src_original: laghu ladhveva ca parinirvāyan bodhisattva evamapi naiva buddhadharmānnaiva sattvān paripācayet /
tgt_original: 疾得涅槃者，亦不能成就佛法利益眾生。

src_original: kutaḥ punaranuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate /
tgt_original: 云何能得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提？

src_original: tenaiva ca śūnyatādhimokṣeṇa bodhisattvaḥ prayujyamānaḥ na nirvāṇāduttrasyati nāpi nirvāṇaṃ prārthayate /
tgt_original: 若空解脫相應菩薩，則不畏涅槃亦不求涅槃。

src_original: sa cedvodhisattvo nirvāṇāduttrasyet paratra nirvāṇasaṃbhāro 'sya na paripūryeta yathāpi  ca taduttrastamānasatvānnirvāṇe 'nanuśaṃsadarśinastadgataguṇadarśanaprasādādhimuktivivarjitasya bodhisattvasya /  sa cetpunarbodhisattvo nirvāṇo prārthanābahulavihārī bhavedāśveva parinirvāyāt /
tgt_original: 若菩薩畏涅槃者不能滿足涅槃道，以畏涅槃故不見涅槃功德利益，不見涅槃功德利益，清淨信樂皆悉遠離。 若菩薩求涅槃者，多修習故疾般涅槃。

src_original: āśu parinirvāyam naiva buddhadharmānna sattvān paripācayet /  tatra yā ca saṃsāraṃ yathābhūtamaparijānataḥ saṃkliṣṭacittasya saṃsārasaṃsṛtiḥ /  yā ca saṃsārādudvignamānasasyāśunirvṛtiḥ /  yā ca nirvāṇāduttrastamānasasya tatsaṃbhārāparipūriḥ /  yā ca nirvāṇaprārthanābahulavihāriṇa (Dutt 28)  āśu parinirvṛtiḥ ayamanupāyo bodhisattvasya veditavyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
tgt_original: 疾般涅槃者，不能成就佛法利益眾生。

src_original: yā ca saṃsārādanityādibhirākārairanudvignamānasasyānāśunirvṛtiḥ /  yā ca nirvāṇādanuttrastamānasasya tatsaṃbhāraparipūriryā ca nirvāṇe guṇānuśaṃsadarśino na cātyarthamutkaṇṭhāprāptasyāśu nirvṛtiḥ /
tgt_original: 若厭生死，則疾般涅槃。 若畏涅槃者，不能滿足涅槃之道；

src_original: ityevaṃbhāgīyairdharmaiḥ sumahadantaraṃ gṛhi-pravrajitayorbodhisattvayorveditavyam /  iti bodhisattvabhumāvādhārānudharme yogasthāne dvitīyaṃ pakṣapaṭalam /  (Dutt 214)  Adhyāśayapaṭalam (Chapter 2.3)  uddānam /  vātsalyaṃ sarvasattveṣu saptākāraṃ hi dhīmatām /
tgt_original: 菩薩地持經卷第九次法方便處淨心品第三菩薩有七種愛念眾生，若成就此愛念者，名真實心、第一真實心。 一者無畏；

src_original: tatra (Dutt 75) kathamanulomāṃ kathāṃ kathayati /  anurūpeṇeryāpithena sthitāya deśayati nāpratirūpeṇa /
tgt_original: 隨順說者，住如法威儀說，非不如法。

src_original: abhayaṃ yuktamakhedamayācitamanāmiṣaṃ vistīrṇaṃ samañceti /
tgt_original: 三者不厭； 四者不求； 五者不貪； 六者廣大； 七者平等。

src_original: na hi bodhisattvaḥ kasyacidbhayādvatsalo bhavati /  ānulomikena kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇā samudācarati manāpena hitasukhena ca /
tgt_original: 菩薩未曾恐畏故，於諸眾生起愛念心，身口意業隨順行愛念安樂，是名無畏。 菩薩未曾無巧便而行愛念，所謂非法非律非真諦行、教授非處，是名巧便。

src_original: tathā ca bodhisattvo vatsalo bhavati sattveṣu yathā teṣāmarthe sarvārambhairna parikhidyate /
tgt_original: 菩薩愛念為諸眾生，一切所作而不疲厭，是名不厭。

src_original: ayācita eva ca bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu vatsalo bhavati na tu kenacidyācitaḥ /  nirāmiṣeṇa ca cittena vatsalo [bhavati] na parataḥ pratyupakāraṃ pratikāṃkṣamāṇaḥ paratra ca vipākamiṣṭaṃ pratyāśaṃsamāna iti niṣkāraṇavatsalo bhavati sattveṣu bodhisattvaḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩無請而愛念眾生，是名無求。 菩薩以無貪心而行愛念，不求恩報及未來愛果，是名無貪愛念。

src_original: vipulañca tadbodhisattvasya vātsalyaṃ bhavati sattveṣu na parīttam /  tathā ca vipulaṃ bhavati yathaiṣāṃ sattvānāmantikādbodhisattvaḥ sarvākāramapyapakāraṃ labhamāno notsṛjati ātmānaṃ kāmamapriyaṃ karoti /  na tu kenacitparyāyeṇa pareṣāṃ pāpakarmecchati /
tgt_original: 菩薩於諸眾生廣大愛念，不限眾生，於眾生所得饒益不饒益悉不棄捨，寧自苦身不苦眾生，是名廣大。

src_original: tatpunarevaṃ lakṣaṇameva guṇayuktaṃ vātsalyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvasattveṣveva samamāsamanta sattvadhātuprādeśikaḥ /
tgt_original: 又彼相成就愛念眾生，是名平等愛念； 不限眾生界，是名平等愛念。

src_original: evamanena saptākāreṇaiva vātsalyena yuktā bodhisattvāḥ kalyāṇāśayāḥ paramakalyāṇāśayā ityucyante /
tgt_original: 菩薩成就如是七種愛念，是名真實心、第一真實心。

src_original: tatra śraddhāpūrvaṃko dharmavicayapūrvakaśca buddhadharmeṣu yo 'dhimokṣaḥ pratyavagamo niścayo bodhisattvasya so 'dhyāśaya ityucyate /
tgt_original: 菩薩方便觀佛法僧，若意解正向決定，是名極淨心。

src_original: na uccatarake āsane niṣaṇṇāyāglānāya nodgunṭhikākṛtāya na purato gacchate vistareṇa yathāsūtraṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 不為高坐無病者說，覆頭者、在前行者，悉不為說，如修多羅廣說。

src_original: te punaradhyāśayā bodhisattvasya samāsataḥ pañcadaśa veditavyāḥ /  katame pañcadaśa /
tgt_original: 又彼極淨心，略說有十五種： 一者無上心； 二者隨轉心；

src_original: agryāśayo vṛttāśayaḥ pāramitāśayaḥ tattvārthāśayaḥ prabhāvāśayaḥ hitāśayaḥ sukhāśayo
tgt_original: 三者波羅蜜心； 四者真實義心； 五者神力心； 六者安心； 七者樂心；

src_original: vinirmuktāśayaḥ dṛḍhāśayaḥ avisaṃvādanāśayaḥ aśuddhāśayaḥ śuddhāśayaḥ suśuddhāśayaḥ  nigṛhītāśayaḥ sahajaścāśayaḥ /
tgt_original: 八者解脫心； 九者堅固心； 十者不虛偽心； 十一者不淨心； 十二者淨心； 十三者快淨心；

src_original: tatra yo buddhadharmasaṃgharatneṣu bodhisattvasyādhyāśayaḥ so 'gryāśaya ityucyate /  bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādāne yo 'dhyāśayo 'yaṃ vṛttāśaya ityucyate /
tgt_original: 十四者調伏心； 十五者俱生心。 菩薩於佛法僧寶極淨心，是名無上心。 受菩薩戒，於受持律儀極淨心，是名隨轉心。

src_original: dānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāsamudāgamāya yo 'dhyāśayo 'yaṃ pāramitāśaya ityucyate /
tgt_original: 於行施忍精進禪定智慧極淨心，是名波羅蜜心。

src_original: dharmapugdalanairātmye paramārthe ca dharmatathatāyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ yo 'dhyāśayo 'yaṃ tattvārthāśaya ityucyate /
tgt_original: 人法無我第一義真實甚深極淨心，是名真實義心。

src_original: buddhabodhisattvānāmacintye 'bhijñāprabhāve sahaje vā prabhāve yo 'dhyāśayo 'yaṃ prabhāvāśaya ityucyate /

src_original: pāramitāśayena kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhāvanāsātatyakriyayā 'pramādavihāriṇo bhavanti paramāpramādavihāriṇaśca /  tattvārthādhyāśayenāsaṃkliṣṭacittāśca saṃsāre sattvahetoḥ saṃsaranti /

tgt_original: 云何種性住？

src_original: tatra prayogaḥ katamaḥ /  yā svārthaprāptau tīvracchandatāmāgamya vinipātabhayaṃ vā 'mutra dṛṣṭe vā dharme parato 'yaśobhayamāgamya śikṣāpadeṣvanupālanā sātatyakāritā satkṛtyakāritā ca /

src_original: tatsamudācāre saṃdṛśyate /  prakṛtibhadratayaiva na haṭhayogena tasmin kuśale pravarttate /  api tu pratisaṃkhyānataḥ sāvagrahaḥ sambhṛto bhavati /  sarveṣāṃ ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ gotravihārī bodhisattvo bījadharo bhavati /  sarvabuddhadharmāṇāmasya [sarva]bījānyātmabhāvagatānyāśrayagatāni vidyante /  audārikamalavigataśca bodhisattvo gotravihārī bhavati /

src_original: abhavyaḥ sa tadrūpaṃ [saṃ]kleśaparyavasthānaṃ sammukhīkartum /  yena paryavasthānena paryavasthitaḥ anyatamadānantaryakarma samudācaret /  kuśalamūlāni vā samucchindyāt /

src_original: yaśca vidhirgotrasthasya gotrapaṭale nirdiṣṭaḥ /  sa gotravihāriṇo bodhisattvasya vistareṇa veditavyaḥ /  [iti] ayamucyate bodhisattvasya gotravihāraḥ /

src_original: iha bodhisattvasya prathamaṃ cittotpādamupādāya aśuddhādhyāśayasya yā kācidbodhisattvacaryā ayamasyādhimukticaryāvihāra ityucyate /

src_original: tatra gotravihārī bodhisattvastadanyeṣāṃ [sarveṣāṃ] bodhisattvavihārāṇāmekādaśānāṃ tāthāgatasya ca vihārasya hetumātre vartate hetu parigraheṇa  no tu tena kaścitu tadanyo bodhisattvavihāra ārabdho bhavati na pratilabdho na viśodhitaḥ /  kutaḥ punastathāgatavihāraḥ /  adhimukticaryāvihāriṇā punarbodhisattvena sarve bodhisattvavihārāstāthāgataśca vihāra ārabdhā bhavanti (Dutt 219)  no tu pratilabdhā na viśodhitāḥ /
tgt_original: 種性住菩薩，於餘一切菩薩十一住及如來住，為因轉、為因攝受，於餘菩薩非方便亦非得亦非淨，彼何況如來住。 解行住菩薩，於一切菩薩住及如來住，是方便而非得亦非清淨，唯得解行住及清淨向。

src_original: sa eva tvadhimukticaryāvihāraḥ pratilabdho bhavati /  tasyaiva cāyaṃ viśuddhaye pratipannaḥ /
tgt_original: 解行住淨已，得歡喜住前方便及即彼淨向，歡喜住淨已得增上戒住前方便及即彼淨向，如是廣說，乃至最上菩薩住當如是知。 最上菩薩住淨已，次第得如來住前方便頓得及淨，是為菩薩住如來住差別。

src_original: adhimukticaryāvihāre pariśuddhe pramuditavihāraṃ pūrvārabdhameva pratilabhate /

src_original: tasyaiva ca viśuddhaye pratipanno bhavati /  pramudita vihāre pariśuddhe 'dhiśīlavihāraṃ pūrvārabdhameva pratilabhate /  tasyaiva ca viśuddhaye pratipanno bhavati /  evaṃ vistareṇa yāvatparamaḥ paraniṣpanno bodhisattvavihāro veditavyaḥ /  parame pariniṣpanne bodhisattvavihāre pariśuddhe 'nantaraṃ pūrvārabdhasya tātathāgatasya vihārasya sakṛtpratilambho viśuddhiśca veditavyā /

src_original: tatra katamo bodhisattvasyādhicittavihāraḥ /  yo 'dhiśīlavihāra viśuddhinidānailaukikadhyānasamādhisamāpattibhirvihāraḥ /

tgt_original: 菩薩依世俗禪三摩提淨覺了真諦，正念處等三十七菩提分法觀察住。

src_original: tatra katamo bodhisattvasya satyapratisaṃyukto 'dhiprajñavihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 云何諦相應增上慧住？

src_original: yo bodhipakṣyapravicayaṃ niśritya yathāvatsatyāvabodhavihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩因依菩提分觀察，如實覺了真諦住。

src_original: tatra katamo bodhisattvasya pratītyasamutpādapravṛttinivṛttipratisaṃyukto 'dhiprajñavihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 云何緣起生滅相應增上慧住？

src_original: yastameva satyāvabodha[madhi]patiṃ kṛtvā tadajñānāt sahetukaduḥkhapravṛti /  pravicayaprabhāvitastajjñānācca sahetukaduḥkhanirodhapravicayaprabhāvito vihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩以真諦覺為增上已，以智觀察有因苦、有因苦滅智住。

src_original: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ sābhisaṃskāraḥ sābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 云何有行有開發無相住？

src_original: yastameva trividhamapyadhiprajñavihāramadhipatiṃ kṛtvā 'bhisaṃskāreṇābhogena niśchidranirantaraḥ sarvadharmeṣu tathatā-nirvikalpaprajñābhāvanā sahagato vihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩以三種增上慧為增上已，有行有開發不斷無間，一切法如，離諸妄想修慧俱住。

src_original: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ anabhisaṃskāro 'nābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 云何無行無開發無相住？

src_original: ebhiḥ pañcabhirākārairbodhisattvaḥ pariśuddhāṃ kathāṃ kathayati /
tgt_original: 如是五種，菩薩清淨說法。

src_original: (Dutt 220) yastasyaiva pūrvakasya nirnimittasya vihārasya bhāvanā-bāhulyāt svarasenaiva niśchidranirantara-vāhirmārgānugato vihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 即此無相住，多修淳至不斷無間，升進道隨順住。

src_original: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ pravisaṃvidvihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 云何無礙住？

src_original: yastameva supariśuddhaṃ niścalaṃ prajñāsamādhiṃ niśritya mahāmativaipulyamanuprāptasya  pareṣāṃ dharmasamākhyānānuttaryamārabhya dharmāṇāṃ paryāyārtha-nirvacanaprabhedapravicayavihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩即依彼快淨不動智慧三昧，得智慧增廣，為人說法無上方便，於法義辭分別觀住。

src_original: tatra katamo bodhisattvasya paramo vihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 云何最上菩薩住？

src_original: yatra sthito bodhisattvo bodhisattvamārganiṣṭhāgato 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau mahādharmābhiṣekaprāpta ekajātipratibaddho vā bhavati caramabhaviko vā /
tgt_original: 菩薩住彼究竟菩薩道阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，大法灌頂，一生相續。

src_original: yasya vihārasyānantaraṃ saṃhitamevānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvabuddhakāryaṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 若最後身於此住，次第得無上菩提，作一切佛事。

src_original: tatrādhimukticaryāvihāre [bodhisattvo] bodhisattvabhāvanāyāṃ parīttakārī bhavati cchidrakārī aniyatakārī punarlābhaparihāṇitaḥ /  pramuditavihāre bodhisattvastasyāmeva bodhisattvabhāvanāyāṃ vipulakārī bhavatyacchidrakārī niyatakārī yathāpratilabdhāparihāṇitaḥ /  yathā pramuditavihāre evaṃ yāvat triṣvadhiprajñavihāreṣu /
tgt_original: 住解行住菩薩，於菩薩修少行、斷行、不決定修行，所得有退轉。 歡喜住乃至三種增上慧住，於菩薩修廣行、不斷行、決定行，所得不退轉。

src_original: pratharma nirnimittaṃ vihāramupādāya yāvatparamādbodhisattvavihārādbodhisattvo bodhisattvabhāvanāyāṃ apramāṇakārī bhavatyacchidrakārī niyatakārī ca /
tgt_original: 有行有開發無相住乃至最上菩薩住，於菩薩修無量行、不斷行、決定行，所得不退轉。

src_original: ta ete samāsato viṃśatirākārā bhavanti /
tgt_original: 前後略說二十種： 一者時； 二者頓； 三者次第； 四者相續；

src_original: tatrādhimukticaryāvihāre bodhisattva-nirnimittabhāvanāyāḥ samārambho veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 解行住菩薩，無相修方便。

src_original: pramuditavihāre 'ghiśīlādhicittādhiprajñavihāreṣu ca tasyā bodhisattva-nirnimittabhāvanāyāḥ pratilambho veditavyaḥ /  prathame 'nimittavihāre samudāgamo dvitīye 'nimittavihāre bodhisattva-nirnimittabhāvanāyāḥ pariśuddhirveditavyā /
tgt_original: 歡喜住乃至增上慧住菩薩行無相，修第一無相住，升進第二無相住菩薩無相修淨無礙住。

src_original: pratisaṃvidvihāre parame ca vihāre tasyā eva bodhisattva-nirnimitta-bhāvanāyāḥ phalapratyanubhāvanā veditavyā /
tgt_original: 最上菩薩住菩薩，無相修果。

src_original: adhimukticaryāvihāre vartamānasya bodhisattvasya ke ākārāḥ kāni liṃgāni kāni nimittāni bhavanti /
tgt_original: 解行住菩薩行解行時，有何行？ 何狀貌？ 何相？

src_original: adhimukticaryā-vihāre vartamāno bodhisattvaḥ pratisaṃkhyānabaliko bhavati /  bodhisattvakṛtyaprayogeṣu pratisaṃkhyāya prajñayā prayujyate /  no tu prakṛtyā tanmayatayā /  dṛḍhāyāḥ sthirāyāḥ avivartayā bodhisattvabhāvanāyāḥ alābhī bhavati /
tgt_original: 解行住菩薩行解行時，以思惟力，菩薩所作方便思惟慧修習，不能性自真實堅固不動不退，不得菩薩不退轉修。

src_original: yathā bhāvanāyā evaṃ bhāvanāphalasya vividhānāṃ pratisaṃvidabhijñāvimokṣasamādhisamāpattīnām /  (Dutt 221) pañca ca bhayānyasamatikrānto bhavati /  ajīvikābhayamaślokabhayaṃ maraṇabhayaṃ durgatibhayaṃ pariṣadśāradyabhayaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 如修，如是修果，種種無礙神通解脫、三昧正受，悉皆不得，亦未離五恐畏，所謂不活畏、惡名畏、死畏、惡道畏、大眾畏。

src_original: pratisaṃkhyāya ca sattvārtheṣu prayujyate na prakṛtyanukampā-prematayā /  ekadā ca sattveṣu mithyāpi pratipadyate kāyena vācā manasā /  ekadā viṣayeṣvapyadhyavasito bhavati /  ekadā āgṛhīta-pariṣkāratāyāmapi saṃdṛśyate /
tgt_original: 思惟修習利益眾生，不能性自哀愍，或時起邪身口意業、有時貪著五欲境界、有時慳惜所有眾具。

src_original: śraddhāgāmī ca bhavati pareṣāṃ buddhabodhisattvānām /  no tu pratyātmaṃ tattvajño bhavati yaduta tathāgataṃ vā ārabhya dharmaṃ vā saṃghaṃ  vā tattvārthaṃ vā buddhabodhisattvaprabhāvaṃ vā hetuṃ vā phalaṃ vā prāptavyaṃ vā  'rthaṃ prāptyupāyaṃ vā gocaraṃ vā /  parīttena ca śrutamayacintāmayena jñānena samanvāgato bhavati nāpramāṇena /
tgt_original: 由佛菩薩生於淨信，不能自起真實智慧，所謂三寶功德真實義、諸佛菩薩神通力、若因若果、若得義、若得方便、若境界，少聞少思，智慧成就不能無量。

src_original: tadapi cāsyaikadā saṃpramuṣyate /  saṃpramoṣadharmo ca bhavati /  duḥkhayā ca dhandhābhijñayā bodhisattva-pratipadā samanvāgato bhavati /  na ca tīvracchando bhavati mahābodhau /  nottaptavīryo na gambhīrasusanniviṣṭaprasādaḥ /
tgt_original: 或時失念成就菩薩遲喜之道，不能專心求大菩提熾然精進深樂淨信。

src_original: triṣu ca sthāneṣu muṣita-smṛtirbhavati /  viṣayeṣu manāpāmanāpeṣu rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmeṣvekadā viparyastacittatāyāḥ /  upapattau tatra tatrātmabhāvāntare pratyājātasya pūrvakātmabhāvavismaraṇāt /  uddiṣṭānāmudgṛhītānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ cirakṛtacirabhāṣitasya caikadā vismaraṇāt /  evameṣu triṣu sthāneṣu muṣitasmṛtirbhavati /
tgt_original: 或於三處忘失正念，所謂於可喜不可喜色聲香味觸法或時顛倒受生，彼身中間，或受誦持法久作久說，以此因緣忘失正念。

src_original: ekadā ca medhāvī bhavati dharmāṇāmudgrahaṇadhāraṇārthapraveśasamarthaḥ /  ekadā na tathā /
tgt_original: 或時黠慧受持正法善解其義，或時不爾。

src_original: ekadā smṛtimān bhavati /  ekadā muṣitasmṛtijātīyaḥ /  na ca sattvānāṃ yathāvadvinayopāyābhijño bhavati /  nāpyātmano buddhadharmābhinirhāropāyābhijñaḥ /  haṭhena ca pareṣāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /  avavādānuśāsanīṃ vā pravartayati /
tgt_original: 或不善知隨宜調伏方便，或復不知自生佛法方便，率意說法教授教誡。

src_original: sā cāsya haṭhena pravartitā na yathābhūtamājñāya /
tgt_original: 以率意故，不如實知。

src_original: ekadā ca vandhyā bhavatyekadā cāvandhyā /  rātrikṣiptānāmiva śarāṇāṃ yadṛcchāsiddhitāmupādāya /
tgt_original: 或時虛說，不時不中，如暗中射或中不中。

src_original: kālena satkṛtyānupūrvamanusandhyanusahitaṃ harṣayatā roca[yatā] toṣayatā utsāhayatā
tgt_original: 五者堪耐； 六者歡喜； 七者欲； 八者喜； 九者勸；

src_original: ekadā ca cittamapyutpāditaṃ mahābodhādutsṛjati /  ekadā ca bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānān nivartate notsahate vā /
tgt_original: 或時退捨大菩提心，或時起菩提心而復退捨，或時受菩薩戒而復還捨。

src_original: ekadā sattvārthakriyāprayukto 'pi khedamantarā kṛtvā tasmātsattvārthakriyāprayogāt pratinivartate /
tgt_original: 或時能作利益眾生成就而復厭倦，是故利益方便退。

src_original: āśayataścātmanaḥ sukhakāmo bhavati pratisaṃkhyāya ca parasukhakāmaḥ /
tgt_original: 常樂自樂，思惟然後欲樂眾生。

src_original: bodhisattvaskhaliteṣu ca parijñābahulo bhavati /  no tu parijñāya parijñāyāśeṣa-prahāṇavān punaḥ punaḥ skhalitādhyācāratayā /
tgt_original: 自知缺減，而不能斷令無有餘，更數缺減。

src_original: ekadā neyaśca bhavatyasmādbodhisattvapiṭakadharmavinayāt /  (Dutt 222) ekadā gambhīrāmudārāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā utvrasyati /  bhavati cāsya cetaso vikampitatvaṃ vimatiḥ sandehaśca /  sarveṇa ca sarvaṃ mahākaruṇāsamudācāravivarjito bhavati sattveṣu /  alpena ca hitasukhopasaṃhāreṇa sattveṣu pratyupasthito bhavati /
tgt_original: 或時於菩薩法藏信受他語，或時聞說深妙之法而生恐怖動搖疑問，或時於一切眾生遠離大悲，少能安樂利益眾生不能廣大。

src_original: na vipulena nāprameyeṇa ca sarvāsu paripūrṇāsu yathānirdiṣṭāsu bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣate /  na ca sarvaiḥ paripūrṇairyathānirdiṣṭairbodhisattvaliṅgaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati /  na ca sarveṣu yathānirdiṣṭeṣu bodhipakṣaprayogeṣu paripūrṇeṣu saṃdṛśyate /  dūre cānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodherātmānaṃ pratyeti /
tgt_original: 不能如上所說學菩薩所學，不能滿足菩薩相、菩薩翼方便、菩薩真淨，去阿耨多羅三藐三菩提遠。

src_original: itīmānyevaṃbhāgīyāni liṅgāni nimittānīme ākārā adhimukticaryāvihāre vartamānasya bodhisattvasya veditavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 如是等行相，名解行住菩薩行相。

src_original: na ca tathā nirvāṇe 'syādhyāśayaḥ sanniviṣṭo bhavati yathā saṃsārasaṃsṛtau /  uttaptairacalaiśca kuśalairbodhipakṣyairdharmairasamanvāgato bhavati /
tgt_original: 不能淨心深樂涅槃捨離生死，不動善根菩提分法悉不成就。

src_original: adhimātrāyāmeva kṣāntau vartamānasyaiṣāmākāraliṅganimittānāmaśeṣaprahāṇāmanantarañca pramuditavihārapraveśo bodhisattvasya veditavyaḥ pratilambhayogena  tasyāsya pramuditavihāravihāriṇa ete [sarva]dharmāḥ sarvena sarvaṃ na bhavanti ye 'dhimukticaryāvihāra-vihāriṇa ākhyātāḥ /  etadviparyayeṇa ca sarve śuklapakṣyā dharmāḥ saṃvidyante /  yairayaṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ śuddhāśaya ityucyate /
tgt_original: 如是行上忍時斷此行相，次第入歡喜住，方便得歡喜住，彼一切法悉無復有住解行住所說相違，一切不染污分法成就，名淨心住。

src_original: adhimukticaryāvihāre mṛddhyāṃ kṣāntyāṃ vartamānasya bodhisattvasyaiṣāṃ yathā nirdiṣṭānāmākāraliṅga-nimittānāmadhimātratā veditavyā /  madhyāyāṃ kṣāntau vartamānasya [madhyatā] veditavyā /  adhimātrāyāṃ kṣāntau vartamānasya bodhisattvasyaiṣāmākāraliṅganimittānāṃ mṛdutā tanutvaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 解行住菩薩行下忍時，如上所說行相增，行中忍時中，行上忍時下。

src_original: kiñcāpyadhimukticaryāvihāre 'pi vartamānasya bodhisattvasya mṛdumadhyādhimātrayogenottarottarā śuddhiradhimokṣasyāsti /  na tvasau adhyāśayaśuddhirityucyate /
tgt_original: 解行住菩薩有軟中上方便展轉淨解脫，非無罪清淨。

src_original: tat kasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: tathā hi so 'dhimokṣa ebhiranekavidhairupakleśairupakliṣṭaḥ pravartate /
tgt_original: 彼解脫有種種上煩惱生故。

src_original: pramuditavihārasthitasya tu bodhisattvasya sarveṣāmeṣāmadhimokṣopakleśānāṃ prahāṇānnirūpakleśaḥ śuddho 'dhimokṣaḥ pravartate /
tgt_original: 歡喜菩薩，解脫上煩惱、斷離煩惱，清淨解脫生。

src_original: tatrapramuditavihāre vartamānasya bodhisattvasya ke ākārāḥ kāni liṅgāni kāni nimittāni veditavyāni /
tgt_original: 云何歡喜住菩薩行相？

src_original: iha bodhisattvo 'dhimukticaryāvihārāt pramuditavihāramanupraveśana-pūrvakañca bodhisattvapraṇidhānamanuttarāyāṃ
tgt_original: 是菩薩於解行住當入歡喜住，是菩薩先善入無上菩提願，善入菩提方便修習決定。

src_original: samyaksaṃbodhau asupratividdhabodhya supratividdhabodhyupāyaṃ yadbhūyasā parapratyayagāsuniścitaṃ (Dutt 223)  prahāyānyadabhinavaṃ ṣaḍbhirākāraiḥ su[vi]niścitaṃ pratyātmaṃ bhāvānāmayaṃ bodhisattvapraṇidhānamutpādayati /
tgt_original: 若復緣他而進捨不決定，未習得六種善決定。 緣自力修慧菩薩願生。

src_original: sarvaṃ tadanyaśulkapraṇidhāna-samatikrāntamatulyamasādhāraṇaphalam /
tgt_original: 一者超餘一切淨願無等不共；

src_original: laukikaṃ ca tatsarva[loka]viṣaya-samatikrāntaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 二者亦是世間亦出世間一切境界；

src_original: ekakṣaṇa[mātraṃ] samutpanne api tasmin praṇidhāne dharmaprakṛtiḥ sā tādṛśī yā 'prameyaśulkadharmeṣṭaphalā bhavati bodhisattvānām /
tgt_original: 四者發一念願，法性自然無量淨果不動轉；

src_original: sarvasattvaduḥkhaparitrāṇānugatatvāt sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāsādhāraṇam /
tgt_original: 三者隨度諸眾生苦，不共一切聲聞緣覺；

src_original: viśeṣabhāgīyañca tadaparāntakoṭīpatitam /  mahābodhiniṣṭhaṃ tat /  punaretatsuviniścitaṃ bodhisattvapraṇidhānaṃ cittotpāde ityucyate /
tgt_original: 六者勝進分究竟大菩提願，是名菩薩決定願。

src_original: nirvikārañca tatpraṇidhāna[ma]kṣayam /  nāsya pratilabdhasya kenacitparyāyeṇa parihāṇiranyathābhāvo vā upalabhyate /
tgt_original: 五者不變異無盡願，終無能令退轉變異；

src_original: sa punareṣa cittotpādo bodhisattvasya samāsataścaturbhirākārairveditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 又彼菩薩發心當知四種：

src_original: katamaiścaturbhiḥ /  ādita eva tāvatkīdṛśānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ taccittamutpadyate /
tgt_original: 初何等眾生發心？

src_original: kiñcālambyotpadyate /  kīdṛśañca kiṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kenātmanā utpadyate /  utpanne ca tasmiścitte ko 'nuśaṃso bhavati /
tgt_original: 緣何發心？ 發心有何相？ 發心有何福利。 此四種發心當知。

src_original: ityebhiścaturbhirākāraiḥ sa cittotpādo veditavyaḥ /  tatrādhimukticaryāvihāriṇāṃ sarvākārasūpacitakuśalamūlānāṃ samāsataḥ samyagbodhisattvacaryāniryātānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ taccittamutpadyate /
tgt_original: 彼解行住菩薩，一切種善修習善根，略說正菩提行出生而發心，是名略說眾生發心。

src_original: tadbodhisattvānāñcittamutpadyate /  samyagāśu ca sarvākārasarvabodhisaṃbhārānukūlaṃ sarvasattveṣu sarvākārabodhisattvakṛtyānukūlamanuttara-samyaksaṃbodhisvayaṃbhūjñānapratilambhānukūlaṃ  sarvākārabuddhakṛtyakaraṇānukūlaṃ taccittamutpadyate /
tgt_original: 緣發心正速疾一切種一切菩提眾具隨順，菩薩於眾生、一切種菩薩所作隨順，無上菩提得自覺知隨順，一切佛事隨順而發心。
