src_original: prītataro bhavatyekadharmapadaśravaṇena samyaksaṃbuddhopanītena bodhisattvacaryāpariśodhakena  na sarvaśakratva[-māratva-]brahmatva-lokapālatva-cakravartitva-samucchrayapratilambhaiḥ /
tgt_original: 若聞一偈正向佛道，淨修菩薩行勝得一切轉輪聖王、護世、帝釋、魔梵諸王。

src_original: sa cedenaṃ kaścidevaṃ vadet /
tgt_original: 若有人言：

src_original: evamahamidaṃ [dharmapadaṃ] samyaksaṃbuddhopanītaṃ sarvabodhisattvacaryāpariśodhakaṃ  te 'nuśrāvayiṣyāmi sa cenmahatyāmagnikhadāyāmātmānaṃ prakṣipasi mahāntañca duḥkhopakramaṃ saṃpratīcchasīti /
tgt_original: 「我有此法正向佛道，淨修菩薩行，若能投大火坑受大苦者，當為汝說。

src_original: śrutvāsyaivaṃ bhavet /  utsahāmyahamasya dharmapadasyārthe pūrvavat trisāhasramahāsāhasrapratimāyāmāpyagnikhadāyāṃ brahmalokādātmānamutsraṣṭuṃ prāgeva pratyavarāyām
tgt_original: 」菩薩聞已歡喜樂受作是念： 「若聞正法正向佛道淨修菩薩行，正使三千大千世界大火熾然乃至梵天，尚入其中，況復小火。

src_original: nārakaduḥkhasaṃvāsairapyasmābhirbuddhadharmāḥ paryeṣitavyāḥ prāgeva prākṛtairduḥkhopakramairiti /
tgt_original: 經地獄苦尚求佛法，況復小苦。

src_original: evaṃrūpeṇa vīryārambheṇa dharmān paryeṣyaivaṃ yoniśo manasikaroti /  yathā dharmānnudharmapratipattiṃ buddhadharmānugatāṃ na vyañjanasvaramātraviśaddhimiti
tgt_original: 」如是精進方便思惟求法，如法次法向隨順佛法，不以文字音聲清淨。

src_original: viditvā tadeva śrutaṃ niśritya dharmanimittāni samyagālambanīkurvan viviktaṃ kāmairvistareṇa  prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthañca dhyānaṃ laukikaṃ catasra ārūpyasamāpattīrlaukikīścatvāryapramāṇāni  pañca cābhijñā upasaṃpadya viharati /  sa tairbahulaṃ vihṛtya tāni dhyānāni samādhīn samāpattīḥ vyāvartayitvā praṇidhānavaśena kāmadhātau yatra sattvārthaṃ bodhipakṣadharmaparipūriṃ ca paśyati tatropapadyate /  na tvevāsya tadvaśenopapattirbhavati /
tgt_original: 作是念已，因聞正緣法相，離欲惡不善法，得世俗四禪、四無色、四無量、五神通，捨諸禪三昧正受，以願力故來生欲界，觀彼眾生能滿菩提分法者而生彼處。

src_original: tasya kāmavītarāgatvātkāmabandhanāni prahīṇāni bhavanti dhyānasamādhisamāpattivyāvartanatvād (Dutt 231)  bhavabandhanāni /
tgt_original: 離欲故，欲縛斷； 捨諸禪正受故，有縛斷。

src_original: tadyathā tadeva suvarṇakuśalasya karmārasya hastagataṃ prakṣīṇamalakaṣāyamapi samadharaṇamavatiṣṭhate tulyamānam /  evamasya sā kuśala mūlaviśuddhirveditavyā /
tgt_original: 譬如真金數被鍊治離垢明淨，菩薩善根轉增清淨亦復如是。

src_original: adhimukticaryā-bhūmāvevāsya pūrvameva dharmatathatādhimokṣād dṛṣṭikṛtabandhanāni prahīṇāni bhavanti /  mithyārāgadveṣamohāścāsyātyantaṃ na pravartante /  tasya buddhadarśanaṃ vistareṇa kuśalamūlaviśuddhiḥ pūrvavadveditavyā /  tatrāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
tgt_original: 解行住先如是法，如解脫見縛斷耶，貪恚癡畢竟不行，見佛善根清淨如前說。

src_original: upapattitaśca śakro bhavati devendro yadbhūyasā /  kuśalaḥ sattvānāṃ kāmarāgavinivartanatāyai /  prabhāve 'pi yatra pūrvake vihāre sahasramākhyātaṃ tatreha śatasahasraṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 若更受生得帝釋身，以離欲善法調伏眾生，神力勝前諸住百千萬倍。

src_original: sattvaduḥkhavimokṣopāya-samyak-paryeṣaṇataśca mahāgauravadharmaparyeṣaṇataśca dharmānudharmapratipatti-laukikadhyānasamādhisamāpattyabhijñābhinirhāra-vihārataśca  tadvyāvartanaṃ praṇidhāya yatra kāmopapattitaśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhitaścopapattitaśca  prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ /  vistaranirdeśaḥ punaryathāsūtraṃ tadyathā daśabhūmike prabhākaryāṃ bhūmau /
tgt_original: 所謂十種思惟成就入一切行，眾生界大菩提正分別真實苦解脫方便，正求大恭敬求法，法次法向巧便出生諸禪三昧，正受神通捨於諸禪，以願力故隨所欲生，見佛善根清淨受生神力，廣說如修多羅十地明地說。

src_original: śrutākāradharmālokāvabhāsa-samādhyālokāvabhāsa-prabhāvitatvādasyā bhūmeḥ prabhākarītyucyate /  adhyātmaṃ cittaviśuddhimupādāya sā prabhā saṃbhavati tasmātsa vihāraḥ adhicitta ityucyate /
tgt_original: 聞行法，行法明照，三昧明照故名明地，內心清淨故名增上意住。

src_original: yenārthena prabhākarī bhūmiḥ tenaivārthenādhicittavihāro veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 彼明地即此增上意住。

src_original: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ bodhipakṣyapratisaṃyukto 'dhiprajñavihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩菩提分法相應增上慧住？

src_original: iha bodhisattvena pūrvamevādhicittavihāre daśa dharmālokapraveśāḥ śrutaparyeṣṭimadhipattiṃ kṛtvā pratilabdhā bhavanti /  yeṣāmadhimātratvātparipūrṇatvādadhicittavihāramatikramya prathamamadhiprajñavihāraṃ praviśati /
tgt_original: 是菩薩於增上意住，得十法明增上滿足已，入初增上慧住。

src_original: [te] punardaśa dharmālokapraveśā granthato yathā sūtrameva veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 十法明如修多羅說。

src_original: ye ca prajñapyante yatra ca prajñapyante yena ca prajñapyante te ca yatsamāḥ paramārthaḥ  yasya ca saṃkleśa-vyavadānaśca saṃkliśyante viśuddhante ca yatpratiyusaṃktena saṃkleśena  saṃkliśyante yayā cānuttarayā viśuddhyā (Dutt 232)  viśudhyante /
tgt_original: 謂平等第一義，若煩惱惱若清淨淨、煩惱繫惱無上清淨淨。

src_original: ityayaṃ samāsārthasteṣāṃ dharmālokanirdeśānāṃ veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 是名略說法明義。

src_original: sa tasmin vihāre vyavasthitaḥ /  abhedyāśayatā pūrvaṅgamairyathāsūtrameva daśākāreṇa jñānaparipākena [jñāna-]paripācakairdharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati tathāgatakule tadātmaka-dharmapratilambhāt /
tgt_original: 住此住者，十智成熟，不壞淨為首，如修多羅說。 十智成熟生如來家，逮得自在十智觀察。

src_original: sarvākārāṃ bodhisattvāpekṣāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā smṛtyupasthānapramukhān saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān bhāvayanti yathāsūtrameva /
tgt_original: 為增上已，修念處等三十七菩提分法，如修多羅說。

src_original: tasya tāndharmānupāyaparigraheṇa bhāvayataḥ satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ susūkṣmāpyasya skandhadhātvāyatanānyabhiniveśaḥ sarveñjitāni cātyantāsamudācārataḥ prahīyante /
tgt_original: 修集彼法，故身見等離陰界入，微細愛著畢竟不生。

src_original: teṣāṃ prahāṇād yāni tathāgata-vivarṇitāni karmāṇi tāni sarveṇa sarvaṃ nādhyācarati /  yāni punastathāgata-varṇitāni tāni sarvāpyanuvartante yathāvat /
tgt_original: 如來不稱歎業一切不行，所稱歎者一切隨順。

src_original: tathābhūtaśca bhūyasā mātrayā snigdhamṛdukarmaṇyacittaśca bhavati tathā citrākārasuviśuddhacittaśca /  kṛtajñakṛtaveditādibhistadāśayānuguṇairvicitraiḥ śukla-dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati /
tgt_original: 如如真實心轉柔和，修種種行其心快淨，知恩報恩隨順功德，種種淨法皆悉成就。

src_original: uttari ca bhūmipariśodhakāni karmāṇi samanveṣamāṇo mahāvīryārambhaprāpto bhavati /  tasya tannidānamāśayādhyāśayādhimuktidhātuḥ paripūryate /  tannidānaṃ cāsaṃhāryo bhavati avikampyaḥ sarvatīrthyamāraśāsanapratyarthikabhūtaiḥ /
tgt_original: 修上地業得大精進，因彼精進淨心深心信解滿足，因彼正法外道魔怨不能傾動。

src_original: pūrvavacca buddhadarśanaṃ vistareṇa kuśalamūlaviśuddhirveditavyā /
tgt_original: 見佛善根清淨如前說。

src_original: tatrāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ /  tadyathā tadeva suvarṇakuśalena karmakāreṇālaṃkāravidhikṛtamasaṃhāryaṃ bhavatyakṛtābharaṇairjātarupaiḥ /
tgt_original: 譬如真金為莊嚴具，餘金不及；

src_original: evamasya bodhisattvasya tāni kuśalamūlānyasaṃhāryāṇi bhavanti tadanyabālavihārasthitairbodhisattvakuśalamūlaiḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩善根亦復如是，勝餘下地菩薩功德。

src_original: tadyathā ca maṇiratnamuktālokamasaṃhāryaṃ bhavati tadanyairmaṇibhiḥ /  sarvavātodakavṛṣṭibhiścānācchedyaprabhaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 如育多摩尼光明清淨，餘珠不及，一切風雨所不能滅。

src_original: evamayaṃ bodhisattvo 'saṃhāryo bhavati sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ /  anācchedyaprajñālokaśca bhavati sarvamārapratyarthikaiḥ /
tgt_original: 如是菩薩，下地菩薩聲聞緣覺智慧光明所不能及，魔怨煩惱皆不能壞。

src_original: upapattitaśca suyāmo bhavati devarājaḥ /  kuśalaḥ sattvānāṃ satkāyadṛṣṭivinivartanatāyai /  prabhāve ca yatra pūrvavihāre śatasahasraguṇaṃ samākhyātaṃ tatrāsmin koṭisamākhyātaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 若更受生作焰摩天王，以諸善法教化眾生破身見等，神通力勝於前住百千萬倍。

src_original: ayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ bodhipakṣyādhiprajñavihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 是名略說菩提分法增上慧住。

src_original: dharmālokapraveśaniṣpattiṃ pratilābhataśca jñānaparipācanataśca bodhipakṣyadharmaniṣevaṇataśca  satkāyadṛṣṭyādi-sarvābhiniveśeñjitaprahāṇataśca pratiṣiddhānujñātakarmavivarjana-niṣevaṇataśca
tgt_original: 所謂十法明成就，入十種成熟修菩提分法身見等，一切著斷制業聽業若離若修。

src_original: tannidānaṃ cittamārdavataśca tadanukūlaguṇasamṛddhitaśca (Dutt 233)
tgt_original: 因彼心轉柔和，隨順功德皆悉成就，修上地業得大精進。

src_original: vistaranirdeśaḥ punastadyathādaśabhūmike 'rciṣmatī bhūminirdeśe bodhipakṣyā dharmāstasyāṃ bhūmau jñānārcibhūtāḥ samyagdharmadeśanā prajñāvabhāsakarakālokānām  tasmātsā bhūmirarciṣmatītyucyate /
tgt_original: 彼地菩提分法智焰種，正說法智明照世間，是故彼地名為焰。

src_original: bhūmipariśodhaka-karmaparyeṣṭimārabhya mahāvīryārambhataśca tannidānamāśayādhyāśayādhimuktiviśodhanataśca  tannidānaṃ sarvaśāsanapratyarthikāsaṃhāryataśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhitaścopapattitaśca  prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 因彼精進淨心深心信解清淨，因彼正法魔怨不動，見佛善根清淨受生神力，廣說如修多羅十地焰地說。

src_original: saiva ceha bodhipakṣyāprajñāvabhāsakara-dhiprajñavihāra ityucyate /
tgt_original: 彼焰地即此菩提分法相應增上慧住。

src_original: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ satyapratisaṃyukto dvitīyo 'dhiprajñavihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩諦相應增上慧住？

src_original: iha bodhisattvaḥ pūrvake 'dhiprajñavihāre [yā] daśa viśuddhāśayasamatāḥ pratilabdhāḥ tāsāmadhimātrātvāt paripūrṇatvāt dvitīyamadhiprajñavihāraṃ praviśati /
tgt_original: 是菩薩於初增上慧住，得十平等淨心。 增上滿足已，入第二增上慧住。

src_original: daśa viśuddhāśayasamatā yathāsūtraṃ granthato veditavyāḥ /  asamaiśca buddhairbuddhāḥ samāḥ /
tgt_original: 十平等淨心，如修多羅說。

src_original: tadanyasattvadhātusamatikrāntāḥ /  yaiśca dharmairyathā samāḥ /  ityayaṃ samāsārtho viśuddhāśayasamatānāṃ veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 謂無等等覺，超餘眾生，於法如等，是名略說平等淨心義。

src_original: so 'sminvihāre vyavasthitaḥ /  bhūyo jñānavaiśeṣikatāṃ prārthayamānaḥ catvāryasatyāni daśabhirākārairyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
tgt_original: 住此住者智慧增進，於四聖諦有十種如實知，如修多羅說。

src_original: granthato yathāsūtrameva sarvaṃ veditavyam /  parasaṃjñāpanatāṃ [pratyātmajñānatāṃ] tadubhayādhiṣṭhānatāṃ cārabhya yacca deśyate /  sūtravinayamātṛkāmārabhya yena ca deśyate /
tgt_original: 若緣他、若自知、若俱知，如修多羅、毘尼摩得勒伽說。

src_original: sa evaṃ satyakuśalaḥ sarvañca saṃskāragataṃ prajñayā samyag vidūṣayati /  sattvadhātau ca karūṇāśayaṃ vivardhayati /
tgt_original: 知是諦方便，破壞一切有為行，於諸眾生大悲增長。

src_original: pūrvāntāparāntataśca bālasattvamithyāpratipattiṃ samyak pratividhyati /  teṣāñca vimokṣāya mahāpuṇyajñānasambhāraparigrahe cittaṃ praṇidhatte /  tadgatāśayaṃ ca samudānayati /
tgt_original: 前際後際於四真諦愚惑邪向，令入解脫功德智慧眾具。

src_original: yāni ca sattvānugrāhakāni laukikāni lipiśāstramudrāgaṇanādīni yathāsūtrameva śilpakarmaṃsthānāni tāni sarvāṇyābhinirharati sattvakaruṇa[ta]yā  (Dutt 234) anupūrveṇa yāvat bodhipratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ laukikavyavahārānukūlatayā dāridrya-nāśopāyatayā
tgt_original: 攝眾生故修世俗書論，如修多羅說。 以工巧業一切，出生悲心，誘進安立菩提，隨順世間方便惠施。

src_original: smṛtimatigatipramukhaiḥ prabhūtairvicitrairguṇaiḥ samṛddhaśca /  anya manasikārāpagataḥ /  citraiḥ paripācanopāyai sattvān paripācayati /
tgt_original: 成熟修行正願正念正智正說等種種真實功德，增長無餘，思惟一切種，成熟方便成熟眾生。

src_original: dhātuvaiṣamyamanuṣyāmanuṣyopasaṃhṛtopadravapraśamanatayā 'navadyakrīḍārativastūpasaṃhārato  dharmarativyāvartanatayā sannivāsopakaraṇārthināmalpakṛcchreṇa sannivāsopakaraṇopasaṃharaṇatayā
tgt_original: 四大錯亂非人所持令得休息，無罪戲樂眾具饒益，因此饒益引令樂法，以住止眾具而為饒益。

src_original: rājacaurādyupadravaparitrāṇatayā sthānāsthānaprayogānujñāpratiṣedhanatayā maṅgalyāmaṅgalyavastvādānatyāgasanniyojanatayā  dṛṣṭe dharme parasparānabhidrohasamparāyāviparītābhyudayamārgopadeśanatayā /
tgt_original: 王賊所惱度令安隱，處非處方便若聽若制吉非吉事惠施成就，現法展轉清淨饒益，諸顛倒者為說正道。

src_original: ityayaṃ teṣāṃ sattvānugrāhakānāṃ śilpakarmasthānānāṃ samāsārtho veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 是名攝受眾生世俗工巧平等義。

src_original: tadyathā tadeva svarṇakuśalena karmakāreṇa musāragalva-mṛṣṭaṃ pratyarpitamatulyatayā 'saṃhāryaṃ bhavati tadanyaiḥ suvarṇaiḥ /
tgt_original: 譬如真金眾寶廁填，光明清淨勝於餘金。

src_original: evamayaṃ bodhisattvo 'saṃhāryo bhavati sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ tadanyabhūmisthitaiśca bodhisattvaiḥ /
tgt_original: 如是菩薩智慧方便，勝餘菩薩聲聞緣覺。

src_original: tadyathā candrasūryanakṣatrāṇāmābhā asaṃhāryā ca bhavati sarva vātamaṇḍalaiḥ /  [sarva]vātavāhā sādhāraṇā ca bhavati /
tgt_original: 譬如日月宮殿，一切風輪不能令失。

src_original: evamevāsya bodhisattvasya sā prajñā asaṃhāryā bhavati sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ /  laukikakriyā sādhāraṇā ca bhavati /
tgt_original: 如是菩薩智慧方便，不為世法之所毀壞。

src_original: upapattitaḥ saṃtuṣito bhavati devarājaḥ /  kuśalaḥ sarvatīrthyavinivartanatāyai /  prabhāvaśca koṭīśatasahasrasaṃkhyā nirdeśato veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 若更受生為兜率天王，以諸善法破壞一切外道邪法，神通力勝於前住億百千倍。

src_original: ayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ satyapratisaṃyukto 'dhiprajñavihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 是名略說諦相應增上慧住。

src_original: śuddhāśayasamatā-niṣpatti-praveśataśca upāyasatyavyavacāraṇā-prativivardhanataśca  sarvasaṃskāravidūṣaṇataśca kārūṇyavivardhanataśca tadarthaṃ puṇyajñānasaṃbhāropacayapraṇidhānaprayogataśca  smṛtimatigatyādiguṇavivṛddhitaścānanyamanasikāra-sarvākāra-sattvaparipācanābhiyogataśca  laukikaśilpābhinirhārataśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhitaścopapattitaśca prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ /  vistaranirdeśataḥ punastadyathā daśabhūmike sudurjayāyāṃ bhūmau sattveṣu niścayajñānaṃ sudurjayam /  tacceha paridīpitam /
tgt_original: 所謂平等淨心成就，入諦觀增長破壞諸行，於諸眾生大悲增長，功德智慧眾具成熟，正願正念正智正說等功德增長無餘，思惟一切種成熟方便，成就眾生工巧出生，見佛善根清淨受生神力，廣說如修多羅十地難勝地說。

src_original: tasmātsā bhumiḥ sudurjayetyucyate /
tgt_original: 決定智慧難勝，是故彼地名為難勝。

src_original: tenaiva cārthena satyapratisaṃyukto 'dhiprajñavihāro draṣṭavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 彼難勝地即此諦相應增上慧住。

src_original: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ pratītyasamutpādapratisaṃyukto 'dhiprajñavihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩緣起相應增上慧住？

src_original: iha bodhisattvena pūrvameva satyapratisaṃyukte adhiprajñavihāre daśa dharmasamatāḥ pratilabdhaḥ (Dutt 235) bhavanti /  yathāsūtraṃ granthatastā veditavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 是菩薩於諦相應增上慧住，得十平等法。

src_original: yathā yathā śamathavipaśyanābhiratiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate tathā tathā śamatho vipaśyanā ca pariśudhyataḥ /
tgt_original: 如是如是樂住止觀，如是如是止觀清淨；

src_original: tāsāmadhimatratvātparipūrṇatvādidaṃ vihāramanupraviśati /
tgt_original: 增上滿足已，入第六住。

src_original: sarvadharmeṣu pāramārthikasya sataḥ svabhāvasya nirnimittasamatayā abhilāpābhisaṃskārapratibhāsasyālakṣaṇasamatayā
tgt_original: 一者一切法第一義自性平等； 二者無言說行無相平等；

src_original: tasyaivālakṣaṇatvāt svayamajātasamatayā hetuto 'nutpannasamatā svayaṃ hetu[ta]ścānuptannatvādatyantamādiśāntasamatayā
tgt_original: 三者無生平等； 四者因緣不起平等； 五者畢竟寂滅平等；

src_original: vidyamāna[sya] vastugrāhakasya jñānasya niṣprapañcasamatayā ādānatyāgābhisaṃskāravigamasamatayā
tgt_original: 六者離諸虛偽平等； 七者一切行無取無捨平等；

src_original: ityayaṃ tāsāṃ daśānāṃ dharmasamatānāmarthavibhāgo veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 是名略說十平等法。

src_original: māyānirmitopamasamatayā nirvikalpajñānagocarasya svabhāvasya bhāvābhāvādvayasamatayā /
tgt_original: 九者妄想境界如幻如化平等； 十者妄想境界有無無二平等。

src_original: so 'sminvihāre sthitaḥ sattveṣu saṃvṛddhakaruṇo bodhau tīvracchandābhilāṣajātaḥ /  lokānāṃ saṃbhavañca vibhavañca sarvākārayā pratītyasamutpāda-samyagvyavacāraṇatayā vyavacārayati prajānāti /  pratītyasamutpādajñānasanniśritaṃ cāsya vimokṣamukhatrayamājātaṃ bhavati śūnyamanimittamapraṇihitam /  tato nidānaṃ cāsyātma-para-kāraka-vedakabhāvābhāvasaṃjñā na pravartante /
tgt_original: 住此住者，於諸眾生大悲增長，專樂菩提，知諸世間合散生滅緣起正行，了知依緣出生智慧，及三解脫門空無相無願，依三三昧離我我所，知者作者有性無性相。

src_original: sa evaṃ paramārthakuśalaḥ sattvasāpekṣaḥ yoniśaḥ pratividhyati kleśasaṃyogāt /  pratyayasāmagryācca saṃskṛtaṃ prakṛtidurbalamātmātmīyavirahitamanekadoṣaduṣṭaṃ pravartate na vinā kleśasaṃyogapratyayasāmagrīm /  tena mayā kleśasaṃyogapratyayasāmagrīṃ ca vikalīkartavyā cātmarakṣārtham /
tgt_original: 如是第一義方便，思惟眾生煩惱結縛，因緣和合有為危脆，著我我所生諸過惡，離煩惱結縛因緣。

src_original: na ca sarveṇa sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ vyupaśamayitavyaṃ sattvānugrahārtham /
tgt_original: 和合自護故，不滅一切有為。

src_original: tasyaivaṃ jñānakārūṇyānugatasyāsmin vihāre 'saṅgajñānābhimukho nāma prajñāpāramitāvihāraḥ abhisaṃmukhī bhavati /
tgt_original: 攝眾生故，如是智慧慈悲隨順，住無障礙解脫般若波羅蜜。

src_original: yathā yathā śamatho viśudhyati tathā tathā kāyaprasrabdhiścittaprasrabdhiḥ pṛthuvṛddhivaipulyatāṃ gacchati /
tgt_original: 如是如是止觀清淨，如是如是身心猗息漸漸增廣；

src_original: yenāyaṃ sarvalokikacaryāsvaśaktaścarati /  sa ca vihāro yā tīkṣṇā saptamyāṃ bhūmau prāyogikacaryāparyantagatā bodhisattvakṣāntiḥ tayānulomikyā kṣāntyā saṃgṛhīto veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 住無礙智解脫已，於一切世間行無礙，如是住者名第七地菩薩。

src_original: so 'saṅgajñānābhimukha-prajñāpāramitā-vihārābhimukhyād bodhyāhārakāṃśca pratyayānāharati /  laukikānāñca saṃskṛtasaṃvāse na saṃvasati /  praśame ca śāntadarśī bhavati /  na ca tatrāvatiṣṭhate /
tgt_original: 方便行忍隨順忍所攝，住無障礙解脫般若波羅蜜，修菩提因緣不退轉，世俗有為一切不住，亦不住彼休息寂滅。

src_original: tasyaivamupāya-prajñājñānānugata-syāvatāra-śūnyatāsamādhipramukhāni daśa samādhimukhaśatasahasrāṇyāmukhī bhavati /
tgt_original: 如是方便智慧隨順入空三昧門，百萬空三昧門現在前。

src_original: yathā śūnyatāsamādhiḥ evamapraṇihitānimittasamādhayo veditavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 如空三昧，無相、無願三昧門亦如是。

src_original: (Dutt 236) teṣāmāmukhībhavādabhedyāśayaśca bhavati /  sarvākārācchāsanādasaṃhāryaśca bhavati sarvamāratīrthyaśāsanapratyarthikaiḥ śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
tgt_original: 此諸三昧門現前已得不壞心，一切種佛法殊勝，外道魔怨所不能壞，餘如前說。

src_original: tatrāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ /  tadyathā tadeva suvarṇaṃ kuśalena karmakāreṇa vaidūryamaṇiratnamuṣṭaṃ pratyarpitamasaṃhāryaṃ
tgt_original: 譬如真金眾寶廁填勝於餘金。

src_original: bhavati tadanyaiḥ sarvajātarūpaiḥ evamasya bodhisattvasya tāni kuśalamūlāni viśuddhatarāṇi  bhavantyasaṃhāryāṇi pūrvavat /
tgt_original: 如是菩薩善根清淨勝於一切。

src_original: yathā yathā vipaśyanā viśudhyati tathā tathā jñānadarśanaṃ pṛthuvṛddhivaipulyatāṃ gacchati /  etāvacca bhāvanāyāḥ karaṇīyam /
tgt_original: 如是如是觀清淨，如是如是知見增廣，如是如是習行。

src_original: tadyathā candraprabhā sattvāśrayāṃśca prahalādayatyanācchedyaprabhā ca bhavati catasṛbhirvātamaṇḍalikābhiḥ /
tgt_original: 譬如月光除眾生惱，一切風輪不能障蔽。

src_original: evamasya bodhisattvasya sā prajñābhā sarvasattvakleśaparidāhañca praśamayati /
tgt_original: 菩薩智慧光明為諸眾生息煩惱火，一切魔怨不能斷絕。

src_original: anācchedyā ca bhavati sarvamārapratyarthikaiḥ /  sunirmitaśca bhavati devarājaḥ /  kuśalaḥ sattvānāṃ sarvābhimānavinivartanatāyai /  prabhāvo 'pi koṭīśatasahasraṃ saṃkhyānirdeśato draṣṭavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 若更受生為善化自在天王，常以善法滅除眾生一切憍慢，神通力勝前億百千倍。

src_original: ayaṃ pratītyasamutpādapratisaṃyukto 'dhiprajñavihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 是名略說緣起相應增上慧住。

src_original: dharmasamatā-pariniṣpattipraveśataśca pratītyasamutpādāvabodhavimokṣamukhasambhavataśca  sarvamithyāsaṃjñāsamudācārataśca upāyasaṃsāraparigrahataśca asaṅgajñānābhimukha-prajñāpāramitāvihārābhimukhataśca  apramāṇa-samādhipratilambhataśca abhedyāśayapratilambhataśca śāsanādāsaṃhāryataśca  kuśalamūlaviśuddhita upapattitaḥ prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ /  vistara[nirdaśata]stadyathā 'bhimukhyāṃ bhūmau /
tgt_original: 所謂平等法成就入，覺諸緣起生解脫門，離諸邪想方便攝受，住無障礙解脫般若波羅蜜，得無量三昧得不壞心，佛法殊勝，見佛善根清淨受生神力，廣說如修多羅十地現前地說。

src_original: asaṅgajñānābhimukhasya prajñāpāramitāvihārasyābhimukhyādabhimukhītyucyate /
tgt_original: 無礙智現前，是故彼地名為現前。

src_original: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ sābhisaṃskāraḥ sābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩有行有開發無相住？

src_original: iha bodhisattvenānantare 'dhiprajñavihāre daśopāyena prajñayā cābhinirhṛtāḥ sarvasattvāsādhāraṇā laukikāḥ sarvalokāsādhāraṇāśca mārgāntarārambhaviśeṣāḥ pratilabdhā bhavanti /
tgt_original: 是菩薩於緣起相應增上慧住，具足十方便慧，次第出生世間共不共勝進道。

src_original: yadutāśrayagatañca dauṣṭhulyamanapanetavyaṃ sarvatra ca jñeye jñānadarśanaṃ viśodhayitavyaṃ ca /  caitatsarvaṃ bhāvanākarmānayā caturākārayā bhāvanayā bodhisattvasya saṃpadyate /
tgt_original: 修慧者離身心惡，於一切所知知見清淨，一切修慧業皆從如是四種修生。

src_original: teṣāṃ yathāsūtrameva granthavistaro veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 十方便慧如修多羅說。

src_original: yeṣāmadhimātratvātparipūrṇatvātsaptamaṃ vihāramanupraviśati /
tgt_original: 增上滿足已，入第七住。

src_original: laukikasampattisaṃvartakaṃ puṇyaparigraha mārabhya sattveṣu hitasukhāśayamārabhya  bodhāya puṇyasambhārabodhipakṣya-dharmottarotkarṣamārabhya śrāvakāsādhāraṇatāmārabhya
tgt_original: 謂出生世間善法，攝受福德安樂眾生，福德眾具菩提分法悉得增長，不共一切聲聞緣覺。

src_original: pratyekabuddhāsādhāraṇatāmārabhya sattvadharmadhātumārabhya lokadhātumārabhya tathāgatakāyavākcittajñānamāramya /  ityathaṃ teṣāmupāyaprajñābhinihṛtānāṃ mārgāntarāṇāmārambhaviśeṣāṇāmadhikārārthaḥ samāsato veditavyaḥ /  sa ebhiryukto 'pramāṇamasaṃkhyeyaṃ tathāgataviṣayaṃ pratividhyati /  tatsamutthānāya (Dutt 237)
tgt_original: 知眾生界、法界、世界、如來身口意，是名略說方便慧出生道。

src_original: cānābhoganirnimittākalpāvikalpanatayā 'pramāṇabuddhiviṣaya-samutthānaṃ paśyan nirantaraṃ niścchidraṃ prayujyate sarveryāpatha-cāravihāramanasikāreṣu  nāsya sarvāvasthāgatasya mārgaviprayukto bhavati /  tasya cittakṣaṇe daśapāramitāḥ pramukhāḥ sarve bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ paripūryante viśeṣeṇa /  anyeṣu tu vihāreṣu na tathā /
tgt_original: 如是功德次第勝進，入無量無數如來境界所起處無開發無相想，見無量佛境界所起處無間無斷修習一切威儀，行住思惟不離一切處道，於念念中具足十波羅蜜及一切菩提分法，非如餘住。

src_original: prathame pramuditavihāre praṇidhānādhyālambanatayā dvitīye cittadauḥśīlyamalāpakarṣaṇatayā  tṛtīye praṇidhānavivardhanadharmālokapratilābhatayā caturthe mārgāvatāraṇatayā pañcabhe  laukikakriyāvatāraṇa yā ṣaṣṭhe gambhīrapraveśanatayā /
tgt_original: 第一歡喜住修習正願，第二住離惡戒垢，第三住願轉增長得法光明，第四住入道，第五住入世間所作，第六住入甚深法門；

src_original: āsmin punaḥ saptame vihāre sarvabuddhadharmasamutthāpanatayā bodhaṅgāni paripūryante
tgt_original: 此第七住起一切佛法滿足助菩提法。

src_original: avavādaḥ katamaḥ /
tgt_original: 云何教授？

src_original: bodhisattvaprāyogikacaryāparipūrisaṃgrahādasya vihārasya jñānābhijñācaryāviśuddhāṣṭamavihārākramaṇācca /  tathā hi sa bodhisattvo 'sya vihārasyānantaramaṣṭamaṃ viśuddhaṃ vihāraṃ praviśati /
tgt_original: 是菩薩方便行滿攝受住智神通清淨行，菩薩於此住，次第入清淨第八住。

src_original: sa ca vihāra ekāntaviśuddhaḥ /  ime tu sapta vihārā vyāmiśrāḥ /
tgt_original: 住第八住者一向清淨，第七住雜淨方便。

src_original: viśuddhavihārapūrvaṅgamatvādasaṃkliṣṭaḥ /  tadasaṃprāptatvātsaṃkliṣṭacayapatitā vaktavyāḥ /  tasmādasmin vihāre sarve rāgādipramukhāḥ kleśāḥ prahīyante /
tgt_original: 入不染污名不染污行，此第七住貪等煩惱斷故，不名有煩惱。

src_original: sa ca na saṃkleśo na niḥkleśo veditavyaḥ asamudācārād buddhajñānābhilāṣācca /  tathābhūtasyāsyādhyāśayapariśuddhamapramāṇaṃ kāya vāḍabhanaskarma pravartate /  sa yāni tathāgatavivarṇitāni karmāṇi pūrvavat tasya pañcamavihārābhinihṛtāni laukikāni
tgt_original: 不得佛智慧，如實心清淨故。 不名離煩惱，此第七住成就無量身口意業，如佛所歎業，如前說五住所得。

src_original: śilpajñānānīha paripūryante ācāryasammataśca bhavati trisāhasramahāsāhasre sthāpayitvā  ūrdhvavihārasthān bodhisattvāṃstathāgatāṃśca /  na kaścidasyāśayaprayogābhyāṃ samo bhavati /
tgt_original: 世間工業智自然滿足，為三千大千世界大師，唯除上地菩薩及如來，餘無及者。

src_original: sarve ca dhyānādayo bodhipakṣyā dharmā āmukhī bhavanti /  bhāvanākārābhimukhatayā nottariyākārasthānataḥ /
tgt_original: 一切禪定菩提分法，皆現前修而不受報。

src_original: tadyathā aṣṭhame vihāre /  sa tathā prayuktaḥ suniścitaviṣayasamādhipramukhāni daśa samādhiśatasahasrāṇyabhinirharati bodhisattvasamādhīnām /  teṣāñca lābhātsamatikrānto bhavati śrāvakapratyekabuddhasamādhiviṣayam /  sa evaṃ sarvakleśaviviktena durvijñeyena sarvavikalpapracārāpagatena kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇā viharati /  na cottariviśeṣaparimārgaṇābhiyogamutsṛjati sattvāpekṣayā /  bodhiparipūrṇārthaṃ tasyāpramāṇaṃ sarvanimittāpagataṃ kāyavāṅmanaskarma pravartate supariśodhitamanutpattikadharmakṣāntyāvabhāsitam /
tgt_original: 菩薩於此住，思惟方便入善伏三昧，生百萬三昧，超過一切聲聞緣覺三昧境界，遠離煩惱諸妄想行，隨順甚深身口意業，不捨方便勝進之道，顧念眾生滿足菩提，離一切相，無量身口意業生淨修無生法忍。

src_original: (Dutt 238) asminvihāre svabuddhiviṣayatayā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaviṣayasamatikrāntāstadanyeṣu
tgt_original: 於此住超過自覺境界，餘六住佛法攀緣。

src_original: samāsato 'ṣṭavidho veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 略說八種教授。

src_original: sa tamevopāyajñānābhinihāramadhipatiṃ kṛtvā sarvasattvāsādhāraṇāṃ bodhisattvacaryāñcarati laukikapratibhāsāñcātanmayīṃ ca yathāsūtrameva /
tgt_original: 如是方便智生為增上已，行共一切眾生行，照明世間，餘如修多羅說。

src_original: tu ṣaṭṣu buddhadharmādhyālambanatayā ṣaṣṭhe ca vihāre bodhisattvo nirodhaṃ samāpadyate /  asmiṃstu pratikṣaṇaṃ samāpadyate /  idañcāsyātyadbhutaṃ karmācintyam /  yad bhūtakoṭivihāreṇa ca viharati na ca nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti /
tgt_original: 第六住菩薩能入寂滅，今住此地念念寂滅而不證寂滅，得未曾有身口意業不思議實際而不證實際。

src_original: tadyathā tadeva suvarṇaṃ kuśalena karmakāreṇa sarvamaṇiratnamṛṣṭuṃ pratyarpitamatyarthaṃ bhrājate /  asaṃhāryañca bhavati tadanyairjāmbūdvīpakairābharaṇaiḥ /
tgt_original: 譬如真金一切摩尼眾寶廁填，勝閻浮檀金；

src_original: tasya tu piṇḍārthaḥ /  puṇyakriyāmārabhya kaḍatrapariṣatparigrahamabhinirvṛttiviśeṣaprārthanā-samārambhaṃ  vimokṣatrayavihāratāṃ hīnayānādhimuktopāyavinayanatāṃ kāmaparibhogaṃ kāmaviśeṣaprārthanāṃ  tīrthikavyāvartanatāṃ paracittānuvartanatāṃ mahājanakāyānuvartanatāṃ cārabhya śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /  tatrāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
tgt_original: 取要言之，為功德事親屬想攝受，修習勝進住三解脫，求下乘者方便調伏，受五欲者求殊勝欲，轉諸邪見隨順正念，於諸大會皆悉隨順，餘如前說。

src_original: evamasya tāni kuśalamūlāni viśuddhatarāṇyasaṃhāryāṇi bhavanti sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhakuśalamūlaistadanyaiśca nikṛṣṭataravihārasthairbodhisattvakuśalamūlaiḥ
tgt_original: 菩薩善根清淨，勝於一切聲聞緣覺及餘離垢菩薩。

src_original: tadyathā sūryābhā jambūdvīpe yadbhūyasā snehaśca pariśoṣayati /  asaṃhāryā ca bhavati sa ca tadanyaprabhābhiḥ /
tgt_original: 譬如日光照閻浮提，一切濕穢皆令乾消，勝於餘光；

src_original: evamasya bodhisattvasya prajñābhā sattvānāṃ sarvakleśaviṣāṇi ca śoṣayati /  asaṃhāryā ca bhavati pūrvavat śrāvakādijñānaprabhābhiḥ /
tgt_original: 是菩薩智慧光明，能令眾生煩惱乾消，勝於一切聲聞緣覺及餘菩薩智慧光明。

src_original: ayaṃ sābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ upāyaprajñābhinihṛtamārgāntarārambhaviśeṣaniṣpattipraveśataśca
tgt_original: 是名略說有行有開發無相住。

src_original: vaśavartī ca bhavati devarājaḥ /  kuśalaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhābhisamayopasaṃhāreṣu /  prabhāvaḥ koṭīśatasahasrasaṃkhyānirdeśato veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 若更受生，作他化自在天王，以智慧饒益，一切神力勝前億百千倍。

src_original: tathāgataviṣayasamutthāna-prativedha-nirantaraprayogataśca pratikṣaṇaṃ sarvabodhipakṣyadharmasamudāgamataśca  kliṣṭākliṣṭa-vyavasthānataśca prayogikacaryāparipūrisaṃgrahataśca āśayaśuddhikarmapravṛttim  adhikṛtya sarvalaukikaśilpakarmādiparipūraṇataśca aprameyaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāsādhāraṇasamādhi-pratilambhataśca  pratikṣaṇanirodhasamāpattitaśca sarvasattvāsādhāraṇalokacaryācaraṇataśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhitaśca
tgt_original: 所謂方便慧勝進道成就入，入如來境界所起處，無間方便於念念中具菩提分法，染污不染污建立方便行，滿足攝受淨身口意業，一切世間工巧業滿足，得無量三昧，不共一切聲聞緣覺，念念寂滅行於一切共世間行，見佛善根清淨受生神力，廣說如修多羅十地遠行地說。

src_original: upapattitaḥ prabhāvataśca samāsa-nirdeśato veditavyaḥ /  (Dutt 239) vistarataḥ pūrvavat /  tadyathā dūraṃgamāyāṃ bhūmau /  bodhisattva-prāyogikacaryā-paripūrisaṃgṛhītatvāt dūraṃgametyucyate /  tenaiva cārthena vihāro veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 方便行滿足，是故彼地名為遠行。 即此地名為有行有開發無相住。

src_original: tatra katamo bodhisattvānām anābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩無行無開發無相住？

src_original: iha bodhisattvena prathame 'nantare vihāre daśākāraṃ sarvadharmaparamārthāvatārajñānaṃ pratilabdhaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 是菩薩於初無相住，得十種入一切法第一義智，如修多羅說。

src_original: triṣu adhveṣu yathāyogam ādyanutpannatāmajanmatāmalakṣaṇatām ārabhya tadanyahetubhāvāsambhavāvināśatāñcārabhya  paramārthato nirabhilāpyasvabhāve vastunyabhilāpābhisaṃskārapratibhāsasya svabhāvasya  lakṣaṇena hetubhāvena cāvidyamānasya tasyaiva saṃkleśātmanāpravṛttitāñcānivṛttitāñcārabhya  tadajñānamithyābhiniveśahetukāñca tasminvidyamāne vastuni nirabhilāpye ādau madhye  paryavasāne sarvakālasaṃkleśasamatāṃ cārabhya tathatā-samyakpraveśanirvikalpasamatayā  ca tatsaṃkleśāpanayanamārabhya /
tgt_original: 謂三世法如所應，無生無起無相無成，第一義離言說自性，不知言說行自性相生無智邪見計著，知離言說事，初中後一切時煩惱平等入離妄想平等，一切煩惱悉皆遠離，是名略說入第一義智。

src_original: ityasya jñānasya daśākārasyādhimātratvātparipūrṇatvādimamaṣṭamaṃ pariśuddhaṃ vihāramavatarati /  ihasthaścānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu paramāṃ bodhisattvakṣāntiṃ suviśuddhāṃ labhate /  sā punaḥ katamā /
tgt_original: 此十種智增上滿足已，入第八清淨住，是名得快淨第一無生法忍菩薩。

src_original: catasṛbhiḥ paryeṣaṇābhirayaṃ bodhisattvaḥ sarvadhamān paryeṣya yadā caturbhireva yathābhūtaparijñānaiḥ parijānāti /
tgt_original: 復有四種求求一切法，四種如實知知一切法。

src_original: tadā sarvamithyāvikalpābhiniveśeṣvapanīteṣu sarvadharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭe ca dharme sarvasaṃlkeśānutpattyanukūlatāṃ paśyati /  samparāye ca sarveṇa sarvaṃ niravaśeṣato 'nutpatiṃ paśyati teṣāmeva pūrvamithyāvikalpābhiniveśahetusamutpannānāṃ dharmāṇām /
tgt_original: 以求知故離一切妄想計著，現法一切煩惱不起，來世一切究竟不生妄想計著。

src_original: tāḥ punaḥ catasraḥ paryeṣaṇā yathāpūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭāstattvārthapaṭale /
tgt_original: 四種求、四種如實知，如前真實品說。

src_original: catvāri ca yathābhūtaparijñānāni tānyadhimukticaryāvihāramupādāya yāvatsābhoganirnirmittādvihārān na suviśuddhāni bhavanti /
tgt_original: 從解行住乃至有行有開發無相住，未得快淨；

src_original: sa tasyāḥ kṣānterlābhād gambhīraṃ bodhisattvavihāramanuprāpto bhavati /  tasya ye pūrvake nirnimitte vihāre catvāro 'pakṣālāste prahīṇā bhavanti /
tgt_original: 得無生法忍已，得甚深行，離初無相住四種惱患：

src_original: asmiṃstu vihāre pariśuddhāni bhavanti /  tasmāt sa bodhisattvaḥ anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣānti-pratilabdha ityucyate /
tgt_original: 於此住乃得快淨，是故名第一無生法忍。

src_original: sarvākārasattvārthakriyāśaktāvautsukyaṃ (Dutt 240)  prahīṇaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 三者一切眾生利益堪能勤方便；

src_original: uttari ca viśuddhavihāre autsukyaṃ prahīṇaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 二者淨地勤方便；

src_original: sūkṣmasaṃjñā-samudācāraśca prahīṇo bhavati /  tasmāt sa vihāraḥ suviśuddha ityucyate /
tgt_original: 四者微細想行，是故此住名為快淨。

src_original: tasya ca tasmin gambhīre vihāre 'bhiratasya tasmin dharmamukhasrotasi tathāgata-saṃcodanā-samādāpanā-abhinirhāramukha-jñānābhijñā-karmopasaṃhāro 'prameyaḥ /
tgt_original: 於甚深法門法流水中，如來勸發出生無量門智慧神通諸業饒益。

src_original: tathā saṃcoditasya cāpramāṇakāyavibhaktijñānābhinirhāro daśavaśitā-prāptiśca yathāsūtrameva vistareṇa veditavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 以勸發故，無量尊身智慧出生，得十自在，如修多羅說。

src_original: vaśitāprāptaḥ sa tāvadākāṃkṣati tāvattiṣṭhati /  yena vā dhyānavimokṣādicittavihāreṇākāṃkṣati tena viharati /  saṃkalpamātreṇaivāsya sarvabhojanādi-pariṣkārasampad bhavati /  sarvaśilpakarmasthāneṣu cāsya yathākāmapracāratā bhavati /  sarvopapattisaṃvartanīyeṣu ca karmasu sarvopapattyāyataneṣu cāsya kāmakāmopapattitā bhavati /  yathepsitañca sarvarddhikāryaṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 得自在故，欲久近住隨意即能，諸禪解脫、隨意所欲資生眾具、世工巧業悉得隨意，一切生處一切受生隨意往生，一切神力一切誓願隨意能得，變一切物成於金寶隨意能成，欲知法界名身句身味身於一切法建立巧便即能知之。

src_original: evaṃ vaśitāprāptasya bodhisattvasyātaḥ pareṇa vaśitāprāptakṛto 'nuśaṃso vistareṇa yathāsūtrameva veditavyaḥ /  audārikañca buddhadarśanaṃ vihāya satatasamitamavirahito bhavati buddhadarśanena /  śeṣakuśalamūlaviśuddhiryathāsūtraṃ veditavyā /  maharghasuvarṇadṛṣṭāntena [ābhādṛṣṭāntena] ca /  upapattiḥ prabhāvaviśeṣaścāpyasya bodhisattvasyāsminvihāre yathāsūtrameva veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 於念念中常等見佛，善根清淨受生神力金光明喻，如修多羅說。

src_original: ayamanābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 是名略說無行無開發無相住。

src_original: paramārthavatārajñānaniṣpattipraveśataśca anutpattikadharmakṣāntilābhataśca sarvāpakṣālāpagata-gambhīra-bodhisattvavihāraprāptitaśca  dharmamukhasrotasi buddhairaprameyābhinirhāramukhajñānābhijñākarmopasaṃhārataśca  apramāṇakāyavibhaktijñānapraveśataśca vaśitāprāptitaśca vaśitānuśaṃsapratyanubhavanataśca  kuśalamūlaviśuddhita upapattiḥ prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ /  vistareṇa nirdeśato yathāsūtraṃ tadyathā 'calāyāṃ bhūmau /
tgt_original: 所謂第一義智成就，入得不起法忍，惱亂悉離，得快淨住甚深法門。 諸佛勸發出生無量智慧神通諸業饒益，無量尊身智慧出生，得大勢力得大自在力，福利果報善根清淨受生神力，廣說如修多羅十地不動地說。

src_original: pūrvakābhisaṃskārāpagamādanābhogāniścalavāhimārgasamārūḍhaṃ (Dutt 241)  taccittaṃ tasyāṃ bhūmau pravartate /  tasmāt sā bhūmiracaletyucyate /  tenaiva cārthenāyaṃ vihāro draṣṭavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 離有行有開發乘不動勝進道，是故彼地名為不動。 即此地名為無行無開發無相住。

src_original: yathāpi tadvodhisattvaḥ samādhisanniśrayeṇa vā saṃvāsānvayādvā yeṣāmavavaditukāmo  bhavati yo vā punaranyo bodhisattvo 'smai avavadati tathāgato vā sa ādita eva cittaṃ paryeṣate jānāti /  cittaṃ paryeṣya indriya paryeṣate jānāti /
tgt_original: 菩薩依三摩提教修行者，若無餘菩薩教者則自教授。 如諸佛法，先當如是知四種求： 一者心求者知心求；

src_original: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ pratisaṃvidvihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩無礙住？

src_original: iha bodhisattvastenāpi vihāreṇa gambhīreṇāsaṃtuṣṭa uttarijñānaviśeṣatāmanugacchan  yaiśca dharmajñānābhisaṃskāraiḥ pareṣāṃ dharmaḥ sarvākāro bodhisattvena deśayitavyo  yacca dharmākhyānakṛtyaṃ tatsarvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti tatredaṃ dharmasamākhyānakṛtyam /  gahanopavicāreṣu ye ca saṃkliśyante viśudhyante ca /
tgt_original: 是菩薩樂深解脫上勝進智，知佛法藏、菩薩一切種行，為人廣說。

src_original: yena ca saṃkliśyante yena ca viśudhyante /  yacca saṃkleśavyavadānam /  yā ca tasyānaikāntikatā /  yā ca tasyaikāntikatā /  yā ca tasyaikāntikatā 'naikāntikatā /  tasya yathābhūtajñānam /
tgt_original: 於所說法所可為說悉如實知，所可說法煩惱清淨、誰惱誰淨悉如實知。

src_original: yayā bodhisattvapratisaṃvidabhinihṛtayā vācā /  yadṛśe dharmāsane niṣaṇṇasya /  yatra yeṣu ca dharma deśayataḥ yāvadbhirmukhaiḥ yayā sattva-vijñāpana santoṣaṇa-kṛtyasaṃniyojana-śaktyā samanvāgatasya /  tat sarvaṃ yathāsūtrameva vistaranirdeśato veditavyam /
tgt_original: 乃至出生菩薩無礙智，坐於法座，所可說法眾生樂受堪能成熟，如修多羅說。

src_original: evañca dharma-deśanākuśalasya deśanākṛtyakuśalasya ca yat sarvākāramahādharma-bhāṇakatvam aprameyadhāraṇīprāptasya sarvasvarāṅgavibhaktikuśalasyākṣayapratibhānasya  yādṛśyā dharmadhāraṇodgrahaṇaśaktyā samanvāgatasya /
tgt_original: 如是善說法，名大法師。 得無量陀羅尼，善諸音聲辯才無盡法陀羅尼攝受堪能成就。

src_original: kuśalamūlaviśuddhyupapattiprabhāvaviśeṣo 'pi yathāsūtrameva veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 善根清淨受生神力，如修多羅說。

src_original: tatkṛtyajñānataśca acintyamahādharmabhāṇakatvapratilambhataścakaśalamūlaviśuddhita  upapattitaḥ prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ /  vistaranirdeśataḥ punaḥ yathāsūtrameva /  tadyathā sādhumatyāṃ bhūmau /
tgt_original: 所謂樂深解脫說法行智不思議大法師，善根清淨受生神力，廣說如修多羅十地善慧地說。

src_original: sarvasattvānāṃ hitasukhāśayapariśuddhyā bodhisattvapratisaṃvinmatyā dharmasamākhyānādhikāratvāt sā bhūmiḥ sādhumatītyucyate /
tgt_original: 安樂一切眾生，淨修菩薩無礙廣說大法，是故彼地名為善慧。

src_original: tenaiva cārthenāyamapi vihāro draṣṭavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 即此地名為無礙住。

src_original: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ paramo vihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 云何最上菩薩住？

src_original: iha bodhisattvasya pratisaṃvid-vihāre sarvākārapariśuddhe dharmarājatvārhasya dharmābhiṣekasamāsannasya  vimalādisamādhi-aprameyapratilambha-tatkṛtyakaraṇataḥ sarvajñajñānaviśeṣābhiṣekapaścimasādhisammukhībhāvācca (Dutt 242)  sarvabuddhebhyasyadanurūpāsanakāyaparivārapratilābhinaḥ svaraśmigamanapratyāgamanaiḥ  sarvākārasarvajñajñānābhiṣekapratilambhataśca abhiṣiktasya ca sarvavineya-samudānayana-tadvimokṣopāya-buddhakṛtyajñānataśca
tgt_original: 是菩薩於無礙住，淨修一切種法王所應灌頂法，得離垢等無量三昧，作所應作，最後益一切智灌頂三昧現在前，得一切佛同坐身，蓮華眷屬光明普照，得一切種一切智灌頂，一切剛強悉調伏。

src_original: aprameya-vimokṣa-dhāraṇī abhijñā pratilambhataśca tadādhipateya mahāsmṛtijñā nābhinirhāranirvacanavyavasthānataśca  mahābhijñābhinirhārataśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhi-upapattiprabhāvaviśeṣataśca samāsanirdeśataḥ
tgt_original: 得解脫方便佛所住智，無量解脫總持神通，得大念智言辭部分及大神通，善根清淨受生神力。

src_original: paramo vihāro veditavyaḥ /  vistaranirdeśataḥ punaryathāsūtrameva tadyathā dharmameghāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau /
tgt_original: 是名略說最上菩薩住，廣說如修多羅十地法雲地說。

src_original: paripūrṇabodhisattvamārgaḥ suparipūrṇa-bodhisambhāraśca sa bodhisattvaḥ tathāgatā  nāmantikāt dharmamedhabhūmyāmatyudārāṃ duḥsahāḥ tadanyaiḥ sarvasattvaiḥ saddharmaṃvṛṣṭi sampratīcchati /  mahāmedhabhūtaśca svayamanabhisambuddhabodhi-abhisambuddhabodhiścāprameyānāṃ sattvānāṃ saddharma-vṛṣṭayā nirapamayā kleśarajāṃsi praśamayati  vicitrāṇi ca kuśalamulaśasyāni virohayati vivardhayatī pācayatī tasyāṃ bhūmāvavasthitaḥ /  tasmāt sā bhūmirdharmameghetyucyate /
tgt_original: 法雲地菩薩滿足菩薩道，滿足菩提眾具，得菩薩勝慧興大法雲，以正覺自覺雨諸眾生，煩惱垢穢悉令休息，種種善根增長成熟，是故彼地名為法雲。

src_original: tenaiva cārthena paramo vihāro draṣṭavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 即此地名為最上菩薩住。

src_original: api tu mṛdutvān na saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti /  teṣāmeva ca madhyādhimātratvāt [ta]danyottarabhūmipratilābha-niṣpattivyavasthānaṃ veditavyam /  ekaikaścātra vihāro 'nekairmahākalpakoṭīśatasahasraistato vā prabhūtataraiḥ pratilabhyate niṣpadyate ca /
tgt_original: 彼一一住，若中上根者，一一經億百千大劫，多有成就軟根者不在數中。

src_original: na ca yānyuttarottareṣu vihāreṣvaṅgāni nirniṣṭāni tāni pūrvakeṣu vihāreṣu sarveṇa sarvaṃ na saṃvidyante /
tgt_original: 如上說展轉上功德，前地所無。

src_original: yacca vyāyacchamāno dhrauvyeṇa nāvyāyacchamānaḥ /  dvitīyena mahākalpāsaṃkhyeyena pramuditavihāraṃ yāvatsābhogaṃ nirnimittaṃ vihāramatikramyānābhogaṃ nirnimittaṃ pratilabhate /  tacca niya meva /  tathā hi sa śuddhāśayo bodhisattvo niyataṃ vyāyacchate /
tgt_original: 初阿僧祇大劫解行住過得歡喜住，五行勝進第二阿僧祇大劫歡喜住，乃至有開發無相住過得無開發無相住，此即決定淨心菩薩決定勝進。

src_original: te tu sarve vihārāstribhirmahākalpāsaṃkhyeyaiḥ samudāgacchanti mahākalpāsaṃkhyeyenādhimukticaryā-vihāraṃ samatikramya pramuditavihāro labhyate
tgt_original: 彼一切住，要經三阿僧祇大劫。

src_original: tṛtīyena mahākalpāsaṃkhyeyenānābhogañca nirnimittaṃ pratisaṃvidvihārañca samatikramya paramaṃ bodhisattvavihāraṃ pratilabhate /
tgt_original: 第三阿僧祇大劫，無開發無相住及無礙智住過，得最上菩薩住。

src_original: tatra dau kalpāsaṃkhyeyau veditavyau /
tgt_original: 劫有二種：

src_original: yo 'pi mahākalpaḥ so 'pi rātrindivasamāsārdhamāsagaṇanāyogena kālāprameyatvādasaṃkhyeya ityucyate /  yāpi (Dutt 243) teṣāmeva mahākalpānāṃ gaṇanāyogena sarvagaṇanā samatikrāntā saṃkhyā so 'pyasaṃkhyeyaḥ /
tgt_original: 一者日月晝夜時節歲數無量，故名阿僧祇。 二者大劫無量，故名阿僧祇。

src_original: yastvadhimātrādhimātreṇa vīryārambheṇa prayujyate tataḥ kaścidantarakalpān prabhūtān vyāvartayati kaścit yāvanmahākalpān /  na tvasaṃkhyeyavyāvṛttiḥ kasyacidastīti veditavyam /
tgt_original: 若菩薩增上精進，能轉中劫，不能轉大劫。

src_original: pūrvakeṇa kalpāsaṃkhyeyena bodhiranalpaiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairadhigamyate /  paścimakena punaḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyena tribhirevanadhikaiḥ /
tgt_original: 彼歲數阿僧祇劫，是前阿僧祇菩薩所過； 後三阿僧祇大劫無有過。

src_original: ebhiśca dvādaśabhirbodhisattvavihāraistribhirasaṃkhyeyaiḥ kleśāvaraṇapakṣyañca dauṣṭhulyaṃ prahīyate jñeyāvaraṇa-pakṣyañca /
tgt_original: 如是十二住菩薩，三阿僧祇大劫，煩惱障分染污、智障分染污斷；

src_original: tatra triṣu vihāreṣu kleśāvaraṇapakṣyadauṣṭhulyasya prahāṇaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 彼三住，煩惱障分染污斷：

src_original: pramudite [vihāre] āpāyikakleśapakṣyasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ samudācāratastvadhimātramamyasya
tgt_original: 歡喜住，惡趣煩惱分斷，增上中煩惱分一切不行。

src_original: sarvakleśapakṣyasya anābhoge nirnimitte vihāre 'nutpattikadharmakṣānti-viśuddhivibandhakleśa
tgt_original: 無開發無相住，無生法忍清淨相續，煩惱染污分一切不行。

src_original: indriyaṃ paryeṣya āśrayaṃ paryeṣate jānāti /  āśayaṃ paryeṣyānuśayaṃ paryeṣate jānāti /
tgt_original: 二者根求者知根求； 三者悕望求者知悕望求； 四者使求者知使求。

src_original: pakṣyasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ dauṣṭhulyasya prahāṇaṃ veditavyam /  parame punarvihāre sarvakleśa[sa]vāsanānuśayāvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ veditavyam /  tacca tathāgataṃ vihāramanupraviśataḥ jñeyāvaraṇapakṣyamapi dauṣṭhulyaṃ trividhaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 最上菩薩住，一切煩惱習使障斷，入如來住。 智障染污分有三種：

src_original: tvaggataṃphalgugataṃ sāragatañca /
tgt_original: 一者皮； 二者膚； 三者骨。

src_original: tatra tvaggatasya pramuditavihāre prahāṇaṃ bhavati /  phalgugatasyānābhoge nirnimitte sāragatasya tathāgate vihāre prahāṇaṃ bhavati /  sarvāvaraṇaviśuddhijñānatā ca teṣu triṣu vihāreṣu tasya kleśa-jñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇasya tadanye vihārā yathānukramaṃ saṃbhārabhūtā bhavanti /
tgt_original: 歡喜住斷皮障，無開發無相住斷膚障，如來住斷骨障，一切障清淨。 於此三住智障斷，餘住隨其次第真實莊嚴。

src_original: eṣu trayodaśasu vihāreṣu samāsata ekādaśavidhā viśuddhirveditavyā /
tgt_original: 如是十三住，有十一種淨：

src_original: prathame gotraviśuddhiḥ /
tgt_original: 第一種性淨；

src_original: anuśayaṃ paryeṣya yathāyogaṃ yathārhameva vicitreṣvavatāramukheṣvavatārayati /  yadi vā 'śubhayā yadi vā maitryā yadi vā idaṃpratyayatā-pratītyasamutpādena yadi  vā dhātubhedena yadi vā ānāpānasmṛtyā yathāyogaṃ yathārhamavaratāramukheṣvavatārya
tgt_original: 五者隨其所應種種度門而度脫之，所謂不淨、慈心、緣起、界分別、安那般那念，是名隨應度門而度脫之；

src_original: dvitīye śraddhāvimuktiviśuddhiḥ /
tgt_original: 第二解行淨；

src_original: caturthe śīlaviśuddhiḥ /
tgt_original: 第四戒淨；

src_original: tṛtīye 'dhyāśayaviśuddhiḥ /
tgt_original: 第三淨心淨；

src_original: pañcame cittaviśuddhiḥ /
tgt_original: 第五意淨；

src_original: ṣaṣṭhe saptame 'ṣṭame ca samyak jñānasamārambhaviśuddhiḥ /
tgt_original: 第六、第七、第八正見淨；

src_original: navame prāyogikacaryā-paripūriviśuddhiḥ /
tgt_original: 第九方便行滿足淨；

src_original: daśame tattvajñānābhinirhāraviśuddhiḥ ekādaśe tadarthasamyak parasamākhyānāya pratirsavidviśuddhiḥ /
tgt_original: 第十真實智神通出生淨； 第十一正義無盡說無礙淨；

src_original: dvādaśe sarvākārasarvajñeyānupraveśajñānaviśuddhiḥ /
tgt_original: 第十二隨順一切種一切所知智淨；

src_original: trayodaśe tathāgate vihāre savāsana-sarvakleśa-jñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhiḥ /
tgt_original: 第十三如來住一切煩惱障習使智障習使淨。

src_original: aṣṭābhiśca pūrvanirdiṣṭairmahāyānasaṃgrāhakairdharmaireṣāṃ trayodaśānāṃ vihārāṇāṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 如前菩薩功德品說八法攝，一切摩訶衍菩薩藏所攝。

src_original: prathamadvitīyayorvihārayoḥ śraddhājātasyādhimuktigatasya (Dutt 244)  bodhisattvapiṭaka-śravaṇacintanā /
tgt_original: 此十三住，攝第一第二住信心生解行住，於菩薩藏得聞慧思慧；

src_original: tataścordhvaṃ triṣu bodhisattvavihāreṣu pariśuddhacaryā saṃgṛhīteṣu bhāvanāphalaniṣpattiḥ /  tathāgate vihāre 'tyanta nairyāṇikatā veditavyā /
tgt_original: 第十第十一第十二住，淨修慧行所攝修慧果，成如來住畢竟出離。

src_original: tṛtīye vihāre 'dhyāśayopagamanaṃ bhāvanākārapratilābhapūrvakam /  tadanyeṣu sarvavihāreṣu yāvat sābhoganirnimittādbhāvanāvāhulyam /
tgt_original: 第三住得淨心及初修慧行； 第四住乃至第九有行有開發無相住修惠廣；

src_original: arthe tu sa bodhisattvaścarati /  arthe parame caran sarvadharmāṃstayā tathatayā samasamān yathābhūtaṃ prajñayā paśyati /  sarvatra ca samadarśī samacittaḥ san paramāmupekṣāṃ pratilabhate /
tgt_original: 行第一義已，一切法如無等等，如實知見一切平等，觀平等心得第一捨。 依第一捨已，一切經論一切巧便悉善通達。

src_original: śrāvakavihāre sādharmyeṇa caiṣāṃ dvādaśānāṃ bodhisattvavihārāṇāmanukramo veditavyaḥ /  yathā śrāvakasya svagotravihārastathā 'sya prathamo veditavyaḥ /  yathā tasya [samyakatva]nyāmāvakrāntiprayogavihāraḥ evamasya dvitīyaḥ /  yathā tasya nyāmāvakrāntivihāraḥ tathāsya tṛtīyo vihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 聲聞住法亦有十二，如菩薩次第當知。

src_original: yāmāśritya sarvavidyāsthānakauśaleṣu prayujyamāno bodhisattvaḥ sarvapariśramaiḥ sarvaduḥkhopanipātaiḥ na nivartate /  kṣiprañcāklāntakāyaḥ aklāntacittaḥ tatkauśalaṃ samudāyanayati /
tgt_original: 一切苦難終不退轉，其心堅固身無疲極。

src_original: mahāsmṛtibalādhānaprāptaśca bhavati /  na ca tena kauśalenonnatiṃ gacchati /
tgt_original: 所為巧便得大念力，於諸巧便亦不自高。

src_original: na ca pareṣāmācāryamuṣṭiṃ karoti /  sarvakauśaleṣu cāsaṃlīnacitto bhavati /  utsāhavānavyāhatagatiśca bhavati /
tgt_original: 法化眾生無所祕惜，於諸巧便心不怯弱。

src_original: yathā yathā guṇairvi[va]rdhate tathā tathā praticchannakalyāṇo bhavati /  na parato jñātuṃ samanveṣate na lābha satkāram /
tgt_original: 如是如是功德增長，如是如是愈更覆藏不令他知、不為利養。

src_original: yathā yathā samucchrayaviśeṣamadhigacchati tathā tathānirmānataro bhavati sattvānāmantike /  yathā yathā jñānaviśeṣamadhigacchati tathā tathā bhūyasyā mātrayā paropārambhavivādaprakīrṇalapitākleśopakleśebhyaśca  vṛttaskha litasamudācārebhyaḥ parijñāya parijñāya cittamadhyupekṣate /
tgt_original: 如是如是生死苦增，如是如是堪能增長無上菩提，如是如是功德轉增，如是如是憍慢慚減，如是如是智慧轉明，如是如是彼彼諍訟、犯戒煩惱皆悉了知，知已放捨。

src_original: tasmād ye kecidbodhimanuprāptavanto ye ca kecitprāpsyanti ye ca prāpnuvanti sarve ta etadeva jñānaṃ niśritya nānyannyūnaṃ prativiśiṣṭaṃ vā /
tgt_original: 是故菩薩，已得菩提、今得當得，悉依彼智，非餘若劣若勝。

src_original: imā (Dutt 29) evaṃbhāgīyā bahavo 'nuśaṃsā bhavanti bodhisattvasya bodhipakṣyā bodhyanukūlāstajjñānasanniśritasya /
tgt_original: 菩薩如是等無量福利，順菩提道，悉依彼智。

src_original: evaṃ niṣprapañcanayārūḍho bodhisattva evaṃ caṃ bahvanuśaṃsa ātmanaśca buddhadharmaparipākāya pareṣāñca yānatrayadharmaparipākāya samyak pratipanno bhavati /
tgt_original: 如是離虛妄菩薩有如是等無量福利，自能成就無上佛法，以三乘法利益眾生，是名正趣。

src_original: evañca punaḥ samyak pratipanno bhavati /  bhogeṣvātmabhāve ca nistṛṣṇo bhavati /
tgt_original: 正趣已，自於身財遠離貪愛。

src_original: saṃvṛtaśca bhavati susaṃvṛtaḥ /  kāyena vācā sambareṇa ca śikṣate prakṛtyā pāpārucitāyai prakṛtibhadrakalyāṇatāyai ca /
tgt_original: 捨於身財，等心眾生給施所須，善攝諸根，學身口律儀，性不樂惡仁賢真實，忍他侵逼及諸惡行。

src_original: nistṛṣṇatāyāñca śikṣate sattveṣu bhogātmabhāvaparityāgāya sattvānāmevārthāya /
tgt_original: 學離愛已，復教眾生令離貪愛。

src_original: kṣamo bhavati parataḥ sarvopatāpakipratipattīnām /  kṣamitvaṃ ca śikṣate mandakrodhatāyai ca a-paropatāpanatāyai ca /
tgt_original: 修學忍已，瞋恨轉薄不惱逼他。

src_original: sarvavidyāsthāneṣu cābhiyukto bhavati kuśalaśca sattvānāṃ vicikitsāprahāṇāyānugrahopasaṃhārāya ca ātmanaśca sarvajñatvahetuparigrahāya /  adhyātmasthitacittaśca bhavati susamāhitacittaḥ /  cittasthitaye ca śikṣate caturbrāhmavihārapariśodhanatāyai pañcābhijñāvikrīḍanatāyai ca sattvakṛtyānuṣṭhānatāyai sarvakauśalyābhiyogajakleśa-vinodanatāyai ca /
tgt_original: 一切明處精勤修學，善為眾生決諸疑難攝取饒益，亦自攝受一切智因，內攝其心安住正受，淨四梵處遊五神通，一切事業悉方便學，一切巧便若立若廢終不疲厭。

src_original: vicakṣaṇaśca bhavati paramatattvajñaḥ /  paramatattvajñatāyai ca śikṣate mahāyāne cāyatyāmātmanaḥ parinirvāṇāya /
tgt_original: 能善觀察第一真實，能善修學第一大乘，終不願求現世涅槃。

src_original: sa khalu bodhisattva evaṃ samyakprayukto guṇavatsu sattveṣu pūjālābhasatkāreṇa pratyupasthito bhavati /
tgt_original: 如是平等究竟具足，於諸大德奉事供養，於惡眾生興大悲心，隨力所能為除惡行。

src_original: doṣavatsu sattveṣu parameṇa kāruṇyacittenānukampācittena pratyupasthito bhavati /  yathāśaktyā ca yathābalaṃ doṣaprahāṇāyaiṣāṃ prayujyate /  apakāriṣu sattveṣu maitracittatayā pratyupasthito bhavati /
tgt_original: 於己嫌恨不饒益者，為起慈心，隨力堪任不諂不偽安樂饒益，令彼結恨過惡自滅。

src_original: tat kasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: tathā hyekasmindharme ekasminvastuni bahuvidhā bahavo bahubhirabhilāpaiḥ prajñaptaya upacārāḥ kriyante /
tgt_original: 謂一法一事有眾多名字施設故。

src_original: na ca bahuvidhānāñca bahūnāṃ prajñaptivādānāṃ niyamaḥ kaścidupalabhyate /  yadanyatamena prajñaptivādenaikena tasya dharmasya tasya vastunaḥ tādātmyaṃ tanmayatā tatsvabhāvatā syānnānyairavaśiṣṭaiḥ prajñaptivādaiḥ /  tasmātsakalavikalaiḥ sarvaprajñaptivādaiḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvavastūnāṃ nāsti tādātmyaṃ nāsti tanmayatā nāsti tatsvabhāvatā /
tgt_original: 亦非多名有決定性，亦非一名有自性、餘名無自性，是故施設假名，多名一名悉無自性。

src_original: api ca sa cedrūpādayo dharmā yathāpūrvanirdiṣṭāḥ prajñaptivādasvabhāvā bhaveyuḥ /  evaṃ sati pūrva tāvadvastu paścāttatra chandataḥ prajñaptivādopacāraḥ /  prākprajñaptivādopacārādakṛte prajñaptivādopacāre sa dharmastadvastu niḥsvabhāva eva syāt /
tgt_original: 復次色乃至涅槃法，若隨名字有自性者，要先有法而後隨意制名，未有名時彼法應無自性。

src_original: prajñaptivādopacāre cāsati prajñaptivādasvabhāvatā dharmasya vastuno na yujyeta /
tgt_original: 無名有法，是亦不然。

src_original: sati niḥsvabhāvatve nirvastukaḥ prajñaptivādo na yujyate /
tgt_original: 若無自性者，無事制名。 是義不然。

src_original: sa cetpunaḥ pūrvameva prajñaptivādopacārādakṛte prajñaptivādopacāre sa dharmastadvastu tadātmakaṃ syāt /  evaṃ sati vinā tena rūpamiti prajñaptivādopacāreṇa rūpasaṃjñake dharme rūpasaṃjñake vastuni rūpabuddhiḥ pravarteta /  na ca pravartate /
tgt_original: 若法本來自性是色，然後以名字言說攝取是色。 若然者，應離名有色施設，眾生應自知，是色不待名知。

src_original: tadanena kāraṇonānayā yuktyā nirabhilāpyaḥ svabhāvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ pratyavagantavyaḥ /  yathārūpamevaṃ vedanādayo yathānirdiṣṭā dharmā antato yāvannirvāṇaparyantā veditavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 而眾生無名則不知色，以是故知一切諸法離言說自性，如色乃至涅槃亦復如是。

src_original: dvāvimāvasmāddharmavinayātpranaṣṭau veditavyau /
tgt_original: 復次有二種人壞佛正法：

src_original: yaśca rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ rūpādikasya vastunaḥ prajñaptivādasvabhāvaṃ svalakṣaṇamasadbhūtasamāropato 'bhiniviśate /
tgt_original: 一者若色等諸法色等諸事，施設假名說自性自相，於不實法妄想計著；

src_original: yaścāpi prajñaptivādanimittādhiṣṭhānaṃ prajñaptivādanimittasanniśrayaṃ (Dutt 31)  nirabhilāpyātmakatayā paramārthasadbhūtaṃ vastvapadamāno nāśayati sarveṇa sarvaṃ nāstīti /
tgt_original: 二者施設假名處假名所依，離言說自性，第一實義誹謗毀滅，一切都無所有。

src_original: asadbhūtasamārope tāvadye doṣāste pūrvameva nirūpitā uttānā viśaditāḥ prakāśitāḥ /  yairdoṣai rūpādike vastunayasadbhūtasamāropātpranaṣṭo bhavatyasmāddharmavinayāditi veditavyaḥ /  yathā punā rūpādikeṣu dharmeṣuvastumātramapyapavadamānaḥ sarvavaināśikaḥ pranaṣṭo  bhavatyasmāddharmavinayāt tathā vakṣyāmi rūpādīnāṃ dharmānāṃ vastumātramapavadato
tgt_original: 如前說建立不實法妄相過惡者，謂於色等諸法色等諸事非實計實，以是過故，破壞正法。 又色等諸法、色等諸事，因緣分齊，誹謗毀滅都無所有，破壞正法。 今當說色等諸法事，因緣分齊，誹謗說言無有真實亦無假名。

src_original: tadyathā satsu rūpādiṣu skandheṣu pudgalaprajñaptiryujyate /
tgt_original: 如士夫等陰說名為人，是則可爾；

src_original: nāsatsu /  nirvastukāpudgalaprajñaptiḥ /
tgt_original: 無事說人則不應爾。

src_original: nirvastukaḥ prajñaptivādopacāraḥ /  tatra prajñaptervastu nāstīti niradhiṣṭhānā prajñaptirapi nāsti /
tgt_original: 若但假名而無事者，則無依處亦無假名，是不應爾。

src_original: ato ya ekatyā durvijñeyān sūtrāntānmahāyānapratisaṃyuktān gambhīrān śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktānābhiprāyikārthanirūpitān  śrutvā yathābhūtaṃ bhāṣitasyārthamavijñāyāyoniśo vikalpyāyogavihitena tarkamātrakeṇaivaṃ  dṛṣṭayo bhavantyevaṃvādinaḥ /
tgt_original: 是人聞難解修多羅大乘甚深空相應義，於如實說一向不解，作不正思惟虛妄分別，以無巧便慧作如是說：

src_original: śāśvatāntāsadgrāha pratipakṣeṇa madhyamāṃ pratipadaṃ deśayati /  ucchedāntāsadgrāha pratipakṣeṇa madhyamāṃ pratipadaṃ deśayati /
tgt_original: 六者執常邊，對治為說中道； 七者執斷邊，對治為說中道；

src_original: prajñaptimātrameva sarvametacca tattvam /  yaścaivaṃ paśyati sa samyak paśyatīti /
tgt_original: 一切皆是假名，無有真實，作如是觀是為正觀。

src_original: teṣāṃ prajñaptyadhiṣṭhānasya vastumātrasyābhāvātsaiva prajñaptiḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhavati /
tgt_original: 是等於假名所依悉無所有，假名亦無。 假名既無，假名真實亦無所有。

src_original: rūpādisaṃjñakasya dharmasya yadrūpamityevamādi nāma /  yena rūpamityevamādinā nāmnā te rūpādisaṃjñakā dharmā abhilapyante 'nuvyavahriyante rūpamiti vā vedaneti vā vistareṇa yāvannirvāṇamiti vā /
tgt_original: 名色等諸法，以色等名宣說諸法，流通言教，說色乃至涅槃。

src_original: tatra na ca rūpādisaṃjñakā dharmāḥ svayaṃ rūpādyātmakāḥ /  na ca teṣu tadanyo rūpādyātmako dharmo vidyate /
tgt_original: 色等假名，無色等自性，色等法亦無餘自性。

src_original: yā punasteṣāṃ rūpādisaṃjñakānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirabhilāpyenārthena vidyamānatā saiṣā paramārthataḥ svabhāvadharmatā veditavyā /
tgt_original: 此色等假名，諸法離言說，義無所有，是名第一義自性法。

src_original: uktañca bhagavatā arthavargīyeṣu /
tgt_original: 如世尊義品說：

src_original: yāḥ kāñcana saṃvṛtayo hi loke sarvā hi tā munirno upaiti /
tgt_original: 「世間集言說，　　牟尼悉不著，

src_original: rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni yā rūpamityevamādyāḥ prajñaptayaḥ /
tgt_original: 」此偈顯示以色等假名施設色等事，是名世間集言說。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: samāropāpavādikā dṛṣṭirasya nāsti /
tgt_original: 建立及謗無有此見故。

src_original: akṛte ca kṛtābhimānaṃ tyājayati /  aprāpte asparśite asākṣātkṛte sākṣātkṛtābhimānaṃ tyājayati /
tgt_original: 八者除不作作增上慢，不得得、不觸觸、不證證增上慢。

src_original: ato 'sau tasyā viparyāsapratyupasthānāyā dṛṣṭerabhāvādanupaga ityucyate /
tgt_original: 無彼顛倒見，是名見不著。

src_original: sa evamanapagaḥ san kenopādadīta /  tayā dṛṣṭyā vinā tadvastusamāropato vāpavādato vā anupādadānaḥ samyagdarśī bhavati jñeye tadasya dṛṣṭam /
tgt_original: 如是不著，誰能起見著於色等事，若建立、若誹謗？ 不起著正觀境界，是名為見；

src_original: yastasyaiva jñeyasyābhilāpānuśravastadasya śrutam /  tasmin dṛṣṭaśrute tṛṣṇāṃ notpādayati na vivardhayati /
tgt_original: 聽所知言說，是名為聞，是故見聞不起染著。

src_original: panaścoktaṃ bhagavatā saṃthakātyāyanamārabhya-iha saṃtha bhikṣurna pṛthivīṃ niśritya dhyāyati /  nāpaḥ /  na tejaḥ /  na vāyum /  (Dutt 34) nākāśavijñānākiñcanyanaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ nemaṃ lokaṃ na paraṃ lokaṃ  nobhau sūryācandramasau na dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātaṃ prāptaṃ paryeṣitaṃ manasānuvitarkitamanuvicāritam /
tgt_original: 復次佛為訕大迦旃延比丘說「比丘不依地修禪，不依水火風，不依空、識、無所有、非想非非想，非此世非他世、非日月、非見聞覺知、非求非得非覺非觀，不依此等而修禪定。

src_original: tatsarvaṃ na niśritya dhyāyati /  kathaṃ dhyāyī /  pṛthivīṃ na niśritya dhyāyati vistareṇa yāvat sarvaṃ na niśritya dhyāyati /
tgt_original: 云何不依地乃至不依覺觀而修禪定？

src_original: apsu apsaṃjñā vistareṇa yāvat sarvatra yā saṃjñā sā vibhūtā bhavati /
tgt_original: 若地地想除，乃至一切一切想除。

tgt_original: 好色眾生變為惡色、惡色眾生變為好色、或好惡色變為中色、或中間色變為好惡色。

src_original: yathā suvarṇadurvarṇatāmevaṃ vyaṅgāvyaṅgatāṃ kṛśa sthūlatāmityevamādi yatkiñcidanyathā satsvalakṣaṇataḥ śakyarūpañcā [nyathā] 'dhimucyate /  tatsarvaṃ tathā bhavati yathā 'dhimucyate /
tgt_original: 如好惡色，支節具足若不具足、若肥若瘦如是等比所有自相，能變其色自在無礙，非一切變隨其所欲。

src_original: asthitasya cittasyādito 'vasthitaye samyagālambanopanibandhaḥ /  sthitacittasya ca svārthaprāptaye samyagupāyamārgadeśanā /
tgt_original: 三處者，先未住心，令係念緣中； 已住心者，說得自義正方便道；

src_original: tatra gamanāgamanam /  tiraḥ kuḍyaṃ tiraḥ śailaṃ tiraḥ prākāramasajyamānena kāyena gacchati vistareṇa yāvadbrahmalokamupasaṃkrāmati  pratyāgacchati ca yāvadakaniṣṭhādūrdhvaṃ tiryagvā punaryāvadaprameyānasaṃkhyeyāṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasrān
tgt_original: 來去者，石壁無礙，上至梵世乃至色究竟天，若來若去悉得自在，周遍十方無量無邊三千大千世界。

src_original: lokadhātūn gacchati āgacchati ca kāyena vā audārikeṇa cāturmahābhautikena /
tgt_original: 若化身、若麁四大身，若來若去亦復如是。

src_original: dūraṃ cāsannamadhimucya manaḥsadṛśena vā javena gacchati cāgacchati ca /  tatra saṃkṣepaprathanam /
tgt_original: 若遠近想，即時往返。

src_original: himavantamapi parvatarājaṃ paramāṇumātramabhisaṃkṣipati /  paramāṇumapi hima vantaṃ parvatarājaṃ pratānayati /
tgt_original: 大小者，能令雪山如一微塵、令一微塵如雪山王。

src_original: tatra cittendriyāśayānuśayajñānena yathāyogamavatāramukhāvatāraṇatayā ca cittasthitaye samyagālambanopanibandho veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 知彼心根悕望結使，隨應度門而度脫之，令心止住係念緣中。

src_original: tatra sarvarūpakāyapraveśanam /  mahatyā vicitrāyāḥ pariṣadaḥ purastāt sa grāmanigamatṛṇavana[-bhūmi-]parvataṃ rūpakāyamātmakāye praveśayati /  sā ca sarvā pariṣattasminneva kāye praviṣṭamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte /
tgt_original: 色像入身者，諸沙門婆羅門一切大眾，若村若城草木叢林及諸山地，一切色像悉內身中，時諸大眾各各自見入菩薩身。

src_original: tatra sabhāgatopasaṃkrāntiḥ /  kṣatriyapariṣada mupasaṃkrāmati /  upasaṃkrāntasya yādṛśī teṣāṃ varṇapuṣkalatā bhavati tādṛśī tasya /  yādṛśa ārohapariṇāhastādṛśastasya bhavati /  yādṛśī svaraguptisteṣāṃ tādṛśī tasya bhavati /
tgt_original: 所往相似者，若至剎利眾，如彼色像，身量脩短音聲語言悉與彼同。

src_original: yañca te 'rthaṃ mantrayante tamasāvarthaṃ mantrayate /
tgt_original: 彼之所說，與彼同說；

src_original: yamapi te 'rthaṃ na mantrayante tamapi so 'rthaṃ na mantrayate /  uttaraṃ caitānānudhārmyā kathayā saṃdarśayitvā samādāpayitvā samuttejayitvā saṃpraharṣayitvā 'ntarddhīyate /  antarhitañcainaṃ na prajānanti ko 'nveṣo 'ntarhito devo vā manuṣyo veti /
tgt_original: 彼所不能，為其開演，廣說正法令歡喜已即於前沒，不令彼知誰出誰沒、為天為人？

src_original: yathā kṣatriyapariṣadamevaṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatiśramaṇapariṣadaṃ cāturmahārājakāyikān  devān trayastriṃśān yāmāṃstuṣitānnirmāṇaratīnparanirmitavaśavartino devānevaṃ brahmakāyikān  brahmapurohitānmahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhānapramāṇābhānābhāsvarān parīttaśubhānapramāṇaśubhān  śubhakṛssnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalānasaṃjñisattvān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān  sudarśanānakaniṣṭhān /
tgt_original: 如剎利婆羅門居士沙門眾，四天王天、三十三天、夜摩天、兜率陀天、化樂天、他化自在天、梵身天、梵眾天、大梵天、少光天、無量光天、光音天、少淨天、無量淨天、遍淨天、無障天、福生天、廣果天、無煩天、無熱天、善見天、善現天、色究竟天亦復如是。

src_original: tatrāvirbhāvatirobhāvaḥ /  mahatyā pariṣadaḥ purastācchatakṛtvaḥ sahasrakṛtvaḥ ato vā pareṇāntardhīyate /  punaśca tathaivātmabhāva mupadarśayatyāviṣkaroti /
tgt_original: 隱顯者，於大眾前作百作千，或復過是乃至無量，然後還沒、沒已復現。

src_original: tatra vaśitvakaraṇam /  yāvān kaścit sattvadhātuḥ taṃ sarva gamanāgamanasthānādyāsu kriyāsu saṃvartayati /  sa cedasyai vaṃ bhavati gacchatu gacchati /
tgt_original: 自在者，菩薩能令眾生若來若去、若住若語。

src_original: tatra śāśvatocchedāntāsadgrāhapratipakṣeṇa madhyamayā pratipadā sthitacittasya svārthaprāptaye samyagupāyamārgadeśanā veditavyā /
tgt_original: 彼執斷常，對治為說中道。 令住心者，成就自義正方便道。

src_original: tiṣṭhatu tiṣṭhati /  āgacchatvāgacchati /  bhāṣatāṃ bhāṣate /  tatra pararddhyabhibhavaḥ /  tathāgatastadanyeṣāṃ sarvarddhimatāmṛdhyabhisaṃskāramabhibhūya yathākāmaṃ sarvaṃ saṃpādayati /
tgt_original: 障他神通者，如來神力悉能障蔽諸餘神力，亦能令現。

src_original: niṣṭhāgato bodhisattva ekajātipratibaddhaśca caramabhaviko vā tathāgataṃ sthāpayitvā tulyajātīyañca bodhisattvaṃ tadanyeṣāṃ (Dutt 44)  sarveṣāmṛddhyabhisaṃskāramabhibhavati /  tadanye bodhisattvā utkṛṣṭatarabhūmipraviṣṭāṃstulyajātīyāṃśca bodhisattvān sthāpayitvā tadanyeṣāṃ sarvarddhimatāmṛddhyabhisaṃskāramabhibhavanti
tgt_original: 究竟菩薩一生補處，除如來及等行菩薩，悉能障蔽。 其餘菩薩，除上及等，亦悉能障。

src_original: tatra pratibhānadānam /  pratibhā[na]dāne paryādatte pratibhānamupasaṃharati /
tgt_original: 與辯者，無辯眾生能與辯才。

src_original: tatra smṛtidānam /  dharmeṣu smṛtau pramuṣitāyāṃ smṛtimupasaṃharati /
tgt_original: 與念者，於法失念能令憶念。

src_original: tatra sukhadānam /  ye 'sya bhāṣamāṇasya dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti teṣāṃ tādṛśaṃ kāyikaṃ caitasikamanugrahamupasaṃharati pratiprasrabdhi sukham /  yena te vigatanivaraṇā dharmaṃ śrṛṇvanti /
tgt_original: 與樂者，廣說正法令彼得聞，隨彼身心攝取饒益得止息樂，離諸陰蓋專心聽法隨其時節。

src_original: tacca tāvatkālikayogena na tvatyantam dhātuvaiṣamikāṃścaupakramikānamanuṣyābhisṛṣṭāṃścopasargān vyupaśamayati /
tgt_original: 非究竟樂四大錯亂能令調適，非人所惱亦令休息。

src_original: tatra raśmipramokṣaḥ bodhisattvo vā tathāgato vā ṛddhyātadrūpān raśmīn kāyatpramuñcati  ya ekatyā daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā nārakāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ nārakāṇi  duḥkhāni pratiprasrambhayati /  ekatyā devalokasthānudārān devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragān svabhavanasthān gatvā ihāgamanāya saṃcodayati /  tathā tadanyalokadhātusthitān bodhisattvānihāgamanāya saṃcodayati daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu /
tgt_original: 放大光明者，謂佛菩薩神力放光遍至十方無量世界，地獄眾生苦痛休息，上至諸天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人非人等，令見光明來至佛所，他方世界諸菩薩眾悉皆來集。

src_original: samāsatasthāgataḥ aprameyairasaṃkhyeyairnānāprakārai raśmibhirapramāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ vicitramaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamarthaṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 略說十方世界無量諸佛無量光明，饒益安樂無量眾生。

src_original: tatrākṛte yāvadasākṣātkṛte sākṣātkṛtābhimānatyājanatayā aniṣṭhitasvakāryasyāntarādhiṣṭhānaparityāgo veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 彼不作作慢乃至不證證慢未究竟者，令捨中住。

src_original: te punarete sarve pāriṇāmikyā ṛddhyāḥ prakārā ekaikaśaḥ prabhidyamānā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā veditavyāḥ /  anyathā prakṛtyā vidyamānasya vastunastadanyathāvikārāpādanatā pariṇāma ityucyate /  tasmādeṣā pāriṇāmikī ṛddhirityucyate /
tgt_original: 是名轉變神足。 若以種分別則無量無數，除其自性變為餘事，是故名為轉變神足。

src_original: tatra nairmāṇikī ṛddhiḥ katamā /
tgt_original: 云何化神足？

src_original: samāsato nirvastukaṃ nirmāṇam /  nirmāṇacittena yathākāmamabhisaṃskṛtaṃ smṛddhyatīyaṃ nairmāṇikī ṛddhirityucyate /
tgt_original: 略說無事化作，隨其所欲悉能化現，是名化神足。

src_original: sā cānekavidhā /  kāyanirmāṇaṃ vāḍnirmāṇaṃ viṣayanirmāṇañca /
tgt_original: 是化多種，或化身或化語。

src_original: tatpunaḥ kāyanirmāṇamātmano vā sadṛśaṃ visadṛśaṃ vā parasya vā sadṛśaṃ visadṛśaṃ vā nirmimīte /  tatpunaḥ kāyanirmāṇamātmanastu pareṣāñca sadṛśāsadṛśam /  indriyasabhāgamindriyādhiṣṭhānaṃ nirmimīte na tvindriyam /
tgt_original: 化身者，或似自身或不似，或似他身或不似，又自身他身相似不相似，化作相似根及根所依，非作實根。

src_original: viṣayasadṛśamapi nirmāṇaṃ (Dutt 45) nirmimīte /  tadyathā bhojanapānādi maṇimuktāvaidūryādi ca yatkiñcidrūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyasaṃgṛhītaṃ bāhyamupakaraṇaṃ tatsadṛśaṃ tadvinirmuktaṃ sarvaṃ yathākāmaṃ nirmimīte /
tgt_original: 又復化作相似境界，謂飲食眾寶色香味觸所攝眾具，一切隨意。

src_original: tatpunarātmasabhāgamanekavidhaṃ bahu nānāprakāraṃ devanāga[yakṣā]suragaruḍakinnaramahoragavarṇa  manuṣyavarṇa tiryakpretanārakavarṇaṃ śrāvakavarṇaṃ pratyekabuddhavarṇaṃ bodhisattvavarṇaṃ tathāgatavarṇam /  sa yadi tādṛśa eva bodhisattvo bhavati tādṛśameva nirmimīte /  ātmasabhāgamasya tannirmāṇaṃ bhavati /  anyathā tu visabhāgaṃ bhavati nirmāṇamātmanaḥ /
tgt_original: 又自身相似，或作一身或作無量，天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人非人等種種色像，人及畜生餓鬼地獄、聲聞緣覺菩薩如來，如是色像，隨其所應悉能化作自相似身，若異自身名不相似。

src_original: sa cetparaṃ devabhūtaṃ tatsādṛśyena nirmimīte parasadṛśamasya tannirmāṇaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 他天身等化令相似，是名他相似化。

src_original: sacedvaisādṛśyena nirmimīte paravisabhāgaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 若作彼天不相似身，是名他身不相似化。

src_original: yathā devabhūtamevaṃ yāvattathāgatabhūtaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 如天身乃至佛身亦復如是。

src_original: tatra prabhūtakāyanirmāṇaṃ katamat /  iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sakṛdaprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānām arthaṃ karoti tairvicitravarṇanirmitaiḥ
tgt_original: 無量身者，謂佛菩薩於十方無量無數世界，一時化作種種色像，饒益十方無量眾生。

src_original: kiñcicca nirmāṇamadhitiṣṭhati yaduparate 'pi bodhisattve tathāgete vā 'nuvartata eva /  kiñcinnirmāṇaṃ buddhabodhisattvānāṃ kevalaṃ sattvānāṃ vidarśanāya māyopamaṃ bhavati /  kiñcitpunarbhūtaṃ bhojanapānayānavastrādimaṇimuktāvaidūryaśaṃkhaśīlāpravāḍādi ca nirmitaṃ bhavati /  tathaiva nānyathā /  idantāvat kāyanirmāṇaṃ viṣayanirmāṇaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 佛及菩薩雖至餘方，化住如故，或為眾生暫現如幻，或作飲食衣服車乘金銀真珠琉璃頗梨珂珼玉石如是等物，一切化現如實不異常得受用，是名化身。

src_original: vāṅnirmāṇaṃ punarasti susvaratāyuktam /  asti viśadasvarānvitaṃ svasambaddhaṃ parasambaddhamasambaddhaṃ dharmadeśanāsaṃgṛhītaṃ pramattasaṃcodanā-saṃgṛhītañca /  tatra susvaratā /  buddhabodhisattvānāṃ nirmito vāgvyāhāro gambhīro bhavati megharavaḥ kalaviṅkamanojñasvarasadṛśo hṛdayaṃgamaḥ gremaṇīyaḥ /  paurī ca sā vāṅnirmitā bhavati valguvispaṣṭā vijñeyā śravaṇīyā apratikūlā aniśritā aparyantā /
tgt_original: 化語者，妙音具足、廣音具足，或從自身起、或從他身起、或無所從起，或說正法、或隨事教責。

src_original: tatra viśadasvaratā /  ākāṃkṣamāṇaḥ tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā vicitrāṃ devanāgayakṣāsura garuḍakinnaramahoragaśrāvakabodhisattvapariṣadaṃ (Dutt 46)  sanniṣaṇṇāṃ sannipatitāṃ yāvadyojanaśatapariṣanmaṇḍalaparyantāṃ sarvāṃ svareṇa suparipūrṇena vijñāpayati ye 'pi dūre ya 'pyantike niṣaṇṇāḥ /  ākāṃkṣamāṇaḥ sāhasrikacūḍikalokadhātun svareṇa vijñāpayati /  dvisāhasraṃ vā trisāhasraṃ vā yāvaddaśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyān lokadhātūn svareṇa vijñāpayati /
tgt_original: 妙音者，謂佛菩薩化作口語，其聲深遠猶如雷震，或復微妙如迦陵毘伽音，可樂聲、悅樂聲、可愛聲，如是廣化無量音聲，言辭辯正，易知憙聞，隨順無盡。 廣聲者，謂佛菩薩化大音聲，令天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人非人等，聲聞緣覺諸大菩薩無量眾會，乃至一由旬若內若外周遍普聞，若小千世界、中千世界、大千世界，乃至十方無量世界亦悉普聞，為眾生故，從其自身以一音聲說無量法。

src_original: tasmācca ghoṣādanekaprakārā sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanā niścarati /  yā sattvānāmarthāya saṃvartate /  tatra svasambaddhaṃ vāṅnirmāṇaṃ yatsvayameva nirmitayā vācā dharmaṃ vā deśayati pramattaṃ vā saṃcodayati /  parasaṃbaddhaṃ punaryat paranirmitayā vācā dharmaṃ vā deśayati pramattaṃ vā saṃcodayati /
tgt_original: 從他起者，化作他語，為人說法，除其放逸。

src_original: tatrāsambaddhaṃ vāṅnirmāṇaṃ yadākāśāt vāṅniścarati nirmitādvā na sattvasantānāt /
tgt_original: 無所從起者，空中化聲猶如人語。

src_original: tatra dharmadeśanānirmāṇaṃ yat tatra tatra sammūḍhānāṃ yuktisaṃdarśanārtham /
tgt_original: 說正法者，為愚癡眾生演說正法，令得開解。

src_original: tatra codanānirmāṇaṃ yadasammūḍhānāṃ pratilabdhaprasādānāṃ pramattānāṃ pramāde hrīsaṃjananāya apramāde ca samādāpanāya /
tgt_original: 隨事教責者，彼雖不疑，得信樂心而為放逸，令生慚愧起不放逸。

src_original: tadetadanekavidhaṃ nirmāṇam /  samāsataḥ kāyanirmāṇaṃ vāṅnirmāṇaṃ viṣaya nirmāṇañca veditavyam /  itīyaṃ nairmāṇikī ṛddhiḥ /
tgt_original: 如是眾多，略說三種： 化身、化聲、化境界，是名化神足。

src_original: eṣāpi caikaikaprakārabhedenāprameyā cāsaṃkhyeyā ca veditavyā /
tgt_original: 若一一分別則有無量。

src_original: sā punareṣā dvividhāpi ṛddhirbuddhabodhisattvānāṃ samāsato dve kārye niṣpādayati /
tgt_original: 如是諸佛菩薩二種神足，能辦二事：

src_original: āvarjayitvā vā ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa sattvān buddhaśāsane 'vatārayati anugrahaṃ vā anekavidhaṃ bahu nānāprakāraṃ duḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāmupasaṃharati
tgt_original: 一者為令眾生生信樂故，神足現化令入佛法； 二者攝苦眾生安隱利益。

src_original: nāma te sattvā yatrāhamabhūvamevannāmeti vistareṇa yathāsūtraṃ sattvakāyadikaṃ sarvamanusmarati /
tgt_original: 謂佛菩薩自知宿命，如是眾生是我名字，如契經廣說。

src_original: yathā cātmanātmanaḥ samanusmarati tathā pareṣāmapi anusmārayati /  svayameva ca pareṣāmanusmarati /
tgt_original: 知他宿命亦如己身，自知宿命能令他知。

src_original: ye 'pi te sattvakāyāḥ pūrvānte yannivāsāstānapyātmanā (Dutt 47)
tgt_original: 所知眾生本同事者，亦能令彼自識宿命。

src_original: smarati pareṣāṃ smārayati amukā nāma te sattvā yatrāhamabhūvamevaṃnāmeti vistareṇa /  teṣāmapi sattvānāṃ tathaiva sarvaṃ pūrvenivāsamanusmarati yathaivātmano dṛṣṭadharme /  sūkṣmamapi samanusmarati yatkiñcidalpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā pūrvaceṣṭitaṃ pūrvameva cetayitvā apramuṣitam /
tgt_original: 彼諸眾生知與菩薩昔同事已，亦復知餘眾生與己同事，亦復能令其餘眾生展轉相知，宿命名字名字等種種因緣。

src_original: kṣaṇaṃ nairantaryayogenāvicchinnaṃ yayaivānupūrvyā kṛtamitamapyanusmarati /  yasya kalpagaṇanāyogena śakyā saṃkhyāṃ kartum aprameyāsaṃkhyeyamapyanusmarati /  yasya kalpagaṇanāyogenāśakyā saṃkhyāṃ kartum avyāhatamasya samāsataḥ pūrvenivāsajñānaṃ pravartate yatreṣṭaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ yāvadiṣṭam /  evaṃrūpo bodhisattvasya tathāgatasya ca pūrvenivāsasaṃgṛhītaḥ prabhāvaḥ /
tgt_original: 從今現在及過去世。 念念中間，巨細多少次第悉知，是名諸佛菩薩宿命智通。

src_original: sa tena pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānena jātakān pūrvān bodhisattvacaryāṃ sattvānāṃ buddhe  bhagavati prasādajananārthaṃ gauravotpādanārthaṃ ca vicitrānanekaprakārān prakāśayati  itivṛttakāṃśca pūrvayogapratisaṃyuktān sattvānāṃ karmaphalavipākamārabhya /  śāśvatadṛṣṭikānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ śāśvatadṛṣṭiṃ nāśayati tadyathā pūrvāntakalpakānāṃ śāśvatavādināmekatya-śāśvatikānāṃ vā /
tgt_original: 菩薩自知宿世行菩薩道未曾有事，能為眾生開示顯現令其敬信愛樂佛法厭離生死，亦為顯示過去因果，令計常者遠離常見，謂於過去妄想常見及以斷見。

src_original: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā divyena śrotreṇa divyān mānuṣyakān śabdānāryānapyanāryānapi ghanānapyaṇukānapi vyaktānapyavktānapi nirmitānapyanirmitānapi dūrāntikasthān śṛṇoti /  tatra divyāḥ śabdāḥ ūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanopapannānāṃ sattvānām /
tgt_original: 謂佛菩薩天眼清淨過於人眼，見諸眾生死時，好色惡色下色上色，乃至後生漸漸增長諸根成熟。 身諸所作善、不善、無記，天眼光明照見悉知。

src_original: tatrāryāḥ śabdāḥ /  ye buddhānāṃ buddhaśrāvakānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāñca /  teṣāṃ vā 'ntikācchrutvānuśrāvayatāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ sattvānām /  tadyathā saṃdarśayatāṃ samādāpayatāṃ vā samuttejayatāṃ saṃpraharṣayatāṃ kuśalasamādānamārabhyākuśalatyāgañca /
tgt_original: 謂佛菩薩以天耳聞天人音聲、聖聲非聖聲、麁聲細聲、辯聲不辯聲、化聲非化聲、遠聲近聲，一切悉聞。

src_original: aṇukāḥ śabdāḥ /  antato yāvat karṇajāpaśabdāḥ /  vyaktāḥ śabdāḥ /
tgt_original: 天聲者，從四天王乃至色究竟。

src_original: yeṣāmartho na vijñāyate /  tadyathā drāmiḍānāṃmantrāṇāṃ vāyuvanaspatiśukasārikākokilajīvaṃjīvakādīnām /  tatra nirmitāḥ śabdāḥ /  ye ṛddhimadbhiścetovaśiprāptairvā ṛddhyabhisaṃskṛtāḥ /
tgt_original: 聖聲者，謂諸佛菩薩聲聞緣覺所出音聲，教誡眾生，所謂示教讚喜，令修善法捨不善法。 彼諸眾生無染心者，受誦論議如法問難，與念教誡及餘一切善語利益。

src_original: dūrāḥ śabdāḥ /
tgt_original: 如是等聲是名聖聲。

src_original: yatra grāme kṣetre vihāre vā tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā viharati tatra ye śabdā niścaranti tān sthāpayitvā tadanyatra yāvadaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu /  cyutyupapattijñānaṃ buddhabodhisattvānāṃ katamat /  iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyati cyutikāle 'pi cyutānapi suvarṇadurvarṇān hīnapraṇītānaparānte ca jātān /  vṛddheścānvayādindriyāṇāṃ paripākādvicitre kāyaceṣṭite kuśalākuśalāvyākṛteṣu pravartamānān /
tgt_original: 非聖聲者，謂諸眾生妄語、兩舌、惡口、綺語，從無擇獄上至諸天，諸方眾生種種諸聲。

src_original: tatra divyena cakṣuṣā tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā daśasu dikṣu kāyaceṣṭitaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ dṛṣṭvā yathāyogaṃ yathārha teṣu sattveṣu pratipadyate  divyena ca śrotreṇa vākceṣṭitaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ śrutvā teṣu sattveṣu yathāyogaṃ yathārhaṃ pratipadyate /  evaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā divyena śrotreṇa bodhisattvastathāgato vā samāsena karma karoti /
tgt_original: 隨眾生心化作諸聲。 遠聲者，除佛菩薩所住村落城邑中聲，其餘乃至十方無量世界一切音聲。 諸佛菩薩以天眼見乃至十方身之所作淨不淨色，見已方便隨宜利益，以天耳聞口之所行淨不淨聲，聞已方便隨宜利益，是名略說諸佛菩薩天眼天耳之所作為。

src_original: tatra cetaḥparyāyajñānaṃ buddhabodhisattvānāṃ katamat /
tgt_original: 云何知他心智通？

src_original: iha bodhisattvo vā tathāgato vā pareṣāṃ daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ kleśaparyavasthitamapi cittaṃ jānāti /  vigatakleśaparyavasthānamapi kleśasānubandhaṃ sānuśayamapi kleśaniranubandhaṃ niranuśayamapi mithyāpraṇihitamapi cittaṃ jānāti /
tgt_original: 謂佛菩薩以知他心智通，知十方無量無邊世界眾生煩惱纏心、知離煩惱纏心、知煩惱相續煩惱使心、知離煩惱相續煩惱使心；

src_original: tadyathā tīrthikacittaṃ sāmiṣābhiprāyasya kliṣṭamapi cittaṃ samyak praṇihitamapi cittaṃ jānāti /
tgt_original: 知邪願心，所謂外道心及貪求心；

src_original: etadviparyayeṇa hīnamapi cittaṃ jānāti /  tadyathā kāmadhātūpapannānāṃ sarvasattvānāmantato mṛgapakṣiṇāmapi /
tgt_original: 知下心，謂欲界眾生乃至禽獸心；

src_original: madhyamacittaṃ jānāti tadyathā sarveṣāṃ rūpadhātūpapannānāṃ sattvānām /
tgt_original: 知中心，謂色界天心；

src_original: praṇītamapi cittaṃ jānāti tadyathā sarveṣāmārūpyopapannāṃ sattvānām /
tgt_original: 知上心，謂無色界天心。

src_original: sukhaprasaṃyuktamapi duḥkhaprasaṃyuktamapyaduḥkhāsukhavedanāsaṃprayuktamapi cittaṃ jānāti /
tgt_original: 知苦相應心、知樂相應心、知不苦不樂相應心。

src_original: ekena paracittajñānenaikasya sattvasya yasya yadyathā yādṛśaṃ yāvaccitaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati tatsakṛdyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /  ekenaiva paracittajñānena prabhūtānāmapi sattvānāṃ yeṣāṃ yadyathā yādṛśaṃ yāvaccittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati tadapi sakṛdyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
tgt_original: 一念他心智，知一眾生心，隨其所念悉如實知。 一念他心智知無量眾生心，隨其所念悉如實知。

src_original: sā punariyamabhijñā buddhasya bodhisattvānāmindriyaparāparajñānāya sattvānāṃ nānādhimuktijñānāya  nānādhātucaritajñānāya yathāyogañca pratipatsu citrāsu nirvāṇapuraḥsarīṣu samyaksanniyogāya /
tgt_original: 復次諸佛菩薩知他心智通，為種種根力、種種解力、種種界力、至處道力、漏盡力，隨其所應而作方便。

src_original: idamasyāḥ karma veditavyam /  tatrāsravakṣayajñānaṃ buddhabodhisattvānāṃ katamat /  iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā kleśānāṃ kṣayaprāptiṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
tgt_original: 云何漏盡智通？ 謂佛菩薩煩惱盡如實知，謂己及眾生，若盡若不盡悉如實知。

src_original: evamebhistribhiḥ sthānairaṣṭavidho 'vavādaḥ saṃgṛhīto veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 如是三事，攝八種教授。

src_original: āsravakṣayaprāptyupāyamapyātmanaḥ pareṣāñca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /  (Dutt 50) yathā upāyamevamanupāyamapi yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
tgt_original: 己及眾生漏盡方便，已起未起悉如實知。

src_original: āsravakṣayaprāptāvabhimānaṃ pareṣāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /  nirabhimānamapi yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
tgt_original: 彼諸眾生，起漏盡增上慢、不起漏盡增上慢，悉如實知。

src_original: bodhisattvaḥ punaḥ sarvaṃ caitat prajānātyāsravakṣayañca svayaṃ na sākṣātkaroti /
tgt_original: 菩薩一切漏盡如實知，而不證漏盡。

src_original: ataḥ sāsravañca svayaṃ na sākṣātkaroti /  ataḥ sāsravāñca vastu bodhisattvaḥ sahasravairna vijahāti /
tgt_original: 菩薩不捨煩惱，具諸有漏事，常行彼事而不染污。

src_original: na ca saṃkliśyata iti so 'sya sarvaprabhāvāṇāṃ mahattamaḥ prabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 如是力者，名最上力。

src_original: tena khalvāsravakṣayajñānena buddhabodhisattvāḥ svayaṃ na kliśyante /  pareṣāñca vyapadiśantya bhimānañca nāśayanti /
tgt_original: 又佛菩薩漏盡智通，自離煩惱，亦為眾生廣分別說，令其捨離增上慢心，當作是知。

src_original: idamasya karma veditavyam /
tgt_original: 是漏盡智業。

src_original: tatra dharmaprabhāvaḥ katamaḥ /
tgt_original: 云何法力？

src_original: sa punareṣa dānādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prabhāvaḥ samāsataścaturbhirākārairveditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 此六波羅蜜各有四事：

src_original: vipakṣaprahāṇataḥ saṃbhāraparipākataḥ svaparānugrahataḥ āyatyāṃ phaladānataśca /
tgt_original: 一者對治； 二者成菩提具； 三者攝取自他； 四者得未來果。

src_original: dānaṃ dadad bodhisattvo dānavipakṣaṃ mātsaryaṃ prajahāti /
tgt_original: 云何布施四事？ 一者布施對治慳貪。

src_original: ātmano bodhisaṃbhārabhūtañca bhavati tadasya dānam /
tgt_original: 二者成菩提具。

src_original: dānena ca saṃgrahavastunā sattvān paripācayati /  pūrvaṃ dānāt sumanā dadaccittaṃ prasādayati /  dattvā cāvipratisārī /  triṣu kāleṣu pramuditacittatayā ātmānamanugṛhaṇāti /
tgt_original: 三者以施攝取成就眾生，欲施善心、清淨心施、施已不悔，三時歡喜，以自饒益是名自攝。

src_original: pareṣāṃ ca jighatsāpipāsāśotoṣṇavyādhīcchāvighātabhayaduḥkhāpanayanāt paramanugṛhṇāti /
tgt_original: 彼諸眾生飢渴寒熱疾病所須，眾難恐怖悉令遠離，以此饒益是名攝他。

src_original: paratra ca yatra yatra pratyājāyate āḍhyo bhavati mahābhogo mahāpakṣo mahāparivāra ityeṣa caturākāro dānasya prabhāvo nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ
tgt_original: 四者以是因緣，在在所生得大財富、得大種性、得大眷屬，是名布施四功德力無餘無上。

src_original: kāyavāksaṃvaraśīlaṃ samādadāno bodhisattvaḥ śīlavipakṣaṃ dauḥśīlyaṃ prajahāti /
tgt_original: 云何持戒四事？ 一者受身口律儀，對治犯戒。

src_original: bodheśca saṃbhārabhūtaṃ bhavati tadasya śīlasamādānam /
tgt_original: 二者成菩提具。

src_original: samānārthatayā ca saṃgrahavastunā sattvān paripācayati /  dauḥśīlyapratyayaṃ bhayamavadyaṃ vairaṃ prajahadātmānamanugṛhaṇāti sukhaṃ svapan sukhaṃ pratibudhyamānaḥ /
tgt_original: 三者受持淨戒，同利攝取成就眾生，遠離犯戒怨家恐怖臥覺常安，以自饒益。

src_original: tathā śīlavato 'vipratisāraḥ prāmodyaṃ yāvaccittasamādhiḥ /  ityevamātmānamanugṛhṇāti /
tgt_original: 又持戒者，心不悔恨常得歡喜，乃至心定諸自利事，是名自攝。

src_original: sarvasattvānāñca sarvaprakārairaviheṭhanatayā abhayamanuprayacchati /  evaṃ paramapyanugṛhṇāti /
tgt_original: 普施眾生一切無畏，是名攝他。

src_original: (Dutt 51) tannidānañca kāyasya bhedātsugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyate /  ityayaṃ caturākāraḥ prabhāvaḥ śīlasya /  nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
tgt_original: 四者以是因緣命終生天，是名持戒四功德力無餘無上。

src_original: kṣamo bodhisattvaḥ kṣāntivipakṣamakṣānti prajahāti /
tgt_original: 云何忍辱四事？ 一者修忍對治不忍。

src_original: bodheśca saṃbhārabhūtā sāsya kṣānti rbhavati /  samānārthatayaiva ca sattvān paripācayati /  ātmānañca parañca mahato bhayātparitrāyamāṇastayā kṣyāntyā ātmānañca paraṃścānugṛhṇāti /
tgt_original: 二者成菩提具。 三者以堅固忍，同利攝取成就眾生，自身及他度大恐怖，是名自他俱攝。

src_original: eva mevāvavādaṃ parato vā labhamāno bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ vānuprayacchannaṣṭānāṃ balānāṃ  gotraṃ krameṇa viśodhayati vivardhayati dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalasyendriyaparāparajñānabalasya  nānādhimuktijñānabalasya nānādhātujñānabalasya sarvatra gāminī pratipaj jñānabalasya  pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānabalasya cyutyupapattijñānabalasya ca /  (Dutt 79)
tgt_original: 如是菩薩從他受教，教授他已，八力種性清淨增長，所謂禪定解脫三昧正受智力、諸根利鈍智力、種種解智力、種種界智力、一切至處道智力、宿命智力、生死智力、漏盡智力。

src_original: tato nidānañca bodhisattva āyatyāmavairabahulo bhavatyabhedabahulaścāduḥkhadaurmanasyabahulaḥ /  dṛṣṭe ca dharme 'vipratisārī kālaṃ karoti /  kāyasya ca bhedātsugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyate /  ityayañcaturākāraḥ kṣānteḥ prabhāvo nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
tgt_original: 四者以是因緣，於未來世無有怨憎無別離者，既無別離亦無憂苦，臨命終時心不悔恨，捨此身已生人天中，是名堪忍四功德力無餘無上。

src_original: ārabdhavīryo bodhisattvo viharan vīryavipakṣaṃ kausīdyaṃ prajahāti /
tgt_original: 云何精進四事？ 一者精進對治懈怠。

src_original: bodheśca saṃbhārabhūtaṃ bhavati sanniśrayaśca tadvīryam /  samānārthatayaiva ca sattvān paripācayati /  ārabdhavīryaśca sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharannavyavakīrṇaḥ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaḥ pūrveṇāparaṃ viśeṣādhigamaṃ paśyan prītiprāmodyenātmānamanugṛhṇāti
tgt_original: 二者成菩提具。 三者依勤精進，同利攝取成就眾生，精進樂住離諸惡法功德增長，歡喜悅豫以自饒益，是名自攝。

src_original: tatrānuśāsanaṃ katamat /
tgt_original: 云何教誡？

src_original: kuśalapakṣābhiyuktaśca paraṃ na kāyena vācā vā viheṭhayati /  pareṣāṃ cārabdhavīryatāyāṃ chandaṃ janayati /  evaṃ paramapyanugṛhṇāti /
tgt_original: 精勤修善，不以身口恐怖眾生，眾生見已亦樂精進，是名攝他。

src_original: hetubalikaśca bhavati āyatyāṃ puruṣakārābhirataśca /  ityayaṃ caturākāro vīryaprabhāvaḥ /  nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
tgt_original: 四者以是因緣，於未來世能成大人奇特功業，是名精進四功德力無餘無上。

src_original: dhyānaṃ samāpadyamāno bodhisattvo dhyānavipakṣaṃ kleśaṃ kāma vitarkaprītisukharūpasaṃjñādīṃścopakleśān prajahāti /
tgt_original: 云何禪定四事？ 一者禪定對治煩惱，言語亂覺喜樂色想煩惱悉滅。

src_original: tatrāyaṃ paripākasvabhāvaḥ /  kuśaladharmavīje sati kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmāsevanānvayād yā kleśajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇaviśuddhyanukūlā  kāyacittakarmaṇyatā kalyatā samyak prayoganiṣṭhā yatra sthitāḥ śāstāraṃ vā āgamyānāgamya  vā śāstāraṃ bhavyo bhavati pratibalo 'nantaraṃ kleśāvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ vā sākṣātkartuṃ  jñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ vā /
tgt_original: 自性成熟者，有善法種子修習、善法隨順二障，清淨解脫身心有力，真實方便具足究竟，有佛無佛堪能次第斷煩惱障及智慧障，如癰已熟至應破時，名之為熟。

src_original: tatpañcavidhaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 略說五種。

src_original: samānārthatayaiva ca sattvān paripācayati /  dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāratayātmānamanugṛhṇāti /  śāntapraśāntavītarāgacittatayā sattveṣvavyābādhyo bhavannavikopyaḥ paramapyanugṛhṇāti /

tgt_original: 若上座說法及決定論時，若自說法若聽法、若自決定論時，若說法眾中、若決定論眾中，不禮不犯。

src_original: (Dutt 111) anāpattistenopāyena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ damayato vinayataḥ akuśalātsthānādvyutthāpya kuśale sthānepratiṣṭhāpayataḥ /  [anāpattiḥ] sāṃdhikakriyākāramanurakṣataḥ anāpattiḥ pareṣāṃ prabhūtatarāṇāṃ cittamanurakṣataḥ /
tgt_original: 若護說者心，若以方便令彼調伏、捨離不善修習善法，若護僧制若護多人意。

src_original: bodhisattvaḥ parairupanimantryamāṇo gṛhe vā vihārāntare vā gṛhāntare vā bhojanapānavastrādibhiḥ pariṣkāraiḥ mānābhinigṛhītaḥ āghātacittaḥ pratighacitto vā na gacchati /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 若菩薩檀越來請，若至自舍、若至寺內、若至餘家，若施衣食種種眾具，菩薩以瞋慢心不受不往，是名為犯眾多犯，是犯染污起。

src_original: ālasyakausīdyānna gacchati akliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /  anāpattirglānaḥ syādapratibalaḥ kṣiptacitto va /  anāpattirviprakṛṣṭo deśaḥ syāt mārgaśca sapratibhayaḥ /  anāpattistenopāyenāsya damayitukāmaḥ syāt vinetukāmo 'kuśalātsthānād vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmaḥ /  anāpattiranyasya pūrvataraṃ pratijñānaṃ bhavet /  anāpattirnirantarakuśalapakṣa-[prayuktasya kuśalapakṣa-]cchidrīkārānurakṣārthamagacchataḥ anāpattirapūrvasyārthopasaṃhitasya dharmārthaśravaṇasya parihāṇihetoḥ /
tgt_original: 不犯者，若病若無力、若狂若遠處、若道路恐難、若知不受令彼調伏捨惡住善、若先受請、若修善法不欲暫廢、為欲得聞未曾有法饒益之義及決定論、若知請者為欺惱故、若護多人嫌恨心故、若護僧制。

src_original: yathā dharmārthaśravaṇasya evaṃ sāṃkathyaviniścayasyāpi veditavyam /  anāpattirviheṭhanābhiprāyeṇa nimantritaḥ syāt /  anāpattiḥ pareṣāṃ prabhūtatarakāṇāmāghatacittamanurakṣataḥ /  anāpattiḥ sāṃdhikaṃ kriyākāramanurakṣataḥ /  bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāmantikājajātarūpajatamaṇimuktāvaidūryādikāni ca dhanajātāni vicitrāṇi
tgt_original: 若菩薩有檀越，以金銀真珠摩尼流璃種種寶物奉施菩薩，菩薩以瞋慢心違逆不受，是名為犯眾多犯，是犯染污，起捨眾生故。

src_original: te tāvanna paraniranurakṣā aprasannānāṃ prasādāya prasannānāñca bhūyobhāvāya śikṣāsu śikṣante /  prāgeva bodhisattvāḥ parārthaparamāḥ /  yatpunaḥ pratikṣepaṇasāvadyamalpārthatāmalpakṛtyatāmalpotsukavihāratāmārabhya śrāvakāṇāṃ bhagavatā vyavasthāpitāṃ tatra bodhisattvo na tulyāṃ śikṣāṃ śrāvakaiḥ karoti /
tgt_original: 聲聞者乃至自度，乃至不離護他，令不信者信、信者增廣學戒，何況菩薩第一義度，又復遮罪住，少利少作少方便。 世尊為聲聞建立者，菩薩不同學此戒。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: śobhate śrāvakaḥ svārthaparamaḥ parārthanirapekṣaḥ parārthamārabhyālpārthaḥ alpakṛtyaścālpotsukavihārī ca /  na tu bodhisattvaḥ parārthaparamaḥ śobhate parārthamārabhyālpārtho 'lpakṛtyaścālpotsukavihārī
tgt_original: 聲聞自度、捨他應住，少利少作少方便； 非菩薩自度，度他應住，少利少作少方便。

src_original: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya duṣkarā priyavāditā /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩難愛語？

src_original: ca tathāhi bodhisattvena pareṣāmarthe cīvaraśatāni sahastrāṇyajñātikānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāmantikātparyeṣitavyāni pravāritena /
tgt_original: 菩薩為眾生故，從非親里婆羅門居士，求百千衣。

src_original: teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ balābalaṃ saṃlakṣya yāvadartha pratigṛhītavyāni /
tgt_original: 及自恣與，當觀施主堪與不堪，隨施應受。

src_original: yathā cīvarakāṇyevaṃ pātrāṇi /
tgt_original: 如衣，鉢亦如是。

src_original: yathā paryeṣitavyānyevaṃ svayaṃ yācitena sūtreṇājñātibhistantuvāyairvāryayitavyāni /
tgt_original: 如衣鉢，如是自乞縷，令非親里織師織，為眾生故，應畜憍奢耶臥具坐具乃至百千，乃至金銀百千亦應受之。

src_original: anāpattiḥ pareṣāṃ bodhisattve manyusambhāvanājātānāmāghātavaimukhyasaṃbhāvanājātānāṃ saumukhyāntarbhāvaśuddhyupadarśanārtham /
tgt_original: 若他疑菩薩，嫌恨違背和顏戲笑，現心淨故。

src_original: [yaḥ] punarbodhisattva evaṃdṛṣṭiḥ syādevaṃvādī na bodhisattvena nirvāṇārāmeṇa vihartavyam /
tgt_original: 若菩薩作如是見、如是說言：

src_original: api tu nirvāṇavimukhena vihartavyam /  na ca kleśopakleśebhyo bhetavyam na caikāntena tebhyaścittaṃ vivecayitavyam /
tgt_original: 「菩薩不應樂涅槃、應背涅槃，不應怖畏煩惱，不應一向厭離。 何以故？

src_original: tathā hi bodhisattvena trīṇi kalpāsaṃkhyeyāni saṃsāre saṃsaratā bodhiḥ samudānetavyeti /
tgt_original: 菩薩應於三阿僧祇劫久受生死求大菩提。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: yathā khalu śrāvakeṇa nirvāṇābhiratirāsevitavyā kleśopakleśebhyaśca cittamudvejayitavyaṃ  tataḥ śatasahasrakoṭiguṇena bodhisattvena nirvāṇābhiratirāsevitavyā kleśopakleśebhyaśca  cetasa udvego bhāvayitavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 聲聞深樂涅槃畏厭煩惱，百千萬倍不及菩薩深樂涅槃畏厭煩惱。

src_original: tathā hi śrāvako 'syātmano 'rthāya prayukto bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya prayuktaḥ /  tena tathā cittāsaṃkleśābhyāsaḥ samudānetavyo yathāyamanarhannapi tatprativiśiṣṭenāsaṃkleśena samanvāgataḥ sāstrave vastuni anuvicaret /
tgt_original: 謂諸聲聞但為自利，菩薩不爾普為眾生，彼習不染污心，勝阿羅漢成就有漏離諸煩惱。

src_original: bodhisattvo 'nādeyavacanakaramapaśabdamātmanaḥ ayaśo 'kīrti na rakṣati na pariharati bhūtavastukām /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 若菩薩不護不信之言、不護譏毀亦不除滅，若實有過惡不除滅者，是名為犯眾多犯，是犯染污起。

src_original: abhūtavastukāṃ na pariharati /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ akliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 實無過惡而不除滅，非染污起。

src_original: anāpattistīrthikaḥ paraḥ syāt /  iti yo vā punaranyo 'pyabhiniviṣṭaḥ /  anāpattiḥ pravrajyā-bhikṣācaryā-kuśalacaryā-nidāno 'paśabdo niścaret /  anāpattiḥ krodhābhibhūto viparyastacitto niścārayet /
tgt_original: 不犯者，若外道誹謗及餘惡人、若出家乞食修善因緣生他譏毀、若前人若瞋若狂而生譏毀。

src_original: bodhisattvo yena kaṭukaprayogeṇa tīkṣṇaprayogeṇa sattvānāmarthaṃ paśyati taṃ prayogaṃ daurmanasyārakṣayā na samudācarati /  sāpattiko bhavati [sātisāraḥ] (Dutt 117)  akliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 若菩薩觀眾生，應以苦切之言方便利益，恐其憂惱而不為者，是名為犯眾多犯，是犯非染污起。

src_original: anāpattiryat parīttamarthaṃ dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ paśyet prabhūtaśca tannidānaṃ daurmanasyam /
tgt_original: 不犯者，觀彼現在少所利益多起憂惱。

src_original: bodhisattvaścittasthitimārabhyaṃ citaṃ samādhātukāma āghātacitto mānabhinigṛhīto nopasaṃkramyāvavādaṃ yācate /
tgt_original: 若菩薩欲求定心，嫌恨憍慢不受師教，是名為犯眾多犯，是犯染污起。

src_original: sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /  ālasyakausīdyākliṣṭamāpattimāpadyate /  anāpattiglānaḥ syādapratibalaḥ /
tgt_original: 若嬾墮懈怠犯，非染污起。

src_original: anāpattiḥ viparītamavavādaṃ saṃbhāṣayet /  anāpattiḥ svayaṃ bahaśrutaḥ syātpratibalaścittaṃ samādhātum /  kṛtaṃ cānenāvavādakaraṇīyaṃ syāt /
tgt_original: 不犯者，若疾病、若無力、若知彼人作顛倒說、若自多聞有力、若先已受法。

src_original: ṛddhyāvarjanatā katamā /  yā ṛddhimata ṛddhiprātihāryavidarśanā sattvānukampayā sattvānāmāśayaviśuddhiṃ vādhipatiṃ
tgt_original: 神足者，神力示現哀愍眾生令得信樂，信增上已修方便淨。

src_original: bodhisattva utpannaṃ kāmacchandanivaraṇamadhivasayati na vinodayati /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭamāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 若菩薩起五蓋心不開覺者，是名為犯眾多犯，是犯染污起。

src_original: anāpattistatprahāṇāya cchandajātasya vyāyacchata stīvrakleśatayā cittamabhibhūya samudācaraṇāt /  yathā kāmacchanda evaṃ vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhamauddhatyaṃ kaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ca veditavyā /
tgt_original: 不犯者，為斷彼故，起欲方便如前說。

src_original: bodhisattvo dhyānamāsvādayati /  dhyānāsvāde ca guṇadarśī bhavati /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimādte /
tgt_original: 若菩薩見味禪以為功德者，是名為犯眾多犯，是犯染污起。

src_original: anāpattistatprahāṇāya cchandajātasya pūrvavat /
tgt_original: 不犯者，為斷彼故，起欲方便如前說。

src_original: yaḥ punarbodhisattvaḥ evaṃdṛṣṭi syādevaṃvādī na bodhisattvena śrāvakayānapratisaṃyukto dharmaḥ śrotavyo nodgrahītavyo na tatra śikṣā karaṇīyā
tgt_original: 若菩薩如是見如是說言： 「菩薩不應聽聲聞經法、不應受、不應學。

src_original: kiṃ bodhisattvasya śrāvakapratisaṃyuktena dharmeṇa śrutenodgṛhītena /
