src_original: sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 」是名為犯眾多犯，是犯染污起。

src_original: tathā hi bodhisattvena tīrthikaśāstreṣvapi tāvadyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ prāgeva buddhavacane /
tgt_original: 何以故？ 菩薩尚聽外道異論，況復佛語。

src_original: anāpattiḥ aikāntikasya tatparasya vicchandanārtham /  bodhisattvo bodhisattvapiṭake sati bodhisattvapiṭake akṛtayogyaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ bodhisattvapiṭakamadhyupekṣya śrāvakapiṭake yogyāṃ karoti /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 不犯者，專學菩薩藏未能周及。 若菩薩於菩薩藏不作方便棄捨不學，一向修集聲聞經法，是名為犯眾多犯，是犯非染污起。

src_original: sā trividhā draṣṭavyā /
tgt_original: 略說三種。

src_original: bodhisattvo buddhavacane sati buddhavacane akṛtayogyastīrthikaśāstreṣu bahiḥśāstreṣu yogyāṃ karoti /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 若菩薩於佛所說棄捨不學，反習外道邪論世俗經典，是名為犯眾多犯，是犯染污起。

src_original: anāpattiradhimātramedhasaḥ āśūdgrahaṇa-samarthasya cireṇāpyavismaraṇa-samarthasya  arthacintanāprativedhasamarthasya buddhavacane yuktyupaparīkṣāsahagatayā 'vicalayā
tgt_original: 不犯者，若上聰明能速受學、若久學不忘、若思惟知義、若於佛法具足觀察得不動智。

src_original: buddhyā samanvāgatasya taddviguṇena pratyahaṃ buddhavacane yogyāṃ kurvataḥ /

src_original: evamapi ca bodhisattvo vidhimanatikramya tīrthikaśāstreṣu bahiḥśāstreṣu kauśalaṃ kurvannabhiratarūpastatra karauti tena ca ramate na tu kaṭubhaiṣajyamiva niṣevamāṇaḥkaroti /

src_original: sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /  bodhisattvo bodhisattvapiṭake gambhīrāṇi sthānāni śrutvā paramagaṃbhīrāṇi tattvārthaṃ vārabhya buddhabodhisattvaprabhāvaṃ vā 'nadhimucyamāno 'pavadate /  naite arthopasaṃhitā na dharmopasaṃhitā na tathāgatabhāṣitā na hitasukhāya sattvānāmiti /
tgt_original: 若菩薩聞菩薩法藏甚深義真實義、諸佛菩薩無量神力，誹謗不受，言非利益非如來說，是亦不能安樂眾生，是名為犯眾多犯，是犯染污起。

src_original: sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /  svena vā 'yoniśomanaskāreṇa parānuvṛtyā vā 'pavadamānaḥ /  bhavati khalu bodhisattvasya gambhīrāṇi paramagaṃbhīrāṇi sthānāni śrutvā cetaso 'nadhimokṣaḥ /  tatra śrāddhenāśaṭhena bodhisattvenedaṃ pratisaṃśikṣitavyam /
tgt_original: 或自心不正思惟故謗、或隨順他故謗，是菩薩聞第一甚深義不生解心，是菩薩應起信心不諂曲心，作是學：

src_original: na me pratirūpaṃ syādandhasyācakṣuṣmatastathāgatacakṣuṣaivānuvyavaharatastathāgatasandhāya bhāṣitaṃ pratikṣeptum /
tgt_original: 「我大不是，盲無慧目。 如來慧眼，如是隨順說。 如來有餘說，云何起謗？

src_original: iti [evaṃ] sa bodhisattva ātmānañcājñaṃ vyavasthāpayati (Dutt 120)  tathāgatameva ca teṣu buddhadharmeṣvaparokṣatāyāṃ samanupaśyati /
tgt_original: 」是菩薩自處無知處，如是如來現知見法，正觀正向，不犯，非不解謗。

src_original: anāpattiḥ kathāparyavasānakālamāgamayataḥ /  bodhisattvo 'vasādanārhān sattvān daṇḍakarmārhān [pravāsanārhān] kliṣṭacitto nāvasādayati /  avasādayati vā na ca daṇḍakarmaṇā samanuśāsti /  samanuśāsti vā na pravāsayati /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ /  kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 若菩薩見有眾生應呵責者、應折伏者、應罰黜者，以染污心不呵責、若呵責不折伏、若折伏不罰黜，是名為犯眾多犯，是犯染污起。

src_original: ālasyakausīdyāt pramādādvā nāvasādāyati yāvanna pravāsayati akliṣṭāmāttimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 若嬾墮懈怠放逸犯，非染污起。

src_original: yadbodhisattvo vadhakeṣu pratyarthiṣu pratyamitreṣu suviśuddhena niṣkaluṣeṇa cetasā pratisaṃkhyāya sammodanīṃ vā ānandanīṃ vā upakarāṃ vācamudīrayati iyaṃ (Dutt 150)  bodhisattvasya prathamā duṣkarā priyavāditā veditavyā /
tgt_original: 菩薩於怨家所，以清淨心思惟慰喻，發喜饒益而共言說，是名第一難愛語。

src_original: anāpattiḥ kālāpekṣiṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 不犯者，彼不可治、不可與語，難可教誨，多起嫌恨。

src_original: anāpattistato nidānaṃ kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādaprekṣiṇaḥ /  anāpattiḥ saṃvaraṇavibhedaprekṣiṇaḥ /  anāpattiste sattvā aśaṭhā bhaveyustrīvreṇa hrīvyapatrāpyena samanvāgatā laghu laghveva pratyāpadyeran /
tgt_original: 若觀時，若恐因彼起鬪諍相違、若相言訟、若僧諍、若壞僧，若彼不諂曲有慚愧漸自改悔。

src_original: bodhisattvo vicitrarddhivikurvitaprabhāvasamanvāgataḥ uttrāsanārhāṇāṃ sattvānāmuttrāsanāya āvarjanārhāṇāñca sattvānāmāvarjanāya śraddhādeyaparihārāya [ṛddhyā] (Dutt 124)
tgt_original: 若菩薩成就種種神力，應恐怖者而恐怖之、應引接者而引接之，欲令眾生消信施故。

src_original: nottrāsayati nāvarjayati /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ akliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /

src_original: iha bodhisattvaḥ saṃgrahītavyāṃśca sattvān samyak saṃgṛhṇāti /  nigrahītavyāṃśca sattvān samyagnigṛhṇāti /  śāsanapratihatānāñca sattvānāṃ pratighātamapanayati /  madhyasthān sattvānasmin śāsanee 'vatārayati /  avatīrṇāśca sattvān samyak triṣu yāneṣu paripācayati /  paripakvāṃśca sattvān vimocayati /
tgt_original: 是菩薩應攝等攝、應伏等伏，違佛法者除其障礙，中住眾生令入法律，已入者以三乘法而成熟之，已成熟者令得解脫。

src_original: tadekatyāṃśca sambhāra-rakṣopacaye saṃniyojayati /  yaduta hīnayāna-niḥsṛtiṃ vārabhya mahāyāna-niḥsṛtiṃ vārabhya /
tgt_original: 眾具護養勸導成熟，所謂勸捨小乘守護大乘，如眾具護養。

src_original: yathā sambhārarakṣopacaye evaṃ praviveke cittaikāgratāyāmāvaraṇaviśudau manaskārabhāvanāyāṃ ca sanniyojayati /
tgt_original: 如是獨靜一心淨諸障礙，憶念及修勸令成就。

src_original: pṛthagvidhā ca paricaryā tadyathā glānopasthānaparicaryā dharmyacīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyaparicaryā  śokakaukṛtyaprativinodanaparicaryā kleśaprativinodanaparicaryā /  ityevaṃbhāgīyāḥ pṛthagvidhā paricaryāṃ veditavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 攝取者，依止無貪心修行布施，瞻視和上諸師疾病，供施衣食湯藥眾具，若有憂悔及餘煩惱能為開解，修如是等如法供養。

src_original: śrāvaka-pratyeka-buddhagotrān śrāvaka-pratyeka-buddhayāne sanniyojayati /
tgt_original: 有聲聞緣覺種性者，以聲聞緣覺乘而成就之；

src_original: tathāgata-gotrānanuttare samyaksaṃbodhiyāne niyojayati /
tgt_original: 有如來種性者，以無上菩提而成就之。

src_original: tatra katamā bodhisattvānāṃ vighātārthikārthacaryā /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩除惱行利？

src_original: sā 'ṣṭavidhā draṣṭavyā /
tgt_original: 略說八種。

src_original: nigrahaḥ katamaḥ /  ātmagatāṃ saṃkleśārakṣāṃ saṃvidhāya skhalitacodanā mṛdau vyatikrame /  madhye vyatikrame 'vasādanā /  adhimātre vyatikrame pravāsanā /
tgt_original: 伏取者，心正思惟自護煩惱，見餘眾生若有毀失，下犯訶責、中犯折伏、上犯驅出。

src_original: hretavyeṣu sthāneṣvāhrīkyaparyavasthāna-paryavasthitānāṃ sattvānāmāhrīkyaparyavasthānaṃ vinodayatyapanayati /
tgt_original: 若有眾生所應慚處令捨無慚纏，以得開覺如無慚纏。

src_original: yathā āhrīkyaparyavasthānamevamapatrapitavyeṣu anapatrāpyaparyavasthānaṃ middhaparyasthānamauddhatyaparyavasthānaṃ  kaukṛtyaparyaṃvasthānamīrṣāparyasthānaṃ [mātsaryaparyavasthānaṃ] vinodayatyapanayati /
tgt_original: 如是無愧纏、睡纏、眠纏、掉纏、悔纏、慳纏、嫉纏，悉令聞覺亦復如是。

src_original: tatra yā ca codanā yā cāvasādanā sā teṣāmeva hitasukhārthaṃ tadanyeṣāñca /  yā punaḥ pravāsanā punaḥ pratisaṃharaṇāya sāpi teṣāṃ cānyeṣāṃ ca hitasukhāya /
tgt_original: 呵責、折伏，為安樂彼及餘眾生；

src_original: tatra katamā bodhisattvasyehāmutrasukhā 'rthacaryā /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩此世他世樂行利？

src_original: sā navavidhā draṣṭavyā /
tgt_original: 略說九種。

src_original: parasattvānāṃ kāyakarmapariśuddhimārabhya sarvākārā prāṇātipātāt prativiratisamānāpanatā /  sarvākārādattādānāt-prativirati-samādāpanatā /  sarvākārā kāmamithyācārāt-prativirati-samādāpanatā /  sarvākārā surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānāt prativirati-samādāpanatā /
tgt_original: 普令眾生身業清淨，謂授一切種不殺生、一切種不盜、一切種不邪婬、一切種不飲酒。

src_original: vākkarmapariśuddhimārabhya sarvākārā mṛṣāvāda-prativirati-samādāpanatā /  sarvākārā paiśunya-prativirati-samādāpanatā /  sarvākārā pāruṣya-prativirati-samādāpanatā /  sarvākārā sambhinnapralāpa-prativirati-samādāpanatā /
tgt_original: 普令眾生口業清淨，謂授一切種不妄語、一切種不兩舌、一切種不惡口、一切種不綺語。

src_original: (Dutt 154) manaskarmapariśuddhimārabhya sarvākārābhidhyāvyāpādamithyādṛṣṭi-prativirati-samādāpanatā /
tgt_original: 普令眾生意業清淨，謂授無貪、無恚正見。

src_original: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya viśuddhā 'rthacaryā /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩清淨行利？
